item.text: rgya gar skad du/ shi na la tan rAraM/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes
'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// kyemasas rgyas
kyisangs rgyas M// ngomatshar rmad du byung ba yi// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang// ye shes
'a@#// gang lags 'bar ba gang// dpal ni gang lags bdag la gsus// 'jigs
khyad chen pos bka' stsal ba// dpal niganyis med ye shes te// gnyis med bde chen ro las byung//
gzung 'dzin matha' spas lang dag go/ sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes che// rang byin brlabs pa lte bar te//
dkyil 'khor 'khor gsang b.ro// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar// thung du gnas shing rang du
'gyur// de nyidadrang du ba dbye dang// rgyas par bya ba gsum yodado// drang po drang ba'i rnam pa yang// 'drongs
pa'i tshadan gsum yod de// sgo gsum yon tan gsum ldan na// so ba'i phyir 'byung bar nges// 'bring la sor
gnyis tham la// sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung// sbom phragazhan skyes phramo tsam// dang po bya gdong nyid na gnas//
rnam thasor gnyis skye mched bzhi// stong pa bcu drug khams bco brgyad// nyi'u lte bar nyi shul// snying ka ru ni gnas
pa'o sman lasogs pa kun ldan pas// drang ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// rnam snangaska rags bcing ba dang// rgyab yol/
dbul dang mchodang dbul// gdan khri dbul dang sku khrus dbul// sman mchod dbul dang re mchod dbul//
denas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo 'am// khromo mdzub mo'i rtse mo yi// bdud rtsi ril bu legs byas te// mkhas pas
rigs bya'i mchod pa 'bul// mngon dushes pa gdon mi za// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// khams gsum mchod pa ragadon mi za//
dar ram mod trisorab zhi'i tshad// rked pasku rags dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// ras bal lasogs rgyab
yol dbul// shing bu rigs dang mthun pa yi// sbom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam// mdasman dang snum ldan pa'i// zug rdum bskyed mchod
rdzas kyis// kyi ri tsana'i lam dumachod// dri ma ruyo khrus byas te// khrus kyis lus la mchod pa dbu'o// sman dang snum gyi yisi/
sgo gnyis dag tumachod pa dbul// shAni tudre ba'i mi dag gis// gtum mo'i mi lamachod pa dbul/ ched pa'i tshad mnyam kartika/ gdan khribastab pa'i mchod pa dbul// de yis
drongs par gdon mi za// de nas rgyas par bya ba yang// gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi na 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun// rgyas par byed pa'i lam yin te// brgyad pa'i sbyor bgasum byas na//
dper na ma tog pad+ma bzhin// de nas dbyeba'i rim pa yang// gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// dus gsu'ulce yi rtse mos kyang// bskyod na nges pa kha 'byed de// de nyid gsum ni mo rang bzhin
ma 'bar ba yi rkyen gyur pa// rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste// rkyen des me nyid 'bar ba bshad// gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag dang// srog rtso la rlung ni dbu mar dgam/ bum pa zhes
mdarlung phul nas// sgo dgu phyi ladrag tu bud// lus kyi ngal dub chab snyam ste// sbyong brdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen// bad pa lasanaMdzi rje 'chang// bde ba yisan bdeb 'grub// rgyu bde
ba las 'bras bu bde// rgyu yinungana'adi mchog la// 'bras bu'inangan 'di mchog go/ de nas bde ba'i rkyen gyur pa// srid pa dgag dang rlungadagag pa// gnas nas gnas su rten bozung
ste g.yas brkyang bas ni rim dgag/ dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha' 'grogayon// g.yon brkyang bas ni brkyang ma ste// sa gas kun dar ma ru gzung// de bzhin zlum pos dbu mar gzung/
de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang// dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon// de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang// drilatsan bu gu dgu
lam kyi// rlung rgyu phyi ru bus byas te// rkang lag drug tu bsaMms byas na// zin par 'di la the tshom med// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis// thun mong dun bya bar gsungs// b.ron las
kyi rlung// gzhan yang lam brgyud rlung rnams dag/ dang po nyid du bsdams byas na// zin par 'di la the tshom med// dbye ba bsdams pa'i mnangag go/ byed pa sprul mar sos gyur na// mi zin pa la
the tsom mad// gnas gsum dag tu klu bsams te// dbugs gsum pa yis yaradrangs te// lte ba'i rgyan la drangs kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yin// mdzes pa'i spyi bo de de la//
gyen du bkan dang thur du bkan// drang bor g.yas g.yon btsan thabs la// ka ti'i gze ni btsan thabs gcig/ sngomapo khromosamanan pa ste// bla ma'i zhal nas ma blangasan// lus kyi nad gzhi
kun nas skye// chu skyes chu so skrangs lasogs// lus smad nadasna nyi shu 'byung// gzhan yang btsan thabs bcuganyisani// bla ma'i zhalanas shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// lus
srog longs spyod thams cad kyis// dusagasum maN+Dal dngabacas mchod// lus srog gtang bar 'phangs pa bas// man ngag dam pa de bas 'phangs// de bas btsan thabs 'phegs par sa/
man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas// de nyid rgyud du shes par bya// zab mo'i don ston rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje phag mo la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad byung 'ad// khyod la gtad dodam
baspos// kun laspyal nadamatshig nyams// kye ma rgyud 'di'i don 'dril// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ dpa' bo mkha' 'grom pa tshogs// thams cad ngo mtshar cher
sos te// dga' zhing mgunas yi rang ngo// dpal yi shes lab ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang che gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs so////sangag gling/
gi rnal 'byor ma tsaN mA le dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyurab/ ka@#// skyagangaskad du/ tsin+d+ha ma le tanarAdza/ bod skad du/
dpalazlaba'i 'phrang ba'i rgyudakyirgyalapo/ dpal rdo rjesems dpa' la phyag 'tshalal// kye ho mgon po rdorjecan// sgrol ma tigurtsa bzhi yi// nges pa gang lags tshad gang lags// rang
bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags M// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin grub pa sgrub 'dod pas// bla ma'i bka'adrin legs mnos te// dur
khrodalasogasas phyogs su// bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan// brtags pa las dang po yi gnas// gang zag mchog la brtagatumad// yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'jug ste// bla med sems
gzung rnal 'byor pas// sgo gsum dal ba'i tshad brtagaste/ bcing ba gsum n nges bsgoms pas// skye ba gcig gis 'grub par nges// dbugs bcing kun rdzobasna
rtsir yid/ yid bcing sor bzhi'i nam mkha'i khams// sems bcing rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen lasanasna tshogs las// sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'byung// de dag bcingagasum dag
pa yis// sems can bacings las nges par grol// bram 'i zhalas shes par bya// 'du shes gsum gyi cha las grol// thig le chagasum phra mon// yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i rim//
sgra dang rang rig re rer snang// stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul/ sa dang lamasogs mi pa kun// rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar// de nas sgrol ma'i tshad bstan te// tshad ni spyi dang
bye brag ste/ brgya phrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis dang/ yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba// gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum culnga// yi ge bcu dgu las 'byung ba/ li'i
chen 'phreng ba'i nges pa'itshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu bzhi// mi 'gyur bcu gsum las khyu ba// sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o/ brgyad cu rtsa lnga'i yig bzhis// mtshang ba las gang
'gyurab// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yig gcig/ rin chen 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do// sum cu rtsa gcig yo gi ni// ti shu rtsa gnyis las byungab// nam mkha'
mnyam pa'i tshad yin// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ dmatshigachen po'i rgyud kyi tshad// drug cu yi ge nyi shu gcig/ gsang bde rjer rab tugrags/ drug cu rtsa gnyis ma 'gyur ba// bcu drug
stobs po che yatshad// bzhi bcurtsa gcig yig la// nam ma lachen po'i tshod yin no/ drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ ye shes 'bar ba'i ldang tshad de// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge dgu// ye shes
'phror ba'i tshad pa na// sum cu rtsa bzhi lde'u bzhi// mkha' 'grogasang b.le tshad yin// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag/ meya'aphrangaba'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ shu rtsa
gnyis bco brgyad dag/ ye shes rgyal po'i ldang tshad do// bdun cu brgyad dang phyed// chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshod yin// tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu lnga// ye shes bsam pa'i ldang

tshad do// dgu bcugakhargyud las byung ba// ye shes gsang ba'i tshad yin no// nyingeshu tham pa gang yin pa// gsang ba rdo rje rgyal bo'atshod// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni// rdo rje rgyal po' ra ba'i
tshad lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi gri bsu// dur khrod rgyan gyi ldang tshad do// sum nurtsal sum yig ni/ bcu drug mkha' 'grom sdom tshad// lnga bcu yi ge bco lnga las// byung ba gsang ba bdud
rtsi'i rgyal// bzhi bcu yi go nyi'u bzhi// 'a ma'i 'khor lo'i gzhung tshadad// sum cu yi ge bcu drug las// byung ba zla ba'i 'phrong tshad do// de nas nges par bshad bya ste// gsang ba'i
'khor lo gang ston pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dmatshigadag/ ston padam tshigachen por nges// dgra drugasten pa stobs poche// dbang bzhi ngag sgrub gsang ba gcod//
rangarig de ston basam mi khyab// yi ge gsum ston rin chen 'bar// sgrogasum 'amaston nam mkha' mnyam// bcom ldan lasogs ze tsam med// ston pa nam mkha'i chen po ste// dbang
bzhi'idi nyid gangaston pa// yeshes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges// lta spyod rmad du gang byung ba// ston pa ye shes 'phra dbaranges// gleng bslang rnam pa lnga yi don// ston pa ma la' 'gro gsang
pa'i rgyud// he ru ka dpal gang ston pa/ me yi 'phreng ba'i rgyud du grags// dbang gsum don ni gang ston pa// sku gsung thugasakyi ra lar nges// snod bcud rin chen ston byed pa// rin
chen 'phrang ba'i ralir nges/ lhan cig skyes ston ye shes bsam// jo rje rtog pa med pa 'o// lha yi de nyid gang ston pa// chags pa'i rgyal po ra lir nges// nges pa lnga ston rdo rje rgyal//
gi ma ral zhes grags// dur khrod brgyad ston dur khrod rgyun// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' 'gro gsum// ston pa ma la 'a 'gro sdom pa 'o// dkyil 'khor la sogs drug skor pa// gsar
ba bdud rtsi 'i rgyal po'o// 'khrul pa 'khrul gzhi des dapa// gsum ston ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud// ma spangs nges ston ti'i tshe lo// tshad nges sgrub gsum ston zla 'phreng// rgyudasogs
lta ston ye shes 'bar// de nas 'kher thams cad dga' nas rgyud thams cad kyi don layi rang bar gyur to// dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga yarU radang/ lo tsA ba dge slongashAkya ye kaMs kyis bsgyur ba'o///@#// rgya gar skad du/ rat+ta rwa la tanarA dza nA ma/
bod skad du/ dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes byakha/ dpalo kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal la// habardo rje snying po dang// mkha' spyod ma 'a sogs pa dag/ sgo gsum
legs par basdus nas ni// ra' tshon po'i bya ba nyon// la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud// ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud// i phyis las gnyis mod rgyud// thabs ni sku ste shes rab
gsung// graltos med thugs su shesapar bya// snyagasung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// rti shu rtsa bzhi byung ba'o// a la la ho i ma 'o// thabs nal laMs ji ltar byung// ra las shes
rab ji ltar byung// a las gnyis mad ji ltar byung// sku gsungathugs su ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhir ji ltar dbye// e ma homagon pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen
bos bka' stsal pa// a las a pa d+hAtiso// 'di nyid lasazhiganyis med rgyud// 'byung ba'i gnas dang rgyur brtag/ la las 'a nA yi rtsa// de las zabs [”]rgyud byung ba'i// rgyudang
bla/ gnas dang ngo bor brtag/ ralas rasanA ya rtsa// 'di nyid lasan shes rab kyi// ral 'byung ba'i rgyud dang gnas// ma chags phyir shes rab ste// shes rab yi ge
bcu drug brda/ lananub phyir thabs yin te// thabs kyi yig bcu bzhibarda// thog ma medanasam skyes pa// e nagasemad rang bzhin te// gnyis med blo yo spyod yul min// khro dang sgra ni kun
rdzob phyir// g.yas ni thabs yin la lanA// g.yon pa shes rab rasan// aban+tA tIganyis su med// thabs dnga shes rab gnyis med kyi// rali'i ngo bo shes par bya// 'dod chags rdul
zla la lus na thabs// lalanA ni sku yin te// gtimug mun pa dgadang yang// shes rab ra sa nAnagasung// zhesngang snyingestobs yid yin te// thugs te gsum gyis 'gyur ba'o// skul

brgyud degasupalabargyad//thug la brgyad de nyi shu bzhi/rali tIshuba'i sa//gnas niakaM brtsa bzhi dang// tsan+dA la dang phyag dag dang// mkha' 'gro 'byung po nyi shu bzhi// de nyid brda ru nges pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi
tshu dbye bsaso// gnas dngamakha' 'gror li dbye// sku gsum du 'di nyid bsdu// dalor rgyud kyi nges pa dang// rgyu ya gnas adang gnas nges pa// gtangs nges dang go rams pas// grangs
nges rigs res btse ltar nges/ mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa yi/ dman pa'i rim pas dang pogasungs// dman pa rnams la byapa'i rgyud// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid yin te// skyes pa
ba 'dul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud// yin s rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// bud med yongs su gzung phyir ro// dang po rtsa ba'i rgyu gsungs te// nga nas bshad pa'i rgyu nyid do// de nas rgyudan phyi ma'o//
de rjes phyi ma'i phyi ste/ rim pa bcu nibaskorab ste// snod nganadaman pa'i rim pas gsungs// me tog sAng po'i[é]cud bzhin du// phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi'i// ra'i snying po snyingaposkyid//
dang po la lasasku yi rgyud/ dpa' bo mkha' 'groms zhus nas// sku yal ba'i 'gro brgyad la gtad/ de rjes ra las gsung gi rgyud// gsung gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// phyi nas
alas thugs kyi rgyud// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi 'i lo// lus 'dus lus gsal mig gis lus// gsalaba'i phyir ni sgron ma ste// spong ba'i
gzugs 'drab dud rtsi'i ro/ tima'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer// 'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'awe ting// chubo'i rgyun 'dra ra'ab lhun// u dum wAr 'dra'i zhing gi rdul// 'di la 'dod 'dod tshol
ba dang// rtog ge pa yis dpyad du med// gal te rang 'dod dpyad gyur na// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro khros gyur to// mgo lus tshal pa brgya ru 'gas// debasard gachung ma dang// bu dang yul
'khor lus ngag gis// blam dam ngamanyes byaste// chub rgyun 'dra'i man ngag blang// kye ma'o mgon po snying rje can// ra 'i 'i dbye ba de ltar na// de yichen po ji ltar lags// nang du nyi shu
rtsa bzhi yi// nges paslar ya nga bdag la gsungs// de rjecan gyis bka'astsal nga// ma srings nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// ral 'dedachen por nges// de de la yang chen po
bdun// gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la// rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste// sa lu lasan myu gu bzhin// de phyir dang po rgyu maspang// lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes
pa dang// lhan cag lhan cig skyes pa'o// thun mong dang ni thun mong min/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya'i phyir/ dang 'o bo ma la' 'gro'azhi la yin te// de nyid ston pa'i bka' las 'das//
de las 'khrul pa snying re rje// phung sogs rtsa dang shu kran/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te// log rtog 'khrul pa rgyur 'dod dang// ngo bam grub rgyur 'dod dang// kun rdzob byang sems rgyur
'dod pa// 'dir rmi(ngas pa da rungs pa// phung po 'byung ba dag pa lo dang// phyi yi skye mched dman pa'i rgyu// brtogs pa rgyur 'dod snying rje// nam mkha'i me tog gi dregang// rang bzhin
gnas pa 'i rtsa rlung sogs// khyad nga ralam gyi rgyu yin te// rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes par// log par rtogs pa snying rje'oms// don ngan byang chub sems kyisan// lhan cig skyes pa'i
ye shes rgyu// bla ma ma bsten de las 'khrul// kun rdzopa shu kru rgyur 'dod pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu'akhrul pa'o// rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi 'byin// de phyir rkyen ni spang mi bya// ye shes
rlung dang ye shes ma// lhan skyes gnyis med rgyun yin te// de nyid srung ba mi bya zhing// las kyi rlung dang ma nyid dang// gzhan du'ang de 'od sbyar bya dang// srid pa len dang bde ba len//
las ma spang zhing bde ba yang// mi sbrang ban bzhi po'o// lus dang lus kyi sing po rtsa// gnas dang gnas chen ma slang nga// lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid phyi dang nad du shes// phyi
nang dbye ba ma slangs pa 'o// snang ba dang ni mun pa'i ra/ gang ba dang ra song nga 'i char// 'pho ba ma spangs brgyud pa'o// rgyu yi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas// de nyid mi spangashos par bya//
rinapo che yi pho brang du// rtenan me spyad shu kra gzung// gal te de rum zin na// shar ba mi snang ra mar bstim// gnyen po ma sbyang gzugs sku gnyis// ma sa pa nibcuganyis pa'o//
nor bu'i rten las skyes pa ya// bde ba la brtenadabang po yi// sgo bas ngo be ma sngangs pa'o// gong 'og khyang nga ra shes byas nas// sgyu mas gton po mas nges pa'o// dga' ba mchog dga'
shes byas te// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya ste// gnas nas gnas su zlog byed nga// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim par 'pho byed pa//
bla ma'i bla ma las brgyudashes/ 'khor bar 'jug ldog bye brag ni// 'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa gnyis// ye shes mon cher 'bar bas// phung po 'byung po dbang re sogs// thams cad
bdud rtsir gyurapan// rkyen gyi khyab par m spangs pa'o// lus kyi ba sa'i bu ga dang// bstan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba// ngo bo'i
khyadapar ma slangs pa'o// de nyid skyama'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma sbyangs pa'i// bzhin mdzes pa la mgayangs phyag rgyan// ldan pa phyag rgya ma spangs pa'o// dam tshig
chos kyi phyag rgya dang// de nas yoshes phyag rgya che// phyag rgyale khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ chags pa'i phyag las yin te// dam tshig chos ni mning gi/ phyag rgyu gnyis su shes par bya//
yengashes phyag rgya chen po gnyis// grol ba'i phyag rgya yin par 'dod// phyag rgyu'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por gsang ba'i 'khor ler te// phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lor yin//
'khor lo'i dbo ba ma sangs pa'o/ dang po gsang ba'i gtum mos// gnyis par rang bzhin gtum mon// gtum mo'i dbye ba masngangs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang ma gnyis ni//
a kun rdzob 'khorab 'i rkyen yin te// ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni/ don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma phyungs pa'o// srid pa bskyed cipe'adzag pa 'di// kun rdzob
kra'i la sa yin ne// srid pa mi 'dren rang rig skyos// donadam byang sems las yi ra no// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa 'o// sbyor thabs rtsa ni rgyas pa dang// kha 'amed pa yi las yin
khe sbyorathabs bzhi lam rmongs pa// 'di min spangs sti rgyung// spyi mthun ba las grub pa yi// mog drug la sogs grangs kyis bstan// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod ngs/
bla ma'i dus thabs legs par bstan// mi sprangs nges pa'i gang ras ngag drung// 'di nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu// de las byung ba khyad par 'bras// drang por ste thig le dang// tshul dang
tshul can mchog gzhan mchog/ 'di nyid de nyid drug yin te// de'i pardzu ni tsaNA lA// re re la yang ngano bzhi ste// tsatsA' no'u bzhi// ra'i nyishurtsa bzhir nges// phyir gnas nii
shu bzhi// spyan dang phyag rgya lteshu bzhi// tsaNA lA dang ra la yi// phyi dang nang du grangs su nges// yang ng 'a bo rdo rje 'chang// ra li 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags// rala'i ngobagang gang
lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sku dang phyag ra tshan rags pa kun// rar 'a re po mar pa 'i 'am// mkha'aphyongs sbyongs log spyod// sgo gsum la gnas khyad
par gyi// rala'i ngo bor gsungs pa yin// dga' ba bcu drug rkyen dang bcas// zab pa'i ra 'a 'a ngo por brtag/ rang rig stong pa thobs dang bcas// mthar thug ralir shes par bya//
a thog mar ma skyes pa// lan nub dang skyong bsdu// mni chags dang rin po cha/ dar las 'dod chags khrag yin te// la las zhe sdang khu ba'o// a las gtimug tu bste// sems
can ra la'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs// kun la ldan pas ra lira gnas // sku ya lal spyi bo ya// gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o//
gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po las// thugs kyi re li thugs kanas// byung ba rnam par nges pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rdzoyi// sman rnams la narang bzhin byung// sku gsung
thugs kyi gnas las te// spyi bo lasogs dag las byung// phyag gi mthil nas rim pas byung// blo ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya// bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin te// he hasoms can
y+Yo sangs rgyas kyi// rang bdenas dang lam ldan te// zla ba bcu sogs sa sogs// rdzus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags/ 'on te sangs rgyas min nam ci// sems can thams cad
gdod ma nas// sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// rdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsherasogs// sems kyi gnas bcus bcu ste// rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga// mkhan po sems
tshad kyi rgyu' po ste// rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas pa laspu bregs/ a dang higanyis sngags kyi don// thams cad sems la gnas pa ste// sa mas med sangs rgyas
ma yin te// ngam grog la sogs bems po'o// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no/ rgyudang 'bras bu'i tshul dang yang// khag la nyal
dang kun tu rgyu/ nus pa'i tshul dang mngon sum tshul/ gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtag sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin go/ de ltasems can sangs rgyas pa/
ralisams cin rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku yi phyag rgyas gdab// ngag lagasungag phyag rgyas gdab// sems la zugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du//
dngos po mnyamagyur pa la// sangs rgyas sems can g la yod// dman dang gya nom ga la yod/ 'khor ba yongs su shes pa la/ mya ngan 'das zhes de 'barjod// thams cad
'jigs dang rnam rtog phreng// 'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyis// legs poragatad kyis dam du spro// de'i tshe 'khora'adus pa thams cad ngomatshar dugyur te mi snang bar gyur to/
dbal rin chen 'bar ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so////rnal 'byoram zla ba'i 'phrang ba dang/ lo tsa ba dgeslong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ bAsUr+yatsakra tanArAdzanAm/ bod skad du/ dpal rima'i'i khor lo'i rgyudakyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal
bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal le/ a lal hodapa' bo kyi// ngomatshar rmad du byung ba yi// bskyed dang rdzogs pachen po yi// ma spangs pa dang ngos pa dag/ mgon pos bdag la
bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po ma srangasa bshad bya ste// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ bskyod pa'i rim pa'i rgyu maspungs//
phyagamtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang/ blamasanangag rkyenam sngangs// lus ngag sgo bsdams dam tshig las// sku gachos 'byung ba 'bras ma sbyangs// zhe sdang ru tra ba'i las/[“]/zhe sdang
rang rig bskyed pa dang// lus kyi dri ma 'khrud pa las// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// pu li ra dang dza lan sogs// nang du spyi bospyi gtsug sogs// gnas kyi dbye ba ma sbyangs
bgo/ shar sogs bdud kyi snying ka ru// zhabs gnas gnasachen ma spangs pa// gnas de phyi dang nang dushes// gnas kyi dbye ba ma sngangs pago/ gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin/
phung sogs lha ru 'pho byed na// 'din 'pho bam spangs pa'o// rgyu yi gnas nistong ka ste// 'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs te/ ma sngangs pa ni gnyis su shes// phung sogs sgyum
lu 'dzin byed pa// 'din rten pa ma sngangs pa'o// gal te nang du ma zin na// phyi ru de nyid ngo bor bsgom// de nyid shur ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po ma spangs sgyumar bsgom// phung sog
la rten lha rnams la// sgo gsum ngo bo ma spangs pa// tha mal pa dang bskyed rim gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste// sgyu ma gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// bdun po rnam dag la
sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba ma sngangs pa'o// phung sogs rtog pa la sa leg nas// phra ba'i gnas su gnas pa byed// gnas kyi khyad parngam spangs pa'o// lha yi rnam par 'jug
pa dang/ gangadu skumar bzlog pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad pa ram sngangs ted// ye shes me na cher 'bar te// phung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa// rten gyi khyad par ma sbyangs pa
mnyam gzhag rjes klobi kun 'gags te// thams cad rten dang brten par snang// ngo bo'i khyad par ma sbyangs pa// de nyid sgyu ma'i rong bzhin med// gnyen po'i byed par ma spangs pa'o//
shes rab phag mo ma sngangs pa// phyag rgyu ma spungs pa ru 'dod// ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra// gong 'og las kyi khyad par ro// zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags gsung// gti
mug sku yi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma sngangs nga// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor la// bde ba chen po'i 'khor 'de dag/ 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma sngangs pa'o// dang po sgyu ma
ye shes ma// gnyis pa sgyu ma ltar snang re// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma phyungs pa'o// phung sogs sgyu ma 'a sa g.yo zhing// phung sogs sgyu mas yang dag srug/ kun rdzob rtogs pa'i
rkyen yin te// sgyu ma ltar snango las g.yo zhing// sgyu ma de nyid lhar bsregs pa// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma pangs pa'o// 'khor ba sgrol zhing
rnam rtog bskyod/ kun rdzob bden pa sems kyi las// 'khor bar mi 'khor rang rig bskyed// don dam sems kyi las yin te// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa//
shA'adi dag ma spangs tishu brgyad// bum pa'i dbang dung 'brel pa'o// gsangadabang bla ma'i zhal nas rlung// shes rab ye shes gzhan du'o// bzhi pa'i ma sngangs nyi shu brgyud// rang
rig lhan cigaskyes pa yi// chos de ma dag bzhi pa'i rgyu// zhol gyi chen ngag rkyen ma slangs// 'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig mes/ bsreg pa las ma spangs pa yin// gong 'og rim
bas dbye ma spangs// a ba rA ti'og min gnas/ gnas dang gnas chen ma sbyangs pa// nyid phyi dang nang du nges// phyi nang dang ba ma sngangs pa ste/ stong pa dang ni ga zung 'a rin char/
'pho ba ma sangs a dang haM rtenam spangs te rtog pa la// sems 'phros de nyid rang rig rasgom// sher ba ma sngangs par rig pa// dbang po'i sgo bsdu ngom spangs// zlog parom gtan
pom spangs pa// rang rig spyi lasems pa las// sngon du ma spangs m spangs brgyud// bam ri kha nas shes par g/ spyodang rang rigamtshan nyid la/ 'tshe ba ma spangs rang ge bsgom//
phyag rgyu laspangs rang rig las// 'phrin las tishu rtsa bzhi 'byung// las ma spangs tegazhan rnams ni// bla ma'i zha'anas shis par bya// dad med blom ma bsten dang// rgyu ma ngam pa ma
pa ra dang// ma spangs ngo bor ma shesapar// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bas+saMbs// dper na sprul gyi 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bco lnga yang// rgyu
dngargyun ngang gnas dang yang// gtad pa go rim grangs dang// nges pa bdun na gzhan du gsungs// sdogasanaspros bcas spros med des// rkyen ni yi shesazhe rlung nges// rgyu 'bras
gnas na sa haM nges// dbang pan gong 'og khyad par nges// sun 'byin ganyen po nges pa dang// de la ngas dang dbye ba nges// las nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de lasaM bya ba ye nges padag/
bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas nigashes// ma sngangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongs su shes rgyu na// 'khrul ba dang na la khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di yis srong pa khyed/
'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung// gong du chudang gzugs su gnas// de bzhin gzugs 'dus 'dus pas// gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ruyang/
khyung ni nges pa go ste// rgyudanadabangapo'i ngo bor gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang/ bod pas bla mamanyes bu ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang// de yi man ngag shes
pa ra bya// bla ma mnyes par Mm byas shing// dbang rnams thob pa ma byas par/ nupa sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cidi rlag par 'gyur// de bas 'bad de nan tan bya/
dpal ma'i 'khor lo'irgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so///rgyagar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ latsang dge slongashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing
zhus tagatan la phab pa'o//@#// rgya gar skad du/ hAdzAn rAdza tan rAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/
dpal bdeb chen po la phyag 'tshol lo// kyemasangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas/ kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa lags// gang phyi sems can thams cad kyis// mya ngan 'das pa thob
bya'i phyir// dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te// blama'irjes su'ajug par bya// rang rig gnyis su med pa la// gzhan ragi gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gzod nas ma skyes ma
grub la// skyes dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po romanyamagyur pa la// dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par
brjod ba lag/ sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis skye bas 'khrul// brda dang tha snyad bral ba la// blo yi spyod yul
byed pas 'khrul// mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// rtag dang chad por 'dzin bsa'akhrul/ shes brjod yul las 'das pa la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul//
dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtog kun gyis stong pa la// dpon rak+Shes su 'dzin pa sa la khrul// rang nyid gnyis su med pa la// bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pas
'khrul/ gdul byasna tshogs 'dul ba gi/ theg pa du ma'i 'og so da skur 'dzebs pas 'a sprul// sems can 'khrul ba sna tshogs kyis/ las kyi rnam smin
la sogs la// bltabs skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// ka pa/ khrod su Da'ad/[z]la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// rdo rje 'dzin bar 'dod pas 'khrul//
'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste// luphrul pa zhu 'phrul pa 'os 'das na// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang
chen po dang// de bzhin zhe sngang bcom ldan 'das// gtilug gti mug chen po ha// de bzhin g.yug bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyi/ 'di sbyangs/
gzhan gyis grol ba min// bdag bo lha dang bla ma sbran// bdag po gcig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa khasdus de las gzhan// skye bo'i bems po cha dang brgyad// de dag
rang rig thob pa'i rgyu// de phyir dam tshig gtso bor bsrungs/ 'bras yu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung/ kyamamagon po kyi sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de lta na// de yi ngo bo
ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra// ro rje snying po snying rdzache// legs par nyon la yid la zung// las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi/ rgyu 'bras
mishesagatimug ste/ lus sems kun nas 'khrugs pa dag/ zhesdang yin te sgo gsum gyis// kun nas bslangs nor bu'i mthar// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chagasaso// dbang
sogs ngo bo gangamashes// 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste// ngo bo sgyu maregang shes dang// dbangabo'i
[W, ]sgo bsdus thabs yin te// gong maskye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i// phyire yang chen por gyur pa ste// gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang// de las gzhan dgomos 'gyur dang// mang bo ma mos
spong ba dang// nyon mongs spyi yis zilam non/ bye brag 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs// thil gyis mi non 'og ma yi// rnam rtog gang yang mi skyo dag/ nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag
tsha/ sbyong/ gnyen po yin par ngos pa dang// nyon mongs spu rtse tsam ma skyo// gnyis ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// bcuganyis 'dod chags chen po dag/ bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste/
zhesnapalasogs de bzhin no// zab mo'i lta spyod ma rtogs par// sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed// de dag ngal ba don med yin// de dag bla ma dam pa las// man ngag
dam pa btsal byaste// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi 'as// sad nga ra byed pa'i cho ga dang// de'i tshe rgyar kyi den la dga' zhing rjes su yarang bar gyurato// dpalayi shes rgyal po
zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//3 rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ 'atsi ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur go
rgyugar skad du/ shAbadzra b+hU kwani gu tan+ta pA dza/ bod skadadu/ dpal rdo rje ra la 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpaMl he ru ka la phyag 'tshal go/ kye mngon
rdzogs mgon po kyi// drapar rnams dam pa yod da ma ci// ga myo 4 'khor khyab pa dam med dam ci// sems can dang rnams rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam
ci dam tshig che chung ji ltar machis// de nyams bshags zabasad da ngam nyi// ba[$ '] ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang// rang rig ye
shes blugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam duyod// rnapa'o a64sa kyi klong/ pa na yes la smod// lus ngag kun nas bzang ba la// de phyir sems kyi dri ma na//
'khrud dong gtor dang sreg pa dang// mkhyen pa'i rten dang/ spyod pas// ba dang chu dang ma da rlung// nam mkha' lta gugasungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim
gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob/ bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtog pa'i rim pa dang// mngon par rtogs pa yan lag go/ 'di yis ngan 'gro sridi las grol//
dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi pa tshul gyi dbang// sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro ched// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// glob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin// 'di ni rang rig
rab zhi pa'i dbang// 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang// ras
dang tshon pa lasogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma 'a sogs de ltar na//
la/ phung sogs ye nasasangs rgyas la// ciyi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// bcos mnyapar bcos ma dang// 'dra ba yin
pa lta bu yi// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i sred pas srad par 'ching// 'khrul pa'i 'khoralos 'khor bar 'khor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang// lhal/
buya bdung sangs te// bla ma dam pa rtag tubasten// yid ches kaM gu ras ye shu/ lung bad tshud ma yin pa dang// 'og ma sngangs shangagong ma thob/ man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang//
mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing// che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shi/ 'a ri ga ltar spyod dang 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang// gnas
kyi khyad par dbus suk+ta// rgyan gyi khyad par thar pa'o// riyodapa las dus yaap+pay+Yas rigs/ nga na gtso bor bye brag kyang// phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso
'khor las khyad par 'phags// dper na pa rol phyin drug las/[.]bas rag pa re yin re dan// 'dra sngol phyin pa lnga dag gis// pha rol phyin pa'i mngam thob// dkyil
'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i/ de nyid kyi nad kyil 'khor te/ nga sa/yabus su ma gnas// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor dus 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med pa yi// grong
dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang// rtsa pa63yan tsegs gyur na// ya/ 2 ga dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyuran// sku gsung
dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang// 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i
nA// dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos ma dege mos pa tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang// bral ba'i rin chen/
bdun po de dag gis// 'khor lo sgyurapa'i ming nimazib bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems conayang// rdul tsam khyad par med mod
kyang rang rig gnyan rig rkyen dog dang// rang sems las su rung ba dang// ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang mi leg pa// don byed nus dang mnus pa// yongs su
rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang// thadad par na mi rtag ste// tshukhams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyisan dag bar 'dod// rang
sems rang rig rtogs pa na// sems can gdong nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/ dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs//
pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang// gsod pa'i 'dushes ma skyes na// srog gcod nyams pa chung dur ngos// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor
ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlog pa chen por nges//gangazhige ma byin chung blangs kyang// gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges//
cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring// chen po las ni nyon mongs rer// de na chen po khe nar nges// tshul 'chos ltang ba chen pos// mi shes pa dang bag med deg brjed ngas la sog
'a grong du gsungs/ gzhan yang dam tshig/ lag pa yi// che 'bring chung du'ang tshang dag/ rang dang gzhan da ngogs ka yig/ rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// khyung ba'i ngo bos
zin pa dang// phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// tshul dang mthun par bshad par bya// dmatshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyil 'khor
shes par bya// gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag la// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig srog phyir// nangs sbyin sreg chen po tsam// zab pa'i ma ni rgyun bzhag ma// thab kyi rgyun bzhag ma yin/
te/ lo bdun dang na gcig dag/ nga yi rgyun bzhag chen po red// zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni/ 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag menachung ngur gsungs//
rgyus pa lasogs de bzhin tu// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi/ kutumatsho yi shes me rang bzhin// 'di'i rgyun bzhag rin po che// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir//
dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes ma la bud ni pa de pa a['' ]na kyis bsregs byas// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dug gzar la sogs
de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung// thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal rdo rjemakha' 'grogasang ba'i
rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs go// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga yaM g+har dang// lo tsa bdage slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o///
rgyagar skad du/ I dz+wa la artse gu sbyar na rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag/
gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rje rje btsun mo'i phag la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
pa'i nang nas rdojuphag mos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang// 'chi ba gang lags sha ba gang// re ni gong lags roman gang// de bzhin sha ba chen po gang// thal ba
gangalags thal chen gang// tshatshagangalags tshatshayi// chen po gang lags gnas ni gong// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
thabs dang shes rab goms 'jug la// rnal 'byor zhes n gsungs pa yin// dus min lhan gsod pa ste// dang popa'i pho ba'i rtags dang yang// dus tshod nges par shes bya ste//
par chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyi// 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor tham// srog kyang rtsol ba la thim ste//
rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang po 'chib ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang// rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi// skyod cig dang po'i ba ste// de nas zhag bdun bar du bzhag
lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das// de na rig brten por grugs// lus na tala'i mgo bo 'dra// 'di nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste/ yongashes dbab dang ye shes bstan// mkha' spyodas spyod/
sa 'og spyod// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ka ru// dra yi thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas gnas nibcug nyis
su driyi thig li bcu gnyis bya/ dpa' bo mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlabs// gzhan yang rgyun lasogs pa kun// dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges// ramir bris pa 'bring po lta
dri'i thog li tha mar nges// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// che ru kar grags chen por bzhes// rang rig bdag po gang yin pa'i// haru ka rungs pa dang// de la dus drug
mchod pas mchod// 'di dag ronachen po ste// 'chi ba zhes n rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// rang bzhin bsregs pa thal ba ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten
[— ]/ nas chos sku'i gzugs brnyan ma bzhin khacig/ yang na bum pa lta bu yig gzhal yas khang pa brtsegs mar brtsige/ ma 'chibcuphyed snying bo drang// tsan
ngan rakum sogs pa'i// drayisozugasapagangebasgo bar bya// tsan dan dmar po la sogs pa'i// drizhim ldan parishing bu 'am// yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi// bud shing tshud dang
ldan pa yis// thab khung chen por rdzogs par brtsig/ bla ma dam pa mnyes byas la// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhi ma 'jigasaseng ga
brgyad// ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan// chog yongs su rdzogs pa dang// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang// sngar gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun bzhag me sbar te//
ma lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid kyang// me yi khangapamadzes paru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// ma mchod sdig pasrog pa'o// sngags dang
rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra// me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag byaste// bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs// medanusdig pa bsreg par bya//
gdungal sogs pa byung na rab// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams// 'din thil bachonapo ste// de las gzhan pa thal ba gsungs// de nas rus
pa zhag gsum n// gur kum la sogs dris gtor te// rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste// kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// gdon bsal khrus bya//
rus pa brdung// ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// drisogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste// dkyil 'khor yongasasu rdzogasapa gi/ steng du seng ge 'i khri dag la// seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi
rgyan stong nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas derarus pa bzhag byas la// ma mchod byas nas zhag lnga ru// bsnyen pa byas tedrug pa la// gdung ni 'byung ste bdun pa la//
tshatshar ba tu gnas par bya// dang por ro srog dus su yang// shi dang bo nas bzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bstanapa ste// drug pa ro yi stagonano// bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas
dang por snang pa gnyis par ro// gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// gzhan la med cing rang la med// dman la med cing de rjes med//
thabs su ma gsungs shes rab kyi// rtsa rgyuda bshad rgyud phyi ma dang// phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi sgron ma ra la yo// rgyud du/
khyod la nga is bshad// de nas sa tshu'i rim pa yang// snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// mthun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs bslang// mi snangs bdag la sogs la// gtor ma/
yisasasogasabasrung// de nas skud pa rnam lnga yang// phan pa rdo rje can dang yang// gzi brjidi gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srad bus sa gzungs sbyang sogs//
cho ga gzhan dang mthun par bya/ dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lhagrangs du yod gtor mar gtang// sbyin sreg dag gis zhi byas te//
gcig gam lnga 'am bdunanaman/ rti'u rtsagacigabargya rtsa brgyad// ci nus par nagadab par bya// dusani mtshan mo zhes pa ste// dang po lan dekyila 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po/
pa rdzogs pa ste// gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku yi gzub/sa brnyanagadab// bum dpangs la gdab pa ste// gsang dbangs dang chu la gdab// gsum pa mo dang rlung
la gdab// bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o// dang po 'pho bsam lhung la// gnyis pa robasreg ma lhung ba'o// gsum pa tsha tshas ma lhungan// 'chib su ba'i dam pa ste/
srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol nges// draman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi ba khronar nges// de bas srid las grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa rabo mnyes te/ 'pho
ba la sogs gdam ngag blang// rgyud 'di gtang kyis legs par zung// de'i tshe'ajig Ner gyi khams kyis chen po yang g.yosapar gyur to// mchod pa snatshogs pa'icarayang bab bo//
[t]dpa' bo dang/ mkha' 'grom dang/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i re langs chen po thams cad rgyud kyi don la rjes suyar par gyur to// dpalags ng ba ma 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs//
pan+ti tag ya d+ha ra dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ baa mr-i ta
gu bya ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje btsun mo'abrug la zhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dkyil
'khoradabye ba ji lta bu// sngags dang gtor ma ji lta'u// sbyin sreg mchod sogs ji lta bu// khyod kyis bdag la shad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po
dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang// phyi lagazugs pharAn dkyil 'khor te// nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gsang par phru ga'i dkyil 'khor te/ bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems/ de rnamA
lha yi tshan nyid kyang// sdumadog phyag mtshan rigs pa'i lam// khro tshul ngag lusu ba'adeng// 'bar ba'i gabadagu phyag rgya drug/ mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu la// thamal pa yi rnam rtog
sbyong lus kyi pra'akhru zhe sdang dag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o// 'di dag phya yi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur pa// de nyid kyi
ni dkyil 'khor te// jorje can dang ngan pa dang// de bzhin de rdzogazi brjid dang// pad+ma gar gyi dpang phyug dang// de bzhin rta bdun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te//
de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yin// de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang// rnam grol steng du gdan khri rlung// mngarag bdag po lha yin no// dang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni phra ba
dang zung 'jug sgo gsum li khri dang// chig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam// las ni rags pa'i lam 'ongoms shing// ngagagi dra re khru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa// mkha'
sdod rlung du shes par bya// gang zhig snang ba sgom pa dang// de bzhin mun pa sgom pa dag/ nyin dang mtshan mor rab tu grags// gnod mdzes lta stangasadaman pa ste// tshul de de las bzlog
pa'o// dang por yid bcing sna rtser bya// de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang// nam mkha' sorab zhi de nas stong// de nas bar du thig le yang// yan lag dang bcas yan lagamed//
shin tu yan lag med pa ste// yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste// thabs la thabs kyi sbyor bar/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// ma nange 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og sgor
sa0/ tsan+dAlaM// kha sbyor dngan skyug po sogs// rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang// bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang dang// gtum mo rang bzhin sbyar ba dang// gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang//
gtum mo rkyen gyiso sbyar ba nga ngo// gtum mo zhar la sbar ba dang/ gtum mo bye brag spur ba dang// spyi yi gtum mo sbyar ba dang// grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang// chags pa'i rang bzhin
gtum mo ste// nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste// gsang ba'i lha yaring ba'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// de yi phyir na b+ha ga yani// dga' ba la
sogs sgyu ma yis/ phra ba'i lam srong las yin te// sems kyi dri 'khrung 'dod chags dag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i rgyu// de nas bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med nam
mkha' bzhin// rang rig stong par 'od gsal ba// bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa yin/ sgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste// ma sgom pa yang rtog pa nyid//
sgom du jul tsam med pa la// yengs su skad cigamed pa 'di// lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig ye shes me bo// thams cad 'di
la gnas pa ste// dper na 'kher le sbyarab 'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tum 'gro yang// yulan 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i/
las dang bya bsna tshogs kun// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// thams cad 'di lasdud par nges// las na zab pa'i las sbyong ste// sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum
'dzoms// gzugs sku galis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs// de nas nang gi spyir srog kyang// lte ba snying ka spyi bo mgrin//
rigasan dris pa'i thab khungs// skun spyi bo gsungamagrin pa// snying kar thugs te yon tan dang// 'phrin lasagatum mo gnyis su nges// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang// rang bzhin
gnas pa'i ye shes ma// mo lha dag ngaso bdag po'i lha// sku mdog phyag mtshan rnam rtog dag/ bsreg rdzas bsregs timo mtshod bya/ 'bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang// rnam rtog bsrog
phyir sbyin sreg ste// rang lus ye shes me yis ni// rtog pa'i bud shing sreg byab// 'di nasmin sreg tshad maste// til sogs sdug par nges pa 'am// las kyi ma nyid ye shes sam/
a bsregs pas nges par tshig gam ci// bsreg rdzas rtog pasreg byed me// dbang po'i spyod yulam yin te// de phyir las kyi mo nyid la// til sogs bsregs pa'i las byas kyang//
nges par sdog pa 'tshog ma 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// bstan pa tsam dunges pa ste// rgyung ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtog pas bstan pa med// dgang gzar blugs
gzar lasogasapa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyinesreg kyang/ khab khung ste ba'amasna rtse ste// chags grola gnas niangs pa dang// rang bzhin dang na gsang
ba yi// gtum mo ye shes me sbar te// g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis// shu kra rtsa dang rlung sogs kyi// phra mo ni rtog pa'i bsreg rdzas bsreg/ bde ba'i ma lha
mchod par bya// zhi rgyas las kyirim pa dang// bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang// phyi yi sngags oM AHhUM// nang du bdud rtsa mtshan nyid de// gsang
ba mchogachad dbusan gnas// mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go/ spos sogs phyi yi mchod pa ste// bdud rtsi la sogs nang du go/ gosang ba bde ba'areyis mchod// mthar
thug stong pa'i ro yis mchod// 'bras sogs phyi yaM gtong m ste// dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed// a ba d+hA tI'i ka pA la'o// sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// rnam
rtog bgags chen zhi bar byed// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// phrapa'i gden chen zhi byas pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtor mar gsungs// rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros//
bde chen ngonan zhi byes ga 'din bzhi pa'igator mar nges// phyag 'tshal skor ba la sogs// sbyang sogs bla ma'i zhalanas shes// gang gi phyir na sbyin sregan// dngos grub/
dam pa ster ba dang// rnam rtog srogaphyir sbyin sreg ste// shasogs sreg pa sbyin sreg man// mnyes pa'i don gyisamachod pa ste// sos sogs phul bas
mas pa med// rang sems was su rung ba dag/ mnyes pas mchod pa chen po ste// gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang// bar chod zhi dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste//
'bras sogs phyi yi gter ma yis// gdon sogs zhib mi 'gyur te// rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag/ gdon la sogs par snang ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog ma spangs par//
gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir// sgo gsum rnam rtog 'joms pa yis// sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang// dmatshig gso dang lha rnam 'go/
dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gtor ma'i nges pa'o// rgyung rnams nye bar zhi ba dang// lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'kher lha ma yin//
lus dang yan lag lhu ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin// lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po sgo gsum g.yang ba dag/ rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung// sgo
gsum phyir lha zhes brjod// yade skyob phyir na sngags yin te// rang sems las su rung ba dang// rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir// 'di na sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs//
ba/ gzhan yang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// thams cad bumalishal nas blang/ rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan byas// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rgyud kyi don la yarang bar gyur to//
dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogasaso//gargyagar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lotsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur bgo
@#// rgya gar skad du/ sA na a kA ra tanArA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dang la bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal 'gro/
'jigs byed pa la phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bos legs btud nas// dur khrod gang lags rgyun gang lags/ rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// legasasore rje snying po legs// legs par nyon la legs par zung// dang por dur khrod bshad bya ste// dur khrod spyi dang bye brag gnas// gzhal yas khang gi
phyi phol to// rdo rjer ba'inang rol du// 'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas// bye brag shar la sogs pa ste// snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang/ lcags nag po tshunachad de// rdo rjer
bas de nyid do// chen po khrun toshu ste// chung ba khru gang tshun chod do// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshad las nges par bazlas pa 'o// rnam shes tshegs brgyar rnam rtog brgya
mi mnga'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tudagod// tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtags su shing brgyud rim pas dgod//
de bzhin gdug pa brgyud btsem pa'i/ rtags su klu brgyad rim pas dgod// tshogs brgyad ma ngego bcu bcom pa'i/ rtags su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod// lus ngag yid kyis sems can
gyi dona mdzad phyir na char sprin dgod// de nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis mang rgyud// rnam rtog zilaganon brgyad por bshad// mdzes pa'i phyi nargyun
yin no// de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dang por dur khrod bshad ng ra bya// shar du gtum drag nag po tsho// lho ru ngahar dgod saratshe// nub tu ma bzad dmar poche// byang du tshang
tshang ljang ku che// mar guger ka can yin te// bden bral mtshams su 'bar ba 'dzin rlung mtshams ramul sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan du dbyibs can no// sgyu tsari lo tsasha/
mkhag sastengs shar gyi phye re dgod// pa tal deng bas// sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod// dur khrod 'di rnyems gzugs rnams kyang// 'bar ba tshig dang mtshig sogs// keng rus thod pa la
sogs dang// golongs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas// ce spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// shar du shi ringesha yapeshing// lha ru a shad tha ma shing// nug tu wang ge langeg shidi/
byang du tsuta'i shing du nges// gong dang mtshungs pa rgya gro d+ha// paska tilcagapA thAdag/ me nas dbang ldan matshamasasu dgod// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su 'dod// shar dbang po
gnas pa ste/ lhor gshin rje gnas pa'o// nub tu glu dbang gnasopaste// byang du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas// shar lhor monu gnas pa 'o/ lhanuba mtshams su srin po gnas//
nub byang mtshams su rlung dgod de// byang shar mtshamasasu dbang ldan dgrod// nyi zla shar la so bdagonub// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su dgod// shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste/
'jog po lha ste stobs rgyu nub// par byang la pad chen mo// hu lu hu lusrin por dgod// rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste// dung skyong dbang ldan mtshams su ni// gdug pa sprul/
gyi gzugs su dgod// kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dubye// shar du char sprin dkar por dgod// lho ru yum tadegod do// nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas// byang du a ba yang dge
gnas// sngo 'ae na yang dag gnas// g+ha ta srin po'i mtshams su dgod// rlung gi mtshams su par shan// gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad// btsod kyi mdog 'dra gur kum
mdog/ nam mkha'i mdog 'dradu ba'i mdog/ sprin gyi mdog 'drasprin gyi gzugs// shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung// dang por spangs pa phun
phun sum tshogs/ de nas ye shes phun sum tshogs// rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs// gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yi// rtags su 'jigs pa 'di
dag gnas/ dgon s nag dur khrod sogs// pags pa rdo rje ra ba ste// nus pa rdo rje gur du nges// dpung pa de ba'i dpung pa ste// brla dang de bzhane nyeba'i bam// brgyad ni dur khrod/
brgyad du nges// rje ngar tapa'i rdzongar bzhi/ lag ngar chub 'i lag ngar bzhi// brgyud gi nang gi shing brgyad do// tshigs dang de bzhin nye ba'i tshigs// steng dang 'og tu mi ni
nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthal dang de bzhine tapa'i mthil// stong 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do// rtsa dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad char srinabargyud yin te// bskyed rimi
rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyadananang na gnas// rtsa rlung ngo bo shes pa rgyas// de phyiri nang gishing brgyud gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ nangan klu brgyud yang
dga gnas // bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir// char sprin brgyad na ning du gnas// de nas gsang pa'i durakhrod kyang// sna rtsertsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyud shingebaskyod
do snyingekar rtsa brgyadi phyogs skyong brgyud/ mgrin par rtsa brgyad klu brgyad de// spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sngone brgyud// gsang bar rnam rtogam mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyudanogisang bar
gnas// thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyi/ gsang bar shing brgyud yang dag gnas// phra ba'imtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi/ gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyud dgod// bde bas bdag
spyod gzhan sbyor bas// de yi phyir na char sprin dgod// denus bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang// rnam shes brgyung na de nyid brgyud// dur khrod brgyad du nges pa 'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de
nyodashing// lhag ma gsum dang tshorasogs lnga// brgyud ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges/ nyon mongs drug dang de ya gnyis// brgyad po dban klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag
ni/ de ni bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyud// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog ma mapa'i rtags// bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyud// stobs sogasamkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas// rtagasasu shing brgyudangs
pa ko rnam rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtagasasu klubaskyodunges pa'o// gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi// dona mdzad rtagasasu char spran brgyad// phyogs skyong bla ma'i zhal
nas shes// de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang// bla ma'i zhalanas shes par bya// rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya// rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o// gzhan yang ng yis gsungs pa'i
bka'/ gsung gcig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang// dum nyid du so sor snang// chos tshul du ma'i bye brag dang// mos pa duma'i bye brag dang// 'du shes duma'i bye brag gis// theg
pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// sems gzung yanalag bsam mi khyab// bayi rjes su 'brangs pa yi// blamasarapa non pa dang// de nyid b.ru ldan mngon shes
smos// de gsungabcu drug mtha' yi bar/ rig pa'i gnas lngam khos pas sbyang// mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan pas// brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yis rjes// de lta'i man ngag
go thob par// sngags kyi lta spyod gang spyod pa// rang yang phung la gzhan yang phyong// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshod// debs dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bla ma dam pamanyes
byas te// man ngag dam pa blabarabya// nges pa'i lta spyod mared par// gsang ba'i lta dang spyod pa dang// mos pa'i rjes su gang byed dang// nyon mongs zilanon la sogs dag/
gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod// 'di dag rkun po marus pa/ mtho ba'i chos la dmal bar skyes/ dang po srid pa skye ba yang// yar ngom ngo mtshams dang gsum// sa 'i dang
cha po ba ma dang// 'bras busrid pa skye bayi// dus der kun tu rubyed na// 'byung ba'i rlung ginang zhugs na// nad gzhi bsdus shing nad gzhi skyong// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung//
dal 'dod pa'i mtshon rasan// g.yang bamed pa gtar ga bya// phyi nas rigs kyi bdag pos so// srid par skyo ba'i dus tshod kyang// rgyun chodazhag gsum zhag lnga dang// bdun dang dgu yi
dus rnams spang// de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'adon// khyod la gtad kyis legs par zung// de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu su rjes su yi rang bar gyur po// dpal du khrod
rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal pordzogs so//paN+Di tug yab+ha ra dang/ latsab dgeslong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
gar skadod/ shAbadzranAdzam hA tan/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal bo chen po'i rgyud/ dbal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyis dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje btsunamo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mkha' 'gro grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu/
bzhugs pa'i dus su phyin ngagasang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po lasogs
pas gsol pa/ rdo phragangalags chen po gang// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// don gyi rdo tsho rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs su shes pa bya//
rnam rtog 'joms phyir rdo rje ste// de la rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyin ng gsangab rab gsags// rtse gsum rtsa gcig rtsa lnga pa// rtsodagu pa de yin/ bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste/
/@#// rtags kyi rirdzobazhi yin/ gnyis su med pa rtse gcig bas// rnam rtos thams cad spangs pa yin// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtumu
gsum/ 'dzoms pa'i phyirin bshad pa yin// rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam nyideso sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes// nyon mongs lnga ni sbyangs pa ste// zhe sdang
nga rgyal 'dod chags dang// phrag dog gti mug 'dzoms par byed// rdo rje rtse dgugang yin pa// ye shes rtse dgu bshad pa ste// khamasagasum sa dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams
gzugs khams gzugs med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes tsho/ sa dgu ba'i gung sgrib pa'i// sgrib pa sbyong bar byed pa yi// rdo rje rtse dgur
bstan pa yin/ rdo rje rtsa mo bcu gnyis pa// 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bsuganyis kyi// spong ba'i yashis bcugs yin// ma rig pa las 'du byed de/ 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes//
ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang len// srid pa skyo dung rgya sha so// de rnams spong ba'i gnyan po sa// chos kyi yongashesa mngon du byas/ de las ye shes drug
rang bzhin// de las sku gsung thugs ngo bo// de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis med reg pa na// de las nyams myong bde chen po// rang ragi de nyid srid pa ste// chos
kun ston byed len pa ste// srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// su ba sal pa'i sku ru bshad// rma sha rkyen dang mya ngan 'das// 'ong gsal stong chen ngang du thim// de phyir rdo rje bcuganyis
pa rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// 'bigs shi no ba zur gsum ste// gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas// 'jam zhing dang la 'joms par byang// pha lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms//
zur lngas thoms cad cadogor byed/ de nas chen po'i don bshad de/ dmags drang bsam pa spyod pa dang// brtul zhugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang// de bzhin ye shos chen po ste//
rore la yang bdun bdun sbyar// de phyi chen po zhes ni bstan// rgyung na rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// rab tugasang dang grasang ba che// de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la//
rgyu ya rgyud du bstan pa yin// de rnams donan jebezhin rtogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis mang pa// rgyun gnyis su med pa yi// rang rig ye shes
mthar thug pa// mthar thug bla na med pa'i rgyud// rgyal po la yang lnga yin te/ @#/phyin gsangadang rab phyogasang// shin tugasang ba chen po ste// de rnams don la dbang bskur dang//
de yi mi mthun phyogs 'dzoms phyir// de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//
sku gsung thugs na ji ltar lags// btsun mo'its+tshag ji ltar lags// rdo rjegang lags snying po gang// dpa' bo gang lags makha' 'gro gang// dpag tumang ba/
ji ltar 'gas// thabaso gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i// mchod nas zhes paji ltar lags// mngon phyogs 'khod pa ji ltar lags// zhal 'dzum
mdzad pa ji ltar lags// gzigs pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud// phung po'i bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud
bzhi bcom pas bcom pa 'o// ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir// dbang phyug dang na gzugs bzang dang// dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang// ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la//
drug po de ldan zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i ngos ni mya ngan te// de ltar bral phyir 'dus pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshogs// thams cad
zla dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsunamo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings// de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste// dbyeram phyed pas bzhugs par bshad// rdo rjechos
rnams 'jug pa che// snying po ye shes chen po ste// sogs pa mang po'i don yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga// byin ng gsang ba la sogs kyi// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyi'i yani//
mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' 'gro ste// rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya// thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir// ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi don la ma dpogs pas// de yi phyir/
na dpag tu med// thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid don dang dbyer medaphyir// gcig gi rin du bshad pa 'o// gnyis pa ma yin de don du// phyi nang ma yin mngod pani//
phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dang// dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang// rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang// sgog dang dgod dang gapanyid dang// rta dang glang
po rin chen sogs// de nas nang gi mchod pa ni// b+hig btsums la ku tsabatsir// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba lnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas te// phung po khams dang skye mched
rnams// de la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchodapan// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le ste// de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis// rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod//
denas rab gsang mchong pa na// drang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang// duga' bral de bzhin lhan skyes dgral// bde ba'i khyadang de nyid kyis// rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod//
de nas bla med mchod pas ni// rang rig stong par rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyade chos kyi sku// de nyidi bla med mchod pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rdo tshe
snying po lasogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs par gyur te/ g.yona phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis ma snang bar gyur to/
[H ]dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rdo rje rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so//rnal 'byor ma tsan+da mA 'a dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
rgyagar skad du/ e dzI nAtsin tan rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpon la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor grangs med pa dang/ ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig dubazhugs pa'i dus su dpa' bo ye shes
mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te thalamo sbyar nas gsol pa// bcom ldan ye shes mnga' bdag che// ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang// ye shes sku
tsha gnas gang dang gang// rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang// gang la dbang byed gang gis 'dul// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo yi
shes mkha' 'gro nyen// ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga// de nyid don la shes pa dang// log rtog shes pas ma bsgribs phyir// spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa 'o// ma leng ye shes mnyam 'de
0/ dang so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o// de la me leng ye shes ni// dper na g.ya' dag me long la// gzugs kharAn gsal bar snang ba bzhin// de bzhin
sems kyi mi 'bod la// nyon mongs g.ya' na deg byas na// chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong// sems kyi pa leng gang yin la// sgyu ma tsam du snang ba de// tha dad mi phyad mnyam
ye shes/ mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam de ni// las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa// de nyid so sor rtog ye shes/ de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de// de nyid don grub
ye shes te// thams cad chos dbyinges gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin// ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa// kha sbyar dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
red tshul// shar dang lha dang nub dang byang// ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas// de dag kun 'dus lte bani// chos dbyings ye shes skyo ba'i gnas// me 'ang ye shes mnyam de dang// so
sor rtog dang bya ba grub// chos dbyings ye shes lasogs pa// bdag po byed pa'i phyir dngan// zhisdang dang nang rgyal dang// 'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang// de bzhin gti mug la
sogs pa'i// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir// rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid dbye
de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas// nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang// de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang// rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa//
de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rang rig ste// dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su bstan// de yi gnas ni rtse yin te// gzung ba rig
pa'i 'khor lor te// nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dgan/go bzlog pa yaM tshul yin no// de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtagasani lus la khrag byung dang// ba spu langs dang 'dar
ba dang// kha zas dad chung lus yang dang// sa dkar gnyer ma dengs pa dang// le 'bo mad dang brtson 'grus ldan// de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub// de nas yon tan bshad pa na//
rkang mgyogs sa stangs 'og gi/ 'jig rten dngos grub gang yin dang// 'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas// rang rig 'od gsal de nyid do//
ka ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te// rtags ni 'od gsal de nyid do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'i// san nges par thob pa'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung sgom pa brtag/ lus sems
tshags su bcug nas ni// rang rig sems kyade nyid la// de nyid dbyer mdabasgom par bya// de yis thob med 'bras bu thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang nas/ de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de ma snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud
kyi rgyal po rdzogs so///paN+Di tag ya d+ha ra dang/ la rtsa ba dge song kAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//ka @#// rgya gar skad du/
bar ga rAdza tan rAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal po rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+he ga la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la
sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he hadapa' bo 'jigs paro// sems can sangs rgyus rang bzhin na// mtshan dang dpe byad gang dang gang// stongadang de bzhin rnam thar dang// rdzus
skyes mngal skyes sgong skyes dang// drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi chur ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a ni dbu yi gtsug tor te/ A na debu sa g.yas su 'khyil/[”]/
oM ningapral ba'i dbyes ma nyam pa// A re smon mtshams mdzod spu ste// un spyan mig mthon mthing// ba yi rdzi ma lta bu 'o// sku tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste// lo'atshims mnyam
tshems thags bzang// la'atshems dkar rebre mchog a na 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// i ltagasazhani tasrab pa ste// onatshungs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan//
o ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum// oM nu bdun mtho ba ru gsungs// an thel gong rgyas pa ste// 'di dag bcudrug g.yas bskor ro// de nas g.yon bskor mtshams nas kyang// a ni/
pags srab mdog gser 'odra// A ni bzhengs bzhin ma btud par// phyag gnyis pus mor slob pa 'o// an re stod seng ge 'dra// A na shing n+ya gro lta bur// chu dang zhing nagab pa 'o//
u ni mdzod spu g.yas su 'khyil// A na spu rnams gyen du phyogs// rimadoms sba ba sbubs su nub// rIbam legs par zlum pa 'o// lo ni zhabs ling tshigs ma mngon// lAni phyag
zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon/ lwa ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil// 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa 'o// e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'brel/[– ]/unasen mo ring ba ste// lo na phyag dang zhabs
mtha'il/ 'khor lo dang na ldan pa yin/ o na zhibs rishin tu gnas // oM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste// an byon pa ra degasan// e n+ya ya ya lta bu ste// spyi bo'i mingeshigs
snying po haM// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// kanasen mo zangs mdog 'dra// kha nase 'a mo mdog snum pa// ga ni sen mo mtho ba ste/ gnasor mo rnams zlum pa// nga ni sor mo rnams/
ba rgyas pa// tsanisor rnams byin gyis phra// tshan rtsa rnams ma mngon pa// dzan rtsa mdud med pa yin// dzAn leng bu ma mngon pa// nya nazhebs mamanyam pa med// Ta ni seng ge 'i stabs su
gshegs// Than glang po'i stabs su gshegs// Na na ngeng pa'i stabasasu gshegs// snyan khyu mchog stabs su gshegs// Nani g.yas phyogs ldog cing gshegs// namadzes
par gshegs pa ste// thani mi g.yo bar gshegs pa// da ni sku la 'khril bag chags// d+hasku byi dor byas pa 'dra// na sku rim par 'tsham pa 'o// pa ni sku gtsang pha sku mchog/
ba sku rnam par dag pa 'o// b+han metshan rdzogs ngo bo de// ma sku kho lag yangs shing bzang// yin gom pa snyoms pa'o// ra sku shin tu gzhon mdog can// lani sku la 'khrul pa med//
wa skye lus rgyas pa ste// bsha nangeshin grims pa 'o// kha yan lag thams cad madzes// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dge/ dku zlum pa da yin te// kA ni dku skabs
phyad pa 'o// ya dku ma rnyongs pa yin te// ran phyol phyam mad pa yin// lan lte ba zab pa ste// wa ni lte ba g.yas su 'khyil// Da nakun nas mdzes pa ste/ rnyan kun spyod gtsang ma
yin// 'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu yin// de nas gayon gyi bzhi bcuni// ka ni sku sna gnag bag med// kha nashing bal ltar 'jam phyag/ ga
phyag ri mo mdangs yodapa// g+haphyag mo zab pa dang// nga phyag ri mo ring ba 'o// saMzhal ha cangam ringe ba// tshazhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang// dza dzAljag
mnyen ljagasrab pa// rtan ljags dmarango bo ste/ glang po'i nga ro 'brug sgraT// rta nagasungasnyan mnyen 'jam pa// Da rnyamachab zlum dang no// Nan mchedakara'adzems mnyam// thani
mang ba byin/ ka phra// dashangs shin tu mtho ba dang// shangs shAn tu gtsang ba 'o// nan spyan 'od rnam par dag/ pa pha spyan bzang rdzi ma ltag/ ban dkar nag phye pad+ma'i// 'dab ma'i
lhumadangs 'dra pad+ma'i spyan// b+han de bzhin smina mtshams rang// ma ya smin mtshams smon snga mnyam// ra ni de bzhin smin ma snam// la 'osnyan shal stug cing ring// de bzhin wa nas ni
ba shal mnyam// sAn gyi dbang po ma nyamasangasha// dpral ba legs par 'byes pa la// se ni dpral ba'i dbyes chapa// hani bu dag shin tu rgyas// dob sgra bung ba ltar gnag kA// dbu
mas+sa/ sgra stag pa ya yin te// de bzhin dbu skra 'jam pa ra// dbu skra mi 'dzing banil// dbu skra mi gshar ba n wa// dbu skra dra zhemo 'a yin te// phyag la dpal gyi be'u dang ni// bkra shis/
g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan// sdong ris lta burlu yin te// lteb sprul pa'i snying po u0f00// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// an phyi nang stong pa nyid// An stongapa nyid stong pa//
i ni chen po stong pa nyid// Ani don dam stong pa nyid// u na 'dus byas stong pa nyid// A na 'dusam byas stong// 'a ni mtha' las 'das stong pa/ rAn thog mtha' stong pa nyid//
lani dor ba med pa stong// ni reng bzhani stong pa nyid// o chos rnams thams cad stong// in ring gi mtshan nyid stong// o ni mo demigs stong pa nyid// o ni dengos po mad stong nyid//
ningo bo stong pa nyid// dngos med ngo bo stong nyid a/ mgrin pa longs sbyong snying po lo// shes rab stong pa bcu drug rtsa// gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam par thar pa
dang po a// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas// phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no// sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs
pan// de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes la 'das pa// sna tshogs 'du shes yang mi byed// nam mkha' mtho' yas la gnas Ta// nam mkha' mtha' yas las 'das
ta rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing/ rnam shosamatha' yas rdzogs pa ta// rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das na// ci yang med pa la gnas te// de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no/
tsayang med pa las 'das te// 'du shes med min la gnas te// 'du shes medaman rdzogs pa yang// 'du shes med min las 'das te// 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus/
mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa na// rnam par thar pa brgyud pa sha/ snying ga chos kyi 'khorale hUM// gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan// 'di dag rtsa ya rnam par gnas//
'khor lo'i rgya na sor gsum ste// sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas// de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yin// sna tshogs sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang// rang du 'byung zhing thung du gnas//
smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la// g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste// steng 'og kha ya bar naso 'byung// ma shar du mngon du phyogs/ brkyang ma nub ste
sgyu 'og gi char// roms brkyang ma la 'khyud cing// g.yas pa'i chu ru zung 'jug nyid// brkyang mas ro ma la 'khyud cing// g.yon gyi charu zung 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku
gsung thugs// de sgrasngags su rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs// de de lasan byung bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba bzhi yi rim paM/
yang snod bcud yab yum la thim ste// yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur// snangapa'i thig le yang dag bcasaM// 'di dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul// A la kA lo nyi zla ste// sems
ni theg le'i ngo bor gnas// nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod// ka dang a las tshe zla ste// rang byung thig le drod gsher yin// de dag skad cig rkyen med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba
tshab rdzus skyes so// rkyen mang sbyorab sgong sogs las// bde ba skye dang bde ba'i rgyu// thams cad dran pa gsang ba yi// mngal na skyes pa'i tshul yan te// yar la bsreg dang mar la gso//
gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yas/ rtsa rgyas bde bster ba dang// rin po che yi pho brangadu// sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin// nang ga
'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis// bde ba skye ba drod gsher skyes// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdong nas bde ba'i rgyur skyes la// bde ba skyes pa rdzus skyes so// gtum mo go bzlog rkyen
gyis sbyar// gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang// gtum mo go bzlog sbarab dang// gtum mo rang bzhin sbyar ba ni// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes/ brdzus skyes rim par/
sbyar bar bya// duma'i gzhi bcas gzhi bcas dang// gzhimadashani tugazhi med de// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes// rdzus skyes bzhi char rim par sbyar/ rgyu dang lam ste
'bras bu kun// skyo ba bzhi yi ngo bor gcig/ de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// dngos po romanyam gyur pa la// log rtog sgyu mas gtaMs su 'khrul// rdo rje snying po snying
rje che// nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang// nga yis bshad kyis legs pa nyon// sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor sgom// gsung na mgrin pa thugs ni snying// yon tan lte ba
/ @#// 'phrin las ni// sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya// 'bar pa bzhi ya a la yang// rdo rje phag mo rab tu grags// han bde mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo gcig pa yin
[H]par 'dod// bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag/ gsum pa hU~M las rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// bcu dgu o las rab tu grags// tishu rtsa lnga nyishu dgu// hU~Mgi ngo bor
yang dag gnas// sum cu bdun dang drug cu ba'i// a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rtsa na re rje phag mo ste// g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal// dpa' bo byang chub sems yin/
te sa mched bcu gnyis ngas ma yang// bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags// 'byung bzhi'i dengs ma zhal bzhir nges// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyun du bshad// gsung mchog bla ma'i
zhal nas byung// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste// 'dom gang mnyam pa gru bzhi yin// bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga// rtsa ni thog gi rang bzhin te// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyud do//
so sen ba spu tAr sogs// mkhas pas brtag cingashes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// dper na rang byung gser dang 'dra// 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te// rang
rig ye shes gzugs bar nan// gzugs bar n dkyil 'khor sgom pa man// rdul tshon la sogs bro bamin// gros la sogs pas mchod pa man// jo shang lha la phyag ma bya//
rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la// rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tumachod// sa ni dgun dus rang ba'an te// 'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// gsungani dpyad dus ngo bo ste// 'jug
pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// thugs ni dbyar dus ngo be ste// gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum// ye shes ston gyi dus yan te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum/ dang po rgyu yi sa pa yin//
'kher chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnams na dekar pos gnas/ lam kyi sa pa rnam pa gnyis// ring ba dang na ba 'o// de ni 'bras bu'as pa yin// 'khor le yang dag gnas pa
ste 'khor la de rnams lha rnams kyang// sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral// rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med// shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med// ma mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can//
zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can// phyi ru sku mdog phyag mtshan lha// nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gzugs// gsang ba'i bde ba lha ru ngas// de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha// lus las byung phyir
lhazhe 'am// rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lha// chags pa'i phyir na lha yin te// rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin te// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs
so de nas sa chen po'ang cher g.yos par gyur te/ mchod pa'i sngon gyi char chen po babs pa gyur to// de nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu ste rjes
su yi rang nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so///rnal 'byor ma tsan+dam le dang/ lo tsa ba dag/
shA song shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ iN+Da ka re saM pa ra tan rAdza nAm/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom/
pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya bo/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po'i ngos gang bas// thams cad stongapar gyur nas kyang// ha dmagon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro ma
ni ji ltor lags// de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig srung ba ji ltar lags// rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs/ nyon cig rdo rjephag mo nyon// dang po dmatshig mtshan nyid kyang// rtsa
ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dge/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang// sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste// rang gzhan sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring//
'am nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// rang bzhin 'khrugs pa bram yang// nyamos pa chung du yin par 'dod// re ro la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la
mnar sems ma skyes kyang// gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi// bdag gis g.yeng bas skyon byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang// gzhan
lanyes pa chungapas na// 'dilnga nyams pa 'bring du bshad// g.yeng pa'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang// 'di na ltung ba yang par gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// lta spyod gang la
gzhan ma mos// zab mo 'de la skur 'debs pa// lhang ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis ma nyes gzhan tshor 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad// re re'i dbye ba gzhan nas
shes de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang// phyi yas rang gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dang// rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol pa// bstan sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur/
g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring+ge chung du// mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang// bcas dbye brag dam tshig las// gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig las ni rdo rje'achang//
nga nas mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid kyang// mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste// phag mo yungs kar tsam gyi med// gzhan ni lnga yi tshod tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// ka nas g.yas
bskor ka yi bar// mkha' 'gro drug cu bzha ru nges// ka sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ste// phyi nas rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// mkha' 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi sor// sum cu rtsa bdun mkha'
'gro ma// lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas// a sogs brgyad na mekha' 'a gro brgyad// de bzhin zung rtsa mkha' 'gro bzhi// snying ka ru na yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum namakha' 'gro ra//
gzhan rnams rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// bcu gnyis bcubazhi mgron par go nas// rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas// gzhan n spyi bor yang dag gnas// de nas sdom pa bshad
bya ste sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ bde de sngom pa yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can// nges par sdom pa yin par 'dod// rdo rje phag mo ma 'da' bas// sdom pa dam/
tshig tun bshang// mi phyed pas na phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos ya nga zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen na gang lags dus gang lags// tshad na galags
srung dus gang// lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams nga 'i rgyu nyid kyang// mi shes pa dang bag med dang// nyon mongs ldan dang ma gus dang// brjed ngas dran pa ma gsal ba//
'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla mam bston grogs ngan 'grogs/ @/mdor na sgo gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chod chang gis myos//
log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod// nyon mos zil non blams skyo// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yanito// spyir na rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon
