sogs gzhan gyis byin brlabs tshe// bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na// chen po rdzogs kyang chung dur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du masong na// bag med nyams pa son gnas// gdon
sogs rang gis ma mthong na// de yang nyams pa chung dur gsungs// 'khor bas skyo dang rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar chong bral ba ba shags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos
gzhi mjug dang gsum// gang rdzogs tshad ni mthor phyin te// che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya// sbyor ba ltung ba chung du ste// dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung// 'jug rdzogs ltung ba
chen por nges// rgyun dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dug/ 'chang ba bsten pa'i dam tshig yani// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// bza' bar bya ba'adem tshig go/ sems can dpa' bo mo kha'
'gro la// longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ rang gzhan sgyu mar gangashes pa// shes par bya ba'i dum tshig go/ sgo gsum sku gsung thugasasu bsam/
bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ nyon mongs dug drug gzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med por bsgral// bsgral ba'i dmatshigachen po yin// dam tshig don dudam tshig dag/ dus/
drug dusaganyis 'bar du// brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrung// dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrung// skad cig tsam yang gnangapa med// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las//
gzhan gyi lus kyi 'os 'byung ba/[“]'di ni sku yi/sa par bshang/ rang gi lus kyi 'os pa las// gzhan gyi ngeg ga nyes 'byung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste// gzhan la gsung
gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i 'os pa las// gzhan la yan lag shes 'byung dang// legs pa las ni nyes
'byung sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang
zhus pa// dam tshig 'di yi don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtogs par daka'// mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu// smacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos sur
la dor ba med// ngan skyags phyir don slar la za ba mang// rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshoran// log rtog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol// de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis//
de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hu/
kha ra dang/ le tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//@#/ rgya gar skad du/ shA artse ma le tan rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ma'i
'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dang papid kye// bdagan khyod la zhu ba mchis// shAni ging lags hogapalags// run gang lags
kagapa lags// dbang bzhi'i haru ka gangalags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ban gnyis med ye shes te// na skye sogs rnam par spangs// run tshogs dang bral
ba nyid// kan gong du ma gnas so// de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ rtag tulus dngasams la gnas// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs kyi nges pa ste// dang por bum/
dbang ha ru ka/ sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe// rang sems las su rung ba ste// de tsho 'jig rten tha mal pa'i// rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i pan he zhes brjod//
las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral// de yi phyir na ru zhes brjod// 'jig rten thamal rnam rtog sgra/ gzung 'dzin gong yang mi gnas pa'o// phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa 'o// thabs
dang shes rab zung 'jug pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags gnyis su med// de yi phyir na horu brjod// bskyed pa'i nom pa he ru ka/ phag mo la sogs tshogs dang ldan// zag
med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul// de nas gsang dbang he ru ka/ nyi zla mtshan ma yig 'bru'i tshogs// bskyed rami rgyu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs
las su rung bas na// de yi phyir na bu zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang// mchod pa dkyil 'khor lasogs pa'i// tshogs dang bral ba'i phyiran nu// bskyod pa'i rdo rje/
phag mo dang// dmagos dang lta spyod gang la yang// ma gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyod pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med ma'o// phyin zhis gsungs pa ste/
rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan// rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// rlud sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas// rtsa rlung rang bzhin gnas la sogs// nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs/
ldan nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas shes rab ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yaM// rgyu spangs phyir na ho zhes brjod// rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi// tshogs dang
bral phyir ru zhes parjod// rlung dang rtsa dang shag le dang// tsaNA lo yi kha dog dang// dbyibs la ma gnas phyir na ka/ sems de bde ba ra gnas pa yis// nang gi thabs dang shes rab med//
de yi phyir na hI ru gsungs// mgo ser nad kyis btab pa ltar// rang sems bde bar gnas pas so// sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang// bde ba la brten tshogs dang ldan//
lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad mad// sems dang bde bar gang gnas pa// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// gsang ba'i dpal ldan he ru ka/
de nas bzhi pa'i saru kaM/ rang rage stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral// de yi phyir na ha zhes brjod// pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam// thams cad stong
'apar lo gnyis pas// tshogs gnyis bral 'dzer ru zhes brjod/ bde spa tsam la mal/nas phul/ kazhes nges par brjod pa yin// sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas/ stobs sogs
ngun sum tshogs pas na// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang/ gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan// b+hAb zhes bya bar mngon par brjod// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med//
dngos po ro a pha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gnas pa'o// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru rgyu// bdud rnams kun la mtho 'tsham zhing// lhan cigas+yas pa'i dur khrod rol//
pa/ nas gsal pa'i ra pa da pa// me long bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin// mkhas pa yang de 'khrul nga sngang/ de ltar don na ma rtogs par// kha cig snyam dog phyag mtshan la//
deta pal pal rdol// lnga reg gzugs pan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod// de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod sogs// de bzhin rang ragi he ru ka/ bla ma ma bstan brtson/
'a/ d+ha// rigs dang rigs pa'i nga rgyal can// khe dang grags pa red la dga'// rgyu nges leg rtog sna tshogs bskyed// de bas du ru karagrags pa// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal
pa 8 dpa pa chas phal phyin// rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las// man ngag ya ngadag blang bar bya// ma mo'i tshogs kyis yazhus pa// de ru ka dpal de ltar na//
derje phag mo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsum ste phag mo gnyis// don gyi de rje de nas brtags// tha ma rdzas kyi rdo rje ste// don/

gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi phyed phyir na rdo rje ste// dbang bzhis rdo rje ra rol// rtags kyi rdo rjegasum yin te// rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste// rtsa gsum sku
gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te// khams gsum sa dgu 'dzoms pa yi// rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu'o// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yon te// ma shes dri ma chos gos pa'i//
dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang// shes rab char phyung phag mo ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru nges// bum dbang zhe sdang gtimug phag/ gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug phag/ gsum pa chags
ngaga' gti mug phag/ bzhi pachos dbyings gti mug phag/ 'di nyid khyed la legs par gtad// thams cad rjes su yo reng ngo// dbal me'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka'i
nges pa 'byung pa rdzogs so//bla ma g+ha ya d+ha ra dang/ dge slongashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// ka @#// rgya gar skad du/
gsaM badzra DA ke gu byatan rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpalaphyogasaru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs rgyal po kyi// dbang rnams dam
12da dam ru// gtsalA+or khyad par meng ngam kyi// mas su nad nga ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad ce nga ngam ci// dam tshig che chung meng dam de/ de nyams bzhugs thabs yod dam ci/
bo ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang/ rang rig ye shes blugs pa khe phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges
ba kho na sU/ lus ngas nas kusungs pas se// de tshul sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrung dang 'thor dang sreg pa dang// mkhyen pa'i chen ngang go 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// nam mkha' lta
bu 1 tshungs pa ste// dang po lags da gsum pa ngag la gyis ru ngasheng dpang mi thor// bsad pa'i rim pa la gnas shing// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyus kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang ngo/ mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang// mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go/ 'di yis ngan 'gro'i
srang 2 sa spel// dung dang na ngag 'brel pas so/ de nas bzhu ra nyal rgyu dpang/ sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dibang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'di ni
rang rag bzhi pa'i dbang// 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'gram 'bag la sogs la// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa yi// sa dang/
tshon lasogs pa yi// gzugs bar n yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin brlabs su shes byas nas ni// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma'i lhasogs de
ltar na/ phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir mchong mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa ya na de khrul gzhi dag/ bcos pa 'bar bcos ma dang// 'dra ba dang lta
bu 'o// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// leg pa'isrid pas slade nga rtakA rgyuses// 'khrul pas 'khor los 'khor bar bskor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang// lha yi bu yi bdud stangs/
sku ti bla ma dam pa rtag lubastan// yid ches roge dang nges shes sku// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang// 'og ma spong zhing gong ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin par blang// mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed
cing// che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing// 'jig rten lta sbyong 'dren pa ya// snod bzung blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye'ug kyang// gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par
tshu thal ba ste// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs// phyag dang zhal sogs khyad par gyis// gtso 'khor la sogs khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin/
mang na// pha rol phyin pa'i mang ma 'thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su grags pa/ dus pa'i/de nyid kyisan dkyi la/ long te// gang zhig dbus su ma gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil du ma 'gyur te//
dperar rgyal po med pa'i grong// grong dang grong khyer bzhin// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams
gyur na// sku gsung pas tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dngam bon len pa dang// 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod
ba sne la rdog de dpa' ng// tshul 'chos mi shes song ba tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra/ dperan 'kher 'a sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang// bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis// 'khor
na pa pake mong ni ma shopa bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang// rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang// rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag kyang//
rang sol sa su rung pa dang// ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// leg pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongs su rdzogs dang ma rdzogs dang// sangs rgyas sems can
sas snang/ sha dang par ri bo brgyud pA/ chu khams ma/ ra dang nam mkha'abazhin// rang bzhan gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pas na// sems can gdod nas sangs
rgyus so// tshe rje phag mes yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs pam tshig la// dbye ba khyod kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems
g.yos kyang// gsong pa'i 'du shes la snyes na// skye sgra/rung 2 Na ma ya nge gnyan gyis gden pas tshor ba dag/ nyams pa 'brang dugasungs pa yin//
de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byan chung blangs kyang// gzhan 22u0f7c na ro [– ]rwa ste u ra/ de/ mas pa tsapang lu nges// ra khungs nyon mongs chungan 'bring// chon po las/
ni nyon mongs cher// de nin po khe nar nges// tshul 'angos ltang kha chen po dbus la nam kamatsha/ tha/ du ngas lasog kaN hreng du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi//

che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshang dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka yo// smyu tan ngag las shes bya ste// las ka de yis thaM ma pa dang// phyi nang tsho rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po
ts+tshA bzhengs// tshul dang mthun pa bshags pa bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gi pa[… ]we spyi yo pa/ 7[ce ]4nga bshags kyi bye brag la sa// spyanasreg gis ni sdig srog
phyir// nang gi sbyin sregachen po bsam// zab pa'i mi ni rgyun bzhag che// thabs kyi rgyun bzhag ma yin te/ 'badun dang ni le gcig ngag/ phyi yi rgyan bzhag chen po mi// zla ba gsum
la/ dang bdun dang ni// 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs/ rgyun bzhag ma ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdong nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes
ma rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i ma// theg paza'amad par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shang yin// man ngag can gyis
bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtod kyis legs par zung// thams cad gul/
zhing mgu bar gyur// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hu ra dang/ lotsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/
@#// rgya gar skad du/ badzra b+hu ra ba bo dAr Na tan rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/
dpal ru ka la phyag 'tshal 'do// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' derjesnying
pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo rjegang lags 'jigs byed gang// 'joms
pa gang lags rgyud gang lags// rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de tshe rnam pa gsum yon te// nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms par byed//
dkon mongs dgrasogs rnam nga ra'joms// yo rgyu dang phrus 'ad// mthar zug spu ra gang/ da la/ rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol ]
pa re re'i bye brag ma 'tshal bas// de yang bye ba bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka[·] stsal pa/ rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// don gyi rdo rje re nas rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje dang
gsum// de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad// gzung 'dzin rtog pas ma le pan/ gyi ngo dzar babudang lo/ pa'i tshe re re sa// tshe bzhi lu shang yin// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te//
rtsagasum rtse lnga rtse dgu nga// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags/ lta shes lnga yi rtags/ dgu khams gsum sa dgu'i rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// bum pa'i dbang dang/
'brel ba ya// sku mdog phyag mtshan lasogs lha// gzung dang 'dzin pa ke na mu chos kyi 'jig snang 'jom dang sa rdo rjego/ gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la//
gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'dzoms ngas rdo rje rtse/ shes ra6 ringashes dang 'brel ba'i// lhan cig skyes dgal la sogs pa'i// gzung dang 'dzin pa gang rtogs pa//
'jig cing 'dzoms pas jo rdzayin// bcu pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi/ ga ga sems nyid stong nyid gzung 'dzin gnyasi su gangartog pa// 'jig cing 'dzoms pas rdo rje 'o// de nas
rtags kyi de rjen// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs su bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug gsum// 'jig cade 'joms pas rdo rjes// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yartegs// nga rgyal la sogs
rnam pa lnga// 'jig nying 'dzoms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rdzas kyi rdo rjen// rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa ni// zur gsum rno la 'bags pa dang/ gru bzhi de ga nyung gsal bar byed// zlum pos rdzas rnams
'joms par byed// zur lngas 'dod sgra la sras rdo rje/ rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud kyi rgyal po ste// de rnams kun la dbang byed pa// log
lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed// bcomi ldan 'das kyis de sung khe ga pa kAlA 'du khang dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu mdA pa rnams dga' zhing mgunas rjes su ya rengs te/ g.yas
phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ [0f7c] so'i rdzu 'phraka sa ma ya pa kha to// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
ma ga ya d+hu ra dang/ lo tsa ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//// @#// rgya gar skad du/ mo hA ba la dzA na rA dza ta rAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal
stobs chen ye shes rgyal po' rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpalaM rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de khon nyid btsun mo'i phyug la 'khor
ngang 'be rje rnalasogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang/ sku rje tshugs kyis khaskyob ru pashum/ sa la rgyus su/ 8 ya rdo rje mas 'grel sogs pas g.yon phyogs su bskor ba lan/
gsum byas nas phyos mgacig tu'akhod do// dpa' bo rdorjes ston lhan la 'a sa shes zags te zhes pa gsum brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rtsan gang lags rlung gang
lags// thig le gang 'gas grangs ni du// lasems gzung ji ltar lags// khor lo ji ltar lags pa dang// de yi grangs ni ngu zhig mchi// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags//
h+phe yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags// de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni// yi ge dgod pa gang dang gang// gtum mo sbyar ba ji ltar lags// zla ba khyim ji ltar lags// gnas nageng du gzung bar bgyi//
rkyen gnyis 'khorale dza ltar lags// go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags// gsang bar 'khor lo bzhi gang lags// de rnams kyi ni ngegongs pa dang// de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung//
tsha stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa ya rim pa ji ltar lags// de rnams kyin degongs pa dang// dges pa'i dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon
cig dpa' bo rdo rjekhyod// khyod la bshad kyis [“]'a legs par zung// rtsa rnams kyi noreng bzhinan// nam mkha'agasemadathams cad skyed// der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin// g.yo ba rnam
0shes g.yo ba yin// thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste// stong nyid bsam dumed pa'o// thig le grasanibasujug ste// rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin// des sems gzung bstan pa ni// rtsa dang rlud
theg le la// gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khol 'khrungasan re yon te// bde chen 'khor longs stong chos// de 'og sbal pa'i 'khor la// de re la yang bzhi bsgo//
bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// me rlung gnyis na rkyen yin te// roma'i 'khor lo de dang ni// gtsug 'khor la dbang bskur gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo ban yon te// bde skyong
'khor lo dang po ste// rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor la yani// gi pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa 'o// gsang ba'i 'khoral bzhi yin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhagronges su bstan// rtsa rnams rang
bzhin nga yis bshad// rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te// rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no// de nas yo gi dgod pan// bde chen 'khoralasum cu gnyis// gsal byed sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/
g.yas nas bskor te ngagodapar bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dubyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyud// yum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon
nus bskor// thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor// sprul pa'i 'khor le'i 'dab mni// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin la// gsal byed g.yas skor dgod par bya// dbyangs yig
gnyis ldan g.yon nas bskor// bde chen 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// nadakar po 'thur paltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor le'i lte dbusasu// onadikar po/
gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khoral lte dbus su/ gat+taMni sngon po 'a zur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// Anadimar bo gyon bltas bsam// rkyenan 'khor
leganyis yin te// dang po'i gos su yigi yaM// gtum mo'abar ba'i yaM yid te// nag po yongs sugyur pa las/ rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu ya dbyibs// dbus su rtsa lnga dgod
byas nas// ba dan ldan mdzes pa 'o// gru gsum gnas su yabakaM/ me yi 'khor la gru gsum dmar// dbus su o Adzin dgod// zur la rdo rdzogasum gyis mtshan// rkyen gyi
'khor la de ltar yin// rlung gis bskyod pas dmatshigs// ye shes mnabasal ba mkhas// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// bde chen ma gtogs gnyis tsam bsregs//
bde chen hani bsros byas nas// zhuwa'ichamed bdud rtsi ni// zla bzhu ba'i bdud rtsi yis// srog gi rtsa yanang nas 'bab// rgyun du 'bab par gyur pa yis// 'chimad thigs pa gnyis yin te//
gzung ba mdud pa'i nang du gzung// go bzlog lugs su bzlog pa ste// mthor zug gnas su gzung ba 'o// gsang ba'i 'khor bzhi pan// gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo ste// hU~Mn lte khar
0 dgod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi grangs// gsal byed lugs bzhin dgod par bya// dbyangs yige rim gnyis dag bkod nas// tha ma bzung ste smras pa'o// sdig pa spongaphyir bde/
skyong ste// de phyir bde skyong zhes bshad// rtamagrin 'khor le'i 'dababazung la// dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs mne dgod/ lte bar un degod par bya// bde ba'i longs spyodamyong ba'i
phyir// rtamagron 'khor lo ru na bshad// rig pa'i 'khoral 'dapa ma lta// lte bgan regod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga la o rgyudaM// tho/[']sanas rim gyi ged par ng/ bzhi pa'i
donan rig pa'i phyir// rig pa'i 'a khor lo zhes ni bshad// gsang ba'i 'khor 'arim pa drug lte ba 'dab bzhi 'dabs brgyud// bcu drug sum cu rtsa gnyis te// drug cu rtsa bzhi bshad pa
yin// lte bar an dgod pa ste// a paMmaya de rnams ni// 'dab ma bzhi legayon nas dgod// 'dab ma brgyad la dgod byub// sde brgyad kyi ni deng bo brgyud// g.yon gyi rim pas dgod
par bya/ 'dab ma bcu drug gang yin la// mamo bcu drug g.yonanas dgod// 'dabamasum nuganyisasogs la// dbyangs yig lag bcu drug ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgong//
'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la// g.yas nas grwa la lugs bzhin dgod/ Arim gnyis g.yonanas dgod// gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yo phyir// gsang ba'i 'khor lazhes bshad// de
nas roma'i 'khopa'// 'dab ma gnyis la lte bar bcas// mtshunge bzhi yi 'dab gnyis la// lte bar de nyid 'thur la dgod// rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba// bluno gyon
la dgod par bya// yi ge gnyis kyi dbus su// byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i// nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir// nyams myong ro ma'i 'khor lor shar// de nas dbabaskura 'khor len/
stong gi tshungs sgo'i 'dab ma brgyad// lte ba lon degodapa ste// daM laM khaM raM/ g.yon nas brtsams ta phyogs bzhir dgod// hUM drakhris/ g.yas nas mtshams su rim par dgod// byang chub
sems kyi chu rgyun gyis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ 'khrud pa'i phyir nadabang bskur te// de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lo bshad// de nas yang na bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus sgrom pa
bshad par bya// gong du bstan pa gang yin pa// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// rang rig sems las gzhan manite// rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid// 'od gsal ba ya rang bzhin du// ci yang
mo rtog shes gyur na// ma bsgomasan yang sgom pa nyide// de ltar sems la legs par zung// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dpa' bo rdo rje l sogs pa'i dpa' bo
dang mkha' 'gro ma dang/ ma mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tumed pa rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nasam snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs chen ye shes
rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzogs so////rgyags kyi mkhan po ga ya ts+tsha pa dang/ lo tsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
rgya gar skad du/ nubadzrasid+d+hedza lasaM pa ra tarAdza/ bod skad du/ dpalardojagrub pa'i dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpol rdo rjemakha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal la//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ rin po che khang bathang gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ dga' ba'i 'od dang/ dri ma med pa'i
'od lasogs pa ngapa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid btsun mo'i b+ho ga la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ rigs sgyu ma'i dbang du
mdzad de/ thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang ga gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
de thal mo sbyar te gsol pa// mgon po thugs rje chaldan pa// de nyid don dam gang yin pa// dpal dang rdo rje'i don dang ni// drab sdom pa rgyud kyi don// des bstan sdom pa gang yin pa//
de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa la sogs 'khor rnams kun// phyi rol don la yengs pa'i sems// nang du bsdus la rtse gcig nyon//
@#// dpal ldan ye shes gnyis med do// de nyid mchod pa 'os yin la// gnyis med bde bas mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyad/
phyir// jorjezhes ni bstan pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa na nges par thob pa 'o// dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rig tubastan
pas// grangasamang rgyachor bstan pa// nam mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don// nam mkha' dang mtshungs rang rigan// sems kyi de nyid stong pa 'o// skad cig de nyid rgyud nyid la// rgyud
ces bya bar bstan pa yin// dpal rdo rje drapa'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ mtshan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////de las gzhan na nga yas bshar// ye shes skye ba'i
rgyu dang gnas// rkyen dang de bzhin dmags pa'i yul/ 'bye brag ming gi rnam grangs dang// don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang// phan yon dang na 'bras bu dang// don dam de nyid chos kyi dbyings
bal de nyid 'dir ni theshad par bya// rgyu ni rang rig yeshis te// rgyu med rgyu ya reng bzhin can// rang rig sgyu mar byung ba na// bde chen 'khor lanas brtsams te// 'khor lo ban khom brgyad
gnyis bshad// de bzhin rtoshu rtsa bo'i ste// ye shes skye ba'i rten yil// gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtse// grogs ni ye shes rlung yin te// ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas
0 de nyid 'byung ba yin// grangs na snga ma ltar du shes// ngo bo thig le nyid yin te// thig le mdud pa'i grangs su shes// de ya phan yon gang yin pa// ba/zung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis/
phyin ci 'go khubartags pa yis// rnam par rtog pa sbyong ba yin// 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa na nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes kyi rgyu dang
gnas la sogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba na// bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab mni[”]/sum cu
rtsa gnyis grangs yin no// de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni// 'dab ma bcudrug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khoral 'dapa ma brgyad// sprul pa'i 'khor le'i 'dab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi
ngag yin no// bde chen 'khor 'o sor bzhi ste// lengs spyod 'khor 'tshe sor bcu drug/ chos kyi kha khor le sor bcuganyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ bden 'khor lo'i lte ba
ru ra haMn dekarapo 'thur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'okhor le'i lte dbus su// o nademar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor le'i lte dbus su// raM ni sngon po 'thu bltas
bsam// sAl pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbusasu// Ats+tshan ngemar po gyin bltas bsam// dang po'i 'khor le'i 'dab ma la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcudrug// lugs 'byung lugs min dgod/
par bya// longs spyod 'khor le'i 'dab ma la// dbyangs yig bcu drug rin bzhin dgod// chos kyi 'kher le'i 'dab ma la// tAM mI paM taM/ yi ge 'di rnams g.yer
nas dgod// o kr-ihi/ mtshams nas g.yas su dgod par bya// sngal pat+ta 'dab ma ban rtsebs la// gsal byed yi ge sum cu gnyis// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul
dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni// dbus nas drang por gnas pa so// hU~Mn dkar po 'thur bltas pa// mar gyi rtsol thug par dgod// g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te//
kA lo sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// thabs la lan gsum bskor byas nas// lugs 'byung 'og tu kha bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la// ma mo dbyangs yig bcugano//
gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// sgal tshigs la gnasasrog la brten// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni// rin chen dang 'dra mdud pa na// dgu par gnas pa bya gdong tshul//
chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// bde ba reg ster man bzhugs// gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor la gnyis// gru gsum gnas su yo be ro// de na yongs su gyur pa las// ma yi 'khor
la gru gsum pa// tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te// lte bar raM ni demar po bsam// 'dab ma gsum la oM A/hU~M// gru gsum zur la dgod bya ba// rdo rje rtse gsum bsam par bya//
rlung gi gnas su yi ge yaM// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ dmadog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la// tshad na sor bzhi nyid yan no// dbus su 'dab ma lnga yin te// lce bar yang naneg
po bsam// 'dab ma lnga la da lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yas mtshan pa 'o// rlung gdam tshig me sbar bas// dam tshig ma yas gtum mo bskul// ye shel res nagetum mo bskul//
'khor lo gsum bsregs rnyed pa tsam// ya gi yon desros pa yis// taMbazhu bdud rtsi'i char yang bab// lte ba'i gnas su thig ler gyur// rgyun du 'gapa rgyug po yis// rin chen
dbyibs 'dra'i nang sleb nas// rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong pas// rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa// chos sku rdo rje 'chang
chen po'i// sa na nges par thob pa 'o// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyungalas/ 'khor 'khobazhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// na yang bshad bya
ba yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i// nges don du ni de yis gsungs/[” ]/de yang don la khyed rnams kyis// rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zung// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byams pa dang/ dga' ba'i 'od dang/ dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'a byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa tham lagu nas//
rjes su yi rang nas lha'i mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni nam mkha' 'dra min po che'i ra dang/ sgog pa dang/ dgod pa dang/ dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang/ pa ta
ril sogs pa'i mchod pa dang/ gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang/ zhal zas kyi mchod pa re brgya pa dang/ gtum pa'i mchod pas mchod de/ gzhan yang
nang dang/ gsang ba dang/ gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis ma snang bar gyur to// dpal rdo
rdzogrub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ 'tsho ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+tagam+b+haah+pha tan/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po don gyi rgyud/ dpal rdo rjesams dpa'
laphyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjebadag/ snying po mchogon bzhugs pa'i sku// rdo rje
sems dpa' la gzigs te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// mtha' dang bral ba yin mod kyi// srid dang 'khor bar rab tu grags// de nas
rje sems dpa' yas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye horang byung bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// gsung mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// skye
med dbyings nas snang byed 'khrungs// 'gro drug 'dren pa khyod kyi gsung// nyid kyi zhal nas thag pa shor// ke ke rudang margad dang// sprug dang rdo yi snying po dang// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pas
ye shes gzhal yas khadog spus/ nyid las mi gzhan 'jigs byed dang// rgyal sras dad pa gtamanyan dang// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams so// de nas bcom ldan shAka thub kyi//
gsung gi degongs pa mkhyen nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi// rang byung ye shes bsdu ba mdzad// de bzhin gshegs kyis 'di skad du// ched du brjod pa rnam par mdzad// gang zhig
rtsol med bde chen don// lhan cig skyes pa ma mthong na/ sgrupa dang rtsol ba rubyed kyang// byas pa don med ga chad du// rdzas bzung ba na 'ching ba nyid// rten 'brel sgom pa gnyis pa'o// don
mang nyams myong 'dod pa yang// 'ching ba'i rgyu ste gsum pa 'o// kha cig a ri'i thal bas byugs// dbang phyug nam mkha'i rdzas rnams sdud// 'chid pa'i rgyu ste bzhi pa'o// gleng gzhi'i
le'u ste dang po'o//mtha' dang bral ba'i rangabazhin la// gzung 'dzin nad kyis ci la 'ching// gdod nas dag pa'i nam mkha' la// bag chags mtshan mas ci la
'ching// skye 'gag med pa'i chos la// rgyu 'brasand kyis ci 'ching// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes la// rtog dpyod nad kyis ci la 'ching// e ma'o rnam
ngag sems nyid glong// lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'od gsalasnatshogs dus na bde// rnam dag 'khoral bde ba la// bsnan pa'i blo gros 'phog pa yis// srid rgyu nges pa'i rtse
bar 'khyams// gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhen chags can gyigadul bya la// bdeb chen po bsam sbyin// khong khro can gyi chedul bya la// g.yo ba rlung gi bcos ma
sbyin// 'dod pa chu bzhin gdungs pa la// bkri drangarang rgyud bcos ma sbyin// kun tu rmongs pa'i yodecan l// stong pa snying rje bcos ma sbyin// ston pas de skad bka' stsal pas// 'khor
rnams bsdu ba rnam mdzad de// de bzhin gshags 'disnyadagasol// ye nas rnam par dag pas na// khams gsum 'khor ba ji ltar lags// glo burab gcig legs 'gyuran/
thog mtha'i yodaparam 'gyur ram// yang na rdo rjesems sogs pa// dmyal bar 'tshad par 'gyur ram// la bor ba bde pa grub pa na// sbyang btub bam ni ci zhogagu// de skadagaso'i sa
misnang gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// nga'anyan pa khyed legasaso// rtsegs midakyis dang bar byos// ma nges kha dog 'ja' tshon las// rigs kyi khyad par tha dad
snang// ldan la lha mo gcig pa'o// ma bsdus gcig tu rdzogs pa 'o// sa ba'i seng ge 'jigs pa med// bka' yi dgongs pa shin tu zab// ma rgyud blo yi mchang pi na/ tshogs
kha dog rigs su bsgyur// dperan swa sti ka bzhin no// garan ta yi skye bzhin// brtags shing brtags shing skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// khyab bdag nam mkha'i
sna tshogs gzugs// deng bdag sems dpa'i lus su 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mgon pos de skad du// bshad nas 'khor rnams dengs gyur te// phyogs gcig tu blo 'khor gyur na// bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// lta ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu// ma bcos ngo bo ji lta bu// ye shes spyod pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so 'dus pa'i
tshogs chen pos// rnam pa drug gi mtshan de du// khyad par bdun dang mtshon pa'i dpe// bcu bzhi rnam pa ci rigs su// bcu gsum ma nor zhes su bshad/ lha5 cig skyes pa khyab gnas
pa da mngon sum dbang gi ngo bor shar// sbyin pas bzlog nas bltas pa yis// nam mkha' las 'bab bde skyong nas// 'thur du 'khor la drug rims su/ a ta ra bde ba len//
ye shes zer zhing sdug bsngal skye// rmongs pas mya ngan sdug pas 'dzin// de ma spong ba'i 'ching bar 'gyur// sa d+ha'i tshul du dge slong gnyis// dbang rdzogs bar zhing bde ba spyod//
[7/ ]bya@#/// 'chi'aphos nas ni ngestsal bar song// rgyal po'i khab na btsun mo can// tshom du sdud cing rig pa yis// ye shes gzhan la 'chad cinge ston// 'chi'aphos dur
khrod sa ga ya// smad 'tshong ma yi srin bu skyes// 'jig rten khamasagazhan sems dmyal du// shin tu 'tshed cing 'bod par 'gyur// brig sha'i drungan a ko ta// bka' yi
bsgo pa rnam par byed// kha sbyor ba ni ye shes zhes// bzhin bzang ma la 'dzegs par dgod// tshe 'phos nas na ngu 'bod skyes// 'chad pa'i skyes bu de phyir nges// khyod 'dri ba
bstan par bya// sems kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa// mi chos lta bam dmagos shes// mgayo ngo bam reda' 'am// de skad gsungs nas mi snang gyur// 'dri ba'i rtog pa dang po
chod// 'chad pa'i skyes bus mang gsol pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gnyen gcig pu// dam phog pa na ji ltar lags// dbang gi 'od bzhin ji ltar lags// rtog pa gnyis pa dris pa
ka las// lta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi// gang la ming de skad bya ya// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mtshon pa'i dpa
ni 'di skad gsungs// nag po brtsegs pa pad pa ti// gri ta dang ni kong ka dang// phag dang glang po gzhon num// zla ba chu shel glang seng dang// o da chubo gsum 'dres dang/
pas gser dang nam mkha' ri be rma/ gsum pa bcu bzhir shes par bya// de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste// de las gang zhig 'da' byed pa// dmul bar yang dag 'tshed par bshad// e ma'o//
rang rig skal chen po// nam mkha'i sngon la 'bud par byed// byis pa rang bzhin mi shes pas// bcos ma du rang bzhin sngo bas byed// rnam dag 'od gsal sgrib pa med// ye shes/
rgya mtshor zhugs rmongs pas// kun tu 'ching ba'i mdud pa nyid// kun tu 'ching ba rgyun ma 'chad// lhan cig skyes pa'i mda' 'phangs kyang// bstan pa'i blo gros leg pa yis//
gcig dang du mas sems bslad pas// rmongs pa nga rgyal spel bar byed// rlung gi rgyu ba dril ba'i lha// yag 'bru kha dog go bar byed// yade dang rlung na rgyu ba na// snang ba 'gags pa
ye shes so// de de log pas 'ching ba'i rgyu// tshangs pa yo no tseNA la// sngar bas lha nyid 'od du zhu// ka sogs g.yas dang g.yon du a// yig mgo tshig dang gsos pa dang//
stong phrag bdun cu'i rtsa lam nas// bar pa bde ba skyed par byed/ don dam pa ro zhes su smra// rmongs pa bsdams pas mdud pa grol// zag pa skyes pas 'ching bar 'gyur// lhan
cig skyes pas rigs pa yis// ci rigs pa rugazhan la ston// grol bar 'gyur zhes nga ma ma// e ma'o blo naganyisasu snang// ji ltar spyad kyang grol ma 'gyur// dbang gi le'u ste/
gsum pa'o///gang la ming de skad byaba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de nas rdo rjesems dpa' yis// rtog pa gsum la
gcad pa'i phyir// stanalas langs te 'di skad gsol// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// bsgom pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar lags// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal
dorje rang byung soms// phyag rnams dag pa 'od gsal dbyings// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'gro ba'i bla ma ye shes gzugs// gsung gi thogs pa lhan cig skyes//
rnam ngag rang rig dbyangs la 'dud// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kyemasems dpa' rdo rjeton// mngon du gyur pa sgom pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs 'bar ba ye shes drod//
zlaci yang mthong la med rtogs na// ma mthong gnas na mthong ba ru// ma thong na 'gag cing bltas na ste// shes rab ye shes 'od po che// ca degar ba'agan bde ba 'gog/ ye shes rgya mtsho ye
gsal la// sangs rgyas sgom par ma mdzad do// de la gnyen po yod dam ci// rigs pas ston pa 'ching pa'i nad// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// bde ba de ni ston mdzad dam// rdo rje
sems dpa' khyod nyid kyis// bstan par nus sam 'on teci// bsnyad du med pas brjod dang bral// bsgrub tu med pas dpe dang bral// mtshon du med pas tshig lam chad/ lhan cig
00 skyes pas bsgrub tumed// mngon du gyurangs bsgom du med// dpyad du med pas bcos dang bral// ma yengs blo yi rtog pa 'o// bsgom pa'i re 'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe// 'chad nga 'i
skyes bu nyid kyang ni// brgyal nas sa 'a 'gyel gyur to// lha min rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// so sor byer te dengs par gyur// lha yi bu mo stong phrag ni// chos la rdzul mig rnam par
dag/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri yapa// de ma thag tu mngon sangs rgyas// 'jig rten khams ni dreg g.yos pas// 'ur 'urapo dang ches cher rgyas// khams gsum po ni 'dar ngar byed//
de yi mod la sems rdzogs pa// ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad gsol// e ma'osangs rgyas kun gyi rje// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bde ba'i mchog/ skal ldan 'dul byed gnyen gcig pu// 'gro
ba'i mar me ye shes smon// khyed kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma rig sgo nga'i lang thog bsal// rnam dag ye shes khyod la 'dud// dga' mgu rangs nas gsol pa dang// thams cad
'dud cing 'khod par byed// sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de skadabcom ldan shAkya thub// rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te// bka' yi bsgo ba 'di skad mdzad//
legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// yang ngag yashes la zhugs pas// rnam rtog 'tshang ba'i nad dang bral// mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// bzlog pa la/kalcas pa tha dad
'dzin// gnyug ma'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes// de yang bcings pas rtsal mthong// gang gis de nyid mngon gyur nga// de la sdig pas ci la 'dzin// dus gsum
'jig rten khams bzhugs pa// de la byin gyis rlob par mdzad/[”]/de la gal te gzugs yong na// dpag gam gzhal du btub bam ci// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ 'del ci rogs skyob/
par byed// gnod sbyin mthu chen thob pa yang// srung ba rgyunadu byed par 'gyur// grul bum srin po gdon rnams kyis// de yi bsam pa yongs su sgrub/ nad ngang shu ba 'bras dang
rims// de yi sa la 'byung la 'gyur// bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang// skad cig ma yis 'byang bar 'gyur// rgyun du zhugs dang lan cig 'ong// phyir ma ldog pa'i
bsams dpa' yis// de yi gzi brjid 'phel bar byed// de bas sems dpa' chen po nyon// khyab pa'i 'khor la bde ba'i mchog 'di nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan yi ga med dang rig
pa'i gsung// dam nga 'i don la 'jal bar nus// don gyis chos nyid 'jal bor ston// bla ma'i zhal nas dris na ste// rtogs na rnal 'byor skyes bu de// nam mkha'i rdul phran ston
ngar 'gyur// ma rabs sgyu ma'i tshig la 'dzin// lhan cig skyes pa mthong ngam ci// gal te mthong na brtag par 'gyur// brtags na yengs te'akhyam par 'gyur/ gnyis kyis blo la
mya ngan snang// kha dog gcig tu bsgyur ba yi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor 'kho mchog/ rnal ma la gnas 'ching 'grol 'gyur// gang zhig bla ma'i drine shes dag/ skye ba med ba nyid duston/
bla ma'i bka' drin mngeshes pa// de yisi lhan skyes ru la mthong// lhan cig skyes pa de yis bcings// ngel 'gro ba skye zhing 'ching// tha dad gzengs pas nad du gyur// dus dang gnas su
bgrangs pas ldeg/ bdag dang gzhan du bltas pas ldog/ 'di dang phyi mar bsang ngas gol// skye med lhan skyes bcos pas 'ching// de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad// 'chad
pa'i skyes bus 'di skad bstod// e ma'o rnam dag ye shes sku// khyab bdag gsung gi lde mgasgo// ma rig sgrib pa pral ba'o// 'bad par gshegs pa ye shes sku// e ma'o rnal
'byor thugs kyi bcud// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir las bsgral/ ma skyes lhan cig 'gag che da cing// byang chung sems 'a phyag 'tshal bstod// phan yon gyi le 'u ste lnga pa'o//
de bzhin g.yogs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po'i don gyi rgyud rdzogs so//karjebatsun gu ru'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsa ba seng kar shAkya
od kyis pham mthing du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o///rgya gar skad du/ shAtsakrasaM ba ra tan+tA rA dza ang+kut+tashA sA na a laM kA ra nA ma/
bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'ang skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de ba na gshegs pa thams spyad kyi sku rang/ gsung rang/ thugs rdo rje ban mo'i phyu ga rnams la bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i
dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis phyi mchod pa dang/ nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang/ de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchong nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye hopacom ldan rdo rje 'dzin//
dpal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// 'khor 'a zhes pa gang la bgyi// sdom pa nyid kyang ji lta bu// rgyud kyi nger na ji ltar lags// de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po su/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// 'khor 'a rnam pa bzhi ru brjod// phyi nang gsang pa de nyid de// dang po la 'khor 'de ni// sku mdog phyag mtshapa lha sku
drug cu rtsa ba nyis rim pa ste/ ye shes dam tshig sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rnam pa bzhin// lugs 'byung lugs la sa bzlog pa ni// tha mal gcod pa sa phyi ru
bshad// gnyis pa nang gi 'khor ni// gnas sogs bcu yi rim pa rnams// mtho ris sa steng sa 'og dang// 'khor re sgo la dgod pa ni/ phyi rol spros pa gtor ma lo// gsum/
pa gsang ba'i 'khor len// sngal pa chos dang longs spong dang// de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni//
mchog dga' dang// rnam par riga' ba'i gnyen po ni u0f38/ bde ba stong pa ma rtog gsum// dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la// de khon ya 'khor 'a rab rjod// sdom pa phyi nang gsang
ba nyid// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtamug dang// nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs pa// gnyen pos ye shes ngang du sdom// bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang// tha mal pa ya rnam rtog
kyang// dag pa lha yi 'khor lor sdom/ gdod nas lus la grub pa ya/rtsa dang rlung dang byang sems kyang// a ba d+hA ti'i nang du sdom// bde ba stong pa ma rtog dang// dngos dang dngos/
mar yong shes kyang// dbyer med gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang// 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yasi// rgyu dang thabs dang
'bras bu ste// dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la// gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'og ma'i yon tan ldan pa dang// nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang/
gnyen po ye shes che ba dang// gzhan la khyab pas rgyal po yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dur khrod brgyud na ji ltar lags// de yi dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phunang gsang ba de nyid kyis// dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur// dang po phyi yi dur khrod na// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rel 'a ma// yang
na phyi rol grwa rnams su// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// gtum drag dang ni tshang tshing dang// 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang/ 'jigs sde rnams ni 'ar sogs
kyi phyogs su g.yon nas bskor te gnas// hahar dgong pa dbang ldan te// dpal gyi nags tshal byon thar ro// 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral du chung ca tshams ko la kaM
laresgrogs// shar du ha ra pa phye la// gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong// byang du byang chub shing bu la// gser po ma yi gdong/ nub tu mya ngan med shing la// 'bar
'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong// lho ru sutu'o shing bu la// 'jigs sde nag tshe ma ho'i gdeng// ma ru ka ran tsa na ste// dpal rgyunegs tshal ra gdong dmar// panger dro a rdzu'i
shinge bu la// 'jigs pa'i mun pa ma he'i gdong// rlud du srid grub shing bu la// ka 'a re sgra sgrogs ri dgas gdong// dbang ldan du gro d+hashang la// dngur dgod pa la g.yagadong
g.yasanagro gug thod pa g.yon// shing 'a'i steng na stod phyung ngo// shar du brgya byin dkar po la// rdo rje sdigs mdzub glang po zhon// byang du lus ngan ser po la/ dbyug pa 'dzin
cing gter la zhen/ nub tu chu bdag dmar po ni// rusrin zhonanas zhags pa thogs// lho ru gshane rjenag po la// ma bzhon nas pe con thogs// shar lho me lha dmar ser la//
ra la zhon nas me thab 'dzin// lho nub srin po snyaganag la// ral gri thogs nas mi la zhon// nub byang rlung lhamadog sngon po// ri dwags zhon nas 'phan no 'phyar// byang shor dbang
ldan dkar po ni// khyu mchog nyonanas rtse gsume thogs// thams cad rang rang goms 'khyud// nor rgyas dang ni 'jog po dang// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dang// shar nas brtsams taM
g.yon du dgod// pa=che dang mtha' yas dang// gas ldan dang na dung skyong na// g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa 'o// sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang/ mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyile//
shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod// 'khrigs pa gang ba 'bab pa dang// drag po sngon tshogs mtshams 'al dgod// rdorje rin chen par dang// las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma// sna
tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyisan// rol spyod cing mkha' la rgyu// gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang// chu dang me sogs rim pa ste//
gza' dang par tu grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas// 'byung po'i gdon dang rolangs dang// stag dang khyi dang ce sbyang dang// wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang// phyod tshig pa
[n ]@#// dang rnam par sbyangs// mgo bo lus po keng rus rnams// a 'a yaM gyi sgra sgrogs pa// de nas nang gi dur khrod// lus kyi sgrasen spyi la sogs/ skye zhing 'jig
par byed pas// dur khrod chen po lus la dgod// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis nas// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni// dbugs rgyu zhes pa dur
khrod de// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyud dang// dngos po'i rtog pa sna tshogs pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dur khrod 'di// gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod// de nas dur khrod dgos ni/
rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la// phyogs skyong ma dge bcupo spong// sangs rgyas brgyud kyi mtshan mngashing// thugs rje'i rtags su shange brgyad la// zhing skyong sngags kyi theg pa srung
gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyud dgod// mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed// chun brjod bya zab pa la// ma sogs ga nga bral ba'o//
rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i glu ga ji bu//
bzhugs pa'i don ni rdo ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// lha yi bu dang phung po'i bdud// bdud bzhi bcom nga sa bcom
lda'adas// skal ba yon tan drug nyided// dbang phyug dang nagazugs bzang dang// dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang// ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni// drug po de la ldan/
zhes gsungs// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de dang bral phyir 'das pa 'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus
gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo gnas// btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyangs// de la yong phyir byug ste// mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rjesnying pos yang gasol
pa dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bkyi// de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bol yang rnam bzhi ste// bum
pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// tha mal pa ya rnam rtog song// des na phyi yi dpa' bor bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa rlung thage le
bsgoms pa yis// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa na// nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas// gzung dang
'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms// de na gsang ba'i dpa' bo yin/ bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas// tha dad rtog pa 'dzoms pa'i phyir// de kho na yi
dpa' bor bshad// dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bzhi// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la/ lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// de ni phyi yi
dpa' mor bshad// nad du rtsi dang thog la sogs// rang bzhin med par byed pas ma// gsang bar dga' pabazhi rnams la// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pas ma// rang rig sems kyi ngo bo ni//
nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgoms pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo 'o// mchod pa yang na rnam pa bzhi// phyi nang gsang ba de khon/ dang po gyis mchod pa ni// me tog bdug spos mar me dang//
klu/ dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang// rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang// gzugs drang sgra dang dri deng ni// ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang// 'khor la rin chen glang po rta// btsun mo dmag
dpon blon po rnams// phyi ya mchod pa thun mong ngo// rang gi lus las byung ba yi// bdud rtsi lta dang btung ba dang// sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// phung po khams dang skye mched
kyi'o 'khor lo rnams la mchod pa nang// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rang snang thabs kyi roge ma yis// skra gzung b+hu su ku tsa btsir// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs// dga'
ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang// lhan cige skyes pa'i bde bas mchod// rang rig stong pa rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos sku la// zhen pa rnams dang bralab na/ bla na med pa'i
mchod pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ gtor ma zhes pa gang la bgyi// de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru/
gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba de khon// dang po phru yi gtor ma ni// thuna mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du// re las ma dang yaM las rlung// skyed gsum a las dum gcig pa'i// nang du
bdud rtsi sha lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang// mkha' 'gro dgyes par byed pa'o// gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye
mchad rnams// lus ni lha ya 'o khorale lo// rtsa na ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// sran bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// gsum pa gsang ba'i gtor man// 'khor lo bzhi yaka pA lar//
rlung dang thig le bdud rtsi la// dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor man// phunang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dpanges
tshuladasnod du// don dam sems kyi sngags kyis su// bde ba chen po'i lha la mchod// phan yonadangos grub ster ba dang// phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang// zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang//
khams dang skye mched rtas pa dang// rgas sra lus kyamadangs ldan zhing// sa dkaraganyer ma spong ba dang// dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang// 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa 'o// lha mos
