'byung// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems las ma gtogasasangs rgyas dang// sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing//
ma gsungs gsung bar ma 'gyur te// des Mn sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sems kyigasang 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa// snang ba myong zhing/
grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang medra/ dmag 'khapha// thog ma ma skyes rang bzhin dag/ blo burasangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas sems can
gnyis ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gat+tis ma yin// rang bzhin rig pa 'od gsal sogs// sar mod brjod du med pa ste// dper na lugs pas ro myong 'dra// ras dang she 'dra'i
rang bzhinal// log rtog rtsisogs rnam par 'khrul// khams grasum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing// 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang// de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ de nyid g.yeng/
dang rnam rtog ste// rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching// rang gis gsod cing rang gis za// rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal// rang rig yonasaspros bral la// sgra dang tha snyad
'jugan 'khrul// rang rig rang gas 'od gsal la// ma mig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul// dngos po stong par ro mnyam 'a// blang dang dor bar byed na 'khrul// 'dod yon ngang gis
'gags pa la// de dag dka' bas myongan 'khrul// rang rig ye nas stong pa la// 'dod yon lnga la brten na 'khrul// duman dang gya nom med pa la/ sgro dang skur pa 'debs na 'khrul//
gdod nas spros bral lhunagrub la// sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can ga'is med la// de dag gnyis su 'dzin ra 'khrul// don nga[']glun rdzob gnyis med la//
bden pa gnyis su 'byedon 'khrul// sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul// stong nyid rol mo nas par// dngos po mtshan mar gzungan 'khrul
sams kyi klong chen mo 'dul bar/ g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul// rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa 'a// rang rig ye shes 'dod na lo khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar//
che ba'i nga rgyal snyan 'khrul// rang rig nyams su ma myong bar// dkar po'i chos rnams ljong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang bzhin ma 'a smral nang rig 'khru
sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul// sangs rgyas las 'khrulasems can de// rang rig 'as 'khrul gnyan rigasnang// sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung// des na rang
sems 'khrul pa dag/ don du snang ba rab tu skye// skye ba med bzhin skye bas 'khrul// lcags bsregs sa bzhi rang gi sems// ma sogs byed pa gzhan n mod// bkres
skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems// zas skom bkres pa gzhan n med// reg btsog lcag gzhus rang gsems// srog gcod gshan pa gzhan na med// 'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun//
rang gi sems su ma shesan// de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bstan// theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta// bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms nas// ma bsgoms na yang
( bsgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// stong par ma 'gyur gang yang med// de las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung// sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung/
de dag sems kyi rang bzhin no// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs duzhig mams// gdul bya gang largyud rnams bshad/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka'asal pa// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// gdol pa ko lcags mkhan la sogs// gzugs ngan gsod pa'i gdon gnyer ba// theg pa 'di las 'grub par
'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgoms pa dang// gtso bo yab yum bsgom pa dang// dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed rim spros dang bcas pa'i lam// rags la gnas
pa'irnal 'byor gyos// lha sogs bu mo mtshan ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung// bkod pa byang sems
dmanapa dbyibs// zab pasngags dang thig le dang// mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms nga// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rten yod ma yin brten pa med// dmigs pa thams
cad rnam bsal te// lhan cige skyes pa'i don sgom pa// phyag rgya chen por rang byin rlab/ de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// las dang po la phyi nang ga'i
mchog la yang ni phyi nang gnyis// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang// dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste// 'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur//
rtsa ba'i rgyud ni nem pa gsum// bshad rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis te// yan lag rgyud na grongs las 'das// rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang// phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin// bram bre rgyal rogs rje
gas dang// dmangs riges gdol pa gdul don du// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ da gu nga du ni
gtso bo bsgom// thabs ni rnam pa ngu zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs las byung ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ri rtse dur khrod ro stong du// gcer bu sku bzhi ga lhor
@#// bltas te// A li kA las lus bsrungs la// dpa' ba 'a 'khorale bsgom par bya// smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol ba bsnyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam//
lam gnyis la ni brten nas su// sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya// bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrud// gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud// gsum pas sems kyi ngo ma ste// de na kun tu
brtags pa la// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rige pa// bkru ba'i phyire na bzhu pa bshad// gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang// byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur
sbu dang// ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la// nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i reme// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas su// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do// stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la//
mtshan dpa bde ba longs spyod sku// rol pa'i mdzad pa stsalaMsku la// sku gsum dbyer med bde chen dang// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par gyur//
gang la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor bas skyonas sdom gsum ldan// thos che dad ldan mtshan chade bzang// dbon par dkyil 'khor bros sna
a bcad// chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyod// thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal
'byoral// sgom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'a u0f7a la che ba'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar
'gyur// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu// rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la brgya// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan
'angs kyis bka' stsal pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la// rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yod pa rgyu la sgrub pa lam// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yani// thog mar gsungs
pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud// don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la// gsal bar byed po bshad pa'i rgyud// bskal pa rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis dang// rtsod ldan
dus bzhi'i rim pa yis// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhirogasungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la snga// dza lta bu la
sbyin par bya// staran lung nod ji ltar bya/ bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying rje med cing khro la gdug/ khengs shing chags pa
tshul khrims med// dad med rigs ngan bla mas skyo// thos chungasnying rang rnams la// dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med// dad ldan rigs
bzang gtong phong che// thos mang dam tshig ldan l sbyin// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis// ston du bla ma mnyes byas la// yar ngo mar ngo'atshos
bcul// dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lha mo rnams la rgyud gtadra ltar// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams// zung la sgrub pa chen
du gyasi// lan grasum brjod la rgyung rnams spyani// phyi rabs dus kyi sAgs ma la// chags sems gyong ba'i slob man// gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod// thos nas khub
glu sub rang che 'byon// de la bsten nangamatshig mas// nges par ngang nas zhu ba yi// gcig nas gnyis lam sgrolan/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyan 'tshod// bcom lan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis rgyud kyi don rtogs nas rjes su yi rang ngo// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi//
tsha[– ]rgyun rmad du byung ba rdzogs so///paN+Di tag ya dru radang/ lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
skad du/ oM anA ba la tan rAdza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha'i 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la ra 'dod pas//
rtog med rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das// zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par s+yas// ngang gis
sangs rgyas 'di nyod tshul// khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas// bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin// rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin// kha cig
stong par 'dod pa dang// kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang// kha cig khyapa 'jug tshul gyis ni// blo dman gan 'jog par byed// de nyid nges par yang dag par// rgyu ya gnas kyi spyod
yul nyide// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na// bsgoms pa medacingabyang nus med// rgyu yi yodaches spangs pa 'di// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i yi shes las byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs
ston par byed// kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du// kha cig zhi chen po che// kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs// 'bacig 'dar zhinge g.yo bo dang// glu gar de bzhin sal snyan dang// lha yi
sngags naserjod pa nyid// khacig sngags ni yang dag dgod// kha cig dkyil 'khor bro ba dang// dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus// de ltar la/
sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags// gang tshosams na legs gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul de// dkyil 'khor de nyide 'gyur ba ni// phan 'dod
rnams kyis shes pa bya// phung po lasogs tshogs rnams kyis// gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa// lus ngag ya de gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor
zhes bya gsungs// phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste// rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya//
me long lta bu'i gcig nyid de// dang po gruran rtogs par bya// so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas// shar gyi krurani rnam par brgyan// byab nan tan khyad 'phags pa// byang gi grur rnam
par zlos// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni// bag chags med gru rjes rtogs byed// gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// grwa ya dbus ni thams cad du// de nyid 'do no rib 'jug pas/
ye shes spyod yul dun brtag/ sgo bzhi yang dag brjod pa na// de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba// de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni// smyon pa bzhin rnam dag pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor gzug
sun// mkhaskyod pa yis rnam par brgyan// zhi deng chos don brgyan pa las// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub// dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs// jakyil 'khor dun bros pa dang// rta
babs lasogs thams cad ni// ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid// sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las na gsungs// gang zhig sems kyi rab 'pha'akha//
ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas/ de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs// dral phyed pa khyed du ste// drile khu doshal brtag pa ni// rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed// sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bur
na chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs// chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyal mtshan 'phreng bar gasungs// tharalasogs gang bres pa// dngos po la sogs dang po
nges// sems n bu re zhes byar bshad// dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o// gos 'phung de dag thams cad ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems//
dga' ba'i ye shes kyis mtshan// de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs// sgra yaM mtshams na thems cad du// ro ljarin chen rtogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje rin po che yis spras// kha nyim gang
gsungs pa// thabs dang shes rab don mthod phyir// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyides ms// ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// de nyid dkyil
'khor du nagasungs// sku gsung thugs na nye ba'i phyir// rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med// bla ma slob ma rnam gsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs// sbyin sregakyang ni bshad/
pa yang// lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod// rnam rtog med pa'isims gang ni// thab khungasgra yis mtshan ma nyid// bye brag phyed pas me nang du// gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams
sems las byung ba'i yam shanged// thams cad kyi no srogablugs bya// gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yam shingezhes na reb tu grags// de ltar sbyin
srog bshad nas ni// rab tu gnas pa brjod pa rabya// sku gsung thugs la rtag tu no/ gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa// de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngoso po su/
gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// de nagasal bar brjod par bya// yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang// gang zhage gsang ba bdagags brjod// skye ba med cing snang med mtshan gzhi
mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir// 'di ni ngeyas stagasasugasungs// sngags na gsal bar bshang nas ni// lha rnams kyang ni brjod par bya// phung po
khams dang skye mched kyi// rang bzhin gyin legs gnas gang// yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shing// gal tesems kyis nyer brtags gang// lha
zhes bya bar yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byoran// gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya// de nas
skyil krung bcas nas// sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang// rang gi reng bzhin rnal 'byor gyis// de nyida mthong bar gzhag par bya// snying ka'i gnas su lag pa gnyis// 'bad pas
mnyam par sbyar nas su// mi rtog pa ya rang bzhin du// gang tshesems ni rab rgyu ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
pa'i bdag/ myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtog pa'i bdag/ thugs kyi rdo rjegasum pa bzhin// rnal 'byorasangs
rgyas thams cad 'gyur// nga yis gsal bar brjod pa na// sku gsung thugasakyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don// thabs dang shes rab spyod yu la don// sems can
don du snying rjeche// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// sna rtse dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs// de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so// res 'ga'
dam tshig 'khor 'a yang// de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so// rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni// gang 'grub de ni res 'ga' yang// gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa bzhin// rnam rtog
med par lhag mos pas// sgrubapo dam pas bsgrub par bya// khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha// bshang ba dang na gecib nyid// dmatshig cesabyarab 'bad par// gang zhig bdag gis tshig
gsungs pa// de rnams kun lo de bzhin gshegs// de rnams thasnyadatsam gyis gnas// gang tshodam tshig 'dod chags sams// des ni de nyid rab tu spyod// gong tshesems na chegs
gyur pa// de nas ms can yod ma yin// de 'dra kun tu rtog pa yi// khrag na za bar 'gyur ba'o// khragan chen po zos nas ni// 'od dpag med pa'i ng bza' bar bya//
gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa// khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrags par bya// de tshom skyes rtogs pa'i phyir// bza'i bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid// dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid// 'chan dun ring
tudabye// mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod// gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las// phyag rgya las kyi sbyorab yis// de
yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod// chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems// sbas pa'i char na gnas pa 'di// chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'i// bshang ba za bar yang dag brjod// dam tshig nyid
kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad// 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes
bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'grom dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rtog pa med pa zhes bya brdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di tag ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo
tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o///rgya gar skad du/ shAso ba rakha sa ma tan rAdza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog nam
mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcage na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamA
cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rjesnying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das
gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rjesange po khyod nyon cig/ srog rang lnga pa de bzhin te/ lam dang 'bras bu nyid
yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste// sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do// rdzogs tshe snying
pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lnga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asal nga// sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// lnga pa yang ni gcig nyade do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa
bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying rje chen po las skyes pa// dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog/
bde ba chen po lam yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po na gong/ dga' ba ni gang/ thabs ni gang/ shes rab ni gang/ gnyis su med pa ni gang kus/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog/ dga' ba gnyis med bde ba che// thabs ni he ru ka dpa la nyid// shes rab rdo rje rnal/banyem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
'byor ma// gnyis su med pa zung 'jug mchog/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang ka ni gong lags/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

he ru ka ni phung po nyid// phung po yang na ru ka/ khams ni de rnam dpal te// rdo rje ma dpa la khams nyid do// skye mched de yang de bzhin du// lha ya ngo bor shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das phung po 'anyoru ka gang lags/ khams kyi rdo rjernal 'byor ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// he ru ka dpal bdag nyade dngos// dri me med pa'i kha dog
can rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis brgyan cinge dgu dang ldan// zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rje dang// rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum ngag gis mdzes pa ste// chags pa
mad pa'i sham thabs can// shes rab rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma// bsdu ra ka'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgyalngas brgyan cing// dag pa lnga bcu'i 'phreng bas mdzes// rdo rje pad+ma'i snod
bsnams pa// yab la 'khyud cing nga rkyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med bde ba la dgyes pa// chu skyes tAma'i dbus na 'gying// khams nyid kyang na lha nyid do// dpal bde mchog nam mkha'
dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu snye le'u dang po'o//kardo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gapalags//
ngo bo nyid kyis khong gsal ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// brtan dang g.yo ba thams cad kun// shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal nyid//
ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku// brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab// brtag tu med pa nam mkha'adebus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med// gnyis su med
pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa 'o// dpal bde mchoganam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i rom pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o//
snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa rnam par dag pa na gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang// dbang ga rnam par dag
pa dang// maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du// bum pa'i ngo bo lhar shes pa// sngags kyi de bzhin nyide gnas pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang/ sbyin sreg ni gang/
gtor ma ni gang/ dbang ni gang/ maN+Dal na gang/ bum pa ni gang/ sngags kyi de bzhin nyade ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// sngags gsang sngags rgyal po ste//

u0f00 shrI badzra heha ru ru kaMhU~MhU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/ o taha hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM sam+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+Na nAye hU~MhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badzrab i ro tsa nI ye hUM
phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis// bskal pa stong pa stong la sogs pa yi// sdug pa ma lus dag byang chu// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes//
angashAt+tha dang rgya gro dang// rUr ba la sogs de bzhin du// bzhi pa'i ngo bor yang dag shes// sha lnga dang na bdud rtsi la// gyen du pho gyi sgra bsgrags pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes//
bang na tha ma'i lam nyid do// bdud rtsi chu yos legs phyugs nas// me tog dmar pos mchod pa 'o// rin chen snod bzang bru gyis mdzes// dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu// nyal ba'i sdug
kyi 'od zer gyis// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing// spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can// dzo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das skye mched kyi mkha' 'a sa gas
ska ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcer bu thal pa'i mdog can te// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa 'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// pi ma ldan 'das snga sa
ni gong/ gtor man gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ o dzA la mu li d+hA ki NI kaM ka ra hU~M phaT/ oM pa ra nA yan DA ki nI hUM phaT/ o ma DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ o pa dza mu
ki ni hUMphaT/ o u lu ka ta kan hUMphaT/ oM a ra tsam DA kirihUMphaT/ chuskyes dag gis rnam brgyan cing// bdud rtsa lnga yis rnam par mdzes// dpa' mo drug ni ma nyes par 'gyur//
rdo rjesnying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i lam ni gong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste// de yi rnam pa de la gnas// rdo rje snying
pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang/ sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam pa'i ngo bo lha nyid de// sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag
por bshar// jo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi bdag po ni gong/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang gi kha dog dmar po ste/ zhal gcig pa la phyag
bzhi pa// sprul pa 'khor lo'i rtse sa la gnas// brkyang bskum tshul rgyas mnan pa 'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka'astsal pa// bstan par bya ba sngags nyade de// o ga Na pa ta ye swAhA/ nag po 'bru yi le bu la// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar gnas pa// sngags kyi ngo bo shes par bya// dpal
bde mchoganam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ las snatshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o/// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub
1/ sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod gnas la sogs pa dang/ rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su yi rang
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///kha che'i mkhan po dzAn badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so//
rgya gar skad du/ shA badzra mahA kA la kro d+hanAtha ra pa susipId nga lta nA ma/ bod skad du / rang la rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i ma rA de ba/ sang la rnga sa gupaN+Da pe na
bya ba'i rgyud dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i// ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa yis// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa/ bka' yaM
'khor lo bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa re da rung gdonam bro ba bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di sku tshe 7ga pas/
ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// kun mkhyen bde gshegs bzhugs gyur nga// mya ngan bzla bar mi mdzad cing// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// rgyun ma 'chad nga 'a 'gro ba kun/
srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug nga ra/ smon lam
par sbyong byed cing// sAde rjes don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bos srid pa spyong bar mdzad// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// 'di ni rgyud rnams kun tu yang// kla klo'i skad
kyis sbos pa ste// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa po// rdo rjesems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i// rdo rjeslob dpon bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub ster byed pa// 'phral du yang dag
yang ches byed// bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis// ma rnams sems dang mthun par 'jug/ de dang de yi gzugs sprul te// sna tshogros g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs// de phyir 'bad
pa du ma yis// sna tshogs tshul gyis mthun par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can// rang gi lha yareb sbyor bas// bdag u0f38ra ye shes mchog 'grub
'gyur// 'di yis rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang// dkyil 'khor pa dang zhing skyong tshogs// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas// mkha' 'gro'i debang phyug mgon po che// sku gsung thugs drang
'phrin las tshogs// ye shes yon tan rigs kyi lha// nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/ lhamo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas// rdo rje'adzin pas dus kun tu // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin
gyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che// bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis// ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje tsan gyis gsungs/
thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum po ni me lus pa// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang na g.yo ba yis//
'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste// mthong ba dang na thos la sogs// thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'char// gang gis skye bo 'gying gyur pa// de nyidi yongs shes rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba A
yis ni// sa gsum bde ba chen po bsgyur// nyon mongasamang na ye shes mod// nyan rang byang chub lam las ring// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams//
T+Tha thams cad gdod nas dag pa yi// ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dngos po du ma gsal bar snang// ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rab bskul// de la pa
bla med rgyud 'di ru// 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya// gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med// dang po bla ma'i dam tshig dag/ thob pas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te//
smra brtan pa dag ni longs spyor yin// nges par brtan pa mya ngan 'da'// rnal 'byor gyi no dem tshig gnas// brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang// dbang bskur ngas ni dngos grub ste// bla ma de bzhin
gshegs pa dang// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpar bcas// dkyil 'khor nag po bla na med// sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang// yang dag bla ma bsnyen par bya// 'dir ni byang
chub sems kyisan// bsnyen pa nye bar bsnyen pa dang// sgrub pa sgrub pa chen po yi// khyad par rim partags dang dus// las la spur ba shes par bya// ji sride las kyi sbyor ba yis//
mgon po 'khor bcas mnyes gyur na// las dang dngos grubo sna tshogos pa// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba mngon
par byang chub pa'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das ngo bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje 'dzin pa'i gsung rmi lam lta bur 'bar gsan te gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'adzin pa gang zhig gis// sgyu ma brag cha'i sgra brnyan ltar// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu//
dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrab// bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni// byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa// kun gyi snying por gyur pa ni/ gsang ba zhing skyong mgon po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi
mgon po 'dis// bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la sog
pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du rdo rje'i theg pa che// gsang ba bsdus pa'i yang dag lam// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i// snying po 'bras bu 'a ma
0// byed pa// snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du// 'dren pa ye shes bstan pa bsrung// 'di nying gsang ba'i sgrub pa gang// rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol// de skad ces
gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ shes rab snying rje zupa'i jug pa// ting 'dzin gang du bsgomagyur pa// bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste// rgol
ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad// thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la// 'dzin dang skyong dang srung ba gsum// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad// sku gsum ya shes
lnga ldan par// gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyinges la rab tuzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal haru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal

'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i debus su/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhan gyis grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang byung bla na med pa'i rdo rje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po ma phyed pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge

tshu 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung ba
zhes bya ba ston par mdzad do// rdo rje gzhi la gnas pa'i tshe// gter gyi bum pa kha sbyoraldan// dus kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba// chu'adzin phyogs tsam byed ldan nyid// sgra dang sgra las khyab
pa ste// du ma ma yin gnas pa'i yul// dam tshig gsang pa 'byung ba las// rgyal ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso// phyogs dus med par rang byung ba// chos 'byung pho brang dkyil 'khor du//
rigs kyi yon tan ldan pa ni// nam mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis 'grub// ma phying lhan cig skyes pa rgyal// pho brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang// dkyil
'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug nga// ge sar pad+ma'i dbus su// kun nas zlum por 'khor ba ni// tshad med 'phreng bas brgyan pa ni// bkod pa dpagamed rim par ldan// ri rab lhun po mchog
byung ba'i// de nyid kun nas yongs bskorab 'i// rgya mtshodangan re rnams te// shin dumanyam zhing mtshungs par 'khor// de nyid rim pa yongs su brtan// bye brag mtshungs med dmor chonamatsho
rim pas chu gter 'o ma'i gnas// 'byung ba bsdus pa ma lus kyi// phung po rus pa'i ri bo la// phyi nang mnyam pa'i tshud can gyi// lhun gyis grub par bstan pa yin// de las dngos po sna tshog
kyis// tharang snang ba ye shes gzugs// rang byung bde bachon de nyid/ mnyam pamed pa kun tu 'byung// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa yi// 'byung gnas sAng po rdo rje'i gdan// rdo rje
snyil krung ma phyid las// thog mtha' med ra'i rang bzhin can// gsang pa chen po'i 'oges dag pa'i// 'dod chags dorje'i skur ldan pa// lta phyogs kyi nang ri deng gi/ dpal gyi ri la mdun
phyogs pa// snyan ka Ta pa rma ta// pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa'i dbus// chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par gnas// dpal ldan dga' ba'i khang pa brtsegs// gsang ba sngags kyi//
sh+tsa rgya mtshoyi// ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul// gsang ba chos kyi dbyings chen po// dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor du// kla klo'i yul gyi mi rnams dang// lha dang lha min drizor bcas//
gsang chen yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rang byung ye shes pho brang du// tshangs dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcug nas kyang// skye bo chags can rab 'dul phyir//
[= ] mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po gsungs// phyogs bcur gnas kyi sas rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang// dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi//
khrag khrig rarib rdul mnyam pa// de dbus seng ge 'i khrir bzhugs pa'i// thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ rdo rjesAng po sems dpa' che// bla gos phrag pa
ba gcig gzar te// pus mo'i lha ngas la btsugs// thal mo spyar te 'di don zhus// gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ ma 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam//
dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste// spyod yu la bstan pa'i khyad par gyi// grub dang sgrub pa 'phrin las tshogs// thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste// rim pa mngon byed rgyur ldan pa// denyid bcom
ldan gsung du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ blamasangs rgyas bstan pa la// dga' zhing mgu la rab dad pa'i// sems dpa' chen pos
gsang ba'i don// rab tu zhus pa legs so legs// shin tu rmad du byung ba yi// gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du// byang chub sems kyi ye shes mdzod// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya//
de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi// grub pa rab tu ster byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// gsang ba las kyi rom pa nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa srung zhingebaka'
la gnas // dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhing skyong la// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso// dpal ldan rig 'dzin thams cad la// mchog tugyur pa'i las sgrub pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni/
'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi// g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yi// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas// mchod 'os gtso bor gyur pa yin// dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang// nag mo re ma tir gyur
pas// lcam dral gyur pas bstan pa srung// sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba/ nad de nyid kho na'i na// yon tan 'phrin 'a sa dbang phyug tu// dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba// lhashu rtsa
bzhi'i gtso be so// gzhan dus gsum dbang byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba spyi la dgongs po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
ki @#// nas gsang ba bshad bya pa// 'ang nyede bla med sgrub pa po// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba//
de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad// dus na bskal pa bzang po yi// rdzogis ldan tha mar gyur pa yi// dpag med dus las 'das nas nii// gnyis ldan dang na gsum ldan las// rtsod pa 'i dus kyi
rim pa la// bcom ldan tshe lo brgya pa'i dus// de nyid bstan pa'i sAkas ma ya// lnga brgya pa ya dus kyi mthar// shin tu gdug cing rtsub pa yi// ma bsrun pa yi dus kyi tshe// de tshemagon
po'i bstan pa 'byung// gang zag la yang gnyis su bshad// bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang// sgol bar byed pa'i spog po ste// dang po bstan pa 'jig byed cing// dkon mchog gsum po
smod pa dang// bla ma la sngang bdag la smod// de dag la sogs bya bar bshad// sgrub pa ngo na rnam pa gsum// he ru ka dpaMl rnal 'byor ma// dag cing spangs te ting 'dzin gsal// rim pa
a go 'phang thob pa ste// thun mong spyi dang bye brag tu// dmatshog gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// gnas kyi khyad par 'byung ba yang// bsnyen pa'i dus dang bsgrub pa dang// las la sbyar ba'i dus shes
pas/ yade 'ong dben dang dur khrod sogs// bsam gtan 'phel dang khyad par ba'o// yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du// mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang/ rig pa dang ni dren pa yis//
[s]dkyil 'khor pa yi snang ba yang// ma lus dngos po gangashar ba// bde ba can du shes pab// bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang// gsang ba 'bras
bu lam byed pa// rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de/ bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum// 'di ni khyad par bsrung ba yan/ grub pa bsnyen ma'i ting 'dzin dang// nye bar bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang//
dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shesache// ma dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa// rnam dag stobasan rgyas par byed// bsnyen pa'i dus su rang lha yi// ser
ga nga ra tshe da zla ra b+ha du bka sa skor ngang rig nga sa atig bye ma ra ra bya// de las sdugs ka la a sngags las// 'od 'phros 'khar ba bzlus pa las// khyad par
ngu na sa bcas dang/ 'a 'or dungal par bzlas pa bya/ dalo bar bsnyen pa dus su ni// bdag nying ru ka las ni/ daM byung mdun du 'od 'phros pas// bskyed cing mthar ni 'u thar bsdu//
sgrub pa'i dus su mgon po yi// rgyas 'debs spyi bor paru ka/ ngo ted gsang sngags phyogs bcas pa// de nyid sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsam// gsang ba zhing skyong rgyal po ru// chog
gsum gyis bsgrub pa'i tshul// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bdag thams cad bde chen gnas pa la// dus gsum 'bor la gsum du gnas// brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob
par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen po bla na med// ye shes ra gen po chen po nyid// khra gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad// rim pa bzhin du yongs su bsor// dkyil 'khor ngo
brang dbus su yang// dur khrod du na mgon po rol/ 'jig rten gsum ra red dka' ba// dam tshig sdod pa'i rang bzhin ni// rtag tu rang sngagasasbas pa ste// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya'o//
'phrin las khyad par gang yon pa// las la sbyor ba rim shes bya// rengs par byed dang skyod pa dang// rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug/ rnam par rmongs dang lcags par byed// dug gas
'dzin dang khon leng dang// rang sha rang gsaza byed cing// gshis ngan dug dang khrag tu sdug/ 'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa// las kyi khyad par yongs su bstan// char dbab pa dang sprin
bral dang// thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang// rang phyogs su na zlog rung srung// byang ka pozlog dang ngag bcing dang/ 'anus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang// phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba 'o//
thabs na las kyi rim pa ste// rten gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// dang por bla ma mnyes par bya// gnyis pa ra dbang bzhi thob pa dang// gsum pa ru byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bka' bsgo
rjes gnang tshul bzhin du// ma nor 'jug pa'i go rim shes// rtan tshul khyad par shes par bya// stobs ni chos rnams thams capal//sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang// yang ngag bden pa'i stobs
kyisan// rang bzhin ma nga ra rtogs pas ga phyung//'jug pa thun mong+ka paM na sa ka sAyarje byang chub sems// tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba'i don 'asoms pa po//

mngon du byed pa/ra sgrub ste// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste// dang po bar dang tha mar yang// gtso bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi// gang grub rab 'bring tha ma ru// rtags kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin//
rgyu ni thog ma med de / na ma 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ mngon sum pa tsA 'gyu 'u ka gas dgag par ma nus pa// de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung/

g.yang phyogs nye nga rdo rje yo/ snying bo zangs sel ba pa'i po/ nga dag ye shes snang ba lo// bla ma'i drin las thob pa raka nganga' mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/
gsum pa 'o///de nas dpal ldan bdud 'joms pan+te// sgrub pa yagayag rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i mgon po chen po ya[' ]/sbas pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi// gsang
pamakha' 'gro ma phan dang// lhan cig tu dgyes par ro/ la gnyis pa la phyag bzhi pa/ gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni// zhal gcig pa la snyan gsum pa// ma thung khros pa na rgyal/
ma ngog/ mgo skyes gyen 'greng brngam pa'i sku// ro yi gdan la bzhugs mdzad cing// klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// khros pas char sprin nag po ltar// mi stag phung po lta bu yi// spyan gsum
drag po'i lho khas gzigs// glang po'i tshul can stobs ldan pa// rgyu ma'i de ngashal sbyangs pa yi// mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// shin tum bsrun sgrig pa'i sku// bdud
'dul chen po lha yalha// nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum tshogs// ma rig mun sel sgeg pa'i nyams// rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston// brtul zhugs sdod pa dang 'a bo ste// gdug pa
'dul mdzad 'jags ra ra ston// log lta skyong byed gtsigs pa'i nyams// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs par ston// ngomatshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing// khro chags ra ga re skyo ba'i shugs
a g.yas kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams// g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag 'dzin// g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'debs// g.yon ngas kha 'i 'dzin par mdzad// gsung gis ha dazhes sgrogs pa/
log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// sna tshogs chu skyes rimar bcas// rang byung rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas// de yi mdun du gdum pa mo// lha mo nyal
a gcig phyag gnyis ma// mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can// gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad// yab la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// yum la lnga yis
rgyas btab gnas// sku dang gnyis med 'khrol bar bzhugs// me 'od 'phreng bas yongs su bsor// ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'khor bsrungs ma// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro 'phrog ma dang// lho phyog
glang sna ma zhes bya// nub kyi sronemo ral pa can// byang dus yi gtsug yin no// gang du rgya mtsho chudangs rung// nag ngo 'a chu dang 'dra ba'i sku// ma rungs 'dzoms byed nag po che// 'bad pas
snying rje bskyed pa nyid// gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid// sAng rje med na ma 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya// mtshasas med ldan byed pa dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'khrug byed pa
zhe sdang rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// re zhig tsam du gsad pa la bya// byas pa'i sha la rtag tu rol// kun tu gatum pa'i shugs 'chang ba// yul rang yul du rol byed pas// 'am+me pa la sa lnga/
gnas nias kyang// dkyil 'kher zhing rnams skyong bar byed// dur khrod gnas kyis yongs su bsor// ma mo'i gnas sogs khyad par byed// klu yis mchod pa'i zhing skyong ba// rtogs pa phyi mas
yongs su bsor// spro dang ra ga gis khang par 'gyur// gu ye'o myags kyi 'dus ltar te// sgrub pa po la lus la gnas// de dag rim pa ra dus bstan pa// dam tshig ldan pa lnga sgra gas pa yis//
sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams kyang par las// 'bru nag gtor ma rab tungashis// gshechen gyis no brgyan pa yi// tshogs smras pA dza gus pas dbul// phyi nang gsang ba khyad nga ra 'os/ bstan pa'i tshul
gyis 'phrin la sa las// bye brag rgyun ngang gnas skabs pa// grub ngang sgrub pas mngon du 'gyur// dus rnams kun tu zhi sdang gis// rnam pa kun tu gzhom mi bya// yul min pa la bsad byas na/
rnal 'byor dam tshig las nyams phyir// grub pa nam yang se nga ma srang lung par yang sheT bla med pa// dam tshig mgon po sgrub pa yi// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// bde bas/
gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad// byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di/ yar ngo mar gab tu gnas/ yar ngo yasar skad byed la// mar ngo la ni 'grib par byed// yar ngo yi na be co lta la// byang/
tshubasems kyi mkha' 'gro yang// bde ba chen por 'du bar mdzad// 'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs// khyi lor 'de lus 3de yan// gzhan du lha dang dkyil 'khor na// btsal ya nga
redaparam 'gyur zhes// 'dren pa dang 'a bos rtag tugasungs// sku gsung thugs kyi gsung ba la// drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa// yon tan 'phrin las ngabang phyug gi/ spyi nang gsang pa'i
bdag po yin// ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las// 'khor le dgug bya gnyis med bsur/ 'dangs snyigs las ri rgyu 'bras dang// gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te// 'khrul dang/
pa/ 'khrul pa ma yin pa// khams gsum kun la dbang byed nga sa// 'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi// mgon po'i khyad par mngon 'byung ba// gdags pa thasAng khyab pa po// thun mong bar ni bstan
pa yin// 'di dag las dang skye bo las// sgrib pa thun mong lha ya che// dngos dang brgyud pas lung bstan pa// srog dang srog ma yin pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang bsu la ba yis// gsang sngags
bzlas pa mngon par phye// 'di ni mngon du 'byung ba 'o//dpa lamagon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba// he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po tsho// 'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya// gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mchogaste// skal ba can la sbyin par bya//
gang du sgrub pa'i sa phyogs su// ma mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas// de nas nag po bsgrub par byi// 'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas// tshad med byang chub sems kyi blos// sIng rje chun po baspyod
byas nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// wer bltas sku grol gter kha yis// dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni// rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying kha ru// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang/
bsil zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam// rang steng yaM las 'dakyil 'khor// rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang// ma ya rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam// de dbus yi ge hU~Mnag po/ 35/sa lnga pa'i rang
bzhinecan// de yi 'od kyi snang ba las// dpag meng kha dog bzhi bcas bsam// rang bzhin gnas su 'phros pa las// bla ma dang na lhag pa'i lha// dkyil 'khor 'khor le bcas pa dang//
nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la// skyabs su 'gro dang mchod pa 'bul// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa// bzod par gsol nas gshegs su
gsol// de rjes dngos po thams cad kun// ma lus stong pa nyade gzhug cing// oM su b+hA ba shud+d+hasarba rAmal b+hA ba shud+d+honyAhaM/ o khadzashud+d+hasarba d+hamakhadzra shud+d+ho'agaM//

oMyo ga shud+d+hasarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho'ahaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun// gdod nas dag pa'i ngang du bsam// de nyidi h+phadang bcas pa yang// nAd tsamadu gnas pa las//
nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab par bya// de las sa bon 'di dag ni// 'chad bzhin pa las rami pas bsam// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang// raM las ma
tu/ ya dekyil 'khor dang// dzaM dkar chu ya dkyil 'khor te// laM las gsar gyi sa gzhi nyid// de steng hU~M las ra rab 'byung// de dag phyi nang ngo bo nyide// de dag steng gi chu la yang// dbus su
paM las pad+dani// sna tshogs pad+ma rgyatshab// lte ba ge sar bcas dbus su// phalas sna tshogs rdo rjen// kha dog lnga dang ldan pa rab sam// de dbus raM las nyi ma yi// hU~Myag sa bon las/

byung ba// sa gzhi ma lus rdo rjer gyur// steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang// ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang// phur bu gro gug kha TaM ga/ jo rje rtse gcig pa dang ni// rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sngags//
ngum rnam par 'phros nas ni// shin tuts+tsha chobasam par bya// bla re ra ba sogs dang ni// gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcade bya// me 'od 'bar ba khyad par 'gyur// 'di dag srung ba'i khyad par ro//
bru las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu pa ni yongs su 'khor/ de steng raM las 'dakyil 'khor// de yi dbus su hUM mdzad ngo// zhal gsum phug na drug pa ste// rin chen klu dbang rgyun dang ldan/
rol pas rnam par sgrog par bsam// raMlas te ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus// de stong pAbcu rnam par bsam// de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu// zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam// khro bo de dag
re re zhing// phyogs stong bcu po gdan la ni// bkug nas gnyis med bzhugs pa ra bsam// de la gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis// phur bus gdab dang brdung bar bya// des na bla med mchog dag
'gyur// khro bo de dag re re zhing/ 'bartan par bya phyir gsang sngags brjod// o dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa// 'od ldan de las spros bsdus pa// bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab// 'od
du zhunas gzhalayas khang// rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa// gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas// jo rdzongang naner bu yi// 'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa 'o// pho brang nang ma zlum po la// re mig dgu
pa rdo rjes bskor// phyi no peng mu khyung bcas// de yi nang na e yi dbyibs// drag po'i gnas su bsam par bya// dbus ma'i nang du paM lasan// pad+ma'i sbyor bcas pa bsam// A 'a kA 'aki'i dus
pa las// de las nam mkha'i sa bon te// nam mkha' lasanaM hU~Mbyung ste// gnyis med zhugs 'a sa 'od du zhu// de la rdo rjegri gug bsam// 'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las// skad cig gsan
sku rdzogs pa// nag po chen po bsam par bya// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpa' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs// yab yum gnyis su med par bsam//
de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyod nas// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab byaste// sngags brjod pas na degyes pa bskyed// de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams// yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa
las// yum gyi mkha' dbyangs bde chen du// so sor tshogs bskyed byas la// phyi rol du rim gyis 'byung// dang por gtso bo'i rkyen dang bcas// rdzogs par byung ste d+hAtInas// gyen du thugs
ka'i pad+ma las// 'thon ta'agro ba'i don byas la// slar 'dus rang la theme gyurapa// dpal lcan sAng rje'i stobs su gnas// de las rim pa ji bzhin du// phyung nas so so'i gongan la bzhugs//
pa'i gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro bzhi// zhal gcig phug ni bzhi pa ste// gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni// g.yas brkyang ban rnam par 'gying// dpa' mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o// mtshamA
pa bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang// snatshogs pad 'dab la gnas pa// rim la gnas mgon po ni// shar du sku yi mgon po dang// lho ru yon tan mgon po dang// nub tu gsung gi mgon po
dang// byang du las kyi mgon po ste// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gri gug thod pa bsnams pa'o// so so'i g.yon du yum rer// gtum mo dang ni dreg mo dang// zlog byang ma
dang dpa' mo ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas// nga ya phyi yi gru chang la// beng 'dzin pa dang kha rgyu ga/ gtsA 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin// so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste/
zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o// de yi phyi rol sgo dang gar/ lha mo brgyad po gar gyis rol// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gar stabs ldan pas bzhugs pa 'o// dkyil
'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa dang// de nas gtso bo yab yum dag/ snyoms par zhugs pa sa 'od du zhu// de nas lha mo bzhi yis ni// rdo rje tshar med dbyangs kyis bskul// e bas [E; ]u Dan/
nI bA/ dza tid+ham dam ga ma gam aM ka ma/ pAd+hasha ra du raM/ sa nas sa sa ni ga ma sa sas/ rig me lu ma ti sa ra sa ma ya sa ra re senasha/ ma hA ma a rA ma sa sa/ ku tAn sAs sA/ sa ni
sa ri tagam oM hU~M/ a ta ma ta ya/ sasA pa pa ma ya a pa sa dri nam a i/ de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las// de ltar nyi bar gsan nas ni// thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de//
nag po gsang ba'i bu dang bcas// shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas// spro ba dang ni bsdu bar mdzad// de 'ang brtan dang mnyes par mdzad// sku gsung
thugs ni rgyas gdab cing// ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang// byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang// sngags kyis brtan ched bzlas pa bya// bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul//
ting 'dzin donabasam nyar bsdu bya// de nas ldang bar gyur pa na// gnyis pa lha rnams thams cad kun// skad cig gis ni rdzogs pa ste// de yi ngang la ting nge 'dzin//
gsang ba khyad par rdzogs par bya// rnam rtog bag chags kyis bcings la// ga pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan// rnam rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na// de nyid thob tu med pa ste// bde ba
chen po yang dag 'byung// chags pa med pas kun tu sad// 'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa// rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang// de nyid shes la btsang med de// rnam par rol pa'i
tshul mchog go/ dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//de nas yang dag bshad
bya ba// gang du sngags kyi yo ge dang// bzang po'i sngagasaM kyi 'phreng ba 'di// rdza rnga bcings pa las shes bya/ re mgo bdun pa'i grangs kyis ni// kun nas mnyam par dgod par bya//
mkhas pas dbyangs dang gsal byed ni// sde tshan rim pas phyi ba nyid// kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni// rim pa bzhin du btubar bya// sde tshanadrug pa'i lnga pa mi/ haya mgo na gnas/
pa blang// uts+tsha ya bzhi pa nyidi// wa 'og gnas pa de nyid de// sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po ste// pa yaM steng na gnas pa blang// a s+yA ya gsum pa ste// ya yi steng ma yang dag blang/
sde tshan brgyud pa'i bzhi pa na// ma yi steng na gnas par sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa nyidi/ da3yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste// ka yi 'og na gnas par sbyar//
sde tshan dang po'i bco lnga pa// rwayi lungan gnas pa yi// zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya// sde tshan dang po'obasnyuban pa// de yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// dbyangs kyi bco lnga pa yin te//
d+ha yo 'og mas brgyan par bya// de nyid thog mar sprin bya yin// sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa yin// na yi 'og na gnas pa ste// bzhi pa yin thog ma gang// rayi 'og ma sbyar byas te// tha
mar 'byung ba'i drug po ste// 'di yang sbyin nor bu star// tshayostong na gnas pa gang// rgyu yi 'og ma rnam par byung// trA ya stong mas brgyan par bya// hayaM 'og na gnas pa dang// wa
yi 'og ma gzung bar bya/ pa yi stang ma 'od btubya// ya yi steng na gnas pa las// 2 yi stong mas las kun byed// sa yi steng gnas yi ge nyid// raya 'og ma sbyar byas 'a// sa 'gyur

yi steng mas brgyan// rtsayi steng na gnas pa la/ sa yi snying ma drug tugazhag 'di ni des khrub 'byung ba'i gnas//de yi steng ma'i yi ge la// nga yi stong mas yang dag brgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas/
ma lus ye shes skuragyur pa'o// kha yi 'og na gnas pa la/ b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge dang// cha ya 'og nas rab sbyin dang// sa ya 'gam yang dag blang// tha 'og Da 'og ston du sbyar// tsa
sangar gnas yi ge dang// dza ya 'og ma bdag po ste// sha yi bar na gnas pa gzung// kha dang sa yi bar gnas pa// ta ya 'ogam nya stong ldan// ma yi steng gnas ri
'og sbyar// thig les brgyan pas 'gyur sbyar// tsayi snying na gnas pa la// sa yi stong mas brgyan pa drung// 'di ni smras pa'i snying po ste// rang srog yi ger gsang ba 'o// da ya steng ma'i yi
ge las// rA ya stong mas brgyan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ snying po bzlas pa rige pa ste/ bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar// na yi steng mas yang dag brgyan// dza ya gong ma/
d+ha steng sbyar// sa la bar gnas Dastong sbyar// thig lenAngs brgyan par bya// na'og d+ha steng mgo bor sbyin// 'di las ma stong ri 'og ldan// thig le zla tshes dag gis mtshan// yi stong
[lx]gnas pa la// g.yo 'og ma drangar si/ kha sud gnas pa la 'og upa/ 2rma 'og mayang ngag la// 'dzin gsang ba'i bzlas pas// pha ba sobs
pa ldan nying yin no// gang du mngon par phyogs pa yi// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// gsang sngags mchog tu gyur pa 'dis// stong dang brgya pa bcu 'gyur gyis// rigs ni dam pa'i sa la
kha gdan la/ der 'ayamadrungadusbyan// klu phyung gnas pa la 'og sbyar/ nyayo 'ogam yang ngag ldan// shas po'i gnas sku 'og sbyar/
bya pha yi steng mas bdubar bya// la yasnying ma'i yi ge la// lnga yi stong mas snyan du sbyar// yi steng ma tis 'gyur la// phyi ma 'a ya 'og mas brgyan// e ya 'og gyur bsdus pa la// sha ya stong
ma drung du sbyar// la yi 'og ma rgyan du byas// luyi 'og gis spyin par bya// o ya 'ogin gnas pa la// nyaya 'og mas brgyan par bya/ dad pa log mar gnas pa la// thig le nA da dag gas brgyan//
nga yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// u yi stong ma sgron par bya// tsha ya stong na gnasapa gang// lha yi 'og ma rnam par blangs/ khaya song mas brgyan par bya// d+ha ya 'og ma gnas pa dang// wa yi 'og ma
gzung bar bya// sa ya steng ma nyid bsdus la// ya ya stong na gnas pa las// pa 'og gnas de la brgyan// 2ye 'og ma kun gyi rten// sa yi steng ma blang bar bya// b+ha ya steng na gnas pa la//
la ya 'og mas brgyan par bya// sa yi steng ma nyid de blang// dzAyA 'ogam da stong dang// nga ya byung na gnas pa la// u yi steng ma ya ngadag blang/ e pe'og gnas yi ge la// rA ya stong ma
mgo bor sbyin// la thabar gnas pa la ya nga// cayi steng mas brgyan par bya// ma steng thag len das brgyan// dza 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la// nga steng sa ya stangam dang// pha 'og ta ya 'og/
mas brgyano// dzayi gong na gnas pa dang// ma yi steng ma sa stengs gnas// ya yi steng ma 'di dang ldan// dza 'og ye steng ma la// d+ha ya stong mas mgo bor brgyan// Na 'og ma sha stongs
ldan// thig len des brgyan pa 'o// Na ya stong mas nyid du// sha yaM thog mas brjen par bya// phayi steng ma btupar bya// la steng gnas pa Ta steng bsgyur// rtaya steng
du ris 'gyur ba// phyi ma'i 'ayA 'og mas brgyan// dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can// sa steng gnas pa nyid dang yang// u stong gnas pa yang dag bcas// sa steng gnas pa thag les brgyan//
la ya stong ma'i gnas pa la// e yi 'og gnas ga bdun gnas// ta ya 'og ma mgo bo sbyin// nga stong gnas pa chu 'og sbyar// la steng gnas pa Ta 'og bcas// la 'og zur gnas sbyar/
bar bya// b+ha ya 'og ma'i yi ge la// ma steng gnas pa snyan du byas// sha 'og dza ya steng mar sgyur/ Na'og gnas pa nyid drung ste// b+ha stong gnas pa'i 'og mas brgyan// sha steng drung du sngon
par bya// la steng sha ya thog ma la// phyi nam 'og gnas pasamadzes// rnga 'og sha thog thig les brgyan// sha thog ri yi 'og mas brgyan// ba thog la stong gnas par sbyar// de la la'og sbyin
par bya// bsteng gnas pa la 'og ldan// lta'og dag gis yang dag mdzes// ka ga bar gnas pa nyid la// nyes 'gyur du na bsdu bar bya// g+ha steng gnas pa de nyid lo// nya 'og brgyan pa
nyid du bya// ma yi thog mar Da 'og bcas// rgyu stong gnas pa nying dngani// wa 'og gnas pa tha 'og sbyin// ha'og cha ya 'ogamor ldan// de yi nyis 'gyur shes par bya/kha 'og ma yi

ya go la// u ra bar gnas sbyar bar bya// ma steng pha 'og 'og tu sgron// de na zhes 'gyur sbyar bar bya// tsha yi snying ma pha thog drung// laya thog ma drung du gnas// de ni zung du sbyar bar bya/ ma
steng gnas pas thog drung// nyis 'gyur rim par shes par bya// sha thog gnasapa wa thog drung// lan gnyis sun brjod par bya// ka 'og gnas pa pha stan pa// ba 'og ston du byas pa nyid/
nyis 'gyur dag tu shes par bya// ba stong gnas pa Ta stong drung// kha ya 'og ma stan du byas// sha steng 'a ya 'og mas brgyan// da 'og i theg stan du slar// pha yi snying ma drung du gzhag/
haya logo ma Na 'og ldan// pha thog drag por 'gyur ba'o// sha stong 'a ya 'og mas brgyan// 'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'i/ mA ra ya ya thog mar sbyor// ma yi stong gnas ri'og sbyar//
nyis 'gyurawag lenAngs brgyan// tsaya steng na gnas pa la// a yi steng ma brgyan pa drung// b+ha thog tha thog gnas pa sbyar// de la lha ya 'og mas brgyan// ma stong gnas pa nya'og no//
yang dag stan du bya ba 'o// 'di ni dri med bad b.legater// snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid ni// gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogasasu// nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// ma lus zhing skyong 'khor
ngang bcas// dur khrod ro la cesbyang dang// sha za'i tshogs rnams 'du ba bzhin// nges par 'du bar byed pa ste// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i bar du ni// de yi
bgegs rnams m lus pa// til 'bru tsam du byed par mdzad ng// snying po 'di ni zlos byed cing// gang du nyim gcig tu yang// ma chad mngon par sems pa yi// de ru
ka dpal rnal 'byor la// 'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod la// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// ji sridamtshan ma ma byung
gi bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya// mtshan ma byung nas bla ma yi// man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya pa// yang dag ye shes bskyod pa po// gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// gtum po de yi gsang ba'i yum// lha mo
bzhi dang bcas pa yi// gsang sngags btub bshad par bya// dbyangs yig bcubazhi pa dgo la// thig le nAngs rnam par brgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas// drug pa yin
u lnga pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang// bdun pa ye nedang po de// anas yi gsum pa ste// dang po'i gsum pa thog tu smin// lnga pa'i lnga pa gsum pas brgyan// gnyis pa yi
nidang pol// amasla yo gsum pas stan// dbyangs kyi 'otsugasum pa yas brgyan// drug pa yi ni dang po dang// dbus kyi dgu pas gnas der sbyar// gnyis pa yi ni deng po// an+tas yi
[d. ]gsum pa dang// de nyid kyi nogs pa dang// lnga pa yi ni deng po la// dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng 'ogaspron// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pa mgokhor sbyin// gsum pa yin/
dang po la// drung du lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyar// lnga pa'i bzhi pa dgu dang sbyar// dang po'i dang po'i drung du ni// gnyis pa'i gsum pa sbyar ba dang// mthar gnas las kyi rtsom yo// de la dbyangs kyi
gsum pas brgyan// anus yi dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// brgyad pa yin dezhi pa la// dbyangs yige drug pa dag gis brgyan// thig lenAngs mdzes pa 'o//
drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid bzhi pa yin thog ma spur// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtum pa mo// drag cing shin tu cher 'jigs byed// yid bzhin norabu'i rigs 'dzin gter// bkra shis pa ni
thog mar sbyar// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bdun pa steng 'og sbyar// thig le nA das mdzes pa yin/us kha ya bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar pa//
anaslu yi gnyis pa sbyar// denyid thig les mdzes par byas// gas pa'i dang po blang byas la// dbyangs kyi dgupa blang ba nyid// drug pa ya ni lnga pa la// uslu khang yi bzhi pa dang// gso
pa yi ni dang po dang// dbyangs yig bcupa sbyar bar bya// bdun pa yane ge'is pa dang// gnyis pa yin deng po dang// lnga pa'i dang po btubar bya// drug pa yini lnga pa la// dbyangs yig

bgape la// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la// dbyang sakyi gsum pas brgyan par bya// dang po yin deng po dang// drug pa yin lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan par bya// gnyis pa ni deng
po dang// mthar gnas pa yigasum pa la// anats+tshapo dang po sbyar/ mthar gnas pa yo gsum pa dang// bdun pa yin lnga pa dang// drug pa yin bzhi pa sbyar// lnga pa yin lnga pa dang
dbyangs kyi dgu pa'i yi ge la// lnga pa'i gsum pa gdags ba/ us raya gsum pa la// lnga pa'i dang po sbyar bar bya// thig le nAdas yang dag brgyan// drug pa yin gsum pa dang//
an+tasla yi dang po ste// yagi gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis/ nyis 'gyur dag tusbyar bar bya// us kha ya bzhi pa la// dang po'i drug pa dang sgyur ba// anas yaganyis pa sbyar// thig le
nAdasabargyan par bya// 'di nagisang ba'i yum dag gi/ snying po sbas pa mchogagyur pa// lhamonag mo ye shesachi// sngags ni drag cing sdud pa 'o// de nas ye shes lnga ldan pa//
byed mngon sum dang por gzhag/ drug pa yin lnga pa dang// mthar gnas pa ya bzhi po la// gnyis pa yane deng bo nyid// anaslayagasum pa ste// dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin// dang
[;]po'i bsu drug pa mtha' bya// mtha na thaT sbyar bar bya// sde tshan gzhes pa'i dang po la// ams yiganyis pa sbyar// dang po'i dgu pa blangab nyid// drug pa yin lnga pa la// thig le nA das
brgyan pa 'o// gnyis pa yin dang po la/ drung dung nyid rje ba gyur// gnyis pa'i dang po de nyid dang// dbyangs kyi dgu pa sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi ba la// bdun pa ya ni gnyis
pa sbyar// de la thig len des brgyan// gnyis pa ya ni deng po la// anasmra yi gsum pa dang// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar// lnga pa'i dang po 3de la yang// dbyangs kyi bdun pa steng
'og sbyar// bdun pa yini gnyis pa la// thig le nA dag mdzes byas pa'o// 'di dag kun gyi thog ma dang// tha mar yang ngag brten par bya// 'di na ki bzhi dag go/ snying po sbas pa
mchog tu gsungs// dpalamagon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa 'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad/
par bya// gsang ba sngags kyi 'kholas// mthar n stoyar sbyar bar bya// lha yi 'khor rgya mtsho nyid// lan tshwachu rgyun 'bab pa'i dang/ gangs kyi thogs pa bdud rtsi'i chu//
me tog mdangs gsal snying po yi// ge sar ze 'brur ldan pa la// 'dab rgyas ye shes 'ashar bas// rang grol mdangs 'bar rab tu rgyas// rdo rje rin chen ral gri dang// 'khor lo
'bar ba'irtsibs dag las// 'khor ba'i rgyu las 'od zer 'phro skyong 'og dgu las rim pa ni// 'khrul cinge gcod pa'i gro gug gis// las dang 'phrin las
rang byung du// byed cing bskul las grub pa// phyi nang gsang ba rim bzhin du// dbab dang sngagasapa bzlog pa ste// rtsa ba yan lag las bzhir 'gyur// dang po thunamong dgu pa ste//
gnyiso pa bye brag phyed pa dang// khaspyod pa'i ye shesamakhazlog pa// klungs su chud pa phyag rgya ma// snying po gcig la dus gsum du// 'gyur med de nyid dbye ba nyid// gcig las du
ba ma'i ngo bo can// 'jig rten pa dngayo shes che// 'gyur ba dang 'gugs pa dang// las rnams byed pa'i srog gyur pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo 'di dgano// bye brag rnal 'byor pas/
shes bya// oM ma hA kA la hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM badzra mahAkA la hU~M phaT/ o badzra ka wu ma hAkAl ya AhU~M phaT/ na mo rata trayA ya/ tad+yathA/ obIm hA kA la ya/ shAsanaM u pa hAn+d+riNo//
e yapany+tsi ma kA la a yaM/ i daM rat+na tra ya/ a pa kIts+tsaM/ ya nga pra ti[Q ]/ sna ras tadA/ i daM du'angs tA/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma ra ma ra/ grots+tshagro// ban d+hAban d+ha/
a han han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa san+d+ra dut+taM/ ri na me ke na mA ra ya hU~MhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hAkA lin kro d+has ki la rakItsin+d+ha akI ye hUMphaT/ odi/hU~M kA li ma hA kA la rak+tanaM

dang nyams su yang// nag po chen po'i zhal ston dang// tha ma rmi lam lung ston po/ mi nag bong thung gsusaM 'phyang dang// bya nag khwa ta la sogs 'ong// de yang rab 'bring tha ma
ya te[“]bye brag rtags su 'char bar 'gyur// grangasan bdun 'bum ngag gsan// mngon sum gsal ba'i nges pa 'char// khri phrag bdun dang khri phrag dgu// stong phrag bdun gyis
lte bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab bcas pa yi// sngags kyi stong phrag bcu dug ni// dus ni zla drug zhag bdun bar// rnal 'byor smra ba bcad de bzlas// mtshig bar ma chod pa yi//
gsang sngags 'phrin las nges par grub// thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma dang// bstod dang bcos bskul las la 'bad// rang nyid he ru kar gsal ba// ra reb sepang yum/
ba sa ma// de mdunanag po chen po 'di// gsal ba bskyed tshul dbye ba yis// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs pa na// mngon sum lta bur blta bar bya// bdag dang mdun gyi mgon po
ya thugs kha'i mkhonarang sngags las// nge ltar po bsdus ting 'dzin basam// de ltar dus dang gzhan du yang// rten bcas dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang// rten btsugs brten/
byed de nyid bsnyen// de nas rten bcas tsam gyis ni// nges par de yi mdunasong ba// mchod dang gtor ma bsham par bya// sha chen srog spos phul nas// dmigs
pa gtod par byed pa dang// gang la bya ba'i bsgrub bya de// dmigs pas bkug cidi btab pa dang/ gtor mar dbul zhing bka' bsgo bya// lha dang phral zhing nyes pa bsgo// de nas ma zhes nyes
pa bsgrag/ dpang btsugs las la bcol bsal bya// de yis nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de las khyad par 'phrin lasan// lha byan dang ni mchod sbyin sogs// bsgral pa'i zhing de gang
k+Sha yin pe// de ya zas pa'i rdzas rnams dang// phung shul sa dngagayul spradas// grog mkhar sa la sogs pa rnams// bdung chad sa 'pha bod bu'i chus// sbrus te lang ga sta gon bya// de nas/
dben par song nas ni// mar ngo ya me tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi lasogs bsgrub dus la// gza' skar shin tudrag po la// de nas 'khor 'briber bya// rgyu nar rasangashing kun dang// zhing
lngags dag la dugasna dag/ khrag dang dug game tog gi/ ru ba mtshan ngan thong chag la// mchog phur bstod pa snag tshas sri// rgya skyegs dag gis bsres 'khri// tshad dang ldan pa'i mu khyud
tshu no rim pa bzhidang ldan pa la// nang du le tshodagur/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga por ni// gru gsum nag po sa bon bcas// las rnams byed pa rlung yog dang// mahAkA la 'brukhazho dang//
0stang non o dang badzra ste// de yi phyi rim rtsibs brgyad la// a mu kaM dang ba yi ni// yi ge bcu gsum gnyis gnyis pa// g.yas so dag tudagod par bya// de yi phyi rim pad 'dab brgyad//
sgo mtshams lha mo'i 'khor lo'i sngags/ ming spel bcas pa dgod par bya// de yi nang gi gru chad bzhir// hU~Mganyis phaT dang bcas pa la// ming spel bcug 'a bri bar bya// khyad par sbas pa'i
'khor lo ni// dbus su rlung gi sa bon nyid// phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro ma bzhi gnas// phyogs bzhir sngags kyi 'phreng ba las// phyi rol rtsibs la gcod pa'i sngags// 'dab brgyad cha'atsa
ka mtha' rten snga ma dag dang mtshungs// yang na rim pa gsum pa yi// gsang sngags ma hA kA la ya// 'phrin las khyad par dgod par bya// 'dis na shin tu mngon spyod myur// thabs dang shos/
rab khyad par dang// steng 'og bar gyi dbye ba yis// wang dang lcags kyi gre gug gis// bla dang tshe srog don snying la// myur du 'khor bas gcod par byed// sdud byed 'phrog cing len pa'i srog/
bsgral ba rdo rje rigs kyi las// thun mong du ni bya ba yane// khyad par 'kher la dril bya ste// dus kyi rim pas las 'asbyar// 'di ni kun tu mnan pa ste// las kyi gshin rje'i gnas sugatad/
'khor 'al yang bsnyen pa dang// bsgrub pa go rim nor mkhya// 'dis na bye ba ma 'grub med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags dang 'khor la sgrub pa'i
le'u ste brgyad pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad pya pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/ rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te// mngon par spyod pa
brtsam par bya// khyad par dur khrod pa yangeshing/ lha 'dre gtum po gnas pa las/ ma mo' bye brag brtags pa las/ khacad l mgo mjugamanorakhar// gnyis gshags de nas sngags bros
la bsdams te blang ba mig gis ni// phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa la// legs par gzhag ste tshad du bya// dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la gzugs// gzhan yang bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag ni/
zur gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas// mang spel bsal tshig ldan pa na// grangs ni reb 'bring tha maste// ci rigs par na bye bar gsungs// yang na re sgrom shing la yang// byang bu byas la
ling ga bri// gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi// 'khor 'di legs par bris pa dang// bsgrub bya srog Na 'alor len// gri gug lnga pa 'khor ba dag/ de dag bar du bcug pa dang// yang na mgon
a po'i 'khor lo dang// bsgrub bya du yod lang ga rnams// de yazheng du dril bar bya// 'khor tshon skud rnam lngas dkri// de yi phyi rol ku shayi// ra yamo gzugs byas nas kyang// rang mdun
gru gsum nag po yi// nang du gzugs nge gzhug par bya// de la lha dang dbye ba dang// nyes pa bsgo zhingebasgrag par bya// de nas bdag nyid lha dang/ mdun du nag po chen pon// zhal gcig
sa phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang// spyan drang mchod cing bstim par bya// las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi// rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// lha srin
snga brgyang ma lus dang// gzhan yang dur khrod sha zarang// ma mo ro langs ce spyang dang// stag dang dred dang bya gcan sogs// bya rog kha ta la sogs pas// yongs su bskor cing 'phrin las
byed// de nas rang dang mgon po dang/ lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi// sa bon 'osan 'od zer yang// lcags kyu lta bu dpag med pas// bsgrub bya de dag ma lus pa// sAng gi srog rtsa nas
drangs te// rang dbang med par rlung gso btog/ myur du 'ong ba mdog nyams pa// rad cing skra 'dzings shin tu 'dar// yod med dang nga yang skrag pa de// zhags pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang//
dril bu la sogs sgra yas na// shin tu dbang po myos gyur te// de yi rnam par shes pa ni// ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs la bstim// de yi dus su gsang sngagasani/ 'phrin las sngags
rasamatha' ru na// A kar ya dzazhes brjod// mgon ponag po yab yum gyi// lte bar gru gsum lcags khang na/ btson dong mun khang gnas par bsam// de las thar dus re da par bya//
de nas dong de ro g.yam la// rdo rje rgya gram bris pasamanan/ mtha' mar los sbyor dus su yang// bsgrub bya'i them pa'i m lam ngag tu// mnan po byas la 'phrin las bcol// gal te de
nying sbyin sreg gis// 'asasbyor bslab bya'i chu rjes sogs// dram sa dang skya sob sa dang// tsha ba gsum dang dug sna dang// khrag ngang ste tshe shang tshe dang// nga rgyu ra dang/
de la sogs// sa sna gzhan dang sbyar bar bya// bong bu'i chu dang bsros nas ni// 'jim pa byas la g.yog par pas// dug chu rosol dgos// de 'khyagaci'i gnas lnga ru// seng ldeng
lcags phur btab la gzhag/ de yi lus po thams cad la// spra tshil gyis ni byug par bya// de la drag pol shang gno// tsheyan sna tshogs btsugs la gzhig/ gru gsum e yi nang dun//
ngegazugs phyi gan ngag tu gzhag/ kha nang dur khrod thal bas brdzang// de nas dong la bcar la gzhug/ de la thun bzhir bya pa 'am// dus drug ngag du bya ban// rnal 'byor pa yis lhor
bltas la/ nyin phyad mtshan khyad dus su bya// yang na dus bzhir las la sbyar// phyogs kyi ne ki bzhi yis ni// dgug gzhug bstim dang bsngags par bya// de nas thod pa mtshan ngan du/
sku yungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i// thun rdzas rnams la sngags bzlas shing// dus ngus dag tu brdeg par bya// skabs skabs dug ga chu yas brdeg/ gal te gu khulanag po dang//
shachen dag gis bdug par bya// yang na 'bras phub me lani// sa tshil ma zhu tsam du bsro// de nas sngags kyis brdeg par bya// 'di ni nyi par 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar cho ga'i thabs

pa 'dul don du// nag po chen po khros pa yi/sgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa// gzhan yang rab tu bshadapar bya// rje btsun horu ka dpal dang// nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams//

chub sems kyang ng lasani// pad+ma zla nyir gnasapa ya// hU~M yig nag por bsam par bya// de la 'od kyis khyab pa las// bsdus shing skad cig yongs gyur pa// dpal ldan nag po chen

dug dang khrag la sogs// bdug pa'i du bas mchod par bya// ma sha 'bras dang so ba dang// 'bru nag me tog byug pa dang// sgron ma lnga dang mi 'chilnga// 'khur ba chan dang chang la sogs//
gtor ma nag po che la dbul// mchodadang bstod pa tshul khazhin bya// 'di yi nye bar spyad pan// bsgrub bya'i zig pa'i rdzas rnams dang// tshab gsum la sogs pa la// gang gi ming dang bcasapa'i

srog brtsam par bya// phung shul g.yul sprad la sogs pa// dur khrod sol bas byug byas te// gru gsum ram pa kha khyer ldan// de yi nang du drag po'i shing// tsher ma can gyis brtsig par bya//

dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni// shan tu 'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sa// le tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dabus la// dpa' bo chen po byad rgyaletshul// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/

byed pa// skad cig tsam gyis bsnyad par bya// de yi shar gyi 'i tshel// drag bo shin tu 'jigs pa ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sbanagasum pa// mthong nag kharngam pa'i tshul du gnas // de
ma/ mdun du rgan byed ma// g.yamasu mi sdug drag po'i/ g.yon du 'jigasam gnas pa dang// rgyabaku ma rnam par rol// nag po'i lho yi phyogs suni/ drag po chen po du ba'i mdog/ zhal
gcig phyag bzhi spyanagasum pa// thodi 'phrang gso khargyun gtsigs pa'i tshul// de yi mdun du rnam rgyalam// g.yas su rnam par rgyal bas// rgyab tu mi sdug ma gnas la// g.yon du gzhan
gyis ma thub ma'o// lha gtor mnyam gnas nub phyogs su// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mngog ser rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas dkris// shin tu bshad pa'i tshul du gnas// de yi mdun

char sprin nag po' mdog 'dra ba// shin tu gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba// de yi mdun du dbang mo ste// g.yas su zla bamo zhes bya// rgyab tu drag tu snang ba la// g.yon du rna ba 'byung ba 'o/
gtso bo nag po chen po yi// shar lho mtshams kyi nas bzhugs pa// gcigs pa can ni shil gyi mdog/ stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa'o// mdun du lha mo 'phrog byed ma// g.yas su
'bar byed ma gnas la// de yi rgyab tu'ajig byed ma// g.yon du yul skyong ma gnas so// gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yin/ lho nub mtshams su bzhugs pa ni// mi sdug pa ni du ba'i mdog/
sAn tu mi bsrun gzugs 'chang ba// gzig gi ko ba rlon pas dkris// mdun du 'dzagis byeng drag mo ma// g.yas su gzugs chen mo zhes bya// rgyab tumachab gcigs ma ste//

mdun du thod 'phrar 'dzin// g.yas su 'phreng ba 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu trikAl 'dzin ma'o// g.yon du ltos 'gro bsnams pa'o// gtso bo nag po chen po yi// byang
sha mtshams su gnas pa na// log sred can n rdza gsaramadog/ snga 'u'i pags pa 'dzin pa go/ de yi mdun du ral grim/ g.yas su ngagra sta 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu jo rdzomapa' thogs

mdzad// pho rta'i rnal 'byor ma 'di ngag/ 'di dag phal cher zhalagacig la// phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can// nag mo ser dang dmar ljang ste// phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa 'o// dur khrod
gnas su rol bar mdzad// pho brang de yaphyi rol du// zhing skyong rnams kyis yongs su bskor// ka kra ha re ka taMshing// han pa 'a yab yum can// ko la kir ni ro yeshing// rgyun du nga
layum dang ldan// d+ha ra parta pa yangeshing// oM gi pa 'a yab yum sbyor// ko Ti d+hib pa d+hishang// dza la pa la yab yum sbyor// b+hi re tsa lta a ma shing// shA ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas//
o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i// ka pA la ya lha srub byed// sa Ta b+ha rur dza ti'i 'bras// gan stod dang lhan cig sbyor// o pU ra re ma Na// ha tib yi rna ba can// gnamo ha yab yum
sbyor// karmi ra bar rtsa ba'i sdong// tsan drus ni go Ta'i bdag/ ma ra Nipar thang sgron shang// 'byin pa ke trapA lar ldan// nAg ba rar sa shangecan// keng rus ldan pa mol bar 'gyur//
suDu pa rar ji lu'ishing// pu yi rkang pa rtag tu rol// dzA lan d+harar khang brtsegs shing// bum pa can de bde bar rol// b+ha sna gu bar drag klog 'khrug/ dza trib ma tam pa gnas//
so sa pa' na trel shayarishang// sgra gcan bsgrags pa 'i yu la dang bcas// tsar rnga pa'ika ran tsar// mdzes pa shag tican yul ldan// o Ta ya bar ang shog ka'i// gnatu sagacan
gsang mor bcas// gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ko la// sred pa dpa' bo dbang phyug bcas// kIr ke pas la'i shang/ lhun po 'bar ba dbang phyug bcas// ke ko ser sa la shing/ lhan
po 'bar ba lhan cig bcas// lha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing// stobs chen 'jigs pa gnas byed pa'o// pu Tanarani d+he du pa// a h+phu ka pa brtul zhugs 'dzin// rAdza g+hihar dza po
na sna chen dza la sgrag can no/ khang pa can du rang byung brag/ thub dka' rgyal mtshan 'dzin mar bcas// mkhAdAyer tsan dan dang// sAtshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur nus//
'di dag ke Ta pA lan// zhing skyong zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gri gug cang te'u g.yas pa na// g.yon pa bod khrag rtsa gsum can/ yuman so so'aphyogamtshan ldan// skye gnas las
byung sa sgrogs mdzad// rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyi// lus la yang dag gnas nas ni// dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed// 'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse
bas// rtag par mtshan mo 'du bar mdzad/ 'didegs gsum khyab pa ste// sna tshogs mdog nyan 'bar pa'o// ongashAn+ti kI ra hUMphaT/ oM ma hAts+tsaM te hUMphacu/ o b+ha la pu hU~MphaT/
o shIka ri hU~MphaT/ o kA'adwipo hU~M phaT/[0f00] dzaya g+halaM hUM phaT/ o pe pu b+hag daMphaT/ oM barmas na hU~M phaT/ o ke trapA la hahi[%]phaT/ o ki lo ki 'o pho waM phaT phaT/ kiM kiM kaM kaM/
ka ha ka ha/ pI dAhU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa// phaT phaT/ hahA/ tutAraMrAdzAnaM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ laM khaM khaM khaM/ rUd+da/ ToTaM TaM/ kaM kaM kaM kaM/ 66663 kr-i TaM kaM kr-i/ saM so so
saM yaM yaM yaM yaM/ pho yi yaM yaM/ b+hi b+hi dz+ha kaM kaM kaM/ gru glu klu/ po pe paM paM swAhA/ yul ni lho'u rtsa bzhi ru// drag po'i zhing skyong ti shu bzhi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ya/
nga dag gsang ba'i sngags yin te// gzhan du nam yang 'khrul par 'gyur// o DA kanA/ ka ka kA tan/ b+ha ba bi rAn/ kha kha khA hi/ ban na/
sadz+dza du'-i/ han han/ g+ha g+ha g+ha taa ga ta ya/ sarba pA pa a mu ka su shAn+taM ku ru hU~MhU~M phaT swAhA/ 'dod g grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// dngos grub stsal bar the tshom med// 'di nyid
dkyil 'khor dgod pa yis// sna tshogs 'phrin las byas pa ste// dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag po mchog/ pho nya legs brten 'khor la yin// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i
rgyud las/ dur khrod kyi bdag po rnams dang/ pho' ba khyad par ba rnams dang/ ma mo dang zhing skyong gi 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa 'o//klud nas gan
yong nyishu bzhi// gsang ba'i mgon po 'di nyidakyis// dkyil 'khor bo brang gnas pa 'o// mkha' 'gro'i gsang sngags bstan par bya// pho la legs skyes rnal 'byor ma// rgya mtshodanganiro
yis ni// phye ba'i rdo rje nor bu dang// par ral gri'i rogs dang ni// bdagshegs yashes dam tshig gis// sna tshogs sha za'imamo rnams// gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa// ku
yis mtshon pas kun tu phye// o b+hi ra li ni hA/ byA dzin/ Da sha ka ra 'ani ]dzAl mu khi ni/ bA yu be ga ni phra tsaNiNaM/ ru dra akI NaM/ ma hAs ni/ a sa niya ma ni/ gAtin/ la Ni/
ba dza yani/ shAdza na ye/ shAdza ya ka ra Ni/ shA badzra/ kaMkA la nekA la rArANe/ pra kro d+ha mu khen/ kAl dziyA/ kArAlan/ badzra b+hu ra ba ka ra Ni/ d+hu ru sin/ yam nasaM 'gi
miM ka ra sa tis+sani da rat+nam lin/ su kra akIn/ ku su lani/ khat+tiNi/ badzra pra b+ha Ni/ badzra kA la yan/ sam pany+tsaNi/ ka ma nag+ho/ tsi tAl ni/ shu kani/ sawa d+hi no/ su trariNi/
rgyu las sa ni/ pang mAkinaM/ dza la dza la kha Ni b+ha ba bud+der/ gam+b+ha tsaN+Da 'khe mAn+te/ tsaN mu kha ni/ hU~Ms warma Ni/ wa ki re shA ra Ni/ hUM ta ru dra ye/ ka ra Nis

ka shrI rus ni mo ju ni d+haM/ g+ha ri Nashe sha Ni/ su hri gyu/ b+haMdu bla ma Ni/ mu la ni/ pa kA la yo ka li ni/ ngari Nib+hA ye/ par Mni/ ru grwa pa a kI raM/ b+hi ma la gri nas hA/ pakApa klasarba

yo gi ni kA marades u0f97pu'agar gasmyu grostsagriny+tsa hUM phaT/ tshes brgyad dang ni leb dang// nyi shu dgu ngang dgu stong dang// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// sa na pe tsem mang 'grub pa go/ dbyug
b+hU gu drag po'i po ladang// chutshod kyi rim ro dang// 'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis// thun ni pho tu brgya dag go/ dus ma sa gnas pa'i pa la// rtashu rtsa bzhi da yo phyad// rtsa rlung
mi ge khams la rgyu/ 'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o// dpal ra gen po tshon po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyudakAsaphyi ru ngan pa ga ngos re po tA ma te las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
tsha/ gnyis pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nag po chen po gtum po ni///'a ba dngas ma chagatsigs ljags 'dril cing// a la la yi sgra sgrogs pa//
rab 'jigs ba'ongs pa'i stabs kyis ra// gsang bamachod byang lha ro brgyud// kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste// 'di yis 'phrin las dbang theng byed// oM badzra ka wu ma hAkA lA ya hU~M hU~M

[/]phaT/ oM gra dus grwa ye hU~MhU~M phaT/ o b+ha ga bya rgyu yahUM hUM phaT/ a b+han su pa rA ya hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM sa ma lA ya hU~MhU~M phaT/ o b+han khe Nasu hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM kron d+haka ra suM hUM hUM phaT/ oM u lA kA
sa hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM ga na gA tsi hU~MhU~M phaT/ 'di'i dpalanag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngags so// mtshan phyed dusan gtor ma 'bul// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// chos
khyad stobs dang bcas pasamatshid// gsang ba sgrub pa'i mchog tu bshad// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis// dben par dug dang tsha ba dang// sa la dgra bo 'gazugs bya ste// grog 'am
ras la// rgya skyegs dug dang khrag rnams kyis// bya rog mo yi rus pas// gzugs bris de yi snying khar ni// a yi rnam pa'i 'khor lo la// mAr ya ya mtha' can gyi// man ngag bzhin
du bri bar bya// de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te// dril la dung khrod sgra yis dkris// sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying kha ru// bcug ste tshigs dang lci ba sogs// dug dang bcas patshir mgazug/
denas sngags pa 'dod lha yi// nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas// snying kha'i hU~M las 'od 'phro bas// lha la bka' bsgo rnam shesani// man ngag can gyis dgug par bya// oM badzra ma hAkA latshe
gemo A kArA dza/ hUM baM hos dgug pa dang// gzhug dngakhacing dang myos par bya// de nas tsha ba dug gsakhrab// de bzhin bdun phrag nyi shu gsum// zla ba gcig tulas sgrub la//
drag po'i thab tu tshor ma dang// bram 'i me la bsre bar bya// des kyang 'dud nga ra ra byed na// bstan pa bde la gnas pa'i phyir// snying rje chen po rab bskyod de// gri
lcags las byas mtshon gyis gtub// khrag dang dug dang tsha ba dang// ram 'apagar b.rus 5pasrogs// thal ba blama'i man ngag ltar// mnar dang chu bor dor bar// gzhan yami shes/
thod pa la// dug ga sa gus gzugs bris te// de ya lce 'a udan ni// no sa sprul khra 'gatsa5ga 5// [']sma ya pa nag pos dkri// nus po la shes kyis gtums nas ni// mi shes
sa phyogs ngagatumanan// bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur na// 'chidang sgo par gyur pa ni// the tshom yod pa ma yin no// yi dgas sam ni dgra bo gang// gro ga la ni gzugs bris la// snying khar
sngags 'dis bskor bar bya/ oM badzra maM hAka la che ge mo mA rA ya swAhU~M mdzaT/ ces pa'i sngags bris gtor na ra gzhug/ de nas sgrapa sngags bzlas par bya// de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul// mgon
tsha bonag po 'khor bcas la// sha khrag rkang sogs bstabs byas nas// gtor mas gsad pas bsgral bya ste// dmags par bya ba myur du rlag/ gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol de// nus pa cung
(zad yod gyur na// rangashed rang la dbab pa'i phyir// ngag mnan sbyor ba 'di ltar bya// gro ga 'am na ro ras la// khrag dang dug dang bdugar yis// gzugs na lces khengs sngags khro ba//
