stam ming spel ldan pas bskor// phyin ci leg tu dril la bcings// zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa la na// tshatsha byas pa'i nang bcug la// bstim zhing mnan la mdun byas la// rnal 'byor spobasdu
phugargyu bcing// thun gyis brabs la bzlas pa bya// las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya// de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni// gnod pa'i sa phyogs dag tumanan// myur du 'grub pa thetshom med//
thod pa 'aman snod gzhan du// sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de// thun rdzas kyis brab larigar bcas// yang na drag po klu' gtad// gru gsum dang bcug brdzi bar bya// kha bcad nas ni drag po yi//
nges par thob par the tsom med// doltar las la sbyor dus su// nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shesanas// srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar sgrag/ bstan pa 'jog par byed pa yi// dgra bosrung khyed lha khyod nyon
gdug pa'i sems ldan dgra 'di yis// dkon mchog bla ma la spyod cing// rnal 'byor la sngangasems can 'tsho// sgrub pa po la bar s gyur pas// dpag tshad stong du ltung ba yi// dmyal ba'i
sdug bsngal myong gyur pas// bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni// gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin// khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par// sdig can 'di myur du spongs// zhes brjod par
bya'o// bstan pa bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang// snying rje chen po ldan pa yis// yengs pa med par byas gyur na// nges par 'grub par gdon mi za// brgya byin dag gi srog kyang g.yo// sdig can dgra
[W ]@#// bgegs smos ci dgos// byang chub se na sa dang rab ldan na// ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub nga bar gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ lha re raM
khor 'dang las sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' ba// dpal ldan lcam dral thams cad
kyi sgrub pa rab tu nyams dga' ni// mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni// zhal gcig pa phyag drug pa// dang po gro gug thod khrag 'dzin// spyan gsum mthinganag brdam pa yi// g.yas

k+Sha g.yon bar ms 'phreng ba dang// Da ma ru ni 'dzin cing rdung// tha ma gnyis kyis kha p+tangang// sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'ching bar mdzad/ klu brgyad kyis brgyan khrag 'dzag zhal// sa bon rang sngag
'phreng ba can// rgyas btab pas na byin brlabs shing// rdo rje sems dpas dbu brgyan pa// n+ya gro d+ha ya shing la brten// ba na ya ka mnan par bsam// oM badzram hA kA la k+Shi kA trab hU~Mb nAyaka
nAhU~MhU~M phaT swA hA/ sha chen bsregs spos phul nas ni// skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags bzlas// de la gtor ma dbul bar bya// khyad par byin rlabs gyur par bya// 'phrin las thogs pa med par

'grub// oM badzakro d+has ma ya ma hA kA lA ya hU~M phaT/ sku'i mgon po'i sngags so// o 'a hA kA la gu Na hri da hU~M phaT/ yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badzra ma hA kA la rakA rudri b+ha Ta ni
'a 5 gsung gi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badzra kr-itsatsAmA ya ma hA kAlatsahal hridzaM/ las kyi megon po'i sngagasaso// oMbadzram kA li ha na badzra hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i mgon/
po sngags so// o tsaN+Di shwa rI ye swAhA/ gtum pa mo 'asngags so// o tsaNitsikA ye swAhA/ dragamo'i sngags so// oM ka lakI sAhA/ zlog byed ma'i sngags so// o ku pishi bar yo/

sAgA/ dpa' mo'i sngags so// ang+gAhAm hA kA la ga Na me tri dr-i/ beng 'dzin ma'asngags so// oM redan+tim hA kA la tIn+d+ri'u la sam+b+ha shAt+taMdza rtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sngags so// oM badzra ma hA kA la kro
gats+tshas ya hUMphaT/ gan+ti 'dzin pa'i sngags so// oM badzam hAkA la tecitso ta gar ma rA NIhUM phaT/ rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i stagaso so// gsang ba kheng 'dzin mgon po yis// lha ma yin
gyi grong khyer// sum brtsegs la sogs khangabazang rnams// khro bo tsan danakheng bsnams kyis// lha dmag bye bdung phyur rnams// byung nas rlag par mdzad pa yi// grong khyer 'bum phrag
brgyad cu yang// rlag byed bdud 'dul chen poste// 'di nyid gson gnas lha mon// kun tu dagyesanas garastabs gnas// ogaMm hA kA la du be nidza a mu ruT osiMm wAkA la trag
rakA/ bonidza/ myi nagashag sbya/ tshushig lca che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ o badzra ma hA kA la rakA tra/ yakA ru pAs ma ya/ sam+baa ru ru tsa pa lA ya/ ma ra Nachad rbad/ dri rbang pu chad pu/
tshol pa tshal pa ni ku ru sa ma ya/ chage mo gtubs dzadza/ oM ru ru ma ma sgu/ ma ma sha taM/ tsita la dr-ihri/ mA ra ya rgud cud/ re shaM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ kA laoM lha
sha ni ma hA kA la yak+ShashA sa na/ a pa ka ring me ke na me ru ru ma ma sgyu/ tsit+tal hridzicad/ drir sngopa tIka sisAhA/ ti ka pa trAhU~M/ a tra ka ta sra mo sha mo sna/ dag bug shag/ ku mi ta
chad 'ge chud sod/ gaN+Di 'dzin pa'i khro bo che// ma rungs klad pa 'gem par byed// tsamuNi ldan rol pa ste/ gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shis// kha ti rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni//
sgyu dgrab gegs lus ngag yod la 'debs// gtum po thogs 'babs mig sbyar ma// sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba 'o// gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams// bdud dang bdud kyi phyog
skrag byed// 'di nyid legs ldan rgyal po che// rdo rje pas gdengs tshogs gdong// dkyil 'khoralha tshogs 'di dag gis// gsang sngags rim pas bstan pa 'o// thun mong khyad par bye
brag gis// lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa// grub pa kun du bgrodapa 'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i
gsangasngags dang 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas bden pa tsam gyisanaM// grub pa stsol bor mdzad pa'o// dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni// yang dag
nyid du bshad parapa/ bya rog g.yang gzhis brgyan pa yi// nagapo phyag bzhi ngad pa ste// gang Ting dam tshig ldan pas spyi/ de yi sku yi rten dukhashad/ gser dngul sogs kyis phris pa'i//
nag po chen po 'i snying po dang// lta ba'i snying po bris pa rnams// gsung gi rten du 'dod pa 'o// bya rog sogs dang nag so// rgya yi snying dang sa ya sAng// rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams//
thugs kyi rten du gzung bar bya// snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang// nyasha la sogs 'bru yin// sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang// bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin// rdzas dang rta gtor stong dang
'og/ steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbub// ba lnga sman lnga myos byed bcas// rgyun du thugs dam lasku la phyi pham chod// rta nag luganagagayag rog 'a// mgul du snying po bris la gdags//
de yi ngo bo legs phul la// phyi yi rten du bya bar bshad/ nag po ras sam dar lo yang// rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis// nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// bris pa nyin gcig gis rdzogs
nas// bar chad med par rab gnas bya// gsang rten lus la bcang ba lo sna tshogs 'bru nag dbal byas pa'i// gtor ma mi shus brgyan pa dag/ thobrang rten dang brten par bcas// nang gi
rjen du slob pa'o// skyes pa grir sha'i thod 'phreng ni// yon tan ldan phyir rtag tus// ma bsad mtshon las byas pa yi// rdo rje gri gug hU~M bris pa// 'phrin las byed pa'i khyad par ro// dmatshig
gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas nyid du// lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar ro// rigs mdakyin thod pa la// gsang sngags yi ge 'di dag ni//
bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed// khasgrub mi dgos par nus pa 'byung// dur khrod so'il bas sngags 'di bri// obI de wi tsamun rak+tatsa muts+tshi/ saM ka mor/ dzAke saM ha sita/ mu khe

ka rag+ha ra/ kAl kA la phrekati tas na sata T+Ta hUM la la ta ya/ ka pA la mA la d+hA ra Ni hU~MhAphaT phaT swA hA/ thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bri// phyi yi tshon du bshad pa yin// bong bu nag mo'i thod
pa la// rten pa lha mo'asku bris pa// nang gi don du bshad pa yin// nal gri'i snying nom nyams pa// mtshon gyi pa la khason pa gzhug/ gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya// bu mo 'a zedapa
jaral dang// gri gug darogyis gtums pa dang// dri bzang mtshan gyis bdug par bya// de len nyid rten du bshad// de nas nub phyogs du gnas ni// gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo//
mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// rdo rje mgon po 'khor bcas la// rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la// 'di na bstan bsrung bzhugs su gsol//
lan gsum brjod nas bzhugs pa bya// rol mo'i sgra dang sos dung dang// sna tshogs rol mos bsus nas kyang// 'phrin las gang 'grub ma ngeshes bya// 'di ni rang bzhin chen yin no// dpal
mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung pa'i rgyud las/ nang gsang ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gajugs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya//
dpal ldan nag pochen po yi// bka' yi tshogs kyi 'o bor gyur pa// 'di ni kun tu shes par bya// las kyi mgon po rnams dang na// lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas// lha srin sde brgyad ma
lus pa// pho nya mngaga gzhug las byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyogs skyong bcu dang ni// klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyud// gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal chen bzhi// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad re//
gnod sbyin brgyad dang 'phrog ma'i bu// sha za dang ni ma mo dang// 'jig chen pa dang dam tshig gnas// zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas// 'di dag las kun byed pa yi// 'jig rten skyong ba
bzhi bcas pas// grub pa 'batustsol mdzad pa// lha dang lha min mi 'am ci// lto 'phye grul bum srul po dang// lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs// nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang//
'byung po ma lus 'dus pa kun// 'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing// mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yaMs// srung nga bar chad nges par sel// sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i rA hu la/ 'di la sogs
pa thams cad la// tshogs kyi gtor mas tshor mchod na// dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster// 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi// nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang// rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma/
'byung// sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni// phyin ng gsang ba rtags gyur pa// dngos dang nyams snang rmi lam dang// sprul pa'i 'phrin las nges 'byung ba// gtso bo nyid/
rang 'kher rnams kyi// rom pa rjes su 'brel bar 'byung// rtags byung nas na las la bskul// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'irgyudalas/ gtso bo dang nor du bcas pa mchod
par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan mgon po chen po yi// thorapa'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar// dpang bskur chog
bshang pa ra bya// 'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs// de las rgyal bar byed pa yi// chog bzang po bla na med// dkyil 'khor bzang po bzhengs par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu//
rgyudangashes yang dag bla ma la// snod ldan dag pa'i slob ma yis// gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la// maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang// rgyal ba mgon po ma lus
bu dang// dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol// lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas// dang po bsnyenapa brtsam par bya// mtshan ma nye ba'am
tshul shes nas// de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya// dang po bgegs rnams nyer zhi ya// 'phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yis// ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang// lus dang ngag dang yid/
kyis ni// sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i// sngags dang bcas pa'i nyus rwa rgyus// ma sbyar srog dang bral bar bya// de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma las// sa brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya/
sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas// brko zhing rolnga bsal bar bya// de nas bsang bcag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni// ro rdzogom pa'i gar stabs kyis// dAhUM drag po'i sgra brjod/
pas// phyogs kun bacing ba byas nas ni// bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma spur/ slob ma kun bsrungs byas la// rdo rjemagon pe chen po yi// ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la// gsol ba gdab
pas gnang ba sbyin// khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrungs// yang dag yeng/ tse dus pa' che// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed pa// rgya ba ma lus bstan skyong che// de nas lhag par/
gnas pa brtsams// sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas// bka' byin nas na them par blta// bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan// ma nyams matsan zhing ldan pa lnga// kha tshur ma nyams pas khrung dkri
snying po snyan dang 'bru la sogs// sngos dang rin chen dag gis dgang// rgyun 'bab chu yasi gang ba drang// 'bras ldanugashang pa/sa kha brgyan pa'o/ de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo ya// bka' ya khro
bo rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la// ma tog gcal bkram lha rnams ni/ bskyod cing mchod la gnyis med bstom// songashing der dang lhas partag pa// bsrung skud kungasha sbyin
par bya// de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas pas// dmatshig gsang ba sbyin par bya// khyad par lha la gsol btab nas// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/
dang por ye shes thig gdab cing// phyi nas dam tshig nges par gdab// go rims ma nor nges pa'i tshul// srad bu shes rab can thig gdab// tshonani byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// pra brtag
rdul tshon rim par dbye// gru bzhi pa 'a sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhisanamadzes pa yi/ snum bskor pho brang ling tshe dgu// dbus ma e dbyibs drag po nyid// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad//
lho khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'dod yon rin chen skad bad dang// dra phyedab ku la ya 'phrang// yang na kha bad mdzes pa'i rgyan// chos 'khor ri dogs gdugs dang bcas//
thong sam pad+ma'i 'phreng bar ldan// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su 'khor// rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i// gsang sngags nyeb sngags par gnas/
ska bstan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab// nye bar brgyan cing yongs su bskor// de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung
ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o///de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya// yang nalang tsho dgu ldan pa'i/
par 'dab brgyad phyi rol du// mu khyud 'khor lo rimi gsum la// e dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod// lha dang sa bon phyag mtshan ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas mtshan// slob ma
khrus byas rgyan btags te// maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing// las kyis mig ni bkab nasasu// dang por me tog dor bar bya// mtshan ma mthong bas legs par drang// sgo bzhinas ni nang 'jug
cing// gu gul bdugasring ting 'dzin gyis// nag po chan po'i lha tshogs kyang// nges pa ra spyan drang btsum par bya// de las nges par rtags rnams byung/ yang na so so'i mgon por bskyed//
ye shesasems dang 'a byin gyis brlab/ bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las// 'od 'phros rang byin brlab par 'gyur// mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor// gdong g.yogs bkrol zhing
lha ngo bstan// de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis// nges par rim pas dbang bskur te// bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong// bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel mdzad/
pa sku yi mgon po 'khorab cas kyis// bla med dngos grub spyon pa'i phyir// yang dag yo shes dbang bskur ro// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las lha yi khyad par ro//
me long ye shes dbang nyid can// rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni// zhe sdang dag pas dbang bskur ro/ mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang// bya ba nan tan chos
kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang// des par dbang bskur brtan par bya// 'phrin las bzhi yo dbang yang bskur/ lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub//
bum pa spyi bor byon pa dang// thod pa'i bdud rtsi byugs pa yis// gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid// rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o// de rjes ba ling gtad pa yis// nus pa thogs med sprin
byed yin// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog/ lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos// ting 'dzin chen po'i phyag rgya che/ 'di nyid dngos grub kun gyi gter// thapa nga cho'i don grub pa// skal
pa/bdun la sbyin par bya'o// daru ka dang nag po che// bla ma tha dad med pa la// tshogs kyi 'khor los legs mtshud cing/ zhabs la gtugs 'a smon lam btab/ 'di rgyu stob par the tsom med//
'phrin las kun tu grubastar byed// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'irgyud 'o a/ dbab pasur zhing pan gyis kharlabs pa 'i 'a 'u ste po brgyud pa'o// smanas
gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan mgon po de nyid kyi// phyogs bzhi yongasasu skyob pa'i// rgyal po chon po rnam pa bzhi// shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung/ lho phyogs nas na rims
skyes po// nub phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang// byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa// 'di nyid grub pa ster byed da pa'o// rab kAnaMg/ @#nga ba dang// bkra
gas nyams dga'is phyogasasu// rnam thos sras khesgrub par bya// sa gzhi ba ya lci bas khyug/ dri bzang tsan dan dkar dmar dang// aka ru dang du ru ka/ kha che gi wang sna tshogs sman/
srog cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi mda' gang pa// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang// rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba// pho brang rin chen las grub pa// sna tshogs pad+ma rin chen/
gling// gter dang dpag bsam ljon shing bcas// ka ba stong phrag du ma yis// rab tu rgyas shang yongs su bskor// lte ba rin chen mu khyud la// lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/ bar ma
lha khyams mdzes pa la// gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor// phyi ma ra bas bskor ba la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa// dbus su rin chen sengage'i
khri snatshogs par ge sar bcas// de dbus zla ba dar gyi gan/ de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// sa bon phyag mtshan dgod bya// sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te// 'bras dang
gro dang 'bru sna la// gtor ma shan tu bzang bar bsham// khyad par me togasna tshogs ni// nA ga ge sar ku mu da// pun ta ke kha ba ku li// par shaki dang tsam pa ka/ d+ma nus ra ma la ke/ su ti/
dang ut+palaM// par man dA ra ba dang// ngaNod pa la sogs pa 'o// snatshogs chudang sreg spos tshogs// gu gul khyad par bsreg par bya// karagu ram sbrang rtsi dang// 'khu ba 'brasachen
zhun mar dang// zhal zas bye brag thams cad dang// snang gsal mar ma byug pa dang// sgra snyan sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang// 'phan
dang bla re la sogs pa// sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi dang// de ltar bkod pas legs brgyan nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang// rang lhar bskyed pa'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil
'khoral// rab tu 'phros pas 'od du 'bar// de las dbus su rgyal chen ni// sku mdog gur kum mdog 'dra ba// ranen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// seng ge 'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i
phyag g.yas yade bzhin nor bu ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan can// g.yon pa ne'u le'i snod can las// kha nas rin chen skyug par bsam// gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang// nor
bu bzang dang lha yi bdag/ yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang// lnga rtsen pa tse kuN+Da la// sna tshogs rgyan dang phyag mtshan bcas// re re'ang dums yongs khaskor nas// shin tu gsal zhing
brtan pa rab sam// de nas sa bon las 'phros te// rang bzhin gnas nas spyanadrangs la// mchod cing bstod de gnyis med bstim// khyad par gsol ba gdab par bya// rgyal ba mgon po
'khor bcas pa'i// yod 'ong khang bzang bo brang 'di// yade bzhin nor bu'i char 'bebs pa'i// na chen gtor gyi dngos grub gsol// o bas hA/ oM bai shra ma NA ya swA hA/ oM dzam+b+ha la ya
sAhA/ o pAn+ta b+ha rA ya swA hA/ oMmaNi b+ha pAya la dA/ oM ku khe rAmasAhA/ osaM pra dza nA ya swAhA/ oM gu ta nAya swA hA/ opaM tsikA ya sA hA/ oM ba tsikuN+Da lA ya sahA/ dang po lcags
kyu'i phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid// gsum pa kun nas khastod par bya// de nas gtor ma dbulakhar bya// gsol ba btab nas 'phrin las bcol// de nas ye shes gshegs su
gsol// der gnas pa ni bzhugs par bya// phyi rtenand rten khyad par ba// rim pa 'khor 'a sngags dang bcas// mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang// khyad par rtags ni gsal bar 'byung
na pa'i mtshan ma nges mthong nas// dngos grub blang zhingagator ma dbul// sbyin sreg las kyis myur du 'grub// gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yasan// 'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub//
khagong ma yamachod pa bya// gtor ma chen po dang bcas pas// lan bdun ta bar bsnyen pas 'grub// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi gter// sgrub pa po la rtsol bar mdzad// dpal mgon po
chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par du'aphags pa rnam thos sras gnod spyin chen po brgyud dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/// de nas gzhan
yang bshad bya ba// 'phags pa chen po de nyid la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba// rim pa 'di ni bstan par phyo// khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che// dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag
po nyid// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ni// spyan gsum cung zad khro bo'i tshul// sku mdog dmar dang ljang ku'i ma dog/ ni chen 'bar pa'i dbu rgyun can// sku la dar
borasum rami la// snatshogs cod pan rgyan gyis smras// phyag g.yas ri chen 'bar ba bsnams// lha ya ba dan mdzes pa 'phyar// g.yon pa mchod rten sku gdung bsnams// ne'u le'i rkyal
panor skyug 'chang// kha khor du khyad par klu chen bargyad// sku lus ma lo rim pa la// sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gdengs ka can// phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba nas/ yid bzhin nor bu legs
sgyu bsnams pa// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs phyed skyal can// thams cad gtso la 'dud par byed// nor rgyas par de dang// stobs kyi rgyu dang 'jog po nyade// pad+ma cherang hu lu che// dung
slong rigs ldan bargyad po nyid// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang dag gi/ pad+mal nigenas bcas te// de ltar bskyed la ye shes pa// spyan drangs mchod la gnyis med bsgom/ ngagyes pa'i tshul gyis
rnal 'byor pa// yid 'ong dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur// oM hUMbadz+dzayakA le sha baN+Daya hUM phaT/ oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ o awanA ya swA hA/ oM takA kA ya AyA/ oM yaM kha pA lA yaMswA hA/
o kao Ta ya swA hA/ oM pad+maya swA hA/ oM ma hApar yasA hA/ oM ku lakAyasAhA/ de ni gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// de nas klu rnams thams cad la//
yid 'ong gtor m dbul bar bya// nA ga ge sar pus pa dang// rgya mtsho baa ru ra// dza ti pa la gur kum dang// tsanadan dkar dmar pu shel ci// dbang po lag dang snying zho sha// chu srin
sder mo le brgan dang// 'gron bu dung dang mu tig dang// 'phyis bla gor zho sha dang// mkhal ma zho sha rma bya'i mdongs// rtar rgun 'brum ma dar gsum dang// gser gyi bye ma ras skud dang/
'o mo dang ni 'bru sna lnga// rin chen snatshogs ma lus pa// khyad par du ni dbul bar bya// de nas mchod cing bstod bya ste// dngos grub gang 'dod stsol bar bsam// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya
gsang sngags khri phrag bcu bzlas nas// rtags byung nas nii dengos grub blang// dpal mgonapachen po dngos grub 'byung pa'i rgyud las/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor
ba'i le'u ste nyishu pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// drang srong sras mchog de nyid laM/ lhamo brgyad kyis yongs bskor pa'i// thabs nyidi rnal 'byor pas shes
bya ranechen bdun pa'i khang bzangs su/ nor bu sna tshogs gdan bzhugs pa'i// 'phags pa sku mdog bai DUm// zhal gcig phyag drug spyan gsum pa// rin chen sna tshogs du mas
smras// gdug pa kluyis nyer brgyan cing// g.yas kyi dang po rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ g.yon gyi dang po rin chen snod// khar ma gnyis ni rdo rje dang// pad+ma 'bar ba bsnams pa dang// tha
mas zhags pa thob 'phyar/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes// skad cig gis ni khesam par bya// oM badzragi duka ku le ra/
A ka/ ma nAyak+Sha rA dza ra t+tAsan+d+he hUM swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni be rjod pa yis// gnod sbyin mo rnams mdun du 'gugs/ o tsan+d+ra kAN+DisA hA/ su g+ha rA ya swA hA/ oM dat+tA yi sa lA/ oM gu
rgyu yisA hA/ su dat+ta yis hA/ o de bye sA tA/ o Ar+ya yi sa/ os las spyi sa hA/ zla 'od can ma rab bzangamo// sbyin byed ma dang gosang ba ma// rab smyonem dang dpal lhamo// 'phags
ma dang ni dbyangs ldan te// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// kun tu rgyal ba 'od 'phro ma// gdu bu dpung rgyan mgulargyun dang// zhabs gdub doshal legs brgyan cing/ dar rang nor
bus rnam par mdzes// dkar dang ser dang dur ba'i 'od// gser 'od pad+ma rAg dang// ut+pal can du rika dang// pa la sha yi mdog mtshungs pa// 'od kyi 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i nang//
pa/ rin chen sgrom bu gter gyi snod// rin chen gzhong pa dung chos dang// de tsur dang nor bu ma// dpal be pany+tsa li ka ste// g.yon pa kun tu par bsnams// sgeg cing 'gying dang ldan par bsam//

gtso bos lhamo brgyad po bsgul lha mo brgyad po thams cad kyis// 'di na char pa phab nas ni//bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnam par bsam// mgon po myur du bskul ba'i tshe// gtso bos ma 'jigs seng ge chibs// thun
mong gan las byed pa// stobs ldan glang chen rab brtan chibs// khyad par sgrub pa'i las rnams byed// g.yu 'brug sngon po chibs nas// snang srode ma lus dbang du sdud// rab ng du byed
pa'i las rnams dang// khyad par sbyin sreg drag pon// bshad dang brdam pa'i tshul gyis ni// myur du las la 'gro ba yi ni// phyi nas gsang ba'i rim shes pa'i// stong phrag bcu yis 'grub pa ste//
'di noren chen ga chu'i nang// rinachon 'bar pa'i 'khor lo la// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'phreng ba can// sa bon spro bsdus ting 'dzin sgom// na mo bo shra ba Na badzA mus la/ mu sun ste/ drishA la oM/

kusha/ pA sha pa ra shu/ bo d+ha mung ga ra lA laM kI de/ has su/ na mo na ma sam+b+ha re wa ta su tsa ta/ kr-i ta rnga s+ya/ mahA kIle kI lA ya/ sarba gra hA/ a ka ni ye bi dza yA/ dzayaM du/ lhag b+haM/

nA ra ku bar/ kA tis taM/ tsakra tino/ ka la ka la/ nA da ku be ra ka li ko le/ nA da ku be ra/ kA tipa ti/ tsakra tin/ bi dzim b+hab+ha ga pa na/ nA da ku be ra/ bkri ta/ drang srong ka ra la/ ban dran/

ri tA/ d+higyas/ gu ny+tsa/ kan gan pa riTaM dA/ bkra ba Na/ b+han g+ha na/ b+hi ba na bas ti/ ku pa ku ti/ ku be ra/ mAd ku pe ran mas ste sa hA/ 'di ni khyad par sgrub pa ste/ gsang sngags gnodasbyin
stong sde'i tshogs// ma lus 'di yis skul bar byed// gar mkhan mchog ces bya ba ya// lhan du mas yongs bskor pa'i// 'din paspyod cing spyan drang ba// spyan drang mchod cing bstod pa dang//
za @#// gang sgrub las la bskul bar bya// 'di yis rnal 'byor dgos pa sgrub// zhi besand gdon ma lus pa// dbang gis khams gsum ma lus bsgyur// rgyas pas nor dang
'bru sogs 'phel// mngon spyod kyis ni go dug pa 'dul// nor bu bzang pos gter la spyod// yang dag shes kyis dus gsum mthong// gang ba bzang pos longs spyod 'phel// gtsug na
'khyil bas tshe dpal ster// 'brog gnas rgyal bas dud 'gro srol// gnod sbyin lnga po 'di dag gis// sa gsum g.yo bar byed pa ste// 'di dag sgrub pos mchod gyur na// phun sum tshogs pa'i
smyu dpal rnams ste// rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yi no// sa bon las 'phros lcags kyus na// 'di dag srog gi dbang po la// dbang byed las byed mi blogi 'gyur// gnod sbyine rnams la shing thog/
dang// klu rnams gtor ms kun tu mchod// lha mo a ru ra ya 'bru// ma lus myur du mchod pa'o// gang po dang na mdzes ma dag/ khyad par mngag gzhug gyurapa 'o// dngol mgon po chen po dngos
grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa sgakhaM pa'i le 'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sems can
rnams kyi don gyi phyir// 'khor ba'i srid pa ji srid par// byang chub sems kyi tshos rnams ston// ri bo'i rtse dnganags tshal brag/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang shang gcigs// gdod nas grub pa'i
na/ du khrod de// gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan bsgol// las kyi mgon po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gru gsum pho brang la gnas pa// dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar ba ni// me dpung 'bar ba 'phro
ba'i dbus// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// sku mdoganag cing mchob no// yan lag thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang// thod pa skam po'i dbu brgyan byas// spyan gsum ldang mig khro tshul ston//
bzhin sbyar mi sdug lus can ni// phyag g.yas rdo rje gri klog 'phyar// g.yon pa dam nyams snying po khrag gis// thod pa bkang nas gsol bar mdzad// dug sbrul gdug pas lha tshogs brgyan//
dbu sku ngomar ser gyen du brdzes// ma 'ong rlon pa'i do shal byas// ro yagadan la brdzus nas kyang// drag po'i nga ro sgrogs pa'i gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po ni/ gsod byed rnam
byed sgrol byed re// bsgrub bya nges yum sgrol ba'i tshe// sku yi mgon pos dam nyams kyi lte ba'i srog rtsa gcod par byed// gsung gi mgon pos dam nyams kyi/ mgrin panas ni khrag rnams
'dre// rdo rje thugs kyi mgon po yis// snying gi dkar nag mtshams su yang bya rog mchu na btsugs nas kyang// srog rtsa myur du gcod par byed// pho nyashaza'i gdong can gyis// spyi gtsug
nas ni rtse la 'jib// las byed ma mo tsaN+Dikas/ gsang ba'i mdomasasor dngas ma rdub/ rtsa 'jib ma dang khrag 'thung ma// srog 'phrog mas ni las la sbyor// nyinemtshan dus las 'da' mi
khyod// 'di dag gsang sngagasam yas bzlas// dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad// rtsa ba'i sngags ni srog yin te// gsung gi dngos grubaswAng po yin// lte ba'i stong
posazugs bsal kha'o// ye shesas khon me'i shigs pa// dngas ma'i gnas par de bshad do// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rim pa ra bzlas pas bsam gtan 'grub// rtags

rnams nye bar ma byung na// 'bad pas bsnyen cing mchod par bya// gzhan du 'grub par 'gyur ro// lo ma g+ha kA la gu Na hrid hU~M phaT/ oM ma pAkA la trag shad dza/ ma hA kAlasadz+dzAyo du dza/ A 'akA li/
mam ldan pa'i// rtsa brgyud 'phreng ba rab tu bsgrags// rim par byin rlabs ldan bya'i phyir// bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// bgrang 'phrang nus par ldan pa yis// las ni myur bar shis pa
zi yani// shel gyis zhi ba chen po 'grub/ mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la// dred po so las gsad pa 'grub// de gnyis 'gyur ba bong bu'i so/ sdang dang bslad pa rdza mo' so// ka sogs rnam
phrag dag yum b.rujug/ byis pa 'tshobyed dbang sogs la// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas// bzhi yis lhag pa'i pa da 'brasangashang// lung tang dmar po bdun gtsag drug/ yang
natsan don 'bru dgu 'am// rgyuskar phyadapos grangs mnyam pas// lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus// dbyangs dang gsal byed phyad sbyangs pas// ru rag sha na mngon spyod la// delta'i chog
shes pa yis// tshar gcad phan gdags las rnams smad// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'khor ni// mgal me bzhin bskor bar bya// de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par 'gyur// des na nye bar 'grub//
par 'gyur// nges kyang grub par ma gyur na// rang nyid ye shesanag po yis// gdug pa 'dulapar bsams nas ni// las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor//
gzas pa po de sol bar byed// gal te las 'a 'gyangs pan// srog gi thigs pa blang bdang// gsang sngags sAng po go bzlog cing// lte ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na// shes bstan pa'i 'agyur
ba ste// srogani ngamaralen byed par 'gyur// ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba las// gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur// sbyin sreg dang naman pa dang//
de bzhin thoradagye las bya ba// gsad pa rang gshed gnad la dbab// de las myur bar gas byung tshe// thugs dam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang// rnal
byoranar mar 'grub par 'gyur/ ngang 'a mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud la sa/ las nye bar sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste ringushu rtsa gnyis pa'o//de nas
gzhan yang bshad par bya// dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang bcas// nag mo mngon por 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad// dmatshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis// brag nag rtse
da mo rno ba yi/kha lha bltas pa'i brag phug gam// gzhan yang ri bo'i wim mam/ gdaM gtsag dur khrod ma mo'i gnas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas mchog tu// maN+Dal
dang ni mchod pa dang// gtor ma legs par bshamasanas ni// shachen bsral a lcog phul nas kyang// bar chad bgegs rnams bsad par bya// khru gsum khrag dang dug gis byug/ dug shang
tsher ma can gyis tshig/ gzhan yang lang ga byas pa la// ma bsad lcags kyu tra hu la// de yi lus 2 gdab par bya/ d+hatshil chen mar ma zur gsum pa// btang nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed
tsha la dkyil 'khor gsum la legs gnas pa// ma hAkA la phyag bzhi pa// mngog nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus// zhal gcig spyan gsum 'bar ba ste// g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang//
'og ma tiye'u rtse gsum pa// g.yon gyi dang pos mda' gzhu dang// gnyis pas mgo bo khrag 'dzag pasnams// dur khrod kyis brgyan sham thabs can// de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// sha za
gnyis ni gnas par basam// las kun byed pa'i pho nyar bskul// dang po lha mo chen mo ni// e dbusu gsang sngags las grub pa'i// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum ngashane tu
sku mdog gnug/ shAn tubam zhing sgrog pa'i sku// g.yasakyi deng po ral gri 'chang// 'og ma ti'i bar ba can// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'dzin// 'ogam kha TaM bsnams pa 'o//
ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes/ mchagacigs thodapa dug sprul brgyan// glang po'i stod g.yogs stag sham dang/ re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol// bong bu grwa ngamarasnyes nani// phyed krung/
'bar bas bzhugs pa'o// yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis mo// ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin// dam tshig brgyad la ye shes dgug/ 'phrin las bcol bar bya ba 'o// o gi ya de po kA la kA/

lam dkA la hUM hUM/ oM ru ru roru ba ti pA tos te tsa pa la a 'ug ma sbyo dza/ ma hAkA lari wA ka rA 'a bkr-i ta kA lar dr-initseN+Da rung Ni dzI hU~M phaT/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hUMb+ha[0f00]ma hAkA li de wi gro rgyub/

lo da kha kha khA hi khA hid ha da ha har te/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra yamA raya/ so Ta ya spo Ta ya/ khA hi hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang// smyos pa gror sha'i snying khrag gis// nag po chen po'i gtor mar
blugs// ma nyams grir sho'i pho blangs la/ ma hAru dra bsdom nas ni// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// gan kyal bzhug la bsgul bar bya// de yi
sha dang khrag dang ni// pags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas// klad pa klong rgyas zhag dang// dbang po lnga dang dong sAng lta// rus pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis// ye shes nag tshon po dang// dpal
ldan nag mo re ma ti// las kyi mgon po 'khor dang bcas// pho 'bran g.yog dur khrod gnas// pAki' tshegs kyi thugs dam bskang// deyape ya tshogs rnams kyis// nag po stong gi thug
dma'askab/ de yi khrag dang chu ser gyis// ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang/ de yachu rgyus rus pa rkang// sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang// mkha' 'gro lnga dang lha
mo brgyud// de yi 'phrin las mgon po dang// sha khro 'khoradang bcas la dbul// phung po bsgral ba'i tshog sakyis mchod// rnam shes khasgral ba ye shes bsgyur// ma bskyod pa ya zheng khams
su rgyal ba'i sras su skyod pa yin// rnal 'byor 'chib slu ba dang// bar chad thams cad zlog par byed// ma rungs bstan la sngang zhing 'tshe// sgrub la gnod ni las 'di bya// gzhan du byas na
rlag par 'gyur// de yi ga la sbyin sreg bya// tshilan zhun chen mar ma bya/ klad rgyas thod pa'i rnga lpags bya// pags pa tshogs kyi gdan du bya// bsregs pa'i rus pa tsha tshabya// 'di ni mgon
po 'khor bcas tshogs// mnyes par gyur cing thugs dam bskang// gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par bya'o/ dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'phrin las kyi
rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las sgrub pa la ni/ bal kha lasogs pa la ne srogabargya rtsa brgyad du bya'o// 'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i lasasgruban stong phrag gis bya'o//
ra'i shing dang dmar ba'ishing gis ni dbang gis sgruban khri phrag gis bya'o// shin tunubapa'itshor ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gisan mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya lor shis so// bslad pa la
nishong ga lam rlungamarabyung ba'i tshe sa la ma lhung bar blangs te// gzugs brnyan bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khra la btagasaShagatang bar bya'o// gal te bzlog par 'dod n zhi ba'i sbyin sreg/
gi thal bas gtorezhing ba sor 'i 'o mas lus bkrusan zhi bar byed do// rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag byugs te gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo de'i phyogs su gtor bas nangesha zachen pos 'jigs

par byed do// yang na ce spyang gi sha la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phuranas/ lhagam gzas pa po'i sgo la gtor nas btang na dur khrod kyi ce spyang gi tshogs rab tu 'du zhing du lasgo la sder
mos 'brad par 'gyuralo// de lta bu lan gsum byas na tso sbyang gis za bar 'gyur ro// gang du thogagis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags te ra beng gi byed par bcug ste shing rkang gcig pa'i rtse mo
la btags na thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid dang rigs mthun pa'i rus pa rnyed na nyungs kar gyis brdeg cing/ pha mas kyi dur khrod du grong so lhags
pa dang spos te gtor mas mnan cing dong brus par sbas la/ robasregs pa'i g.yam pas mnanan rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro/ grog mkhar gyis la gzugs byas la/ de la dus dang til
dmar gyis byugs la 'bras phub kyim la rag tu bsro zhing sngags brjegasan rims tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur ro gzhan pa lan spra tshil gyis byugs shing tshor ma'i rigs mang po btab
bar byas nas dum in pa'i rlung la phyar na yul gzhan du gshis ngan du 'chibar byed de// mtshonangag das ba bzung ste grog la lang ga bris pa de bag zan gyi gzugs dang/
bcas pa la rab tu bsngags tasla ro btang na chu gri ra myur du 'chibar byed do/ khas shang la'ango ga bsregs tasgo khang du sbasan spangs pa chen pos btab par 'gyur ro// gal tagrog mkhar gyi sa
lagazugs byas te/ mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tshu 'byung po'i rtsom la mnan nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcad n na'i khoradang bcas pa nus pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi thag
tsha pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gas kyi sar rus pa'i phur bus btaban ni 'on pa dang// 'ong ba dang/ yan lag nyams pa dang/ lhag par 'gyur te/
klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang po nyams pa nyid byed do// gal tas phyogs der char mi 'bab par gyur na ka ra bA ra'i shing btsugs la/ bdamasar gyi 'om gtor bar byas pas klu gnas
pa'i sar song nas/ rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka' bsgon char chen po 'bab par byed do// bal po so'u shing dang 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yapa tsape klu gzir na char 'bab cing sprin sang

par byed do// gal tasprin dral bar 'dodon rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gab dan g.yab par bya'o//khrag sna tshog pa zhungasaka ra nyungs nag tu sbyar ta klu gnas pa'i sar spyane srog tu byas nas bzlas pa'i
kun par du gtor naser ba mod la 'bab ra ra 'gyur ro// cungs kar tungs nas thal chen la rab tu bsngags nas gtor na ser ba mod la gcod par byed do// da du ra'ishang la sbyin sreg byas nasmo
bar 'gyur// nam pa'i shing gsanarings par byed do me tog ban dUr kengang pa 'a sha yis 'gugs par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la'ang gso bar byed do/[”]
a ru ra'i san sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed do// ma teka lo mas bkrus na bcings pa thams cad grol lo// a ka ru'i shing 'bras bu dang ldan pa'ishing dang gcig tu bsregs tamatshor dor na rgyas
par 'gyurar// glang po'i rus pa la gi wang dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i rigs kyi me tog dang bcas pas kun dga' ra bar sngon sreg byed n 'byor pa phun sumatshogs par
byed do// de dag thams cad sngags dang bcas pa'i nus pas 'grub go/ drang srong gi rus pa ri bo'i rtsor sras te 'bru snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa mthong ba'i sar spyod yul du gyur na
ragis thams cad rab tu 'phel bar byed do// a ma'i 'bras bu dang/ shing thog dzi na ta ka dang/ dzu lu dang/ ji ba ka rnams la snod du bkong ste gtor ma byas nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du
phul nan gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// phur bus gdab cing zhungs kar thal chen gyis mtshams bcad par gyur na gnod pa thams cad las srung bar 'gyur ro// dpal
mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o///de nas gzhan/
ka yang bshad bya ba// shin tu gsang ba bla na med// nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi/ las kyi dngos grub chog bshad// dpal nag po chen po'i phyogs kyi 'phrin las kyi lha mo la/ shar gyi lha
mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed pa'o// lho'i lha mo glang sna mas 'ching ba'i las byed do// nub kyilhamo ral pa can gyis sdom pa'i las khyad de/ byang go la mo sa'i gtsug gis myos shing dbang
du byed par 'gyur ro// lha mo bya rgod kyi mgo bo can ms rengs pa'i las byed do// stag gi mgo bo can mas bslad pa'i las byed do// phagargod kyi mgo bo can ms smor 'jug pa'i las byed do//
bskyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do// khyi gdong masan rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do// khA'i gdong gis na rnam par gnon pa'ilas byed do// khug pa'i gdong gis na khrag drang ba'i las byed
de khyung gi gdong gis ni brgyal ba'i las byed do// gzhan yang grong khyer dkrug pa'i las bya bar 'dod na grog 'am shing kun la dbyangs dang gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bris la/ bsnol bar
byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya gang gi gzugs dang mnge spel gyis 'khrul 'khorago bzlog tu bris la bstsol par bya ste/ rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya dag gi gzugs dang ming srel gyi gnas de

myur du bskyod pa rlung dang/ ma dang/ rlubastsalam rnam par 'khrug par byed do// de nas yang kha sbyar dbye ba'i las dag gis pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems kyi dbye bas phyag rgya dang//
gsang sngags dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul nas lan bdun myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te klu'i dug gis gzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na titha la'i 'brul byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzug
mgogasum pa lce brgyad pa 'am/ rigs su byas pa de'i lo'i nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas de mi nga dang bcas pas klu gnas pa'i phyogs su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do/ (ma he dang rta'i
'khrul 'khor 'byung po'i me la sa ti tsa'i khu bas khros te/ de nyid kyi sha khrag dang bcas pas bskul bar gyuran ni shin tu 'khrugacing 'bya par 'gyur ro// yang na ba tan ropa la trazhes bya ba'i

gi thabs kyis bgegasachen po bsgral ba'i gzugs la brten nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs pa las su bya'o// yang na sa nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'atshog ba phyi la ltas pa dang nang du ltas bdag bkod
de rol rgol ba'i phyogs su bskyal na na myur du yul dang bcas pa rlag par byed do// sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jagis pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang zhag pa khogA ba medun du dmigs la//
phur bus btab pa dang bcas pa'i thabs kyis pha rol gyi depung g.yo ba dang bcas pa zlog par byed do// gtor ma chen po byas tayang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/
0 la/ ri rab kyi gzugs la sna tshogs pa'i gzub sa kharan bkod de 'phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab nagayul chen po las rgyal bar byed do// dpag bsam/

gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka 'am ba ka'i shing la brtenanas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongs su rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do// rdo rje bya khyung gi phyag rgya bcas la/ des klu
non par byas na/ de nyid kha dog dkar por gyurapa'i 'jam pa'i spyod kyis 'dul bal/ nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thobs kyis dkrugs pas klu'i gnas thams cad du ltas chen po drug byung/
bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa snyam byed nas/ myur bar 'ongs pa bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i glingadu char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tshugang bar byed par 'gyur ro//
ka gang du skyes pa g.yul ngor bsad pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpal nag po tshon po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bar byas la bskyed pa dang bsam ste bzlas pa bya/ dben par smras nas gsol
ba btab na gang 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sa kun la'ang srung ba'agyural dang/ 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa dang/ de'i mdun du khrus byas te nyal na lung ston pa 'am/ dge mdege
[“” ]gsal por ston par 'gyur ro// yang n dur khrod kyi sasam doranag gola'ang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan pas bris te/ mchod pa dang gtor mar ldan pas rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin/
rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ de nyid kyang rin po che las byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btaban zla ba drug gis nges par ya nga 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du/
byas pa shes rab yongs su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlasan thos pa'i gzungs yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ blo yongs su dag pa dang/ mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// bsrung bas
srung zhing bcings pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo// gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyirten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyide dang ldan par byas
na dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang bar chad thams cad las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin no// khyad par du'ang gsang ba chen po'i dem tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thams
cang duye shes kyin g po chen pos rjes su myong ba dang/ rgyang ring po nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad do// 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang/
tshe dang/ dpal rab tu sdug cing mi zang po'i ye shes thob par byed pa dang/ nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba mad par seng ge 'i stobs kyis rgya zhing/ bdud kyi ris kyi phyogos ma lus pa pham zhanges
ste 'gas pa tsam byed par 'gyur zhing zlumatshochen po'i mthar thug par 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gang gis gtum pa dang/ dpa' ba [”]dang/ drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la//
rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o// gnas kyi mkha' 'grom dang/ pho'i ma la'a'agrom dang/ 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro/
ma dang/ dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang/ sha za'imakha' 'groma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bo nyamo drug curtsa bzhis kyang 'phrin las thogs pamed par 'grub
bar byed do// zhing skyong chen po dang tapa'i zhing skyopatishurtsa bzhi po dag gis kyang 'phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par phyed pa// gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las
rnam par rgyal bar byed do// gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ sems la dang/ de bzhin du gang gnas pa dang/ rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la da bar skyob par
[– ]byed do// 'baradagongs pas mkhyen por 'gyur ro// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o///
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas// drang srong thub pas yang dag bstanaM// nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa// rgyal ba yon tan 'byung
bgater// ye shes mgon po chen po dang// las kyi mgon po du mar bcas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo na// 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste// skal ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gong//
nga yis lung bstan gyur pa yin// gdug pa rnams ni gzung ba'i phyir/ mkhas pas snying rjebaskyed nas ni// chog kun mchog gis rab sgrub// bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de// de bzhin bdag/
ngadam pa'i bdag/ dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas// 'di la the tshom mi bya ste// sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mi 'gyur// ma dag rnam pa can sems kyi// rang bzhin gyis namya ngan 'das// ma rungs
pa ni gang ngagags// skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang// de nyid thabs dang bcas pa yis// srid pa'i bcings las grol bar 'gyur// de ltar grub pa'i lam brten cing// thun mong khyad par 'grub
bar 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tugator ma 'bul// bgegs med pasong nas 'bephal byed pa'o// 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas
pa rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ sha chen po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma pa shams la/ o ba ma NiTaM hUM dza/ rakA Ni mekA Ni kA mi/ kha kha khA hi khA hi gro gra ba li/ ma hApo paNaM/ pra sA rgyu

ya prasA d+ha ya/ hu lu yulu phaT/ kha kha khA halA sim ramA ra/ sam+ba tas nas taM/ wa ra ad+hi ra pra yats+tshA nusA/ o nAhU~Mzhes pas mtshan phyed na gtor ma sreg sngos dang bcas pa dbulakhar bya'o//

o hA kaha ka dam li ni mu khe yisA d+haya/ ma t+tA kA la bung d+ha dzaM pra ti pos/ kAr ya kA ra ya/ pra dut+tAn/ grots+tshagrony+tsa/ mA ra mA ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hIk+Sha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gur
huramaM raMhU~M phaT/ i daM ba lagrots+tshakr-ihU/ kaMsam+b+hao AhU~M/ dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba grub pa dang gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
lnga pa'o///dpal mgon po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'irgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa/ bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa skyong ba/ bstan pa bsrung
nges pa/ gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o// dpal mgon po rin po dngos grub 'byung pa'i rgyud kun kyi song por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yinego/ rdzogs so//
rgyugar gyi mkhan po ma hApaN+Dita a b+ha yA ka ra gupa'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lotsa ba mkhas pa chen po te rgad 'khor legrags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
@#// rgya gar skadadu/ debadzrata rAdzanAm/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs kyi snying po rdo rdzobatsunamo'i lho ga la bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung
pa dang/ thugs kyi snying bo rje btsugasang ba las chesashin tu gsang ba'ang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asal pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdo rje snying po/
snying rje chen po legs so legs so// rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ sems dpa' chen po dang/ dam tshig sems dpa' chen po snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig/ rdo rjesIng bos gsol pa///
gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags// ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags// gang gis dmatshig sems dpa' la gas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// rdo rjem phyed ces byar brjod// sems dpa' srid pa gsum ga ga nga// 'dis shes rab rigs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// ye shes chen po'i ris gang
ga soms dpa' chen por brjod par bya// rtag tungam tshig la spyod phyir// dam tshig sems dpar brjod pa ra bya// rdorjesnying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus ni ji lta bu// gang gis kye yi rdo
rje lags// de yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad// badzra yis kyang de bzhin nyid// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ni snying rje chen po nyid// badzra'anga shes rab brjod par bya// thabs dang
shes rab bdag nyid rgyud// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang// don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang// rengs par byed dang spyod pa nyid// sngo rengs byed dang mngon
spyod dang// ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i// bskyed dang gnas dang byed rgyudang// don byed ye shes rnam shes dang// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba 'o// haru kan bskyod pa'i rgyu// dang
bya// bor gcig ni bsgom par gyu/ rdo rje snying po snying rjeche// dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing// dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur// de yongs shes pas grol ba yin////
dngos po med pa'i ng yongs shes pas// dngos po sgom 'gyur shes rab can// dngos po med ba yongs shes pas// de ltar du bsgom bya// lus 'du la shes chen po gnas// rtog pa
thams cad yang dag sngas// dngos po kun la khyab pa po// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kyabcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan
yaM 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum nu tshu gnyis 'bab pa bang brnyen po gnas su 'dzag pa'o// de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni mo
ak+Sha ste brkyang ma dang/ rom dang/ kun 'darama'o// brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis// thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas// kun 'dar ma ni dbusa gnas asu// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par
pas// brkyang mam bskyod 'bab pa ste// rom de bzhin khrag 'bab cing// shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa// de ni kun 'dar mar rab grags// mi phyungam dang/ 'phra gzugs ma dang/ rtse ba
ma dang/ g.yon pa ma dang/ thung du ma dang rus sbal skyes ma dang/ sgom pa ma dang/ dbang ma dang/ skyon ma dang/ 'jug ma rang ma mo dang/ mtshan mo dang/ bsil sbyin ma dang/
tshab ma dang/ brkyang ma dang/ kun 'dar ma dang/ rom dang/ gzhol ma dang/ rengs ma dang/ shin tu gzugs can ma dang/ spyi ma dang/ rgyu sbyin ma dang/ sbyor bral ma dang/ sdug gu/
ma dang/ grub ma dang/ 'tshod ma dang/ de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang/ sum bskor ma dang 'dong ma dang/ khyim m dang/ gtum mo dang/ bdud bral ma'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das rtsa sum nurtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//
yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis// dngos po'i mtshan nyid du nibartag/ sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad par bya ste/ A li kA lan zla ba dang/ nyim dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs so// chos dang/ 'phebs

spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs so// e paMm yan/ u0f7a a yi rnam pa lha mo spyan//saMgi chem ba 'gam brjod/ma lha mo gos dkar mo// ya yo rnam pa sgrolamar brjod// sprul pa'i 'kho/
lag 'dab ma drug nurtsa bzhi dang/ chos kyi 'khor la 'dab ma brgyad dang/ 'phongs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'a khora'al 'dab ma banudrug dang/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la 'dab masum nyin gnyis
so 'khor lo'i grangs rom pas rnam par gzhag pa/ skad cig ma bzhi ni/ rnam paM snatshogs dang/ rnam par smin pa dang/ rnam panyed pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhin/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mo// de kho na nyid bzhinaM/ bdag gi de kho na dang/ sngags kyi de kho na dang/ lha'i re
khon dang/ yi shes kyi de kho na de do// dga' ba bzhin/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dag 'a bral kyi dega' ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// sde ba bzhin/ gnas brtan pa dang/
thams cad yod par smra ba dang/ kun gyis bkur ba dang/ dge 'dun phal chen no// zla ba dang/ rtimadang/ A la dang/ kA la dang/ 'bo ba bcu drug dang/ dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ chu tshod
sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ thunatshod bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad bzhi'o// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis// de bzhinagshegs pa lnga'asregs shang// spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te// bsreg
pas ri bong can ha'adzag/ rdo rje rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// oM a kA romu khaMsam+barAm N+NaM/ A d+ya nutapanA tu o A/hU~MphaT swA hA/ 'byung

po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngagasaso// bru oM dzra khaMhU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bonamo o de ba btsubadzra yAhU~MhU~M phaT swA hA/ kye rdorje'i snying po'o// sngags thams cad kyi rkang par dang
ak+Sha por oM gyi nem pa dang/ man zhig dAdang/ hU~M phaTakyi rnam pa ning du gzhug go/ o a ka tsa Ta ta pa lags hA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so// aA/ i I/ u U/ ri rI/ l-i lA/
e wa/ o au/ aM/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bon go/ o dril ke pa hU~M hU~M hU~MphaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'i 'o// oM dzA la dzA la skyo hU~M hU~M phaT swa hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i 'o// o koDi ki Ti bidzra

tshu hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i 'o// o~M A/hU~M/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sa sbyang ba'i sngagasaso// oM hUM swA hA//
res par byed pa'i'o o oM swA hA/ dbang du byed pa'i'o// o TaMswA hA/ skyod par byed pa'i 'o// o tshwasAhA/ sdang bar byed pa'i 'o// o Tu swAhA/ mngon spyod kya'o// oM hUM swA hA/
'gugs par byed pa'i 'o// o sA hA/ gsod par byed pa'i 'o// o ku ru kulu hANisAhA/ ku ru kul+le'i sngags so/ a phu'i rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas
ni blugs/ me tog nag pos ni mchod/ klu 'dul bar byed pa'i bu bsan byug/ glang poma'aching gis nimago bo byug/ kham bor kha sbyar du na gzhag/ ba nag mo'i 'o masani dgang/ gzhon nu
mnag mos bkal ba'i skud pas nai dekri/ rlung gaphyogasabu rdzid khu byas te[]tha' yas der gzhag go/ de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas nardulatsheganagapo/
skyes pa'is pa'i phye masanarjel tshon dkar bo/ ldengasas ni rdul tshon ser po/ dur khrod kyi so phag gsanardulatshon ramakho/ rkun ma'i lam dang/ skyes pa'i rus pa'i phyi ma dag gis
rjel tshon ljang ku ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so// dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus su mtha'
yas mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyud pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ spyan nyishu rtsa bzhis che ba/ 'jigs pa 'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o// de nas slob dpon gyi nang gi ma

rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnasasu sngags bzla ste/ o glu ru b+hu ru/ glu Tu gru Tu/ ma sa ma sa/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+hoT ya g+ho Ta ya/ anan+ta k+Sha b+haka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye redate ru ru kaMsapa pA/
tA la ga tAnan gAnA karmya ya bar ya/ gardza ya tadz+dza ya/ phu phuphuphuphupu phuphuhU~MhU~MhU~M phaTAs hA/ gal te charami 'baban de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog la bzla ste char 'bab bo// gal te mi
'bab na de'i tshomago a ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so// char dbab pa zhes bya ba'i tshog 'o// sngon drel pa bshad de/ dur khrod kyi res la cha bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral de/ o[']A

ya shAshA na pra yA ya hU~M hU~MhU~M phaT swA hA/ sngon dral ba'i cho ga'o// pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha TaM ka'i sgrub pa bshad de/ kha TaM ka dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang/ ku T+Ta rats+tsaM dang lhan/
cig btags la ril bu bya ste/ sngags na deu0f00 badzra ka ra habadzAya hU~MhU~MhU~M phaT/ dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ de bsgrubs la ril ba spyi blugs kyi/
mgrin par baso zhing bskor nas bcagan ragra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro// rdo rjegri gug gi choga'o// lha rnams dgos par 'dod pas thig le bsgrubs te/ tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal
la bsgrubs nas/ rtuwA ra tsin+tadang bsres la nyim gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btag cing btagasanas dgra sta byas te/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzlas te/ o badzra kuwAr pA
Da ya po Da ya hU~MhUM hUM phaT swAhA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gasaso// lha dgas pa'i tshog 'o// tsha bas gdung bar bya bar 'dod pas/ ang+ka'i lemal du dang/

ste tshe dang/ tsitAka'i khu bas dgra bo'i ming bri zhing 'bras phub kyi ma la gdungs te sngags khrowazlas so// oM habadzra dzA ra dzA ra ga tuM d+haM hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ tsha pa'i cho ga'o// khri bzlas pas 'grub bo//

chang skyag par bya bar 'dod pas bslab bya'i ltelar yaM gi rnam pa sgom zhing/ maM ga rnam par gyur pa las chung lte bar bsgoms paskyag par byed par bltas na chang skyug go/ rab tu myos mdabang du bya
bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i brgyudo'amya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgosanas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing/ kakAm tseka'i khu bas thog lo byas nas sngags bzlas te/ oM a

mu kaM mgi ba swa b+ha ba tusAhA/ khro yis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyim dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byas nas rdo rje'i tshul gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/
thubya/ o badz+dzaacha mAtsalamAtsal tit+tatil he badzra ya hU~MhU~MhU~M phaT swahA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyim dang zla ba yang dag par gnas shange nyin mtshan bye brag med par 'gyur ro//

zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pazhes bya ba'i choga'o// on grwan grwa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus su don sgrub pa'i phyir gzhon numa'i mag dag la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas/
ma tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa las yang dag par mchod cing gnagasan dbab bo// bcupazhi pa 'am brgyad pa'i snga ba'i dus su bum pa la sogs pa gzhag cing 'brumar dang sa la sku'i khu ba la
pa sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsag go/ de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i sa laka'i khu bas sngags pa'i mthe bong rgan po la bskus nas/ 'bru mar gyis kyang blugs la/
[%, ]gzhon nu ma la bstan te/ nga'i rdzas sus khyer smos/ de la des smas pa/ cha ge mo zhes bya bas khyeraro// rdo rje skar ma'o// be DAyA de NA yA zhes brjod naklungapo cho 'bros par 'agyur ro/ lan
mAzla zhes brjongan stag 'bros par 'gyur ro//til+likAtil+li yA zhes brjod na bas 'bros par 'gyur ro// a la ma la phulaH zhes brjod na sprul 'bros par 'gyur ro// nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis
a lagapa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro/ rdo rje marang/ dkar mo dang/ chum dang/ rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma dang/ bdagamangom ngang/ sa sbyong ma dang/ mkha' spyong ma'i rnal 'byor
lasarengs par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis khyed do// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dang por byams pa bsgom
par bya// gnyis par snying rje rnamakhasgom zhing// gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang// kun gyi mthar na btang snyoms so// yang na stong pa'i byang chub ste// gnyis pa la ris bon bsdu//
gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs// bzhepa la ni yig 'bru dgod// rengs nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas// tider hU~M byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste// jorje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang/ gur bcing
g.yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid// dang por 'ono rnam sgom pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de stes rnal 'byor gnas nas// de ru gnyid rnam par bsgom// rang gi snying khar re la
bsgom// de las byung ba'i nyidakyil 'khor// der nihUM gi rnam pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can// hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje ni// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus
gnas par// yang nihUM ga de nyid bsgom// [%]gi rnam par gyur bltas nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ dorje skyo banag po che// 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/ yang na sde dang
rima'i mdog/ dad pas nges par rnam bar bsgom// nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni// rdo rjesmyu ba snying rje che// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod//
@#// dkar mo ringegasamtshan ma 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod// ro langs ma ni tshulagam// gas+sa rAni sman 'dzin cing// puk+kasA ni rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhim
ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gdol pa mo niceng te'u rdung// 'di rnams kyis migatso bo mchod// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid// A la zla bkA li
ni// sa bonanang du son gyur pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes bya brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi// rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro
bsdus nas snying kar bkug pa// yo gi ni sngar bdag nyid 'gyur// spro dang ma mtshungs pa'i mdog/ khan du dmar po'i sbyin dang ldan// sgra ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam
yapar brgyan// 'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang/ lag gdub dang na so rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa// 'di rnams phyag rgyararab tu grags// sdang mig brgyad gnyis 'o ya tshul//
g.yonan rdo rje thod pa dang// g.yon pa nas kyang kha TaM ga/ g.yasan rdo rje nag po nyid// hU~M gi yi ge 'don pa'ibadag/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas// dur khrod du na mgonapo rol//
a dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis// dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod// phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgya'akha rnam par dag pa ste/ gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang/ sku mdog dang/

hU~M las byung ba'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang pon smyos pa'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje/ da ga lhag ma[=]ga gi shes rab la 'khyud pa/ shes/
rab rdo rje phag mo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no// phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyamo lta bu/ dang po sngon po'o// gcer bu gong du brjod
pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams n pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na
dril du/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms par 'jug pa// bcom ldan 'das ji lta bde ltar shes rab sto/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa
na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o// lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/// de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rang gi
sI bar sa bon bsam mo// sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/ des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la/
ma mo brgyud kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// oM a b+hi b+hAny+tsan+tu mI sarba thA ga tazhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi las gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar byago/ dbang bskur ba na me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gur kum
gyi char 'bab par 'gyura'o// gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ rdo rje'i rgyu sman la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi gis skya/
bdag por 'gyur ro// 'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do// rdzun gsum du byin gyisabarlabs pa'i sgom pa rnam pa rab ms nas langs te lha'i gzugs su gzhag go/ dbong gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o/
de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba bo// sgra med thos pa po yang med// dri med snom pa po yang med// romed myong ba po
yang med// reg med reg pa po yang med// sems mang sems las byung ba'ang med// skyod byed ma dang sring mo nyid// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tumachod// gar ma tshos ma rdo rjom/
gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// denyid rigs pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar// rab tu'abad pas bstan pa nyid// ma gsang sprul
la dang chom rkun dang// sa skyong ma yis sdug bsngal myor// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba// thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya// rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid// des na phyag rgyur brjod par bya//
rdo rjepar de bzhin las// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen nyid// snying rje chen po dam pa yi// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod// rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyide// de bzhin perA'i gam nyid//
las natshosaMmar rab tu bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo// rin chen gdol marashes par bya// phyag rgya lngar na rnam par nges// 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/
mdor bsdus pas ni'irjod par bya/ dpal ldan de bzhin nyidi gshegs shing/ de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa las// de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par
byu/ ragisan rnam pa drug brjod cing// mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang// phung po
lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni// rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sgom pa po med sgom pa'i ng med// lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang
bzhin las// sngags dang lcan yang dag gnas// rnam snang mkhaskyod don yod dang// rin chen dpag med sems dba'ago/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang// thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid
brjod// tshangs ba sgrib bral sangs rgyas ting// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya// rtag tudage bas zhib da// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de//
[F ]@#// bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung banyid// lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sangs rgyas 'di la b+hag mnga'// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod
par bya// b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud// bcom phyir bcom ldan 'adas zhes bya// gang phyir skye 'gro skyod pa gi/
shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya// gang phyi'i skal ba ston pa yi// shes rab srang mo zhes bya nyid// btso blag ma dang bu mo dang// gar mkhan ma yang brjod par bya// sems can thams cad
'tshed pa'i phyir// btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod// yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni// bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya// snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir// shes rab gur mar brjod par bya//
gang phyirabcom ldan m reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya// A lake la rab brtags pas// brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad// rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid// nyid phyir
dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// lag pa khasgyur ba phyag rgya yin// sor mo nyid pa'i ng de bzhinen// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni// gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no// ji ltar pha las
ka bde thob pa// del bde ba rang gis bza'// bde ba gang gis 'ching 'di// de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod// de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
rab bshad bya// spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog de// khong gis dngos grub mthar 'grog/ kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub brgyus// sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa// rna ba dag larnachab zang/ lo
'khor rnam pa 'dzin// lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid// med pa la yang ska rags de// rkang par de bzhinakangag dub bo// lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin par rus pa'i 'phreng
ba ste// khago ba stag gi pags pa nyid// bza' ba ma 'chi bcuphyed re// har ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa// rigs ni gcig tu/
rnam par brtag/ kha dog dum nyidakyisani// gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya// shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang// yang nadaben pa'i m bas mtha' ru// sgom
pa bzang bor brjod bar bya// cung zad drodan thob pa// gal taspyod pa byed 'dod pas// gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yodan// 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyir// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs
ma rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje 'bumo 'di khyer nas// spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na// rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung
kha byang chub sa bonagadong pa dang// sbyang ba yisan gzung bar bya// gal te dga' bas klu blar ste// de tshe rdo rje mchog ldano/ gal te dga' ba skyes lan// thar pa'i rgyur nager bya ste// de tshe
rdo rje rkang pas gar// yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mkhaskyod pa// cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi 'phrang pa chen/
mdag/ lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la na don yod gnas// kha TaM ga gzugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'unyid// zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa//
glu na rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar nabasgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi phyir na klu dang gar/ yo gis rtag tu rtag tu byas// smananaM rnam par bza' ba ste// chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid// rga shos
zil gyis mi non cing// rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin// rkun ma'i sgra las cod pan byas// de la hU~M byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rna5par 'dzin/
thod pa sor lnga pa yo tshang// byas pas rtsod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// sku yi ska rags nyes bsor nyid// thal ba sku yi mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa
gi spyod pas 'dzin/ cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste// kha TaM ga sgom shes rab nyid// rdo rje thod pa'i stod pa yis// 'di dug bzlas dang sgom pa yin// brkam dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro//
ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang// bdag nyid kyis naganyid spangs nas/ the tsom med par spyod pa bya// lus kyis sbyin pa phyin nas ni// phyi nas spyod pa yang dgaspyad// skul dang skal min rnam
slad pas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'// yang 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir// zhen pa tsam du mi bya 'o// bza' dang bza' min
spyod pa dang// de bzhin btung dang btung mnanyid// bgrod dang bgrong mnasngags pa yis// rnam rtog zhing ngu ma bya'o// dngos grub red pa'i slob ma gang// yang dag ye shes snang ba po//

tshanar mang sang ba'i rgya ya phyir// grub pas bla ma mngon phyag btsal/ bslab ngang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yo gas rnam dpa da
snying rje che// sbyin sreg mchog spyanangaka' thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed// nges par sdomadu lha
min gang// brgya byin lta bu yin na yang// de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng ge 'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tusnying rjes btung bar bya// rnal
byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med// spyod pa'i le'u so drug pa'o//lnga de nas rtsoma'i le'u bshang pa ra bya'o// gang gis sngan dngasring
mor yang// the tshom mar par shes par bya// gang zhig sor mo gcig ston dang/ gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin// g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa la sa// bstan gyi phyag rgyar rnam
/ga pa ra shes// gang zhig srin lag ster ba la// de ya mthe'u chung rnam par sprin// gang zhig gung mo ston pa la// de yi mdzub mo rnam par sbyin// gang zhig srin lagaston pa/
sbrul de yi mgrin pa rab bstan// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yi rtsa gsum rab tubastan// gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de ya mtshams ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig so ni ston pa la//

de yi kha ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la// gtsug ngu da dgrol bar brjod pa ra bya// gang zhig dadra la la ston nga la// de yi rgyab na rab tu bstan// gang zhig rkang mtha'i ston pa la//
rje yos rnam par rtsa bar bya// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// dam tshig gis ri rnam par dbye// de la rnal 'byor mas smras pa// e ma bu ni sIng rje che// gal te 'phreng ba lag ston na/ 'du
par bya zhes smra ba yin// 'dre ngab mngon par gtad byas na// ngar tshig la gnas brtul zhugs bzang// de laphye ro'o zhes 'du ba// bzang po'aspyod yul gnas pa// de la 'du bar
rnal 'byor mas// gang smras de ltar thams cad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang pa'i gnas dang ni//
a/ zhing dang nya pa'i zhing nyid dang// tsan+dor paN+Di/ rjod ng// de bzhin 'du ba 'du pa// 'thung gcod re ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// dur khrod che ba'i dur khrod nyid// 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis
[j]te sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya// skye bcom ldan 'das gnas 'al sogs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas ni/
dzA lan d+marar bshad/u0f7c/ de bzhin du ni su nyed// gnas ni ke lnga gi 'od// de bzhin du na kaM ra nyid// kye gnas mA 'badawa zhes brjod// sin d+hu na ga ra nyid do/ zhing ni mum nor pa gang
de zhing na byed pa'i grangs nyid do// de wi ko Ta de bzhin zhing// zhing ni lhags pa'i grangs nyid de// zhing ku lu ta zhes brjod// de bzhin achu pa de dang// pA yi mchog sprin lA pa'i
ri la pa'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ tsa rdzo par kI la dang// lan tsha rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang// lam pa kA dang kAlci'od// de bzhin so rang de// nye pan+d+rit+taM n+doka ling ka/ gas
dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni// kong ka lcayang tsanor// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// 'thung gtong grong khyer gyi dang yang// 'thung gcong grong gi ma Thar gnas pa// su ra ra dang ko sa
rab n cha gzhon nu'igrong khyer ro// ngo rje snying po snying rje che/ 'tsho ba'i 'thung gcod de la ba'o// dur khrod rab son dge 'dun dang// dur khrod rgyu mtsho'i 'gram nga do// skyed tshal ra pa'i/
rdzong bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnal 'byoram rgyud kye rdo rje// rnal 'byor ma yi 'tshigs 'du ba// nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya//
kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang// de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid// rgyal mtshan/
ngang nametshon bsnyen nyid// lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis// gsad nga ra bya bar brjod pa 'di// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyi'i snyang rje bskyed ra
nyid// thams cad gdug pa gzhug pa cu// choga'i gtso ngos dgag pa bya// de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid// 'an mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya/ @/mi bya
cung zad yod ma yin// rtag tu mi bza' yodam yin// 'di la ma u0f7absam yod ma yin// bzang ngan mi sna gangayang med// ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// de bzhin bdag ltade nga
k+kA mchog nyid// 'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ bza' ngang datung ba la sogs sbyar// yan lag tsho snying bsgyur ba dang// tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid// he ru ka dpal gnas
bzhugs pas// de snyed sngagrwa dang phyag rgya yin// shAneganyis med ye shes te// na rgyusogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// kani gang du'ang ma gnas pa'o// rdo rje thod pa'i
sbyor ba yis// skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi// sha ni mkhas pa sa bza' bar bya/ sems can de de'i dbang du 'gyur// brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
[4 ]nge nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// nam mkha'i khams su byu lag bsam/ dbus su rnam par sgom pa ni// 'khor 'oston du ci rigs par// lha rnams ji ltar
'byung ba nyid// 'khor les dang chun sngon// ji ltar rigs nga ra byen za dang// lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang// ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'ang// chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo 'di//
'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze'u 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te// gru gsum gyi no po mer brjod// de dbus shi ba bco lnga yi// gangan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam [”]/de pi steng du zla
ba yin// zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid// phu nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po// Al zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// kA la'i gzugs kyis snang byed do//
lta ba ma 'dus pa las/ dkar mo la sogs rab t+tagrags// zla ba me long ye shes ldan// bdun gyi bdun pa ra 2 mnying ldan/ rang lha'i sa bon du sa mtshar ro// so sor tsheg pa la
brjod par bya// thams cad gcig gyur nan tan ched// rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste// mkhas pas rog gsungs pa yis// rnam pa lnga po sgom pa pa// A li kA 'dra mnyam
sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yaM ge las byung gong bu la// yuMphaT rnam pa'i ng 'drong mi bya// sems dpa'i gaphrugs bar n las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor bdag po
rnam nga cha sgom// phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid/
zla bzhi ma'i rab dbye bas// A li shes rab kA la thabs// 'di las dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// re zhig nang gi 'phar ma 'a// rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa//
phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkar/ chu bdag chuyo rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rjemakha' 'grom// dbus su bdag madra//
rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol gyi ni 'phar mu la// dkaramo chom rkun polangasam// g+hasmA rAdang puk+kasI// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyud pa Tom ne ru brjod// 'og ldan ma dang stong ldan 'di//
mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snying rjechen po 'di dag gnas// lhamo thams cad kha dog gnag ngagi tshon phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// zhal gcig
na nadamar bdang// las par gri gug thod pa sa khyab// 'khor lo rna chamagul rgyun dang// lag par lag gdub ska ragasan// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag
ba'o// jiltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// lag pa gcig nithod pas brel// g.yas pan ni gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pas kha TaM ga nyid do// stag
gi pags pas rnam dkris shing// ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar// phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyas sor// nga rgyal la sogs skyon drag rnams// gco phyir gri gug rnam par gnas///

dngos dang dngos mang rnam rtog gi/ mgo bo pad+ma'i snod du ni// bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/ dngos grub phyiran btung par bya// stong pa'i rnam pas kha tshwa la/ thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag/
'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// dngos grub myur du thob pa ra 'gyur// dang por nag po rab tu bsgom// gnyis pa radamar po rnam dang ra bsgom// gsum pa la nisi rapo bsgom// bzhi[–]
pa ra ljang khu de bzhinano/lnga pa ra kha dog sngon po dang// drug par dkarapo'i lus can te// yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas// dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no// bskyod pa'i rim
pa nyid dang ni// rdzogs pa yi ya nga rim nga de// rim gnyis mnyam nga ra gnas pas ni// rdo tshu sun gyis chos 'chad de// bskyod pa yi ni rtsa bshad do// nam mkha'i khams ni par la// byA
zhes bya e thes brjod// tshe ma pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid// de yi bde pa 'kher ler brjed// sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid// rig pa ji bzhin rang rig nying// lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems//
ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin// skyes bu thabs su brjod pa nyid// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las// phyi nas de yi rnam pa//
gnyis// re zhig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis// de yi khu pa'i ng bde ba nyid// skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang// de yi khu ba bde ba nyid// de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid//
bzhi la rab tu dbye ba yis// skye med ram pa'i phyogs las ni// 'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi// dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ri// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin tu bang ngaga'/
thams cad nges// de bde'i thabs 'das thams cad mig/ dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad de// marog khu dga' ba de bas lhag/ dga' bral dga' bas chags bral yin lhag ma lhan cigaskyes
dga' de// ngang po rig par 'dod pa dang// gnyis pa bde par 'dod pa dang// gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid// nges na bzhi pa bsgom par bya// mchog tu ngaga' bgro gang ra brjod//
dga' bral las na mya ngan 'das// dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de// 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs// 'dod chags med nyare chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'di
la thabs dang shes rab med// yang dag de nyid snang ba 'o// gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes// gang du yang ni ko red de// bla ma'i dus thabs bstan pa dang// bdag gi bsod nams
las shes bya// dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang// gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang// ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'di kun manyam pa nyid du blta// dam pa rnams ni lnga
ba'i den// mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya// dbu ma gnyis kyis sngangs pa nyid// gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/ gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo// 'di kun zhes bya nga nyid de//
ma'am kaM d mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid// ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa// mnyamazhes khyakha mtshungs par brjod// de yi 'khor 'di lozhes brjod// sgom pa ro gcig ma'am pa de// 'dis ni ngon
gyis brjod par bya// nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung// ngalas gnas gsum re yang 'byung// nga yis 'de kun khyab pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong// de ltar rnal 'byor nga sa
shes na// shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms pa// bsod nams chung ba'i ma yis kyang// de ni 'grub par the tshom med// bza' dang btung dang byugs pa dang// nyal dang 'og dang sems pa na//
phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de nas mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang phyir yadekyis ma sgom par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad chos ni yongs shes na// sgom pa nyid ni
sgom pa man// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang// rtswa lcug 'khri 'di la sogs pa// bdag gi dngos po'ired bzhin las// dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya// de rnams dam pa gcig yong min//
rang rig bde ba chen po nyid// rang rigs na byang chub 'gyur// rang reg phyiran sgom pa nyid// rang gis rig par 'gyur ba las// mnan pa las na las skyes te// rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis ]
byed// rang rig rgyal po rang ga bo/ 9'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang// de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid// de kun de gnas nyams dga' bar// bcu drug char yang mi
bod do// chos 'byung las skyes leshes ni// mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes// khu ba'i rnam pa bcom
ldan yin// de yi bde pa 'dod mar brjod// gcig dang dur phral ba ste// skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di// ngag gi lam 'das sdod yul te// 'di ni

byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir//kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu/sa dang chu dang rlung dang nam dang nam ma la 'a nyid dag ni// rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis// kun gyisaskad cig mi gnod de// mtho ris mi yul rkang 'ogagi/ skang
rig las ni gzugs gcig 'gyur// rang gzhan Naya rnam rtog gis// gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min// thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang// de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas// srid pa dag
pa'i dngos grub min// yang nasrong mthar skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de med pas kyang dngos grub med/ gang gis ma shes kye'i rdo rje// de ni nga la ba don med 'gyur// chu bo'i
rgyun ni rab 'bab dang// mar me'i rtse mor pa bcings ltar// rtag tu de 'de rnal 'byor kyis// ne dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag/ rnal 'byor ma'i 'a khoral zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
