de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis// lha rnams kyig/

ni brjod par bya// phung po lnga dang dbang po drug/ sumachodadrug dang 'byung chen lnga// rang bzhin gyis nem par dag/ nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrabe byang bya// rang rig bdag 'di ngag pa nyung// ngag pa
gzhan gyis rnam grol mine// yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba// dngos po
de kun ngag pa ste// 'di ltar 'gro bsangs rgyas 'gyur// kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs 'a sogs pa'o// ci'i
slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'a phyeparo// ngo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa 'ang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// sgra na rna bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ lce yis ro ni rige ra ra bya// dngos po lus kyis reg par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni//
dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bstan pa nyid// gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod// 'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma// 'du byed rdo rje mkha'
'grol// rnam shes phung po'itshulagyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// denanang gi 'phar
ma la'o// de nas phyi ya'i par ma bshad// dbang ldan dun puk+tasI// mar ni de bzhin ri khrod ma// bden bral gdol pa mo gzhag chung// rlung du g.yung mo rnam par gazhag/ phyi ma lha mo dkar
mo sogs// dbang dkaragashin rjerachom rkun m/ chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma// lus ngan po ni g+hasmAmI// 'og tus spyod ma zhes brjod// steng du mkha'aspyodam zhes bshad// bcud
ayaM pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs// srid dang zhiba'i rang bzhin gyis// lhamo 'di gnyis rnam pa gnas// gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad// sa la chom rkun ma rab grags// dri yo chalaro
ts+tshe langs ma// rol gas rwareb grags// reg las spyodam zhes bshad// chos kyi debyangs la mkha' spyod ma// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// phyug
ba gi dag pa stongapanyid// bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid// rnam thar brgyad kyis zhalanamasanyid// jordzogasum gyis dag pa'i spyan// sanapuk+ka sA zhes bshad// chu khams rngon pa ma zhes
brjod// me ni gtum mor shes par bya// rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags// zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rjem// 'dod chags chuyaM rnal 'byor ma// phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ser sna gsang ba'i
dkar mo nyid// gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad// zhe sdang lasogs rnam sbyong ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya// gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching/
'gyur ba// dedang des ni 'ching ba las grol te// de nyid mdeshes 'jig rten ma grol zhing// de nyid rnam spas dngos grub red mi 'gyur// de phyir dri mid sgra med gzugs nyid med// ro dang
sems kyi rnam par dag pa med// reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes// rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de
nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi// rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// tshog 'ang rab tu bshad par bya// dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin
sbyang// 'bad pas las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo mang gnas dang// byang chub sems dpa'o khyim dang ni// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang// dkyil
'khopadam pa rab tubazhings// rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni// yang na 'brong po nyid kyis te// rane chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pas so// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum/
dang/ mthe bong gsum na lhag par bya// deranaroges lnga las byung ba'i// rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug/ yang na ji ltar gang red de// de ltar bcu drug 'don pa nyid// ji srod khu ba ldan/
0 @#// gyur pa// de srid phyag rgya bstan par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang// thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no// bstan pa de las gang byung ba// slob ma'i kharan btung/
skrub bya// ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid// de nyid la yang bya bar bya// rang rig yeshes nyid du 'gyur// rang gzhan yang dag rig pa smras// mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos
dang dngos med bdag 'di mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres/ de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid ya go dam pa nyid// de nyid
la 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// de nyid thams cad khyab pa po// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med de las byung// gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams dang// rnam par shes pa
[$ ]kun gyi tshul// skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang// bdag dang gso ba sems can dang// dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang
dag gnas// dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de// gnyis pa'i grangs la mchog dga' nyid// gsum pa la sa ni dega' bral bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par ba rjod// de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams dang ni// rdo rje snying po la sogs kun// mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar gyur// dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i
gzugs// de bzhina mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid// dga' khral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid// gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med// bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rirje// sangs rgyas kun gyi
sku gcig pa// rdordzasnying pos rtogasatsa'i phyir// thetshon legs par sel ba ni// 'dod chags med cing chags bral mod// dbu maradamigs par ma 'gyur ro// gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi
phyir// lhan cig skyes pabyang chub barjod// yang na de nyid thams cad bdakA/yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs// de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon// dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs// dang
po sprin dang 'dra ba yin// grub pa sbyam lta bur 'gyur// gnyid log sad par mi byed par// nyal dang lag pa'i khyad par las// rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur// dngos grub mtshan nyid mi
phyed pa'i// phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs// gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid// sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po sto// do shal dengob la phung pas/
brgyan// 'phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// ro rje srad bu mnyam par ldan// ma tog snatshogs nye bar brgyan// bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri// bum pa brgyad
la sogs pas ldan// dayang yal ka la sogs ldan// mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang// rine chon lnga ni yongs su gzhug/ rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs
kyis ni// gsar pa legs par bakal ba dang// shin tutshad ma mdzes pa yi// srad bus shes rab can gyis gdab// 'khor le'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum//
dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri// gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis// mkhas pas naor 'dzin rnam par spang// gong ga a sogs sngags kyis ni// de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin// ji ltar
bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir// sung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// gang zhig dbang ni reb phya ba// rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin// mchod dang gsol bgadab pa nyid// ji ltar bshad pa de
bzhin 'dir/ 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas// myur du dkar mo la sogs bri// shar du gra gug rnam par shrI// lho dang nub tu'ang de bzhin no// byang dang ma ya ma tsams dang ni// bden

bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no// dbang ldan du na gsungs pa// de lta de ltar 'og dang steng// rdo rje sems dpa'i snyoms byas nas// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// phyag gnyis kyi ya rdo rjer sbyor/
slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// khrus dang gtsang sa drizhim lus// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// UhUM snyoms pa byas nas ni/ pihi rnam par 'jig byed bdag/ phyi nas de nyudi
yang dag bshad// rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyab par cung zad yodamayin// mchog dgar sgom pa med cingesgom pa po'ang med// lus kyang med

nyingagazung bamed dang 'dzin pa'i ng med// sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshang dang gciba'ang med// skyagakhro rmongs medagatsang smra mchod phyir thogs med dang// chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med thug
dog med// ser sna med dadang rgyal med cing mthong bya med// sgom dang sgom pa po med bshes dang dgra med cing// rlom sems med pa'i lhan g skyes pa sna tshogs nyid// rdo rje snying pos 'di skad
gsol// gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi// lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa na// cisad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs// rom
sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag/ thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa 'a pa//
bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis// sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur/ byang sems khu ba rnam pa las// chu yi khams na 'byung bar 'gyur// bskyod pa las ni drod sa ste// 'gro ba
rlung du rab tu grags// bde ba nam mkha' nyid kyi khams// lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor// gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba// de phyir bde ba de nyid mni// lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa//

lhan cig skyes par re brjod bya// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod// rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig/ phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las// yo ga snying rje thabs su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dbye
med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med dang smin srog med// dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni mid// den snga//
bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg/ de ni dekyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khoranyid// mdor bsdus nas nisoms na 'dus pa'i gzugs can no// dbar ga le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//
mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba cam/ rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod// dbangag lta stangs g.yon na gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs porAnaganyis// g.yas pa'i chal dgug pa//
nyid// steng nas kyang na gzugs brnyan gnyis// dbu ma rangs pa'i lta stangs nyid// snayaM rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis// 'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed// rdub pa yis ni dbang du byed// gang ba yis
ni dgug pa nyid// na ba yis ni rengs par byed// rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid/ dbang ni me tog rab tu grags// rdo rje'i shange la dgug pa nyid// g.yo bcas rtswa 'al redas khyed nyid// zla drug
goms pa'i sbyorab yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'di'i 'khrul ra ra ma bya ste// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni// mkhas ra sa sems can
gzhug par bya// gsad par 'di la bya ma yin// dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur// sems can bslu ba spangs nas ni// bya ba ma yin thams cad bya// sems can gnod pa tsam gyis mi/

phyagargya'i dngos grubarang mi 'gyur// de la dam tshig bza' bya ba// na dang ga bdang po dang// mtha' yishA dang ngang po'i sha// kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bathal//
skye yi rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid// skye ba bdun pa'i ng de nas mtshon// dga' bral dga' ba la spyod pa// lan bdun pas ni 'grub pa ra 'gyur// skang na mig dang ldan pa dang// drilus gathi
brjid chen po dang// de yi grob ma bdun du 'gyur// mthong nas rnal 'byorapa yos mtshon// de ni thos pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// ku ru kule' sgrub thabs bshad pa ra
bya ste// gong du rtag pa bcugs par/ rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu// g+hilas byung ba'i lha mo na// kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma// mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa mo// ut+pal dang lcag
kyu 'dzin// 'dzin bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed// 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid// bye bas phyugs dang gnod
sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid// brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje sIng re/
mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so///rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//
rab gnas mtshan nyide bzang po nyid// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsung sbyin sreg byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor
dam pa bzhengs pa dang// snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang// sta gon la sogs byas nas ni// nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// sku gzugs snying khar rab tu gzhug/ nga 'dod lha
mnyam rnal 'byor pa// rab mthong sngags kyi lo rol son// o badzrapu A dzAs hA/ oM badzra d+hu pe AhU~MswA hA/ oM badzra dIb A/ hU~MswAhA/ oM badzragan+d+he AyAmAhA/ oM badzran wi d+ya AhUM
satA/ sna tshogs hU~Mn rdzogs pa dang// ma tog la sogs dbul ba nyid// gong ma'i rgyud kyi chog rim pas// mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po nyid// rgyas pa

nyid kyi gru bzhi pa// gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod// 'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub// khru gang dang ni'u phyed nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin// khru do dngan khru gang nyid// rgyas pa'i stong dang
'og tu brjod// sor mo nyishu'am de yi phyed// gsad pa'i stong dang 'og tu yang// zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur// rgyas par ser po de bzhin no// gsad pa la ni kha dogo gnag/ dbang la
dmarapor rab tu grags// dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/ gsada' ji ltar zhe sdang sogs// zhi la til dang rgyus la zho// gsad la tsher ma de bzhin no// sdang la sogs pa'i ng tsher mar
brjod// dbang dang dgug la mu la// o ag+ha ye mahA te dzasarba kArma pra sA d+hu ka/ ka ru Nikr-i tas tAh+pha sa smon sanIha tob+ha bAme dgug pa'o/ ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin// kye ya ro rje

khros mchong pa 'i// lha mo khyod ni dpang du 'gyur// che ge bdag na dekyil 'khor 'di/ sAt+thartsub pa rArbcusA d+hihU~Mg/ ha bya b+hu ka/ A ga ma byangs ya thA kA le sarba sid+d+hi ku ru bam/ ma dga' ba'i
sngags so// oM dzatsAbi ho khaM raM/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// oM ni ri tihU~MlaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so// oM hUM d+haM/ lha bshes kyi sngags so// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa
las brtag pa gnyis po rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o/// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la// rgya mtshor bkur ba ji lta bar// rang 'dod lha
yogazugs lasan// sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag mang rnal 'byor ldan pa 'am// yang na de ru ka dpal brtsom/ gzhan pa'i
sems kyis skad cig kyang// dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so// dang po goms par byed dus kyi// gnas ni gang du bsngags pa'i sams// gcig tumanyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur pa'i//
gnas ni bzang por nges par brtag/ rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su// bdag nyid 'grub pa'isims kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma sgom shes rab can// yang na he ru ka dpal gzugs// rkang pa 'khrud/
dang za ba dang// 'thor 'thung so rtsi za ba dang// tsan dan gyis ni lag nyed dang// smad g.yogs kyis ni ched 'gebs dang// 'byung dang sgyu dang 'gro ba dang// 'dug dang khro dang
rgod pa dang// bcom ldan 'das ma bstan pa dang// shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis// rnal 'byor ma na rnam par sgom// gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig kyang// 'dug pa'i sims nam rags
bas// dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub phyir// mkhas pas 'bad pas mi gnas so// bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jigs byed pa// rdorjesnying po nga yis bshad// brtse bas dngos grub don du yang/
zla ba phyed du yongs su rtogs// bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas// lha yigazugs su sems pa yis// nyim gtsug tu ma chud par// sgom pas yongs su brtag par bgyis// rang gzhan
don ni rab sgrub phyir// 'khor ba thabs gazhan yod ma yin// rigam lhan cig goms byas pas// 'phral du mngon du byed pa nyid// 'jages smyo de bzhin sdug bsngal dang// mya ngan gdung ba
'tshob dang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtamug che// sgrub pa po ni nyon mi mongs// phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar// de ltar nges par shes nas ni// ji ltar de ni skad cig kyang// rnal 'byor
ba rnams ngu 'bod gnas// mtshams med ldan byed po dang// srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang// gzhan yang skyel dmanagang dang// rmongs dang ma rungs las khyed dang// gzugs ngan yan
lab/mtshangakhas// pasams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dge ba bcu la goms pa dang// bum la gus dbang po dul// nga rgyal khro las rnam par grol// des na'i zhig nges 'grub 'gyur//
ga tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob// zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyad// ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par// gnang ba red 'gyur sngags pa la// rnal 'byor ma
yis bstanapar bya// phyag rgya che ge mo kher 'a// sems can don gyis rdo rje'adzin// rAd pa de yang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// so rgyag purayang dag ldan/ byad
chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang// ngag ba bstsalas brtsams nusan// de la chos n rab tu dbye// lha ya gzugs kyi sems dang ni// dam tshig sems kyang gtsage pa nyid// zla ba gcig gis skal
ldan par// 'gyur ba 'dil the tshom med// mchog thob payi khung mang gang// rtog pa thams cad yang dag sbyangs// yang na bdagagi nus pa yis// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang// gnod sbyin
ma 'am ci las kyang// phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag/ de yang khyer la sbyod pa spyad// bdag gi dal ba mngon du'i phyir// gang bshad 'jigs pa 'i gzugs can gyi// spyod pa longs spyod yin
ma gsungs// yang na brtan nam g.yo 'amanyi// rang gi sems naso sor bag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod// phyag
rgya phyagargyanyidadag gis// phyag rgya'i ngos grub ji ltar 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// budamed gzugasanasrangs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi
gzugs su phya/ nu ma spangs pa bo lar 'gyur// kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas// 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur// ze'u 'bru bo la can du 'gyur/ lhagam bdag nyid chen po de//
dag ' chen ta ra ka yi gzugs// haruka sbyor skyes bu nyid// 'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// chags dang
'jig pa dag gis kyang// thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur// gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid// 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed// des na ba 'jige yod ma yin// de nyid lan
chags pa med// la la 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur// 'jige pa'i dngos med zad pa med// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa sgom// spros pa rmi
lam ltar byas nas// spros pa nyid nasmros med byed// ji ltar sbyam lem dang// ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin pa// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor nyid ni de bzhin 'dod//
phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur bar// jiltar shes pa'i bde chon [”]po// 'di ni de yi byin rlabs An// gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// bde ba gnag cing de bser/
ba de ba dmar po dang sa gnas dang bcas pa bde ba dkar bde ba ljang khu pade bso// bde ba rgyu dang mi rgya sa na/ bde ba shes rang bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// bde ba dngos po
dngos med bde// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar ba rjod// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// rdzogasapa' rom pa re rnal 'byor 'di// de yi bde ba bde chen brjod// rdzogs pa sgom pa med pa ste/
bskyed pa yasenatsazhig 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma 'o byang chub sems dpa' che// dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyon// lus kyi dengos med gung las bde//
bde ba sla ba ma nus so// khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid// ji ltar me tog la cha gnas dre// me tog dngos med shes ma 'gyur// de bzhin gzugasasogs daso
med pas// bde ba nyid kyang dngos med 'gyur// dngos po dngos po med pang// dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga// gang zhig 'khe las bstan pa dang// rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes//
rdo rjebatsun mo 'ab+ho la ni// e yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs// sangs rgyas rane chen za ma tog/ khang pa can du zug tu bzhugs// 'chad pa po nga tshos kyang nga// rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa
'jig rten ston pa bsgrub bya nga// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pang// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga// mchog mtha' dag kha bral dang por ni// mun pa la mar me ltar// de bzhin dus
@#// kyang yid ches kyis// btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde chen du// ston pa sum nyurtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas// de med
bsan bde med 'gyur// bdepa med na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min// de nyid dngos med tshul yang
zhi// zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid// mchog tubade ba gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// rang bzhine lhan cig skyes par brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems
kyisani// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa de// lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis na// bzhin lag la dog gnas pan// skyes ba tsam gyis rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bag chags pa 'a pas so/
'tsho dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des//dug gis dug 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la// mon sran sdo'u yaM bza'
ba sbyin// bzlog pa'i smanan brtags pa yis// rlung gis rlung la snyan par byed// rnam rtog lasan rnam rtog dang// srid pa nyid kyis srang pa dag/ ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa// chu
gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed// de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang// rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshod pas tshig pa yang// ma yis kyang ni gdud bar bya// de bzhi
'dod chags mes 'tshig pa// 'dod chagasam yas gdung bar bya// skye ba mi bzad pa ya las/ gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyi// srid pa'i 'ching
ba las grol 'gyur// chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur pa// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis ma shes/
'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las// kun tu ral lta ru 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las// dbye las lA pu'agro bar 'gyur// kho 'a kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags
nyid// srab gati mug chos kyi phyir// gtimug rnam par snang mdzad brjod// gang phyir byang sems gshir pa nyid// gsher ba chu yi khams su brjod// chun mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir//
nasnang 'dren pa mi 'god pa// gnyis kyis 'god pa'i sor ba las// drod ni rtag tusu bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// kak+ko
lar na gang zhig sems// de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can/ phrag dog don yod gru ya yin/ ngon yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid// bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur// dga' ba nam mkhamtshan
nyid do// nam mkha'aser sna jo rdzor 'gyur// ser sna nam mkha' las byung nyapi// sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mtshon// rigs na lnga po de nyid las//
'aglu/ stong phrag du mnyes pa nyid// de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog tu rtag pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi// dbye bas lta ru 'gro bas 'gyur/
gang+gA'i klu drung ni bcu ya byisnyad nyid// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs kyi tshogs la rigs na de ma rnams// de rnams rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya// de rgyun
la yong 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams// phye ba'i rigs la grangasan med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyide// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams//
'a kye'i rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas rdo rjecan gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgyud thams ca
gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang// de bzhin dgongs pa'i sang nyide dang// dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang// gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs//
la sdom pa bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pani// e yaM rnam par rab tu gnas// akhaM rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang las yang dag shes par 'gyur// de nas rnal po la ma
rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa nyid// a paM rnam pa zhis paNo/ ri sku pa
ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de yi rang dang lhang po dang// dpur kaM gyis rnam par brgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi no gnas // sangs rgyas ni
chen za ma tog/ skad cig dbye bas phyu ba nyid// dga' pa de las skye bar 'gyur// skad cig shes nas bde shes pa/ 5I paM rnam par rab tu gnas/ sna tshog sa dang ni rnam smin dang// rnam
nyed de bzhin mtshan nyid bral// skad cige khazhin rer shes pas/ da lta nas 'byor pas shes ba rgyu ba// 'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa// sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// rnam par
smonepa de las bzlog/ bde ba'i gshes zapa nyid// bdag gi bde ba zos pa yi// gros ni rnam par ker pa brjod/ mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan// chags dang chags bral rnam
par spangs// snatshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid// rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid// rnam nyed dga' ba dga' bral nyid// mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// slob dpon gsang ba
shes rab dang/ khazhi pa de yang de bzhin no// dbang ni de yi grangs kyisan// dam/ kha ga sogs rig shes bya// dgod pa ngag pa slob dpon nyid// lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no// lag bcangs/
las shes rab nyid// gnyis las 'khyud la de yang nyid// sems can rnams kyi de ngos grub phyir// dpang na rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// gtor dang blul/sa ba zhes bya 'dis// des na dbang zhes
brjod par bya// shes rab bcu drug lonapal/ lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud// rdo rje dril khu mnyam sbyor bas// slob dpon dbang du rab tu brjod// shin tu banyin
bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// mthe bongasrin lag dag gisani// slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya// de nyid dun mnyam pa'i ro// slob ma'i spyod yul ngag tu bya//
zla ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod// rjod par byas nas gtad par bya// ston pas snas pa sems dpa' che// phyag rgya lode ba ldan pa khyer// phrag dog khro ba rnam spangs pa'o// slob ma tshor
gyur shes nas ni// ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin// kun tu rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar dbang bskur gsol btab pa'i// slob ma'i bye ba bshad par bya// bla ma phyagargya ldan mthong nas//

bstod dang mchod pa ji bzhin bya// bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kyi// rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa// mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba// ji ltar khyod na khidag nyid che//
mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod// 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu// bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs// zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang// ba la che mchog ma dan// bdug
pa lha bshos 'phro pa ba dang// dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis// 'di rnams machod pa rnams kyisanaM/ slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thog// snatsho
spangs pa'i skadacig la// ston pas smos pa sems dpa' che// bad pa chen po rnam par zung// ji srid byang chub bar du ni/ sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// slob ma sAng rje can mthong nas//
rdorje can gyis 'di skad smras// 'di ni yo shes chen po nying// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul// dngos po dngos med bdag nyidagatso// brtan ng
galob khyab nas gnas// skyama'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs kyisani// rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams 'a
bzod par gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor 'khor cazhes brjod// sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur
pas// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil na song po zhes byar brjod// byang chub sems ni bde chen po// dang po mthar byed ces bya ba// 'dus
ba dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod// 'khor lo zhes bya nam mkha'i khams// yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong// go 'akak+ko la sbyor bas// de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol
pa sdom ba zhes bya gang gis dang// dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags gsad pa dang// brdzun gyi tshig kyang skya ba dang//
khyod kyis ma byonapar yang 'ong// pha rol bud med bsnyen par gyis// sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid// gang phyi'i srog nasems su brjod// 'jige na/
bsgral ba zhes bya ba// brdzun tshig tu rab tu bsgrigs// btsunamo'i khu ba ma phyin par// gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das/
la 'di dacas gsol to// yul rnams kyang legs/ dbang po rnams ni gang lags/ skye mched na ci 'a gas/ phung po rnams na gang 'gas/ khams rnams de 'ang ci lags/
'di rnams kyi rang bzhin nA celags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yul drug ni/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi khams kyi rang
bzhinanyid// 'di rnams yul ni drug tu brjod// dbang po rnams ni drug ste/ mig dang rna ba sna dang/ lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/'di rnams dbang po drug po ni// gti mug rdo rje
lasogs ldan// khul dang yul can dag gsan// skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// phung po lnga ni gzugs sogs// mthar ni rnam shes snying rjetshe// dbang po dang ni lu'adi
[” ]dang// dbang po rnam par shesapa nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams go cha'i phyir// khamasa'i bco brgyad rnams su bshad// rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa// brdzun min bo 7 nade u0f8bzhin
du thams cad chuyazla ba ltar// 'dod pas rnal 'byor mas shes gyis// 'di lta ste/ gtsub shing dang/ gtsubastan dang/ skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me skye bar/
'gyur ro// me de gtsub shing la'ang ma gnas/ gtsubastan la'ang ma yani/ skyes bu'i lag pa dag la'ang ma yin te/ rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig na'ang yod pam
yin pas/ mi de'ang bden pa'i ng ma yin zhing brdzun pa'i ngam yin no// de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid lagyis shig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje mkha'
'gro ma thams cad bdud rtsi lta thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed/ kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rjes su chags par byed// bdud rtsi
lnga'iro'ang 'thung bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlabs pa bstanapa/ kyi kye rdo rje mkha' 'grom// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// de nyid bdag gis
gsang mdzad pa// rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis// bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tunyon// lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur/ rangs par gyur te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugasanas
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyanano// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang// bgrod dang bgrod
[4]@#/ mnomi sdang zhi// khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste// grong gi chos ni rab tu spang// blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing// bsam gtan nyid ni demigs la bya// gnyid ni spang bar/
ma bya ste// dpang po rnams mo degabago/ ba la thams cad bza' bar bya// khadog lnga la mnyam par spyad// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya// mdza' bo
sdug pam bya zhing// de bzhin gdug la zhesdong nyid// rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya// g.yungamo gdo'al pa ko lcags mkhan// phyag bder mkhan sogs
reg rim dang// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dmangs rnams// bdag gi lus ltar reg pa nyid// bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ramachang// dug dang mi pa bu btsas skyes// sgyur dang dngaradang bas la sogs//
kha pa lan tshatshab dang// dring dri zhime mchinag dang// byang chub sems kyis rab tu bza'// gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni/ mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin M// rang byung me tog red nas ni//
par rtsod du gzhag pa dang// lud par ng ni snyobs dag gis// bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung// smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang// robasregs thal bas de bzhin brgyan//
ma tog rab gong gnas red pas// mgo rgyas legs par bcing bar bya// de nas rdordzasnying bos gsol pa/ thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs na/[}]
nges par dbang po drug gi grangs/ rnam bar dag pa ma mdzad b/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig la gti mug rdo rjem// rna ba zhe sdang jo rdzom// sna laser sna ma zhes bshad// la/
'dod chags rdo rjem lus la phrag dog rdo rjeg/ yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma// dbang po rnams ni dag bya'i phyir// 'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dgongs pa'i
sad ni cizhis bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis nges gsung gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che// nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa// dgod dang lta ba ngag gis dang// 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis
gnyis kyi// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dgongs pa'i skad name bsgrags pa// bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol// dgongs pa'i skad ni skad chen po// dam tshigabarngan rgyas pa ru//

rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis// khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon// ma na chang ba 'angasha// 'du ba ma la ya dzaM brjod// 'gro ba le Ta son pa// rus pa'i rgyan na ne reshu// 'ong ba paM kha Na ru brjod/
cang te'u kri pi ta su brjod/ skal med du du ra zhes brjod// skal ldan ka 'a u0f7a dza ra brjod// reg min Ton Dim zhes brjod// thod pa bar l+yA naM// bza'akha gro pa ta zhes bya// tshod ma mA la tin
naM/ dbashang ba tsa tus maM brjod// gcib kasgyu rizhis brjod// rang byung sa rgyur shes par bya// khu ba ka pu ra zhes brjod// sha chen la dza zhes brjod// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// rdo rje
gol zhes bshad de// par kak+ko la zhes zer// kha dog dbye bas phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa lta ru bshad// 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no// phyag rgya lnga na bsdus pa
nyid// g.yung mo rdorje'i 'oges su bshad// garam de bzhin pad+ma'i gis// ras 'tshad mnarin chen rigs// skyaganyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod// tshos ma 'a sa kyi rigs 'di do//
phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin// 'di rnams khu pa rdo rjer 'gyur// brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung// rdo rje snying po soms dang ba che// gsang ba'i skad na mtshar chab// nga yis
khyod la gang bshad pa// de rnams thams cad gus pas zung// kyerdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang// gsang ba'i skad kyis mi sna ba// de yi dem tshig nyams par ni// 'gyur pa 'di la thetshom
med/ 'tshob dang na rkun ma dang// gdon dang rims dang dug gis kyang// gal tasangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad// ma gsung de yang 'grongs par 'gyur// rang gi dam tshig rigs rAd na//
gal te tshig 'di ma sma ba// gnas bzhu las skyes rnala'abyoram// deya tshon khro bar byed// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'grom dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces
byapa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas rdo rjesnying po la sogs pa'i rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma thams cad thetshon du gyur/ yid gnyis su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan the tshom bsal du gsol// spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa// rgyu dang gar ni dngos grum sbyin// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// rgyu ni
rtsalags garayang gyi// lcaya le lu las gang gsungs pa// zhesdang la sogs phyag rgya rnams// de la bdagan the tshon madris// gang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya cu// sngags btub pas gang gsungs
pa dbadag med la sogs sa bon nyid// de la bdag ni 'khrul par gyur// gang gi sa bon sa bon gang// rigs kyi le'u las gang bshad pa// bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa// bcom
ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kol+la i re Ti a bo lA mum+ma Ni ri kak+ko la/ g+ha Na ki po tre ho badz+dzaa ka ru Ni ki
a inamolA/ ta hib la khadzaig Do ma a NApid+do a i/ ha'aTikA li u0f97ra pa tshe phyed i du d+hu ra badz+dza a i/ tsa u sa ma kAtsAr so h+phakApa ralA i a i/ mAl i iNA Na shA laN+Dita

hit+ta ru kha i a i/ waM kha Na khe rnga ka ramashud+d+haa shun mu tsho[W]i/ ni raM su aM ga tsaT wi te hi dza sa rA ba pa Nia i/ ma 'a ya dzekun+d+ra rupA Ta i Dotshe ma ta hits+tsha pA dzI A i/ dran pa
'phrogs rnal 'byor pas// dpukayi gzugs kyis gar// chags bral min goms sems kyis ni// 'dod chags sems kyis bsgom pa de// rdo rjechos dang sangs rgyas dang// rnal
byor dang mtsho yis// klu dag na 'di dag gis// legasalaraglu blang garayang bya// 'di nyid kyis na tshogs srung zhing// de bzhin bdag kyang srung ba nyid// 'dis
na 'jig rten dbad du byed// 'dis ni sngags kyi lo zlas pa nyid// gang du gus pas glu len dang/ gang du gus bcas gar byed pa// tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas// del drina mtshon

parapyad/ sgog pa'i drin dang po nyid// de nas yang na bye rgod dri// ga pur ma la ya dzaM nyid// ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra// klu ya mtha' nas mnyan par bya// ba lang 'tshe yi sgra yang ni// phyi ril
dun mtshon bya ba// glu ya byin rlabasamtshan nyid do// phyag rgya rtags dang mtshan ma ste// 'disan rogisan mtshon par bya// rigs 'tshol sgom pa'i sbyor ba las// dngos grub med cing/
sgrub po'ang med// zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma// gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rjem/ ser sna'i phyag rgyus dkar mo nyid// chags ra/sa chu ma phyag rgyas gdab// phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha'
'gro ma// zhesdang phyag rgya puk+ka/// gti mug phyag rgyas ra khrod ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas gadol pa mo// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid// yang na deka no zhe sdang las// gti
mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g+has mI/ gtimug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma// 'dod pas
phyag rgyar shes par bya// a li dang po bdag med ma// a la gnyis pa rdo rje ma// a la gsum pa dkar mo nyid// bzhi pa chuyi rnal 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// drug pa ru//
sI zhes brjod// bdun pa nyid ni ro brong ma// brgyud pa sme sha can du brjod// dgu pa yang na g.yung mo 'ad// yang ni ltogs dkar mo nyid// bcu gcig chom rkun ma zhes bshad// bcu
gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod// bcugasum pa ni g+hasmArI// bcu bzhi pa nis sbyong ma// bco lnga pa na mkha' spyod ma// rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid// rigs kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang//
bsujug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs// rtsanaganyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma// re re rnam pa gsum du brjod// brkyang ma rom kun 'dar ma// bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod// gang
phyir bcu drug cha med pas// 'bad pa sa kun gyi lhag ma spangs// de ci'i slad du zhe na khyod// ron gyi bya ba mi phyed phyir// bco lnga'i chu yi bdag nyid kyi// zla ba byang chub sems su 'gyur//
bde ba chen po a la'i gzugs// rnal 'byor ma rnams deyicha/ tshoN+Di snying pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor ma kun las byung ba// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid// 'grib med btung
mchog nam mkha' nyid// ga pur nges par rtsis ma spang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thabs gang gis byang chub kyi
sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldadu 'das kyis bkalastsal pa// dkyil 'khor 'khor le'i thabs dang ni// rang ban brlab pa'i rim pas kyang// kun rdzob don dam
gzugs can gyi// byang chub sems n rebatubaskyed// kun rdzob kund lta bu nyid// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med kak+kol bde ba can// e bi rnam pa'ird bzhin du// bde ba srung
ba nyid kyi phyir// bde ba snyan zhes rab tu bsgrags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste/ 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid//

'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya ngana'angs ba rtogs mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// 'khor ba tshorab la sogs pa//'khor ba dbangapo rnamAnyid//'khor ba'i sngapa lasogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni mu
ngan 'das// rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob ron dam tshul can no/
shin tu bzhinabazang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// sngo bsangs dal ma rigs bzang ma// sa h+pha ga bur 'byung pa'i gnas// rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje// sa bzang
sgrub pa po la dga'// de yi chang yang btung bar bya// de nas rang yang btung ba nyid// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya// bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas// kun tu ru
byed brtul zhugs can// der ni spor ba las byung ba'i// ga pur mkhas pas ma sbyang ste// nga na la ga dum blang zhing/ nya phyis dung chos nyid du min// nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir// mi 'chi lta
yas blang ba nyid// ga bur nyid ni bdag med ma// bde ba bdagamang tshul can nyid// de yi bde ba phyag rgya che// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te// blo las
sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las// de nyid bcom ldan shes rab m// de ni ring min thung pa man// gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min// dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das//
lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can// de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi bde ba myong ba nyid// de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che// bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sgra de bzhin dridang
ni/ modang de bzhin reg bya de// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang// shes rab nyid kyis dpyad par bya// de ched lhan cig skyes nga la gzugs// bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma// de nyid
dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// de ni me 'khong ye shes gzugs// mnyam nyid ye shes dngos po can// yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te//
chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pa// de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag po nga// de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma// chos kyi dbyas kyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ 'khor 'obasgoms
pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na// sdom pa yang dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus su// a ya rnam pa'i sdom pa gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang// sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye/ go la'i bde pa phyagargya che// rdo rje skye mched thabs
chen nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis n bestan du med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor le'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni//
la bde ba chen po'i 'kher 'dor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang// de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid// skye gnas sAde mgrin mgo bor yang// sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi/

sgra sems can kyi// skye ba gang la brjod par bya// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// lte ba sprul pa'i sku nyid yin// gang gas bskyod dang sprul byed pa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems
nichos kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi sku yang snying kar 'gyur// ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor le'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po
a/ gnas// e bi rnam par rgyu mthun nyid// rnam smonechos kyi 'khor las// longs spyod skyes bu'i byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'a khor la dri med nyid// rgyu mthun sogs par rab bya ba'i// 'bras bu
rnam pa bzhizhis brjong// las kyi rlung gis bskul pa yi// las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod// ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu mthun zhes rab tu bsgrags// las chung 'bras bu che ba/
phyir// rnam par rmen pa de las bzlog/ rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid// bskyod pa skyes bus byed pa nyid// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid//
chos n smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yong// gang phyiramagron par kun bkur phyir// longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid// gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas//
bde ba'i 'khor 'dor dge 'dun che// sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod// lte ba gnas su brjod par bya// skya gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// mngal gyi phru ma chos gos 'di// de bzhin man ma ban
po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa la dang haM// skye gnas 'khor le'i rnam pa a// bde chen gyi yang rnam pa haM// gcer bu skra
dang kha spu bregs// sngags 'don sus pa dge slong nyid// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems rgyun rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// zla ba bcuyangs rnams yin// sems can sa bcu'i dbang
phyug go/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag dam la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste// spyanam dang/ mAm kA dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma dang/ khro gnyer can dang/ tsun dA
dang par+Nari khrod ma dang/ 'og zhal ma dang/ de dag la sogs pa rirab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar
du gyur cing brgyal ba dang/ stug po dang/ sa la 'gyel pa dang/ 'dar bar gyur to/yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams thams cad gzigs nas bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod pa// sa
dang chu rlung byin za yaM// lha mo snod can khyed nyid la// gang zhig sus kyang mashes pa// de nyid nga yas spro yis nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu 'bar thos nas de rnams thams
a cang srog rnyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs// de nyid bsal nas nigs rgyas 'de// lha
mosagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bden pa'i ng ma mchis shang brdzun nga 'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig mngeshes 'jig rten pa//
btsan dug bros pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyisan// de yis de nyid yongs su gcod// de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes gong// kye yi rdo rjer ngal bsosan// ma rigasog
pas mi 'dzin cing// gti mug la sogs 'ching bas man// rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dgas byol
song dang// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang// bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang// bde bgang phyir mapeshis pa// rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams na gong du/
yang// sangs rgyas gzhan dured mi 'gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med// gdol pa smyug ma can la sogs pa// gsod don don du sems pa
po de rnams kye rdo rdzor shesan// 'grul 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// byis pa mngeshes nga sa bsgribs pa// 'di yi bgrod pa mngashis pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar// gang zhig rmongs

pa 'khor bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po sAng rje che// kye yi rdo rje'i thabs red pas// gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba// de na bya med rnyed par 'gyur// rdordza sAng pos gsol pa/ sa ni du k+Sha swA
bshad pa// gang phyir gat+timug sra ba 'di// sku ni rnam snang 'od gsungs pa// ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems spangs nas ni lus kyis
ni/mdzes pa gzhan du ma 'gyur ro// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad soms// sku la zugs kyi phyag rgyas gadab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ chu khams rikhro mar bshad pa// mi bskyod
khu ba'igazugs can nyid// gtse pho mo bskyod phyag rgyas ni// ri khrod ma la phyag rgyar rigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lus spangs nas nisims kyis ni// gnas
pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur// de phyir sems gti mug 'gyur/ thugs la gtimug phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje sInge bos gsol pa/ me ni gdol pa mor bshad
pa 'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// gas te phyag rgyu gzhan man// ji ltar nachen phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang phyir 'dod chags khral/
bshad pa// khrag ni nechen 'byung gnas niyid// drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir// 'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab// rdorje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid do// don
yod rlung ga gzugs can nyid/ don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la// gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni/
gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te// de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pasagayung mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugasan sre ba nyid// dkar mosnyang mdzad gsungs pa 'di// sngar
gsungs nyid kyi rim pa yis// sems kyi bdag po phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid rim pasachom rkun m// de bzhin rolangs mnyid dang// de ya regis pas g+hasmA rI// ma 'pheg pa las phyag rgya lo/
kye yi rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor ma cho// de la bdag med masazhus pag/ e yaM rnamakhar bzhugs nas// bgegs dang lag par
'dren pa las// sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir// rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan// oM in+d+ra dzam dza la dzakA/ b+hAdab b+haM bA u ra/// tsan+d+ra sudz+nyA mA da bA pa ta la pA tA la atsA sa//

sAhA/ i daM ba 'ab+huny+tsa dzi g+ha phul d+hA pa tshwas pa gyu/ oM lha sapa kadz+dzasA da ban+ti khu Ni pha ra gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaMsam+bad+ham Ni A nut+pan+na tAoM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ gang gi tshe 'di'i gtor mas
'byung po thams cad mchod par byed ni rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te/ de rnams la bde ba drame med pa dang/ lha mo rnams dang/ 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/
gal pa 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byinen dbang dang/ mngon spyod dang/ dgra'i sde 'jigs pa dang/ bskyud pa dang/ gsad pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ zhi ba dang//
rgyas par yang 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyagargya gang gis mkha' spyod ma// gang gi phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sngaram 'tshal// bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gsang gsum 'khor 'a'i debus sum/ sku gsung thugs su phye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas//
sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can// steng zhal sku yi rdo rdzom// mkha' spyod 'dong chags phyagargya can// 'og zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma// thugs kyi rje rje bdag med ma// sems n bdag med tshul can 'di//
[7… ]@#// sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste// des na bdag med ma dbus skye// rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnganyid kyang//
bshad kyis rnal 'byoram nyidi nyon// mi khaskyong rnam snang rin chen 'byung// dpag med phrag dog rdo rjesems// zhe sdang gtimugaser sna dang// 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag/ 'dis ni
mi pas sgom pa nyid// rdo rjesams dpa' thangasan ni// phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'dod chags zhe sdangagatamug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs

can gyi// thugs kyi bdag po ragisagaciganyid// zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di// rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod// kye'i rdo rdzolas rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o/// phyag ni benu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi po dang 'jigs pa po/ dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ra can// bdag mdams ni mgul nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga
ni 'dzan lha la// bdag med ma na khyod kyis zhus// bco lngas yongs su bskor ba yi// bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma
'tshal// bdag med tshum b+hana mdzad nas// rdo rje thed par stsal nas ni// lha ya nu ma mnyed mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa// do shal doshal
phyed pas brgyan// mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan// 'dod chags chen po' rjes chags pas// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhane las// khyod dang lhan cig bzhi'i
bzang ma// de la dbus su nga yod de// zhal brgyad pa la skabs bzhi pa// phyag nibenu drug dag gis brgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po// mgo bo'i
'phreng ba'i do shala mdzad// nyimar bzhugs shang rol mor bcas// kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hU~Mspro zhing// thal bas lus la byugs ra nyid//
bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing// dga' bganyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba theb// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal na nag po che/ g.yas

pa lan kun da mtshungs// g.yon pa dmar zhinge cher 'jigs pa// spyi bo'i zhal na gtsags pa can// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshe// lhag ma'i zhal na bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dgar khyed dang nga
dga' bsangashin tu rol ba las// dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung naso// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// chom rkun ma yang phyun gnas ni// phyung nas lho a sgo ru
ni chom rkun ma na sgosrungasam// tho lakako la sbyor bas// rolangasam yang phyung nas// phyungasanub kyi sgo runi// bdud 'joms man rnam pa gnas// dga' bachen po'i snyoms 'jug
las d+hags riyang phyung nas nii// phyung nas byang gi sgo lani// 'jigs pa gzugs can m nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// puk+kasI yang phyung nas ni//
byung nas dbang ldan mtshamasasuni// drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// yang nasrub pa'i sbyorab yis// 'tshadapa'i mtshams su ri khrod ma// srin po'i mtshams su gdol pa mo// rlung gi
'a mtshams sugayung mo nyid// de nas rdo rjechags chen las// rag mar bcas pa khu bor 'gyur// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las// de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul// rje btsun sAng rje'i yidi

bzhengs shig/ puk+kasA rab dag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod// khyong mang na no bedrag 'gum pas// kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shagi stong pa'i
si/ rang bzhin nyid ljongs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' gco'ajig rten mgron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs samasi/ khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo
bdag zhu ba bgyid// bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shAkaM/ g.yung mo bdagan dran nyams pas// snying rje rgyunachad ma mdzad cig/ glang po rta bong glang

rnga mo// mi dang sha rasdu byil// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang glo ba rigs ma nyid// mthar byed dang nor sbyin nyid/

g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na 'o// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul 'a jigs rung ba// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yis// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// oM dang huM gi rje rje mo// khu
ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni// zhabs rnams sa la rdeb pa dang// lha dang lha min bsngags par mdzad// go tsi paM gI paM kaM yaM khaM// 'di yi sa bon byung ba dang// bdag po'i sa bon dag gis
ni// oM hUM sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas// ma mo 'a 'khor lo grong nyams dgar// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po// gtso bo 'di ltar sgom pa nyid/ 'jakar mo'i
g.yas na gri gug ste// de bzhin g.yonan ro hate// chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid// ro langs ma g.yas rus sbal te/ g.yon pa yisan pa'i snod//
gas ri yi g.yas na sprul// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzong nyid// puk+ka sAgayas seng ge ste// g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pas gsi'
byad de bzhin no// gdel pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste/u0f38/g.yon pas thong pa de bzhin no// g.yung mo'i g.yasan rdo rje nyid// g.yonan sdigs mdzub de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis
gnas// dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod// spyan gsum sku ni gyen duste// phyag rgya lnga yas rnam par brgyan// go rI kha dog nag por 'gyur// chom rkun m ni bod dang mtshungs//
ro langs ma nigasar bcos bzhin// gasma rAnimar gda mtshungs/ puk+ka sAni dbangasngona mtshungs// rikhrod mnazlonor 'od// gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma//
g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod/ tshangs pa dbang po nyidabang drag/ gshin rjod ng nor bdag dang// bden bral dang ni thags bzang ris// gorolasogs pa yi gang// bo la gzhib par
[= ]mdzad nas ni// dam du 'khyud cing 'o mdzad pas// bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni// bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so// bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngags// de banyan gdug pa bsdigs
ba pa dang// klu rnams sgrogs par byed pa nyid// lha dang lha min rnam 'od pa// de ni nga yis bshad bya yis// lha mo bde ba sngon ma nyog/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// bdagags gzhan du
ma bstan no// 'di yi sngags kyis gang byung dang// rdo rjesems dpas gang mdzad pa// lha mo ni tu 'jigs paste// ngom chog pas khyed la bshad// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrug pa yis//

zad kyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje snying po dbang spyin phyir// thig le mchog ni bkug pa nyid// bzlas pa khra yisogasal ba dang// sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis// kye yi rdo rje sbyor ldan/
ngas// btsunamo thams cad dgug par bya// bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byorab dag/ kye yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// ngogs pa med pa'i sems kyisan// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed//

rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// zla phyed thig les rnam par brgyan// de nas/ a nanA ya pa ga udzra ke sha bats+tsha ne/ tsatuNi sha ta ne ta ya/ de'i rjes su/ roT 'a b+hu dzAya/ kro'adzAmU tawa pu khe ka

pA la mA lAne kaM d+hA ri Ne/ a d+hA kA rab+hAya arjen du ngaN/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kAraya/ gan+d+ra ya gardza ya/ d+hAdz+dza ya tam+b+ha ya/ sho Sha ya she ya/ sapa sA ga rAn/ ban bonan gA
kaM gra h+phagro lcasha// mahA hahU~M/ duhu/ hi/ deho/ haM/ phaT swA hA/ de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// dam du 'khyur dang 'o byed pas// dkyil khor
yid du 'ong ba zhus// de la ston pa ye shes che// rdo rjepar mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam bzhag pas// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor pra bar mdzad 'pharamagacig dang sgobazhib
stsatshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrug/ babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje srad bus mnyam par brgyan// re khA lnga dang yang dag ldan// de nas bum pa brgyad po bro/ rAn chen lngayabyama'am/
ya nga na 'bras la sogs pa 'am// dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam// de bzhin dur khrong sol ba yis// de dbus pad+ma 'dab ma ni// brgyad pa ze bar bsus pa bye sgong ngo ra sa pa'ithod pa34
mdog dkar cha ni gsum pa bri// dbang ldan du sha ra b+ha// ma yi mtshams su dge slong sri// bden bral du ni 'khor lo bra// rlung du rags kyi bdag po bri// shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid//
lho ru cang te'u drwa ba nyid// nub tu rus sbal bri ba nyid// lto 'phye byang du de bzhin no// lha mo kha dog dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags// dbus su thod pa/
[H ]dkar po yang// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rnam rgyal bum pa nyid// yal ga'i rtse mo gos bzang can// lto ba rin chen lngas gang ba// sA lu skyes pas yongs bkang gzhag/
mang du rab tu brjod pas ci// ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor chog de bzhin bya// bcu gnyis brgyang gnyis len pa yi// rig ma bde chen brgyad po de// deshal rkang gdub kyis/
brgyan nas// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang// bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang// de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang// ma yi spun dang smyug mo dang// de bzhin pha yi sring
mo nyid// rig ma brgyad du rab tu grags// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// 'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// de lasag pur btung ba nyid// des na dkyil 'khor bsang gtor bya//
de rnams rnal 'byor pas btud bya// dngos grub myur du thob par 'agyur// delachad yang btung ba dang// sha dang sA lu skyes pa bza'/ de yang gos dang bral byas nas// b+hagar 'o ni yong
yang byed// nges kyang bo la gzhabi par bya// gar bya glu yang blang bar bya// bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya// de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la// gos kyis miganabakab nas
0 su der ni slob ma gzhug pa nyid// phyin s dkyil 'khor rab tubastan// mtshan mo skye bo mang khyim du// slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas// dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// de la dbang
na sbyin par bya// ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa// slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya// de la de nyid bstan pa ni// dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can// thams cad rgyud du smras pa ste//
mtha' yi mtha' yas phyi ba nyid// rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyaranas// de la lha mo des zhus pa// lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags// gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// der na thog ma dbus mtha' med// srid mdamya ngan 'das pa med// 'dini mchog tu bde chen nyid// bdag red gzhan yang med pa 'dra// longs spyod kyi na rlabs gnyis
la rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan gyi// mthe bong dang ma srin lag gis// de rnal 'byor pa yis btsir// de nas ye shesaskye par 'gyur// de las ci zhig skye zhe na//gzhon nu'i dga'
ba ji lta 'am// lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba'o// mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus// stong dang stong min he ru ka/ kye'i rdo rje las kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o/ lha mo la ni dem 'khyud cing// bo la thod par bcu gnas ni// dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas// skyes pa'i snyani gzhabs nas kyang// tshems kyis ma mchu brtsi
nas ni// mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de// mnyam sbyor bde ba mnga mdzad nas// phyag rgyaldan rab phye ba// bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la// phyag 'tshal don du 'khor
le 'dzin// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la// snodatshig mi nyan pa ya phyir// rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin// sngags kyi bzlas pa'i ng mgul rgyan nyid// gdub bu srog chags gsod pa spangs// phyag rgya
bstan pa sa ragasazhed// sangs rgyas lnga ya phyag rgyas ni// rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab// de nas rab tu bzhi d mdzad nas// tshems kyis ma mchu btsur nas ni// kye yi rdo rje zhes byab//
'tsha lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyid// de la lha mo des zhus pa// gtso bo rtog gang gis dang// de bzhin bya ba gang gis na// kye yi rdo rje'i bris sku yi/ byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dir ni 'bri mkhan dam tshig can// sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni// bris sku 'jigs pa phra ba nyid// skyes pa'i bod gnas kha dog lnga// ro yi
sgra yaM por nyid kyis// brisasku bla ma grwa ba nyid// gang gang skud pa 'kha' ba dang// gang gang ras yugs 'thag pa yang// de yang dam tshig can nges pas// dam tshig byin brlabs rdul
'byor las/ zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi// bsubazhi pa la khyim dben par// phyang n ma rung sems kyis ni// chang gi btung ba cung zad las// lus la naraMshu bsams nas// de bzhin/
gcaraburagyur pas kyang// 'bags pa dang ni ma dag pas// de nas dam tshig rab tu bza'// bzhin bzang snying rje ldan pa dang// gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzangam// me tog bcas
de nas de la lha mos zhus// bo la kako la sbyar
nas/ chems kyis ma mchub tsir nas ni// glegs bam yang n ji ltar 'agyur// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pas lha yas rab phye ba// glogs bam nga yis bshad bya yiso
lhamo skal ba chen mo nyon// sbrang chen snag tsha byas nas ni// mi yi rus pa'i sU gus ni// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis pa// gro gar dam tshig can gyis bri// glegs bam dang ni bris
sku nyid// gal tesal med mthong nani// skye ba 'dare ni dngos grub med// 'jig rten pha rol sbyod yul med// yang dag rab spyan ldan pa la// res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid//
glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du// sku dang mchan khung nying dus// glu gar langag rab bzhag nas// yang dang yang du 'o mdzad nas// bde chen mnyam pa ramyang mdzad de// ro pacan gyis
bza' ba bsdur// tshogs kyi dkyul 'khor bza' ba ni// nyon cig lha mo mog yangs ma// gang du thos pas 'dod don kum// sgrub pa can gyis dngos grub 'gyur// dur khrod ra ye bya
skyobs dang// de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang// yang dben pa'i m rgya mtsho'i ma zar// thaza' ba 'di rab tu bza'// de la gdan du brtags pa// ro yi gzugs
can dgu dang ni// yang na stag gi pags pa dang// dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no// dbus su kye yi rdo rje'i gzugs// ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang//
de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod// dam tshig lha la tinanaM/ stag gi pags pa'i steng du bza'// 'bang nas rgyal po'i sA lu yi// bza' ba der na bza' ba nyid// der ni zos nas zos/
nas kyang// deng rim mo mchod par bya// sring mo bu mo sgyug mo dang// gal te ma sring yon na yang// de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//
[$/ ]skyes pa'i bodachen chagacig par// chang ni bzang pos yonges bkang ste// bla ma la dbul skul chen ma// phyag 'tshal nas noreng yang btung// pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang// de nyidi khyonaM
lag pas dbul// yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa// de ltar sgrub pa po yis bya// kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa//
phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bde ba sbyin pas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu ring min thung ba mni// gnag pa ma
yani dkarapa man// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra// de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan// rdul yang dri shom ldan 'gyur te// ringags lte ba'i dri deng mtshungs// par la yang dbang mchog dri
skad cig par lha chur 'byung// de yo ga pu ra sa ha dag/ mkhas pas bribazang mtshon par bya// ut+pa la ya drore'agyurazhing// a ka ru nanag po mtshungs// dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang/
snyan par smra zhing zhing 'ong ma// skya bzang dbus su gter ma gsum// phal pa pad+macan du brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can m// dernyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// de nas rnal
'byor ma bdag med mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs su skye dang dam tshig can// skyo med kye yi rdo rje ston//
bla ma 'pha gus ming zamaldan// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ lag pas rdo rjesril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang// btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can// su zhing skye bar 'gyur bar/
shog/ de nas lha mo dedagyes nas// tshog zhi 'denyid yang zhus pa// skal mang sems can gdul dka'a'// gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya// de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid// de la bye brag smra ba bstan// mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no// de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid// de yi rjes su dbu ma bstan//
sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas// de rjes kye yi dze rje brtsam// slob mas gus pas blangasanas nii// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i le'u ste
brgyad pa'o/// de nas 'phya 'byed pa yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub posadangos grub thob 'gyur ba/ khasgrub bya'i
lte ba'i rtsa ba la// brtul zhugs can gyis lag pas gdon// haru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis// nang gi ma rungs sems kyisan// 'di ni besgoms potsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges por
'a 'jig/ bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang// bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni// bla ma thub pa la zhus nas// snying rjes gsad par bya ba nyid// ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas/ khrag ni skyag pa
nyidadang yang// 'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba dang// kha ni'og tu rnam par sgom// de yi lam du khab ni mi'i// gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste// snying kar byan zat+tis bon nyid//
dmigs nas skad cig gsod par byed// rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med// phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med// rgyung chen bklags pas 'grub pa nyid// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par
'gyur// rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po// srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' bar// gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis// nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzang ma// rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi//
'phreng ba 'khrug pa lha mo ltos// ma phug pas naasbyor bral 'gyur// phug pas dga' basbyin pa bo// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod ba ya// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid// ma dag pas ni dug
tu 'gro// dag pas bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa ru ka/ 'gro ba sgrol ba'i gtso bo nyidi// gang ga gzugs kyi 'gyur ba nyid// de nang yisasna yis nyon// snying rje'i spyan
nadamar go la// byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yisan// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// phyag ni stong pa bcu/
drug nyid// gug skyod kyis ni sangs rgyus lnga// gdug pa 'dul phyiri khro ba nyide// de nyid gsum spyan gsum mo// shan puk+ka sA ru brjod// de bzhin khrag ni khrod ma// gdol pa mo no
khu bar brjod/ g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag/ pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun// rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid// bdag med mas gsol pa/ sngags btuban ji ltar 'gyur//
gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi// las kyi dengos grub 'gyur ba nyid// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjecan chen po rdo rje snying po gzabarjod chen pos bka'astsal
pa sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis// lha mo shes ba chen mo nyon// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// u rnams kyi bzhi pa la// puk+ka sIs brgyan stong pas mnan// mdo'o/
dkar mawa nas sAsbyar// 'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni// 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed// dang por yi ge'i bdag po gzhag/ de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas//
mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed// ge byed rnams kyi dang po sbyi/dang po yo ni gnyis pa la// stong bcas mthar ni swA hA sbyar// sangs rgyas kyang slod shes
rab can/ dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// gnyis pa yin gsum pa la// ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan// stong bcas saAyang ngag ldan// mi rnams thams cad sdang bar byed//
dang porayi ge'i dbang phyug gzhag/ lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la// stong pa mkha' 'grom dang ldan// mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod mo// yang na yi ge'i thu bo spyin/ daMni khrag dang 'dra ba la//
mthar nis pAthig le mchog/ dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs// gdimug rigs ni dang por sbyin// blun yang dag rab tu sbyar// mthar ni swA hA yang byas na// lha dang mi rnams gsod
parabyed// dang por rnam par snang mdzad gazhag/ dang po nyid kyi dang po la// rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma dang sgor// mthar gnas pa ya gnyis pa la// jo rje mkha' 'grom dang ldan// yang ni dang
po'irtse mo la// rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// yang na de nyid yang dag ldan// steng du chom rkun ma yis brgyan// de rjes hi/ yi rnam par sbyar// mthar yang
sa wAsong pa nyid// ku ru kul+le'i sngags so// oM na dang po bzhi pa yi// gsum pa chom rkun ma yis brgyan// mthar gnas pa ya bzhi pa la// pa tsu badzra gyur ba dang// ud+ma rnams kyi bzhi
pa la// puk+ka sI yis rnam par brgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa ya naganyis pa dang// gsum pa'i dang po mthar sa hA// kye yi rdo rje'i snying po 'o// snang mdzad dang ngo
la gnyis// sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan// g+hasmArIs ni rnam par brgyan// u rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan// stong pas mnan/
cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yan gnyis pa dang// gsum pa'i dang po mthar sa hA// phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang dang po yi// dang po nang gi dkar mos brgyan// gsum pa nyid
kyi dang po la// nang ga dekar mos rnam par brgyan// nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang// gnyis pa'i gsum pa ma yis brgyan// hU~Mgi rnam pa gsum sbyar nas// lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang//
gsum pa'i dang po mthar sa hA/ phyag drug pa'i sngags so// dang po rnamasnang bzhi pa yi// dang po byin za yang dag ldan// ro langs ma yis rnam par brgyan// mthar gnas pa pa gsum pa la//
g+hasma rI yis rnam par brgyan// dang po yo ni deng po la// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang// rdo rje ma yis rnam par brgyan// kA ni chom rkun m yis brgyan// lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang// u
rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'grom yis brgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te// bza dang mthal nasAtsAnyid// phyag gnyis pa'i sngags so// bdag med dang

po'i dang po dang// gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang// gsum pa nyidakyi dang po dang// bzhi pa yin deng po dang// lnga pa la ni deng po dang// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang// uts+tsha rnams kyi dang po
nyid// dang por rnam snam thabs shA// grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni 'bum mo// mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang// klu yi rkang pa gnyis 'gyur nyid// hU~Mgi rnam pa gsum dang lda

'khaM/ dngapo rnam snang phaT nyid kyi// rnam panang bcugam thar sA hA// sa sbyong ba'i sngagasaso// dang por rnam snang de rjes su// rdo rjem yi mtha' ruhUM// bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyisaM brlab pa'o// dang por

klu ] rnam par nga mdzad nyid// de rjes a kAro mu khaM// uSh+Tha rnams kyi gsum pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi bezhi pa ni// stong du ma yis rnam par brgyan// dram de rjes ro rdzom/ 'byin la bya nut+pan+natwAta/
o AhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ kye'i rde rje las sngags bduba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas chos kun sdom cig pa'i// rdo rje sems
dpal zhes byas gasungs// bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas// bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu dbye// shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid// dbang la nadanadamar po nyid// lung tang gis ni mngon
sbyod nyid// yaMshus ni sdong po la// yi rus pas gled pa nyid// bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa nyid// glang po'i rus pas charapa la// ma hayas kyang bsad pa la// rengs par kho ma'i btung ba/
nyid// dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad// gsad pa la nisaMnyid// dgug pa la nibazhi mnyam nyid// sdang lasA lu skyes pa brjod// bskyed pa nyid la gla rtsi'i brjod// yang na mtha'i sha dang//
ngang ngo rig dang/ nadang po dang/ ga dang po dang/ ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no// kye'iro rdzalas bzlas nga 'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// kye'i rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing//
tshoms kyis ma mchub tsir nas ni// lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// b+ha gar 'ang ga bzhag nas ni// 'khor le'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs// lus can rang
garogs bshad kyis// shes rab pha rol phyin m nyon// bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// gang gi srin 'ag rtsa ba la// jo rje rtsa dgu par gyur pa// mi bskyod pa ya rogisa mchog nyid// rnam snang mdzad/
kyi 'khor 'dor gyur// dpag med mgon gyi 'dam skyes nyid// rin chen 'byung gi rin chen nyid// las kyi rogs kyi ral gri 'od/ rnal 'byor pa gang nag po 'di// de yi lhani mi bskyod pa// rnal
'byor pa gangadakar bo che// de yakheldan rnam snang mdzad// rnal 'byor pa gang sngo bsangs che// de pa lhan ngon yod nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang sar po che// sa chen bdag po rigs kyi lha// rnal
'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid// 'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lha// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser// de ni sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur// skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas/
nga rgyal ma bcago mtho mi btsam// kun rdzob gzugs su gnas nas ni// de rnams bde gshegs rigs su 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyidan// ji ltar skyes pa de bzhinano// kun rdzob
snyad tshul las// de yi rigs su'ang de 'gyur ro// smyu gar lang ga'i 'o mdzad nas// de la rdo rje tshe mnyes nas// bdag med ma yas go mdzad pa// lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon// tshal dang
wayaM skyo bo mo gnas dang// bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang// gserabus phyag rgya che byas nas// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// 'o dang 'khyud pa byas nas ni// de bzhin b+ha gar reg pa nyid//
skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa dang// ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi btung ba nyid// rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las// bo la ldan pas lagapas bya// khyogasaM dang ba zhes bya ba dang// de bzhin h+phani tusal
bayis// yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya// steng dang 'og tu lta ba nyid// dngos grub rgyas pa thob pa ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la ga purab tung bar bya// de la ga pur rgyu
tsha yaphyir// sha ni bza' ba nyid du 'gyur// khyadapar du na chang nyid do// kye'i rdo rje las lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor pa'i don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//
rje can gyis dbang// bzhi pa'i don ni bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid// chengang dril bu chen po zung// pa pe rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// slobamakhas ba nyid du gyis// jiltar 'das
pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba// bdag gi gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// lha mos dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma// sna tshog
gzugs can yid 'ong ma// khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che// khyer la mchod pa rtag tu gyis// ye shes 'di na ches phra zhing// rdo rjenam mkha'i dkyil lta bu// rdul khral mthar phyin/

zhib nyid// khyod rang yang ni de yi pha// rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni/ oM pad+ma su lA d+haramasArAgasu khod da tsa tu rAn b+ha ga ba shA hU~MhU~MhU~M kAr+ya kuru Tam/ o badzra ma hA de bya
turAnamadA ya ka/ kha ga mu le ka ra so na tha pAhUM hUM kAr+ya kuru 'ame o AhU~M/ spyi bor oM gyi rnam pa/ snying karanihU~Mgi rnam pa/ rje 'bru li ni A'i rnam pa 'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu
ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
garasang du/ Ar+yaNAkanibadzrapal+yAr ma Atan rAdza kalpa nAm/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa/ kyi'i
do rjel phyag 'tshol lo// nam mkha' bems bcas dang ba dang// go skabs med ngang 'byung pa dang// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang// sems can khams dngayid 'ong dang// sems can
snod dang 'jig rten dang// sa dang sa 'ogakhar snang dang// yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni// gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang// drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang// bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams
dang// gcig gis nyishuram tshang dang// khamasagasum ma lus pa dang mi// pha dang bu dang ma mo dang/ phyi rol dang nang dang ngam// btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni/ thams cad sa dang
bdag med dang// 'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes// bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang// chos kyidabyings dang ma byung dang// nam mkha'i khams dang rang dbus
dang// bdag med pa dang bdago ces dang// dngos po med dang dngos med min// bde ba can dang gru gsum dang// a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang// rdul bral dang sngog bcom dang// dba'
rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang// mthar ni zhi ba'i bde rige dang// gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa lo// sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur/ 'di nirang byung/
ma/ bcom ldan 'das// lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje// las ni dkyil 'khor lnga gsungs pa// rdorjecan dang phanam
dang// de bzhin rdo rje gazi brjidanyid// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang// rta bdun rgyal po lnga po 'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dkar mo rkun m rolangs ma// g+has pa dang puk+kagA/
khrod gdol pa g.yung mo 'o// rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// sam pa zhags pa nyo me dang// dol zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ mi tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char// rdo rje sema'i
dkyil 'khor du// tilag ma dang mar me dang// rin chen sgron maklog lagam// lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro// pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang// 'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du/
gling bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char// bdag nyid chabyang sbyor bas so// yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sgo lcags lde kyogam/u0f7c/ sgom dang nags 'dzin ma/ de bzhin mtshams susan
la sogs// rdo rjemakha' 'gro de rnams kun// rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bsa gnas // snying khar g.yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste// kha dogasna tshogs tsha'abar la'o// shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdangacho/
go ril sogasarab tu grags// shAn du gti mug rmongs chen las// skam pa ma sogs cher gzung ngo// shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba// rim la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu 'dod/
chags chen po la// pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o// phrag dog chen po'i slob chen las// sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag/ rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni
gti mug thams cad thad par mdzad// rdorje mo rgyal po che// rnam par rtog pa'i reb 'be 'phrog/ rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po na// 'dod chags can byeng chub ster// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro
phrag dog che// theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs// rdo rjesams dpa' rgyal po che// mi bskyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// skye 'gro ma zad mgron gnyer phyir// sgrib pa ldan 'joms pa po// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhesngang gtamug nga rgyal dang// 'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams// bas phyir rang gi 'khor 'al// rdo rje gzum/sa ni/
lhu dum 'dzin// shin tugadug pa drag po la// zhib nye bar ma sbyor te// 'di mkhyen rdo dzi can chen ni// rang gis kye yi rdo rjer 'gyur// shin tu stong par zhena rnams kyi// yod min brtul zhug
'dzin rnams kyi// sangs rgyus gti mug spyod don du// rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// shin tung rgyal gdug rnams kyi// skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad// rdo rje ma bdag nyid rgyal//
ngargyal chen po'imun pa 'joms// byang chub chags bral las skyes sbyangs// sems can gang zhig bar byed pa// chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir// pad gar gyi dbang phyug 'gyur//
thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gnas shing// gang zhig las gzhan nas 'gro ba// de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir// rdo rje mgyoms 'gro rang gtso bo// dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid// de dang de/
yi ngo bor 'gro// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// gang dang gang gis dngos po yis// skyes pa rnams kyis yade sbyor la// des na de yi rang bzhin
'gyur// snatshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin no// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// de dang de yi rnam pa yis// chos kyi bshad pa bya ba 'o// sems kyi rje
rje las byung ba// sems can sna tshogs rang bzhin can// sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis// skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas// de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas// sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang/
sems dgopa ni bde ba yi// nyon mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog/ gal te stong pa thabs yin// de tshesangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// 'bras burgyu las gzhan man phyir// thabs ni stong pa
nyid ma yin// lta ba rnams la log rnams kyi// bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi// bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog pa'i phyir// stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de phyir dkyil 'khor
'khor zhes// thabs bde ba'i sdom pa ste// sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad/
cur ldan/ de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang// de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no// thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhib sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
nge nas rdo rje khams gsum thob// rnal 'byor ma ni jo rje gur// dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba// 'khor la rab tubaka' stsal pa// u ni rdo rjecan la dbul// gang gisangs
rgyus rnams la 'bul// b+hArA mchog la de bzhin dri/ 'jig rten rje la bza' dang btung// gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la// 'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste// rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yis//

'tsha dzo rje can kun mnyes par byed// a ka ru gnas kyi rdo rje// phan pa la nitsan dan dkar// ngamar nga 'jig rgyun rje la 'bul// kha che tsho rjesnang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad ngo// hUM rdo rje

tshe las byung ba'i dri// 'di rnams dri ya rapa sbyor bas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul// mngar brdo rje rtag pa la// sbyor ba rdo rje'i mal// de bzhin lan tshwa 'dzag
chen rje/rtayi rgyal po thams cad dam/ bas ba rab tu brtag par bya// kye yi rdo rje rdor can gyis// me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung// ma li kA dang ma 'di// kun da rtag tusangs rgyas
'bul// shing gi dbang mchog med mngog/ snang byed la ma sbyar bar bya// dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang// b+han d+hu dmar po pa tolar// pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul// rta mchog rdo can

[nz]la kun// rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thubazhi pa// snang byed la ni khre lnganyid// par gar dbang drug pa ste// lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun// bza' la rdo rje nyim yi//
lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang// gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi// shin tu bde lagar dbang gi/ glu gar de bzhin rol mo'i sgra// sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag//
nas su// bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tusgrub/ rdo rje'i dpang po sngon po ste// zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi// mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar// nor bu dmar rgyal mkha' mdzod kyi pad+ma dmar po spyan
ras gzigs// da pa yang mar ka ta so// rin lnga'i rdul gyi rdul tshon mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'du lapa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so//
