dmatshis yang dag rab phyi bya// kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag/ dpang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od// phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste// mdzes pa'i khro be ya nilus// dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste//
g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag mo nyid// lag pa g.yon pas ma lcags nyid// gnyis po dag chos phyag rgya sgor// zhabs g.yon parkyang bas yang dag gnas// cung zad mchu ngas 'jigs par byed//
mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i rkyen mchog ste// mgo 'dzings phyud du bcings par ni// ra yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// 'byung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur// gnong sbyin du ma 'byung po dang// gnod sbyin

[A15- ]@#// mo dang klu mo dang// mo lha yi mdzes ma ni// slab pa po yis nges par 'grub// sngagasan/ o b+ha daN+Dam ra b+ha du tipa tiakI b+ha ki ma u0f7a nasarba b+ha dadre dpa shA tsis pA ya hU~M phaT/

de nas de rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// cher chen rab tu dbab bya ste// pad+ma'o dab ma brgyad pa bsam/'o/ der ni klu brgyad ngagod par bya//
stobs po cheran reb sbyor bas// de rnams rnga ma yang dag mnam/ cha meng stobs po che las ni// chuyi tshog sani dbab par bya// kha dog gnag tsang cher gsal ba// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs
par mdzad// phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// skar chi tshe rje gdan mdzad pa// phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag bsnams// yuzhes bya ba'i sngags blos gang// hU~Mrag nang du chud byas te// phaT ni mtha'
ru sbyar bar bya// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyud// gsum pa ser po'i la dog lta bu// bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yang dag brgyan// rdo rje sem

dpa' rnam par brgyan// klu rnams kyis ni char dbabaphyir// stobs po chon rab bsgrub bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'irgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur smra ba pos sangs rgyas

kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o// rdo rje pa ra 'o byas dang// ridags brgyan pa thos pa dang// rdo rje chu 'thung noraldan pa// sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rig pa// dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po// sangs rgyas
kun gyis rab gang ba// rdo rjerin chen kun khyab pa// gangagyurang yis bshang par bya// phan pa'i grong khyer yod 'ong bar// mkha' 'gro rdo rje lu gu rgyud// zhen pa chen po sangs rgyas kun// lcag/
sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya// dga' ldan du ni 'deg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob// rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni// ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// rdo rje lu gu rgyud/
bcings pas// rgyal po'i tshogs rnams bcing bar bya// gang zhig dngos grub ma steran// sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya// rdo rje kye ba dkar mo che// tshe rdzazhags pa ngom rgyun ma// sderdzi
lcags sgrog ro langs ma// po rje dril bu gasma rI// sangs rgyas rnams m dbang du byed// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' ba'i// dngos grub gal du ma ster na// de tshe lAma'agrom bzhi yis

sangs rgyas rnams ni dral shul sgrub// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor
'bum// rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum// 'bum gyis rdo rje rim yaM// 'bum gyis rdo rjechos kyi 'o// 'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste// 'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas/ yis las ni rab rgyas pa/

lnga yis sangs rgyas gar malan nyid// stong phrag sum cu ngag gis ni// ku ru kul+le'i brtag pa 'o// lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni// tshog 'i rim pa rgyud kun gyi'o// rdo rje 'a cagro skye'i rdo rje gi
'bum phrag lnga na khros pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i
sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo rje las// 'dod chags can gyis byang chub sgrub// de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste// ma tog
sIm pas rab ster bas// sems can kun la phan ldan pa 'i// dan rig der ni bshad par bya// sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsnga bas bsdus pa sgo nga las nus pa 'am/ mngal las
mtsho snyas pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdza sa ste sus pa 'am/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa nan nyid rnams
sgyu sam/ 'du shes med pa rnams sa// sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o// dam tshig che bshang de nas na// zur mig mi g.yo mgon byung
za/ ste mi bskyod ye shes b.ris ldan pa'i// ston pa la ni rnam par smod// khyod dam tshig tshu zhes bya// thub pa chen po gzhu can yin nga ming snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan// bdag stobs bcom
pa mnanamasaM// khyod ngam tshig oM zhes bya// 'ong ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams// nga ming rnam par snang mdzad dpal// khyod na ma bcom 'dod pa bral// cikhyong dam tshig azhis byu/ mnga'

[j]bangag mkha' lding mkhyenam ci/ 'ang ming pad+ma gar dbang dpal// khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan// cikhyong dam tshig r-izhes bya// khyod ni gdugs te tshab 'phrog/ nga mang rdo rje nyi ma dpal//

gdugs kyi rnam khyed ji ltar min// cakhyod dam tshig khaM zhes bya// khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhin no// nga ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin// khyod ni rta ste pha rol 'gro// ci khyod ngamatshig sIng rje chang/
a mchang 'tshong mdzes ma'o// mi g.yo bdag mnam mAkA/ zhung po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci// ci khyong dam tshig zhi ba nyid// bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci// bdag ni ma yin lha mo sbyin/
smanayin n ni gso dang bcas// cikhyed dam tshig 'dong chags che// sang 'tshong ma la snur ciyod// bdag ming lha mo dkar mo 'o// ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin// rtsikhyed dam tshig dbang
myong tshe// btsun mo'i pho rAman nam cu// bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma 'o// sgrol ma mig ni bcom pa yin// mgo yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal// de ltar ngo tsha med pas legs// ngo tsha me da
pas sangs rgyas min/ mthong dang mi mthun myur du smos// de nas rdo rje rig yon po spyod pa pos gsungs pa/ rdo rje sems dang 'a zhe sdang che// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs// 'dod/
la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag/ ser sna rdo rje snang byed de// don yong skyon ni thems cad byed// 'dren pa ldan skyon ldan no// sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa 'am// drod gsher skyes dang mtha'
'khob bzhin// gzugasacan rnams sam gzugs med pas// rdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bya 'o zhis// khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa nyid/
khyod zhi sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad// de nyid phyir na brdzun gsungs pa// mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs// sems can bsus na khyod kyi gang// sangs
rgyus nyid de ngo mtshar rmad// 'chibadud tsho'am mu ge 'am// phas kyi 'khor le'i gnod pa dang// rab gnas dkyil 'kher spyin sreg dang// char med pa dang zhi badrang// sngags dang bsgoms par
ldan pa ra ni// gang zhig bangag ni rtag rol pa// de yi mdun du bdag 'dug ste// der ni brdzun du mi 'gyur ro// slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bzhi// ma g.yo bdag nying song pa 'o// dkyil 'khor khang
pa'i gnas nyid du// sangs rgyus gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// khams gsum de bzhin rtsa ba 'am// ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar// bde pa dag snang ba/
byed dang bcas// chos 'byung grong khyeranyams dga' bar// rdo rjedam tshig glu yis dang// rdo rje rkang pa'i gom pas gar// mthar ni ja lA s+ya sogs/ phyag rgya chen po rab ster ba'i// de nyid
'dir ni cher gsang de/ ro rje sems dpa'i bka' ji bzhin// rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// glu sna tshogs dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ gar dang/ 'dul bar 'jug pa dang char ngabab pa
dang/ mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa 'o///de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi teng nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'byung po'i gter ma
gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas pa// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya// dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam// mthar byed lhar na dgod par bya// chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma 'a//
byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya// me rA na phyon zachen po nyid// bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhinamo// rlung du gnas med bsam par bya// dbang ldan ngu na'abyung po'i gtso// zla nyi tshangs pa sogs
dang/ tshangs pa'i 'os ni dam pa dang// tshangs nga 'i 'dun 'du nyid dang// dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang// rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang// gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur ba dang ni// gang zhig
'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang// gtsang ma'i gnas su gang gnas dang// bde ba can du 'dug pa dang// 'og min du na gnas pa dang// 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khamasaM// sum cu rtsa gsum
gnas pa dang// de kun steng du gnas par bya// chos 'byung nang du son pa ni// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang// de bzhinamatha' yasanor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid// pad chen pa=
bzang po can// lha min dmyal ba saras can rnams// chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu 'o// o las tshangs pa la sogs lha// hU~Mlas ma chags pa la sogs/ Alas stobs kyi rgyu la sogs//
lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste// snying gi lha rnams dkar po che// dbang re 'a sogs nag po mtshungs// stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po tsho/ rang mtshungs rigs ma
lus sprad ldan// rdo rje dril bus lag pa khrel// g.yas brkyang bas chu snyan la gnas// tshangs sogs ga nga sa phyag rgyas gang ba// mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis// stobs kyi rgyu sogs gar
bdag gis// thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o// dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni// chom rkun mas zhags bcings pas// ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings pas// sna rAs ridIl/
bus dbab// de nas mchod de zhabs bsil dbul// sngags ni 'di yis bsang gtor bya// oM AhUM/ phyi nas 'thor 'thung dbulapar bya// sngags ni 'di yis gshegs su gsol// oM badzra

satAs ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya// badzrasatAte no pa ti/ dran+d+ho me b+ha wa/ su to me b+ha wa/ su pokhyomo b+ha wa/ a nu rako me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yatsu/ sarba kAr+ya tu ma tsit+taMshri yaM/ ku ru hU~M

hahahahahortsa ga waM sarba tathA ga tobadzra mA me muny+tsa badzra b+ha wa ma hAs ma ya satA amu/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur rdo rdzoming gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje mang phye ba'o//
mang rgangabang gi dus su ni// slob ma bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// jo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// skye ba 'dir nisangs rgyas nyid// bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang/ sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang// mdzes ra'i

rdo rje dang/ rol pa'i rdo rje dang/ shan tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang/ shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i rje rje dang/ par rdo rje dang/ pad+ma myu gu'i rdo rjedang/ a 'pha la rdo rje dang/ pang lcags kyu rdo rje dang/

ye shes rdo rje dang/ yade bzhinanor bu rdo rje dang/ yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang/ shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang/ snying rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang/ dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang/ shun tu bde bar dga'
ba'i rdo rje dang/ spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang/ 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang/ nam mkha'i rdo rje dang/ shes rab rdo rje dang/ pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang/ 'dod chags rdo rje ni dag pa yi gnas su
phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no// bung mang rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyems ma dang/ rodze mtshon cham dang/ jo rdzae ma'o bde ma dang/ jo tshibadag med ma
dang/ rdo rjesman ma dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje dkaramo dang/ jo jo sgyu ma dong/ rdo rje 'bar ba dang/ pho rnga 'dril shing dang/ rdo rjemagyogs ma dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma da nga/

rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang/ rdo rje 'phrang ra ma dang/ rdo rje lA s+ya ma dang/ rdo rje bshad ma dang/ rdo rje'akhyud ma dang/ rdo rje phye ma dang/ rdo rje pad+madang/ rdo rje 'byung ma dang/ rdo rje chen po mo dang/

rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang// rdo rje sgrol ma dang/ rdo rje doshal ma dang/ rdo rje sgeg mo dang/ rdo rje keng ka NAdang/ rdo rje lA ma dang/ ro rjadabugs dbyung ma dang/ rdo rje rnam pa ma rnamakhaka//
ma rnams kyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ kye yi rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang// rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang// rdo rje ar smi/

skyems pa'i khro bo dang// de bzhin duyang rdo rje'i khro bo nyid// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdud rtsi zab sbyor dang/ he rug dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do// rtag pa dang ni gangamug rdo rje dang// rnam nga rasnang mdzad/

dang ni thams cad skyob// sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas lo mdzad dang// sku yi rje tshe rab tu gragos pa dang// sa snying dang na gti mug chen po dang// gshin rje'i gshing dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang//
da de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya skyob pa dang// sangs rgyas zhes bya rab tu grags pa'o// rdo rje'am de nas rin chen badag/ mchen rgyal po nyid de bzhin du yang// rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po
yA che ro rdzobadud zil gnon dang snang byed do// rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang// rdo rje chos dang sman ras gzigs dang ni// pad+ma gar dbang dang na 'dod chags dang// 'jig rten mgon
po rab tu grags pa 'o// dam pa'i rta dang rta yi rgyal po dang// bdun gyi rgyal po de nas lcags rgyal dang// dam tshig rdo rje dang na rna mchog dang// de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyid/ 'don yod
dang ni don grub rgyal po dang// rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa lo// rdo rjesams dpa' ngo nas rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang// dpe med ro mnyam shin tu dga' ba dang/
dam pa dang po bde ba chen po 'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang gad+d+himug dang// dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni// 'di rnams rigasan drug tu brjod// 'dod pa 'i thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub// brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid// rgyama'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste// rdo rje/
garagasum pa 'o// bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste// rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa 'o// brtag pa drug pa stobs po che// brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon// brgyad pa gzugs kyi brtag pa ste//
mkha' 'gro ku ru kul+le dgu// bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste// rnam par snang mdzad bcu gcig la// dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa// sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa// rdo rje phag mo/
bcu bzhi pa// bco lnga pa ni che/zi brjid che// bdag med brtag pa bsujug pa// gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa// hU~M mdzad lan bco brgyad pa// dbyangs can gyi nibcu dgupa// sbyin sreg
brtag pa zhigu pa// rab gnas nyishu rtsa gcig pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni// nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis su 'dod// gtor ma'i brtag pa rta'u gsum// mishu bzhi pa sta gon gnas//
mngon par rtogs pa rmi shu lnga// de bzhin phyagargyu nyi shu drug/ byed pa nyungeshu rtsa bdun pa// blun to shu rtsa brgyad pa// gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni// sum cur gcig med sum cu pa// bag
pa sum cupar niteshad// stong phrag sum cu'i grangs kyis ni// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che// kye yi rdo rje rdora'achang gi/ rgyud ni e
ma rgyas bstan pa// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje/ dag pa'isI po yongasasu gzung// rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste// 'di ni rgyud kyi nges pa 'o// kye yi rdo rjernal 'byor rgyud// dang por
rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// de nyid bud med gzung phyir ro// bcom ldan 'angs ji ltar na smos pa las bsdus pa lags/ paskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems
tsha dpa' rnams dang so so'i snye bo rnams tshe thung bar 'gyur naM/ ji ltar na de rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ jaltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur/ ji ltar sems par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/
spu bo phal pa tsho thung bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ re zhig gang dag slob dpon rnams su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag spyod pa po de rnams
mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag so so'i skyo bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen
par 'gyur ba so/ de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par gyur
cing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/ sAng rje chen po kyi rdo rje// nga ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang// nags tshal skye bo mang grong du// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// mtsho skyes

rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong// sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang// rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu na// nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster// tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang tshong u ma pa'i khyim duni ro rdzoti ma brtan pa nga/
bsenabakuracan la dngos grub stsor// glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang// chang 'tshong ma ya khyom du na// 'di ltar partsa garam nang// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub stsol// rtag tu 'gro mgyogs
zhon 'gyur dang// res 'ga' lam du 'gro ba na// rtan don yod brtan pa nga// dngos grub rdo rje rnams ster ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par
rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bishad pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa 'as// phyagargya rnam gsum shes par bya// sku la lag pa'i phyag
rgya yig/ sngags bzlas pa las ga phyag rgyu// sems lamtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin// de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o// lag pa g.yas na snyam pa ste// g.yonan sdigs mdzub de bzhin no//
mkha' 'grogam pa ma 'jigs ma// gdug pa rnams kyi 'khor ba 'don// g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste// gdug pa rnams bcing rnam par dgug/ de 'di zhegs pa mashes bya// g.yon pas
[@yg]// gdug pa sdigs mdzub ma// g.yas na nyargya zlum po ste// gdug pa rnams ni dekri bar 'dod// 'dirteg tu dol zlum bshad// g.yon pas gdug pa sngags mdzub mdzad/
! lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste// gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod// 'di de rdo rje kye mar bshad// g.yon pas bdud la sdigs mdzub ma/ lag pa g.yas pa rname ste// gti mug mun pa
rnam par dral// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mar na bshad// de ni rdo rje'i mar brjod// lag g.yas mar ma'i sdong snod de// de bzhin g.yon par sdogemadzub go/ 'dang rdo rje mar mar bshad// rnam par
rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms// lag pa g.yas na rin po che// sems can rnams la sbyin pa stor// g.yonan sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rin chen sgronam 'di rab brjod// glog ni lag pa g.yas
par te// rnam par rtog pa'i tshul dzin 'joms// de 'diklog lag mar shes bya// de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas par pang ste// pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya//
g.yon pas sngags mdzubam nyid de// 'di ni mkha' 'gro par brjod// g.yas par b+ha ga'i par ste// bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel// g.yon na sngags mdzub 'dzan ma ste// 'di ni chos 'byung
mar na brjod// g.yas pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste// byang chub chen pos kun 'ching ba// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di na rdo rje sgrog ma'abarjod// sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching
yos// bangaganyid 'khyud par 'dod pa ste// byang chub chags pas rab sab ma// de 'di rje rje 'khyar mar ba/ shad// g.yas pa'i 'gan sgo lcags te// ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo// g.yon na
sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje sgo lcags brjod// g.yas pa'i leg tulde kyog ste// yengashis blangs nas gcod pa mo// g.yonan sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje lde kyog brjod/
g.yas pa la ga tu sgo mon// ye shes skyes pas spangs pa// g.yon na sdigs mdzubu 'dzin pa mo// 'di ni re rje sgo marab rjod// lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni// rang mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyidi//
g.yonan sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// ro tshe yol ba mar na brjod// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro man dam pa'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro lnga ni reb sgrub phyir// mkha' 'gro ma yi
rgyud gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha' 'groma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'brog pa 'di ci'i tshapa'i dam
tshig phyag rgya 'brog pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer
can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba lelung bstan pa yod de/ 'di ni de'i yin te/ Da po hayas ga mne'i skad kyi dbyangs 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/ thams cad kun[}]
tunam mkhar spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha' 'gro mar rab tu grags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cung tshig 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes/
par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'di gsol pa/ e ma mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud// rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang// rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang// rig dngami rige pa nyid pa'o// de nas de bzhin/
gshegs pa mi bskyod pa lasogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sems drapa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'/
rnams kyis gsol pa/ sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa ngas srad pa las bsgral bar bya'o/ zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro pa'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin nga sa gsungasan/ ci'i
phyir na srog chags rnams bsad pa dang/ gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnams sngangs lags/ lta ba rnams las 'ag rnams dang// btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro ma yi
rgyud bshad do// bde ba'i thabs ni mdor bsdus pa// gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste// blo dman rab tu sad byed pa// rgyud kun gyi ni sdong por nges// sngags rnams kyani khyad par du'o// rdorje
nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis// bdag med rnal 'byor la nyid kyis// sngon dugar gyisamachod byas te// rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa//
sangs rgyas rdo rjesams dpa' dang// gal te rdo rjechos dang ni// rta mchog rdo rje ma yang// bdag gisospangs na ma 'grub ste// nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yum gyi gzugs kyis skyed/
par byed// de rnams kyi ni mdzes ma nga// de la nga ni dngos grub ster// mig sman dang na rkang byug dang// ra' gros 'og sgrub pa dang// li'u mkha' la spyod pa dang// mo snang ba dang bcud kyis
len/ rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid dang// bu mo dam pa dgug pan// bdag mnyes pas na sgrub pa pos// dngos grub roji rnams thob bo// spros pa rnam pa mang por ni// smras pa 'dir ni ci
zhig bya// bdag spangs nges par [”]mi 'grub cing// byang chub med cing bsgom pa med// gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing// rtagatu klog cingesems pa dang// sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzlas pa dang//
ngayi sku ni sgom byed pa// gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam// gal tan+ti lam 'dra par lta// shin tu sgom pa li rim pa 'as// mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las ka
de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya// rje rje pa rab sbyor bas// shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las// gang zhig bdag la 'dong ster ba// lus can de la smos ci degos// gang zhig nyame gcig bsgom pa//
rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las// shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub// star te 'di la the tsom med// bdag nyid he ru kar byas 'de// rang gi btsunamo rang bsgoms nas//
gang zhig rnal 'byer cher 'dod pa// de rnams la ni ngo mnyes 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing// spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang// glu dang rol sgra'i rnam pa dang// 'dod kun bden pa spro ba
dang// sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang// sna tshog saro yi btung ba dang// sna tshogs gos ni re mo can// sna tshogs dri yo byug pa yi// gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba// de yi dngos grub
da// star ba dang// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa// de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to/ o a A i I u U rArAu0f8bla e A o no[']oM swA hA/ gang zhig 'dis nga skul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de
pa mas kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgra ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug go/ rdo rje ma ni shar du smin par bya'o// lho phyogs su dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o/ nub phyogs sun chu'i mkha' 'gro
ma'o// byang du rdo rje mkha' 'groma'o// nga dbus su bzhags snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam par byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste/ phyag gnyis ma zhal gtsag ma'o// gri gug
ngang skyes pa'i thod pas 'brel ba/ stag gi pags pa bgos nga/ spyan gsum pa/ skya gyen du brdzes pa// phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi sgor na dkar mo chen mo'o// lhar ni rtsom

pa0 rkun ma'o/ nub phyogs kyi sgor ni mu ma'o// de bzhin du byung du na g+hasma ri'o/ dbang ldan du na puk+ka si'o// 'tshod nga 'i mtshams su re khrod ma'o// srin po'i phyogasasun gdol pa ma'o// rtag tu 'gro
ba ni g.yung mo'o// 'di rnams mtshams dang mtshams bral du sbyin no// gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom par byed pa de'i lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nusaso// thams cad

kyang kha rog nagapora mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpa' mo/ g.yon po la hUM ga 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu
dga' pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa/ rang gi legs skyes bu'i chus// bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis// rdo rje thugs ni repa khasgoms pas// rje rje can
bsam dbang bskur bya// rdo rje'am rab bsgoms pa// deran debu rgyan sbyin par bya// thams cad sngon sprin des bsam nas// rdo rje'i tshigasakhacang sbyor pa las// rdo rjechen po rtse dgu pa/ snying
khar rangago lagapa bya// slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang phyug byas// jorjesams dpas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// dirang khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur// 'di de sangs
rgyas thams cad nyid// bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung// slob ma lcags mchog lha mon// sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya// lag pas rdo rje dril 'khrol zhing/ rdo rje bdag pos ]
dbang bskur bya// oM badzra d+hupa ti phyi nyum tiSh+Thabadzras ma ya hU~M/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni// mang gis kyang ni debang bskur bya// oM badzrasatA tu dz+ha T+Tewamibadzra/
nAmAb+hi'i ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdotshe/ gang gang kun gyi ring gtsor gyur// de de bdaganyid he ru ka/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa 'o// 'di dasangasargyus
thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' phyaganazanas// jo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang na rtag tu zung// osarba thA ga ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma ya swA d+ha rA ya mi hIhi pisi
hUM kun kyang chog gcig pa yis// rtag du bla med mchod pas na slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin// phyis na rdo rje la gnas lag/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rjesams/
sgyu dpa' dga' chen po// kun tu bazang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bdag/ yang na der ni dril bu sbyin// shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i// rorje dril bu zhes bya ba// sems
can kun gyi den gyi phyir// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa// khyod kyis kyang n rtag tu thung// dbug
'byin thams cad byin nas ni// shAkya thub par 'du gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan te// sangs rgyas nyid du thotsom med/ khyod kyis 'chi'ajigs mya nganamed// de ba'i nad/
dang tsha ba med// bde chen theg pa chen po ni// 'di las nga yis lung bstanabu// o a kho haMbu ka ro mi tAbadzras tAn+ta thA ga ta/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub
la// skye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi// ming tshidza zhes byar 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen mo'i dribang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
rdo rjechen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ston kha bos/ dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te/ tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing// bdun po rnam par dag par bya// byang chub sems ni
bskyod nas su// chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom// de lasangs rgyas gnas bsams nas// rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya// dang po skyes bu bsam de nas// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo
slo dri zamanyam par zhugs pa// khu bar rjes su dran par bya// mtshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya// 'khor le'o 'dren pa bskul nas/mig lasogs pa gtimug sogs// rdo rjegasum
gnas gsum dgod// phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste// ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang// dbang na rigem brgyang rnams kyi/ yang n pa dud rtsi myang ba dang// lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa nyid//
'khor le'i 'dren pa bstod pa 'o// rang byin brlab pas byin brlabs te// de la yan lag drug bsgom bya// phyi nas yang na demagagi/ choga'i gomis rim pa yis// mtshan ma yang dag
mtshonapar bya// dang po sngon gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba 'dra tha yin// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin// bzhi pa mar me nyer 'bar ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang bso// sprin
mar nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid// den thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// dngos grub che bar 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar// rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang ma rgyu
pa'i// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// 'jig rten khams ni thems cad du// ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams M// ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa// de yi rjes su thams cad 'brang// ji sring skye
mtsho gnas las byung ba// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas// de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi rdo

rdzo rnam thos nas// dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni// skya ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan// rig mchen po bdag med dang// ngorje rnam snang mang la bdag dang// rdo rjesems dpa' rgyalachen dang// rta mchog
thub pachen po dang// rdo rjes gzi brjid che// rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen ngo// sku gsung thugs nyid dang yang// lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur/ lan cig rgyal po ston pa las/ 'phral/
du mngon sum byed pa po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi ro 'dzin pa po mnyam pa nyid kyi ro rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'di gsungs so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la
zhugs pa// zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che// phyag bcu drug rnams dang ldan// dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzi brjid chen po zhabs bzhi pa// sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te//
skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// rus pa'i rgyan gyiso rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhol nag po ste// dkar po dmar pos rnam par brgyan// lhag ma'i zhal na bung ba bzhin// bdud bzhi
mnyam par mnan pa ste// spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ der na rdo rje mdoganag po// 'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya// dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas rdzas ni rnam par
brgyan// klung bo rtabang glang rnga mo// mi rang sa ralha bya la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni// gnyis 'thung lasogs mi shes bya// sa dang chudang rlung dang ni// drod dang zla ba khyim nyid//
mthar byed dang nor sbyin dri// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyadan 'o// skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i jorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a dzan te// gtimugardo dzamig la dgod// zhe sdang rdo rje rnab la//
ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du// reg dang bdag med bsgom par bya// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid// lag pa gri gug thod pas brel//
srog song stong duyang dag gnas// sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang// de bzhinarkang 'og gnas pa mo// 'di nyid kyi notshog yos// gnasagasum dun gnas par sgom// o mdzad rgyal po chen
po ni// sku ya rdo rje rnam par brgyan// thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs// an mchog gide nyid de// ngag gi lam ni gsal byed
brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// chos can las na'i gos gsum 'byung// timo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i sdige/
mdzub 'dzin pa mo// kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo// dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmar po dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// chom rkun m yi gzugs cani sgom/
btsom gas kyi mdog 'dra ba// rdo rje zhugs pa mtshon chanapo// rdo rjod kyil 'khor dbusa gnas par/ rolangs ma ni khrag dang mtshungs// rdo rje lcagasasgrog nga rgyal byed// byang chub
'ching bar mdzad pa mo// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbusa gnas par// de nas g+has rIbasgom bya// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// ma rgyud utul 'dra ba'o// rdo rje sgo skyong maro rdzabartsonam zhes
a byaba'iting nge 'dzin te// mtshams su lha mo bzhi rnams ni// choga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// byang sems bum pa ri rab dang// ma yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che// phyi bcasags mod/
rnal 'byor pas// mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chon po las chags pas// dbarlabs med pa 'i bde ba 'thob// 'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/
donas rdo rje'adzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyidam pa ston pa kho thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs tedabyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hU~M las byung ba'i khro bo ni// rtag tuzhe sdang/
ldan pa'o nang dumarungasasems kyisani// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// nams man+ta bud+deb+ho/ na mo badzrachung ga ra sta ya tsats+tshamaNA lAkye pa ka rA ya hUMphaT/ donAs 'dirakhro'o/
chen po bshad pa tsam gyisasangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams 'jigs shing 'dar bar gyur nas mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed de// skyes pa'i pad+ma gas/
chag med// srubasagacig pa dang srubs gnyis pa// rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu ngagang// nang rjes rdul gyi sbyor ba yis// rkang pas mnanang
bsdigs par gyi/ sku gsum bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis// bumo dgug par bya// gshin rje gsheng rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// namasaman+ta bud+d+ha N+No/ ma hAdaNAd+harab bar
surAsur maldan lha narma thahUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur/
cing de dran par byed do// 'byung po yi degasasha za nyid// mkha' 'gro grul bum bani pa la// hU~M gis dregs byas phyag rgyus gdab// rdo rdzobatsur bas bdo ba nyid// gzhan gyis mi thub pa ro
ka@#// rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nams man+ta bud+d+he blo/ o du lu hu lu/ ma hApad+ma a mr-i tiku ru ma hA wAn A/ btsanadug chen po dgug par bya'o// brgyal pa

bsrung ba de bzhin no// pad+ma'i drags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nams man+ta bud+d+he b+ho/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya ma bAdIn+d+hoShaT b+hi ra wA ya/ badzra san+to ha da ya/ o amr-i ta kuN+Da laM
hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po bgegs 'joms rdo rdzo bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid ma dga' bar gyur to// rang gis btog pa po dang//

laTha rkang rjes kyi rngul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung ste/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hUM phaTaces bya ste/ hU~Mgs nga rgyal byas nas ro rdzobadud rtsi ting nge 'dzin las
skyes pa/ khro bos sngags kyi rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skyod par byed do// rdo rjebadud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// shin tu legs pa ragasang bar ni// bya ba 'di ni
rab bskul bar// ye shes rdo rjes bya bste// khyim bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// nams man+ta bud+d+hany+nyo/ oM ya ma dan+tA yin lA yanA la daNA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu rusachadun
mA ra ya hUM phaT de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas rnams srog la thotshom du gyur to// brgya phrag brgyad bzlase
pa tsam gyis kyang shin tu sgom par sbyor ba'i cho gas bskul ba las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur ro// dbyig pas mnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nams man+ta bud+d+ha b+ho/
namo ma hAb lA ya/ utsAt+ma kro d+ha rA dza ya san+d+ha nA ga na swod yaM tANA ya hU~M phaN+Da/ de nas gtum pochan po bshad pas/ dug gis gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang/ sgrig cing
'dar bar gyur te stobs po che dran par byed do/ rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nams man bud+d+he b+ho/ namo a tsal ke Na tsan+dA tsin+tA mot+tA mo// tu tusI/
g+ha g+haglu ta yag+ha ta sa hU~M phaT/ de nas khro pa chen po ma go ba skyes bu chen po bshad pas lha dang/ gludang/ gnod sbyin chen po brgyal te sa la 'gyelato// 'di na khri yi rgyal po las/
sang ga zhon pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje dkyil ra thor 32 nor sa// skyes pa dang na lha rnams khugs// o sum lhani sum b+hahU~M/ gran+tagroswAhU~M/ grots+tshapa ya groswA pa ya hU~M/ pan yaho
saMb+ha ga waM bid+ye rA dza ya hUM pha// rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa yis// khrolo chen po bshad pa yis// lhaman bu mo sku mor bcas// num 'dar zhing nar ba 'am// rdo rje zhags pas nges pa cings
te d+hAlcagasakyu yis rnodral nas ni// sku gsung thugasan b+hAny+nyoms pa yis// bu mo thams rudangub ga par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chos
ri char sprin che// rdo rjesems dpa' char mchog ste// rdo rje'am dge 'dunache// rta mchog tshog san chen po dang// phan pa'i yang na cher spyin gyi// zhags pa lcag/
kyu'i sgom pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na// so so skya bo smos ci dgos// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsaras// sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// lcags kyul/
sogs sbyor ba yis// bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+ho/ o Tak+ki hUM dza/ 'o
tadang ni ba tog la yang// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// zla ba nye bar chags dus su// khar bcu gnas ni bsgrub par bya/ ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang// brgya ni gsal bar bzlas
pa yin// sgra ldan gnas mang dbang po drage[V]chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya// dam tshig lcags kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan sngagasadang ting 'dzin gnas//
rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdug/ dgug pa'i gnas su gzung bar bya// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/namasaman+tad+hamatshwa/mas man saM g+ha nAM/ o sa tA ta pa tra/ o bi ma

la/ oM kaM kar/ o pra t+yaM gi ro/ o badzra u'atsakra was u0fa9 yan+taman+ta mU la karma ban+d+hanaMtA Da maM kA la hU~M bAmam kr-i ta ye na ke na tsit+ta kr-i taM ta/ sarbcu ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+haMn+da//
tsir tsa ri/ gi gi ra/ ma ra ma ra/ hU~MAhAhUM hA AhU~MAhUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid srung ba'i sbyor ba la// spor brgyad sogs gzhig pa la// dpung pa'i rig mar gyur byas nas/
'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus// khro bo chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang// yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la// rnal
'byor mchog ni 'di bslabs na// thub pa gzhan ngum 'gyur ro// khro bo chen po 'khor 'dasngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/// de nas
bcom ldan rdo rje can/ sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// yang dag nges par rab tungabye// sangs rgyas gzugs bar n rab bsgoms te//
rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom pa// sangs rgyas gzugs bar n rab bsgoms nas// dze rje rnam snang dran par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs borAn rab bsgoms te// rdo rje'i ma rab bsgom
bya sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te// rta yi don yod rab bsgom bya/ sangs rgyas
gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya// thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis// snying khar ye shes gnas su dgod// ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor/
bas/sa ngas rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang// phyag rgya dang na phyag mtshan brtag/ spro dang bsdu ba byas pan// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi
'byung ba nyid// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'i gragasachen po// gozugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas//
lha rnams la nadabul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad bdag nyid// dral rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sangs
rgyas ni// rin chen phung por rab tu grags// rol rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid// rdo rje chos n de bzhin gshegs//
reg la rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod 'bras bu ster ba po// srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga ni/
bsgom par bya// lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogasas ngas rgyas// ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab// snatshogs las ni byed par
brjong// thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// nyishu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// phung po lngar ni rab tu grags// sangs
rgyas mgon po' dkyil 'khor ni// shar gyi chur na rang du grags// g.yas su rdo rje'i ma yi/ nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi// byang du lhaya rgyal po yi// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi//
shar dudakar po chen po ste// lho nisor po yang dag ldan// dmar po nub kyi cha nyid du// btsong no byang du yang dag ldan// mtshams kyi char na thams cad dang// sgo yi legs dang ya phubs
su da ro rinachen rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes// sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni// de nyid kyis dkyil 'khor brjod
snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor re rer bsros pa 'am// ya rab sdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa 'am// ya ngan nyi shu rtsa lnga ru// gang
tshadakyil 'khor bsdus pa yi// sgor na lcags kyu zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog de bzhin dza rdzanyid// 'jug pa'i sgo srungs dgod par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po' dem

tshig 'di bka' stsal to// dem dang bya rgod de bzhin bse/ sug klung dang na stag ring dang// snga'u dang sna thung ba glang 'tsho// rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na 'o// khra 'ug chu skyar seng ge dang// mtshor
gnas de bzhin ra dang mi/ ra degs pa ga dang yang dag ldan// g.yas man par ni rtag tu gnas// rma bya ma he mu srin dang// nyayi rgyal po rus sbal dang// 'og gi rlung dang ngang pa dang//
ri bong ngan pa'i g.yas pan// stsal pa thu be spren shugs kyis// kha chu mgi sman mtshungs bya la// g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin bshad// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyadan 'o//
karan da dang 'khor lo dag/ lug dang tsa kor dang ni// bye khra hor mo 'ol kha dang 3/ ku rara'o ma'i g.yasan go/ stobs kyi rgya dang dung skyong dang// rigs ldan pa ra pad bzang dang// 'jog
bo nor rgyas mtha' yas na// rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na 'o// gza' lag phur bu mjug rings dang// sgra gcan mgi dmarol wasangs// sman pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid// g.yas
pa nyid du rab tu grags// dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag/ 'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can// gcer bu dang ni theg pathangs ris// stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na lo// klo dang dbugs dang de
bzhin 'bog/ khong skam mdze dang rkangashudang/ mchin pa mcher pa'i reng bzhin yang// glang po la sogs rab tu grags// lcags stegs dang ni brjed byed dang// khrag rdo gcong nad
rgyal po dang// gzhang 'brum skrun dang bkresand dang// mag ser dom la sogs pa// rdza ma byi dang so nad dang// mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung// bad kan 'dzag ngang lus sam drang//
skyarbab 'brasan rma byasogs// rkang 'bamatshil nad rlogaskyangs dang// rgyu ma 'phel dang gsud pa dang// tshad pa rims dang rab gas ni// ka raNasogs rab tu grags// rlung mkhris
de bzhin ma zhu ba// sgrib g.yogs rab bo gcin sra be// gzhogs phyed na dang lkog 'bras dang// rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o// mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni// rab mchog de lta bu
'gro ba// thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas// sangs rgyas ltar ni cher grags pa// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// sems can rnams la gdungs ma gyur// nad rnams ni/
phyir sangs rgyas na/ glang po la sogs nang 'dzin to// de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la// nad med ru dza drang grum med/ 'chi med nges par bya d+hamed// nga rgyal med cing gtimug med/
bkres pa med cing skom pa med// sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med// lha dang lha min mi rnams sam// grang gis kyang na red byed min// nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba
zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/// de nas rdo rje'adzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa// sems kyi
rjes dran dmags nas ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ sems kyis rin chen bsams nas na// chos rjes su dran pa bsgom// las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'kher
lechen po rab bsgom bya/ rnal 'byor 'din mchog rab ste// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje rnam 5
snang bsams nas ni// phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yase// rin chen phung po rang bsgom bya// chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas//
las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab// zhesdang rgyal po rgyal po'i// skyon rnams thams cad zad par mdzad// sngo zhing sbyor bar bsgom par bya// bsdu ba yang na yang dag bshad// sangs
rgyas mgon po rab bsosan// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya// sems kyi rin chen rin po ches//
bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad// sems kyi charasngon sbyor ba yis// yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya// chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che// spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can po// thun tshod
(d bzhi r ni phyin brlabs pa// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas// gzhal med 'bras bu stsol pa 'o//rta mchog char sprin chen po yis//
bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyis
rnamapar bsgom par bya// rtog mang dkyil 'khor dbusa gnas par// sku yi yi ge rnam par bsgom// khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod//
0/ chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par// gsung gi yo ga rnam par bsgom// las kyidakyil 'khoradabus gnas par// don yod yi ge gzugs can te// skugasum mi phyed bsam pa
yis// ye shes rdo rje bsgom pa ra bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i// chos kyi 'khor rnam snang la// rin chen sems kyi rin po che// par bzang po 'dab maradamar// shes rab ral/
gyi don yod kyi// shes rab rnon po'i ring bzhin gyis// rnam rtog ri pogacar nas// phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur// dpag tshad ngeb brgya lam na// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang// rin chen phung po 'od chen dang// chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las// sna tshog 'od je cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas sprin gyis
rnam par brgyan// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang// thams cad du ni snetshogs gzugs// mchod pa
kun gyis mchod par bya// mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis// yeshesargya mtsho rab bsgrub bya// dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi// ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar// sangs rgyas kun mnyam
rnal 'byor pas// skad cig lan gnyis mod 'gyur// ru rak+Sha dang dung ral gri// bu yi 'tshob pad 'bras dang// mu tig la sogs byu ru sogs// bsam gtan ldan pasngags bzlas bya//
sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsunamo// mngon sum du ni bye pa'i phyir// sngags nasnyan gsan 'bebs par brjod// dper na skyes/
chen la la zhig/ skadakying res bos pan// thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa// de ltar skadachig sangs rgyas gshogs// 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang// nam mkha'i khams kyi mkha'
grong du// phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs// jo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// gang gis sngags kyi
a rim thob pa// e ma de yis byung chub thob// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang// sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin// rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas// mtshung
zla pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob// de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te// sngagasakyi spyod pa'i rige gnas pa// 'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te// de na sengs rgyas mnyam pa brjod/ sangs rgyas nga
rgyal dmages nas nii/ chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba// gang zhig bsgom pa de bsan// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur// 'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te// ji ltar chos ni rig
med pa// sems can khamasa'adi ltar bshad// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma mad// ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gi/ rin chen sems na drecen byas// sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur//
[s ]ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'jig pa// nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems// sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las// sems nyid bsgom pa sas rgyas te// skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid//
rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas madacingagang zag med// rnam par shas pa'i gnas don nam// phyi rol gyur ba cung zad med// yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid
khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che// sems gacig gsan thob par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// rodang reg bya'i rang bzhin te//
chos kyidabyingasan metshog tu zhi/ 'dzin rin chen mchog tu brjod// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang// 'du byed dang nA rnam shes nyid// 'di dag thams cad sems las skyes//
thub pa 'di na gzhan m 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// 'dod don 'bras bu rab ster ba// sems kyi de nyidirang bzhin ngag/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste// de nyid phyir na
sangs rgyas kyis// sems kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// zabamo'i rnyem pa nges ldan pa'i// phyed par dga'aba'i dngos grub ster// rdo rjesems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drugapago
de nas rdo dzachen po rong can mkha' 'gro ma'i khur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas gnas ni reb/
rdzogs dang// rnam pa lnga po bsgoms pa dang// kun tu bazang po'i rang bzhin dang// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub dang// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang//
mchod bstong bdud rtsa la sogs pa// rim pas rjes su bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod// o saN+Ta ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pami bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tAmri ta sa dan brjes b+ha ba At+ma ko'ahaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpagamed pas de skad
ces bka' stsal to// osarba ta thA ga ta swA ti badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako3haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sam+ba thA ga tapU dza
badzras phyu ba Ako3haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rtsa mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba tathA ga tAnu rA ga ta badzrasu byu ba At+makoTahaM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
nyim de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// spro ba dang bsdus pa'i sku// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad de// chos dbyings yi ge las rgyus pa// des na sangs rgyas gnas
ka dgod bya// osarba tathA ga ta a na la ya badzrasaM b+hA ba At+ma koTahaM/ rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// 'byung bzhi'i bdag
ba00/ nyid dkyil 'khor nyid// de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam// spos nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya// rdo rje lta bu m phyed phyir// des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya// ma skyes rjes su dran pa/
las// rnam par snang mdzad phan pa nyid// rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ 'di na rin chen sems su bshad// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// 'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las//
rdo rjesems dpa'i gnas 'dug pa'i// sems na 'dod chags zhes byar bshad// gang phyir 'bras bral ma 'grub ster// de phyir don yod rab tu grags// gom mdzes ma rdo rje zhes
byapa'i ting nge 'dzin to// bum pa'idabang ni deng po ste// gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang// gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor dam
pa bris nas ni// dam tshig khu ba'i chog yis// hadang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas// de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang// dam tshig lnga yis bkar
ba dang// mkha' 'gro ma yis tshogs ldan pas// rdo rje sabon rab sbyor bas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas la// slob ma rtag par nges bsams te// rgyun gyis 'gos kyi ming gisan/ slob
ma rdo rje can dbang bskur// spyan dang bdag mo sgrol ma dang// dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyis// rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bla med bshad par bya// blan med pa'i de nyid
'di dganyis su med cing yi ge med// chos kyi dbyings na 'od gsal byed// bde ba bzang po'i ri myong gis// sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te//
ga dang dazhes bya ba dang// dang po mthar yang shA ldan pa'i// rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyade// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// tshogs kyi rje tsha bdud rtsi myong// 'di dag zos pa
tsam rgyas ni// sangs rgyas kun manyam rnal 'byor pa// jo sdod ni mnyam par 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi// de ni gzi brjid lus chen po// 'jig rten kun gyi yid 'phrog pa//
phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal// 'jig rtenakun gyi bdag pos brgyan// lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par brjod// mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur// chos kyi zasan zab po// dam tshig chen po'i
sgyu bsam gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mi bskyod brtenapa'i rnal 'byor pa// nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// rtag par chu shel chen por ldan// rdo rje'am rgas pa/
med// don yod rgyal po chen po ni// rdorje srog gi yan lag 'byung// donakun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan// des narnal 'byor par n brjod// mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las// stong phrag
a ltas na 'tsho bar 'gyur// phan pa'i san khro'u brjod// rdo rje'am rdo rje'i 'bus// tshadapag med kyis dpag med dang// bdun gyis nam mkha'i ji srid bshad// rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag/
kho ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid// 'di dag bstan pas rnal 'byor pa// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// 'din rdo rje nyamar brjod// chos rnams thams
cad kyi ni gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi// thabs dang shes rab zhon pa dag/ khams gsum dag ni thams cad du// sa dang sa 'og bar
snang la// khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus// rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsus// sen mo ba spyi de bzhin khams// khu pa la ni rnam snang gzigs// pags dang khrag la gzi brjid
che tshil dang rkang la rdo rje'adzin// thams cang mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rtsa dang na la bdun rgyal po// 'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar// rdo dzamakha' 'gros rnam par bshad// sa

ma khams ni nem dgapa// spyanan 'khor la mdzes pa nyid// rdo rje batsunamo dang ba ste// pad+ma'i bu mo tsha ba nyid// sgrol ma rlung na rnam par dag/ rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes
bya'o// gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to// sngags thams cad rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te 'a 'u bdun pa'o/// khyod
ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba// thugs dang chos nangashin tu rnam dag pas// lha yi 'usan yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// puk+kasI ni bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jige rgan don
khyu// gyi phyir// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyong na gti mug rdzordzayongs skyong ba// sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag
sh+tsa brgyan mdzad pa// khrodom na bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spros skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni 'dod chags ro dza yongs skyong
ba gsung dag legs pa raso sor rtog pa yis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// gtum par ldan pa bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du//
stong pa nyid sngangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong ba// gzugs kun nan tan thams cad manyam nyid kyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa//
rom ci badrag la mgon pos myur du gzigs// rnam par 'drenapa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// thams cad bzhes par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to// 'khor 'atsan rnams thams cad kyi// 'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po de skad gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta khe tsa

badzras smu ba At+ma ko'ahaM/ o sazata thA ga ta b+hAtsArab dzra swa b+hA ba At+makot+ta/ osarba tathAgatapA tA la wa si nI badzraswa b+hA ba At+mako3haM sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi// byin brlabs
gnas su rtag par ni// e shes rdo rje can gyis bya// 'din byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sku dang/ gsungadang/ thugs kyi dag pas deskad ces bka' stsal to//
phug rgya chen por rab sbyor ba// sku yerin chen sbyang bar bya// bsam gtan rdo rjebasams nas ni// sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed// rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// ngag gi rdo rje dril
mod// gtimug ro rdzorab skor bas// mig gi rnam par shes pa spang// zhe sdang rdo rjebasams pa yis// sgra yi sgo yi bsams pa 'o// snanasorasna rdo rje yis// drug 'dod chags rdo rje
yis// lus ni phrag dogajo lnga yas// yid ni kun tu bzang po yis// de nyid mkha' 'gro bdag med ma// 'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang// gal te 'gal ba yodapa ma yin yang//
nga'i tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po spang ba yod// kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas pa ni// 'khor 'gazugs kyi chos tsam rnam par bsgom// chos kyi dngos po ma byung sngad pa la// gang zag/
thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa// 'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par ma nus te// chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag/ tshig pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i/ lus skye/
smanani gzhan gyi dug nyid de// ji ltar chu na rna bar zhugs pa la// yang na chun thabs su 'gyur ba nyid// ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sams rnams kyi// de bzhin mkhas pas mon sran
ba/ @#// gre 'u bzhin// 'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi// skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung// 'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten ra// 'dod chags smad pas zad par/
'gyur// 'dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas// yid ni rdo rjesams dpar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhags pas 'ching ba yis// 'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod// 'dod chags/
bral ba'i mngon byang chub// 'dod chags mthar phyin rnams ma 'dod// de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi// sgrub thabs sbyin srog las ni// go chas 'dod don thams cad kyi// sgrub thabs yang
dag rab bshad bya// de la 'di rnams na sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ArUb lo[”] tishar ya/ bo d+hisatA ya/ mahAsatAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA/ oM tAre
tut+tare tu re sarba durtswa mam kr-i tedzam ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ banAya/ hU~MhUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba du[é ]stsalhan tAre swA hA/ mamo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha mo sgrol ma
bsgom par bya// phyag brgyad zhalo ni bzhi pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gser gyi kha dog 'dra par bsgom// gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar// jorje ma'i dbang smyos
pa'i/ sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu rgyan can// langatshol ni bab pa'i lus// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cham// sna tshogs par 'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan//
rdordzazhas pa de bzhin dung// g.yas bsamada' ni 'gengs pa'o rdo rje lcags kyusu la// sdigs mdzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa go/ rdo rje skyil krung rgyurab yis// gnas gsum
panibaslab par bya// sha dume tog sgrol ma ste// kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma// yagi olas skyes pa'o// me tog 'phreng bas log pa khyab// phyag gnyis zhal gci'i mnyid//
rgyana rnams M kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yas su bdug spos sgrol ma ste// mdogo gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can m// spos dang dung gis lag pa khrel// rgyuna rnams kun gyis rnam
par brgyan// nub tumar me sgrol ma ste/ mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab// mdog ser ma par rgyan chen go/ g.yo ba gser gyi rnacha ma/ byang du dri yo sgrol ma ste// dri yi dung gis
lag khyab pa// khrag gi mdog ltar lhamo ni// dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya// lcags kyu lasogs rab dbye bas// der nasgo yi srung ma bas// steng dugatsug tor rnam
rgyal ma// 'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom// 'khoral klu zhabs bsnyams nas// spro zhing sngagasan bzla bar bya// o tAre tut+tar tureswAhA/ yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu// pha
rol phyin bcu la gnas ma// 'bras bu thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// sngagasan mchog dang phul du phyogi/ sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa//
bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste// rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa'o// sngags 'dis gos kyi shu bar bdun// mngon par basngags par bya ba ste// mdud pas bcings te/
sku nags tshal du// 'gro na'ang sus kyang ma 'khyer// stag dang/ chom rkun dang/ chu srin sna 'thung dang/ seng ge dang/ sbrul dang/ mche ba can dang/ ma he dang/ dom dang//

sAg gling la sogs dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yib bo// sngags 'dis ut+pal la sbyin srog ji srid du lan brgya rtsa brgyud ji tsam bsku bar bya ste/ o tAre tut+ta re a mu ka ma lnga kham na ya swA hA/
yong sngags de nyid kyis wA'i blo la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te dgu'i khyim du sbasan/ nyim bdun gyisaskyod par byed do// oM tA re tut+tA re tu ri tsa la pra tsa la ge hUM gA mi ni de wa

dat+taM/ uts+tshA ya hU~MphaT/ donus gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ o tA re tut+ta re tu re/ a mu kA b+ha d+han kumA rImar+ya mung+gA na tas+yas ta dzA yAts+tshan+tamo sA hA/ smra tshil dang/ gtum pa'i sa bon
dang/ myos byed dang/ a sho ka'i lam dang/ me tog srog blugs bya zhing/ mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tupasngags te/ nyi ma
bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ o tAre tut+tA re turaa mu kA b+hi d+hA naMswasman ta A karA ya ma mAn+tika dza/ sngags

[]/ 'dis kha dara'i tshor ba stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog sreg blugs bya ba brjod pa 'di byas pas skyes pa skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo'ang 'gugs par byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyol 'gyur bzla
mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras labcom ldan 'dis ma phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig m/ lag pa lcags kyudang/ ut+pal dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa
byas nas me tog 'di rnams bza' zhapalegs zhes bya pa lasogs pas mchod nas phyi nas sgom pa dang ldan bar sngags bzlas so// oMtAretut+tAreture sa mu ma ma i bas ti sAtsAkawA ya hU~M
phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zhags pas mgrone par bcings te/ lcags kyur drangasanas bsgrub bya rkyang pa'i 'og tu bsams tre/ kholamo'atshul gyis bza' bar bya'o/ do/
nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'agyur pa sgrol ma'igazungs bdun mngon par bsngags par bya ste/ bdag gi mge gnyis mig snyan gyis bsu bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o//
denas rgyal kho slob ma dang 'drakhar gus par byed cing 'galabar mkhyed pa dang/ bka' drin stsol zhing snyan par rjod par byed pa dang/ bran du yang dag par 'agro zhing khros ba'ang dbang du 'gyur ba
ste 'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas pa'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lag nyis pa'i zo dug thal bar byas/
ba kha dog dmar mo'i ma dang/ arku'i shing bal las sdong bu'ang tugyur lamig sman bsdu bar bya'o// mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang/ rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rta mchog gis bdug
par bya'o// thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku bar bya ste/ rdo rjemage gis gang bltas pa de/ gal taparaM gar gyi drab ng phyug ma 'baban de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma lags te bdag gis
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bakrongs pa lags so// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba phyis pas mad pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bduna mngon par bsngags par byas nas gung
ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang/ ba glang gi go wang lhan cig byas pas dpral bar thag la yongs su bzung ste/ gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin
bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rornga dang lhan cigaso rtsis byas la byon te/ sbyor ba mchog zos pa na mo slong ba dang/ gzhan du mi dga' ba dang/ gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang/
rang gi bdag po'ang song ngo// de nas gzhan yang spor par 'gyur ba mar khu chen pos nye bar phyogs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya'o// bzlas pa'i mthasu lu btags/
pas mdag gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te/ gang la byoni pa de lnga por yang ma song ngo// de nas M gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyurab zlob la nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing brtan pa
0 byas la/ de las byung pa'i 'jig rten dpang byayag glang tse/ dung ba/spa pa dang ma'e par khyab yong rab tu ma 7 nga la spun te/ ji srid du sngar yang rjes su 'brang ngo// de nas gzhan yang/
sbyor bar 'gyur pa sgrol ma'i gzugs kyis ma ngan pa la sman rgyud yongs su bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'dras bu nges makIn dang lhan cig pas bsus na dbang du 'gyur ro// oM tA re tut+ta
roture a mu ka su ban+d+hA naM muk+tiku ru mus// zhes bya ba'i sngags pa kho na bsgrub bya'i mong nang du bcug par bris la/ ne'u le'i lung bur smras na bcings pa las grol bar 3
'gyur ro// de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu ngan pa'i 'byung gnas pa dag par rab tu bshad por pan// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis phas kyis sgo sna ma thar sa ru tshar gcod par 'gyur
ro lha mo phyag gnyis ra/ zhal gcig ma/ snyam dzeb dkar pa/ yid 'phrogam/ skyaphyed du 'a pa/ chu skyes ngan khyudaka ra pa la yang dag par gnas lag pa gnyis par par
mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgo mdzad shang/ la/ yod na shes rab kyi pho ro tu phyin pa// rdo rje skyil krung du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor
du bsgom par bya'o// tsho las skyes su ra lag tu dgag pa byed pa/ dam tshig sems dpa' slong nas nga shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing/ rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms
pas shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bdun du spyar bas bstan bcos thams cad shes par byed do// 'bum bzlas pa'i sbyorabs nyi ma re re la
tshigs brgya byed par 'gyu'o// rab tu 'bad pa mad par gzhung brgya'ang 'dzin par byed de// de la sngags kyi rkangapar gyur pa/ o pe cupa tsu pradz+nyA badz+dzan dzA la dzA la me rU ban+d+hanaM
d+hi rAmI bud+d+haM ban+d+ha ni swA hA/ khA mi zer ba na sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par sngags pa byas te/ ma bslangs pa'i sengesaM po gyur po ji srid zla ba drug cu gang 'thungs pa shes rab chen
por 'gyur// de nas n+do rje slob dpon gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags/ sgrubopa po yis nges par 'grub// dal zhing zab mo chos
dang ldan// thams cad rig par mkhas dang bcas// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngagasashesashang// rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son// de nyid bcu ni nem par rig/ nyan thos
spyod pa srung ba'o// sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang// gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang// dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan// rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po//
sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yis// 'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed// de ldan bla mar bcas nas ni// gang zhig bla ma smod byed cing// skye bo blam smod pa gang// dmyal ba
chen por 'tshod par 'gyur// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por mchod// rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis// de ltar blo ma'i nan tanabya// bla ma'i grib ma bud med
dang// lham dang snyan deng mal snyan rnams// rmongs chen gang zhig 'god byed na// sus pa de ni spu gri 'dzin// legs par dbang bsar slob ma gang// bla ma'i bka' las 'da'
byed pa// 'jigasmon 'dAr na 'ol pa ra pa gyur// 'jig rjen pa la ngam 2 par garas// g.yo dong skya ya sbyor pa yis// brdzun gyis mi nus sna ba la sa// khong sems mdze nad
chon po can// dmyal pa la sogs skye bar 'gyur// de ltar byis pa'i slob ma yis// bla ma'i bsAn pokur pha rol phyin// bla ma'i bka'ani rab bsrungs na// dngos grub rgyas pa
grub par 'gyur// tshogs kyi thas ni ngag tu bya/ zhi cha la sogs pa dupasul// sdu bar dge 'dun chos ston bya// bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya// bla ma la don dbul
zhing// de yi rjes su tshogs kun ka 'o// pangag gis ni bcu nas ni/ tsheg 'dis bslab par bya// yan lag rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par
brgyan// rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni 1 kho rag yar ma// dme to ba pa nga gis mar me dang// de bzhin dri yi drung sogs g.yas// g.yon du sngags kyi
mchod yon snopa/ mdun du snod na gzhag par bya// zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis// me tog sasogasarAme pa bzhin// lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa
yis// mchod par byas na bzang bor sbyin/ me tog sbyar ba'i tshul gyis dang// drin 'thor ba'i tshul las dang// sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang// byugs pa'i lus kyis rjes
su dris// lAs+ya'i lag pa lA s+ya ste// 'phrang bas 'phrong pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// glu yas hUM gi dam tshig glu// brlabasum pas nagar nyid de// mchod pa 'di rnams sman mang//
sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// sangs rgyas rnams na mchod pas mchod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed por 'gyur// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' zhing// rtag tu 'khor
a nga'i pha rol 'gro// rdo rje mkha' ra gro'i bka' ji bzhin// 'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o// me tog spos sogs mngon sum du// 'a jig rten sprod par gnas pa yis// sna tshogs mchod
pa mchog nyid min// de nyid byang chub yan lag min// dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod// ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la// dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste// thama'i las la
nag po 'o// zhi ba la nam tog dkaraM// ser po rgyas pa'i ro rdol// me tog nag po tham la// dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang// rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med// dkyil
'khor du ni ma zhugs dang// gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang// gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de yi dngos grub mchog nying med// gang gis slob
dpon gso' ma btapa// 'der ra rogs su skye ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom pa ra bya// gang gis byang chub ma thob na// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gnas su de'i// sazhing su bar
'gyur ba so// yang nas yi bdag po che// ngag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro// bde ba can dang na kha' 'gro dang// dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skyo/ 'jig rten 'dir na gang 'grub pa//
sangs rgyas de na ci zhig smos// khams gsum bdag po chen po 'di// 'chi med rgyas pas khyab pa med// tshangs pa brgya ban de bzhin drag/ sgra gcun me dang rlung dang ni// 'dod
pa'i lha dang mthong ldan nyid// 'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur// lha ku phye bzhin gnad smin dang// dri za lha ma yin dang mi// ma'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang// de rnams 'khor 'gyur
the tshom med// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang// rigs dang byang chub byed pa dang// de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang// khyim nas 'byung bar byed
pa dang// rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang// skya pa yongs su len pa dang// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni// 'ang nogazugs ni du ma byed// sangs
rgyas sems can bskyab bzhed pas// sangs rgyas gar na rel pa mdzad// ri bong stag dang seng ge dang// glang po rnams kyi rigs su yang// snying rjes phan pa'i semA
kyis ni// phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur// bud med sgyu ma'i smos pa yis// 'dong chags can la chos gsung ngo// bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid// stsam thams cad sel bar byed//
shes rab pha rol phyin gozugs su// bud med rtag tuyang dag pa nas// skya mchan mo gnas 'dug nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rabo tAstar// g.yo zhing ngadoche ngo tsha med// rtag tu 'dod/
chags pha rol 'gro// dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster/ gzugs dang yonyin nor la yang// 'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med// de 'dod chags yid 'dod pas// rang gi bde ba
myang bar ldan// skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang// bde gshegs pa ka' 'a sa ma 'da' zhing// ma bsAn bkur sAng rjecan// kye'i rdo rje rab phye ba 'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag
mong ma gtso mo dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// sarasna rdo rjes
bdag la skyobs// 'dod chags rdo rje bdag la stsol// ya de dang phrag rig chen po dang// rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// rdo rje can kun dgyes
par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas pa la ngas 'di gsungs pa/ thig skud gsar pa mdzes par ldan// shAn tatshang ma gtsang ma/
yas// zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// shes rab cun kyis thig gdab bya// de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cang zhi/
de pazhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rjesems rang la las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol// dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ran sA rdza stobs dpal ldan// bsrung ba'i 'kher le sbel ba po// rdo rje yis na gsal ba'i lus/ sku gsum las ni skyes pa so// gal pal la
da' byed na// 'jig ste 'de la the tshom mer// lus srul po dang gcig dang// bde smon shes 'byung ba dang// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes// zur cig bgegs na chen po
rnams// 'khor lo yis ni brgyud nyid kyi// chayis sgo ni ring ga gza/// mo la nga lha yi snyam bu ni// sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya// sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni// ya phubs dang ni 'gramanyid
do// rig byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya// dra ba'i snam bu rig byed spyod// dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni// ga'is par mtshams kyi thig dang yang// gsum par ngos ni bzhi yo bzhi//
@#// thog ni rab tu gdab par bya// tshangs thig chaganyis per nas ni// cha drug gi gad par bya// de nas sgo la tshod bor nas// dgu ya char ni rab tu gdab// de la
'di nis sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/ oM khaM hU~M hU~M/ de la 'di na ye shes spyan drang ba ste/ oM ma de ni badzI b+ha ba badzra kar hU~M/ de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ os ma yasu
dramA ti kra ma hU~M/ de la 'di ni rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ 'ji'i tshes dbyings dag pa ste// sems nan khamasi ni thar par byed// kye ya dze dzargyal po las// dkyil 'khor ngam
pa bzheng bar bya// dbang ldan du na sa ra b+ha// ma ya mtshams su dge slong pa// chos kyi 'khor le bden bral du// rlung du rtsodza bri bar bya// lcags kyungashar du bri bar bya// lho yi sgor ni
zhags pa nyid// nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrogs// byang du rdo rje dril bu 'o// dbus su thod pa dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin
srag gi grong khyer rab tu phya pa/ ro rje thab khung sbyor ba yis// ngo rje'i srog rdzas sbyor ba las// zlum por zhi bar byed par brjod// rgyas pa ra ba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs// dbang ni zla ba
phyang pa 'dra// dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs// gsang dang zhe sdang las la ni// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa 'o// de bzhin skyod byed skal nganadang// yan lag nyam/
pa'i sbyor ba yis// tsan dan a ka ru shing dang// gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis// sbyin sregayan lag me sbar nas// phyis na yong ni dgug par bya// o e mye dam pAb+hU tade la
la ridI dzesat+ta ma kr-i hItAA hu timA dAraM asaMnInAhe ti b+ha ba/ lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug par bya// zhugs pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing// lcags sgrog gis nizhabs dge bsring/
dril bu 'khrol bas dbang du byas// lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa brkyang/ mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni// mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las// yang nemo ni mnyes par bya// de la
'di ni ro dzamachod yon gyi dam tshig ste/ o pra ba rasatA ra pra tits+tsha swAhA/ de la 'di ni zhibs bsal gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sarba pA pa da han badzra ya satwas+ya sarba pA paM da ha sa hA/
dela'ang na bsreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig ko sdegs te/ o badzan ma 'a ma hA b+hU ta dzA la ya/ sarba b+has ku ru sarba du3na hUMphaT/ drabya dzayAhaM ho/ sa ma yu s+saM a
haM/ phyi nas rang 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e bye b+ha ga wan+natab+has tsha ya tsa a gnas mA ti tsi pU dza dzad pra sid+d+hi me/ de la 'din dgyes pa'i dam tshig ste/ o sprod/
sarba sa t+tAm+ba/ sid+d+hirat+taya shwachu grwa/ gtsayAMbud+d+hA bo kha yaM pu na rA ga mnA ya mu/ bzhengs pa dang/ las sna tshogs kyi sbyorab dang/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyud pa'o//
de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab gnas ni+ti/ 'jig rten thasAng la gnas te// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// dang pore zhig rig ma 'dzin/
dril bu 'khrol bar 'dod pa dang// nang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las// g.yas nga ra rdo rje gsorab dang// srong thun skad ni chog pa// gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang// rin chen snyan
kyis yongs gang ba'i// bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// mo de wa pa tshu badzra a d+hi ti/ o mo har a dzI ti/ o tre lar ti a d+hitiny+tsa/ o rA ga ra ti pos rmitiSh+Tha/ oM badzrar tia d+hUtiSha/

la'i o badzrage rAA karA ya dza/ oM badzra rIpra be sha ya hU~M/ oM badzra be tAlA pin+d+ha bi/ o badzra g+hasmArAwa huM ku ru ho/ 'din ye shes dgug pa'i tshog 'o// shun pa lnga dang bsgyu lta// khyad par du
'ayang dri lnga dang// lus bashal la ni blugs par bya// mchod yonalasogs sngar bzhin bya// yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya// snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab// mgo la sogs pa gto
mug sogs// rdo rdzogsum naM gnas gsum dgod// dbang ring gi rigs nyid kyi// mchod pa lasogs rim pas brtsam// rang gi snying nas ye shes bsam// sangs rgyas bzhugs par
la bsang gtor bya// ye shes rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo sngo// byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam// dngos po
kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// stong pa snying rje tha dad med// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs yongs su bskor// khyod ni nyid kyi shugs kyi mchog mnyis pa// khyed kyi rgyu pa ni rgya'i 'gro ba kun
bsgrubs shing// snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad mdzad pa// skya ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phen mdzad pa// ha ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes/ ro che sa ko lA ra yis/ bo rje/
sgom pa bsgom par bya// rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni// joN+Dadakyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dzarje phung po rnam par bsgom// de las kyi rje ma chung pa bsam//

rdo lce yi sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid// rdo rje'i sngagasakyis bsang gtor bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang nga 'i tshe tshe de skad cesabaka' stsal to/
nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par rtse ma lnga pa khros pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// stobs kyisas sa rgyus phur bus gdab/ ngor[' ]pa krong khyer yang 'ong bar//
rdo rje mdzub mo khri sbyor ba las// gal tadangos grub ma star/ derjesems dpa' gsad pa la bya// o du ru du ru tsun ts+tshan/ hU~MhU~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje
de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rtamagrin rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos// phyag rgya chen por brjod nga las// pad+mangam ra po
spyi bor 'dzin// skumadog dmar bo stobasapocho// gos dkaraganyis med sbyor ba'i las// btudrug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// g.yas pa'i zhal nanag po ste/
g.yon pa zlamadzes dri mamad// dang po dmar po shes par bya// lhag ma'i zhal na bung ba mtshungs// zhal brgyad pa 'azhabs bzhi pa// rdo rjechos nagazi brjing che// 'dod chags chen/
po'i rjes chags pas// bdud bzhi mnyam pa mnan pa 'o/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// dbu rgyan jorje 'dzin pa bsam// skumadog dkar
po gzi brjid che// phyag na bcu drug zhal brgyud pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// chos kyi 'khor le spyi bor 'dzin// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa// spyan dang gnyis
mang sbyor ba yas// 'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs par mdzad// dang po'i zhal ni dkarapo ste// nag po dmar pos rnam par brgya// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyid rnam par bsgom// cod pan rin chen 'dzin parab sam// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che// phyag na bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi
pa ste 'jigs pa po// sems kyirin chen spyi bor 'dzin/ kha ma gser ltar gzi brjid che// dang po'i zhalan sar po ste// g.yas pa sngon po 'dra ba 'o// g.yon pa zla 'od/
bzang po ste// lhag ma'i zhalani bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbusa gnas par// rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin par bsam// mar gad
ut+pala mtshungs pa'o/ zhal brgyad pa la zhubs bzhi pa// bcudrug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te// rta ya gzugs te 'jigs pa po// g.yas pa
kha dog nag po ste// g.yon pa zla mdzes dri med// ral gri des grub spyi bor 'dzin// lhag ma'i zhal na bung ba mtshungs// rdo rje nyi ma na nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'din sgol ma 'gazug
lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod// gri gug dang na thod pa 'dzin// kye yi rordzad kyil 'khor mchog/ ral gri dag ni rtag pa nyid// phan par me long de bzhin no// rta mgrin la ni
gos bzang ste// rdzordartam la ni gser/ rta mchog lan 'gro mgyogs te// mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// bla ma la rtag rgyun dudabul/
skal bzang rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/ skal bzang thub pa rnamasnanga mdzad// skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dpang// sal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin
pa'i rgyal bo sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa// o d+ha ra ra/ drwa raya d+hAr ya marda marda/ badzra hU~Mka phaT swA hA/
de nas sngagusachen bshad pa na// jo rje skye ba'i sAde rje che// 'jigs shingesgragapar gyur nas ni// rje'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
chos kyi rjem pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsung pa/ o khadzad+harma sam ya// bu lu ru lu o Arolog tha'u sAhA/ dems 'di'i bshad tsam
na dorngachos ni grogasachen po// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas// chos kyi dengos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
tsha/ snyoms par zhugs te/ phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM sha ti pa ra ma sAshA ta e rin rdzig pa' sAhA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs//
brgyalazhung 'jigs par gyur nas ni// de nas sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dordzogazi
brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs la/ o badzrasUr+yatamo bid mnam sa ma ya hU~MahaM rat+tatsAka phaT swahA/ des 'dinakheshadatsam gyis// rdzogazi brjade 'od po che// 'jigs shing brgyal/
bar gyunas nii// 'amo'i dngos gruba'ab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// phu
phu ha ti/ pradz+nyA dIka tra sA hA/ de nas 'di'i kheshad tsam gyis// rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni// de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol//
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de nyid de// rdo rjecan gyi zla phyed mtshungs// dorje chos kyi pad+ma'adra// zhima'i yong bzhin nor bu sbyin// mchog ces bya de la ni// thams cad du ni gru gsum
mo rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// phan pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// rin chen tog ga ler byed ma// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya ra// rus pa'i rgyan gyis
brgyan par ldan// stag gi pags pa bsnams pa dang// dbu skra thod pa phyadapa ste// mchod par brtson pa'i sems dang 'a yas// chags pa mig dmar mthong nas ni// phyag rgya
chen po'-i sbyor ba las// chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ de las snatshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// spyod pa'i mtshan

nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ dzo rjephyag rgya yang dag brtsam// mo tog 'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa// nags chen po yomatha' nyid du//so mas pa ra chen po 'gro bar bya//nag tsha dunaslong mo rgyu/
zas ni bzang pos brgyan pa nyid// de rnams 'jigs shing sa gnas ster// nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun// rdo rje can ni 'kher du 'gyur// skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun// skye bo gang
