zhige bzhi ru phye// dang po dga' ba dang ldan pa// las dang po la sbyin par bya// gnyis pa mchog dag dang ldan pa// snang ba gsum n thib pa la// dga' ba gsum pa dang ldan pa// chos kyi sngonand nges
pasaso// kun tu 'od sa zhes bya ba// red pa bzhi la sbyin par bya// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das snang ba la sogs pa dang/ chos kyi sngon dang/ kun tu 'od rnyed pa la de lta bu'i dbang gi
rgyu rim pa lags na/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa la ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la sogs pa ma red pa rnams la thog mar rang gi ngo bos so// sa la sogs pa red pa//
rnams la mthar thug pa'i rang gi ngo bos so// gang gi phyir zhe na/ de rnams la brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis shan tu bsod nams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen
bo mthong ba tsam gyis thob bo// ji ltar pad yongs susmin pa nyima'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rgyas so// ma smin pa de bzhin du ma yon no// lha mos gsol pa// ma smonapa rnams la yongs su smin
tsha pa'i dus gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin sogs bsod nams bsags pa yis// mchog gi blams gtan la phab// skal ldan mo desmin pa'i dus// de las bla mer
byar chub na// bla med gnas ni thob pa gang// phyi nas rtsayang bar nga mi dgos// blamed sa chen nas/ 'bangamo/ 2 2/ sa lcatshegasagazugs
nI mthong bar 'gyur// de bzhin bla med 'od kyis ni// ye shes chen po mthong bar 'gyur// [0f7a ]sa chen po sku dang bral/ 'gas su pa ranam bal bzhin// lus dang ngag nga yong gzugs
min// sgrolasogs pa rnam par spangs// dpemedanam mkha' dang bral ba// sred dang mya ngana'angs pa//// ra dang ljadra ba sogs/ 9 kajagu// char ya nga thig le dang pra pa ba/ la dang
tshul tsam ma yin te// mchog dang gzhan mchog gnas las grol// skye ba med dang 'chamed pa// rmad byung chen ri 'du shesas// lha mos gsol pa/ kyelacom ldan 'das yags chen
po'i debaduphyug blanamed pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub red pa la yongashasachen po brjod du med pa'i gnas gtan red du yong ngam ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gra sa mang pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum khyod la de lta bu 'dri/ brjod du med pa'i ye shesachen po khyod kyis ci phyal mi zhes de ltar yonan bdag gnang gi ngo bo yang dag pa'i khyod kyis mi shes so/ lha mos
gsol pa/ khyod kyi ngo bdag gis shes// 'on kyang bdag gis gzhan zhig zhus// sems can byang chub las gnyan tu// mchog gi dbang phyug rnying pa 'am// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka'/
stsal pa// byang chub redalas gzhan ci zhig/ zhal bzang mo de red yod dam// 'on kyang de la mthong yod// tshil la bdud rtsi ji bzhinano// lhachos gsol pa/ bcom
ldan dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang phyug/ rang bzhin yi shes sbyin pa po// bdag gis gzhan zhig zhu ba bgyid// de la bka' drin bdag la stsol// dbang gi rim pa'i ye shes grang// bzhi pa de ltare
bzhinano// de la re zhigu ji bzhinadon// rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalapa/ bzhi pa de nyid ngo bor grags// de ltar ye shes 'du shes so// de bzhin yashes

'as byung zhes// meshes las byung lte bar bde/ dalha mo ya shes kha la yod// ye shes las byung skye ru ste// sa ru lengs spyod do bor grags// snying kha run debang shes bya// thim pa kha ru shes bya ste//
bskyed pa'i rim pa yan phyogs// yang nade bzhin gyini sgra// ji bzhin shes rab la sngar thal// de ltar ye shes lta ba yis// bkug nas rang gi kha la bkod// rang gi snying kha'i pad gnas su//
byas nas nyid kyis nyams su myong// de yi skad cig ye shes bde// smyos pa dang bral rtog med pa// sems kyis thams cad mthong nas su// nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya// de yang bsam pa
bor nas su// phyi nas bsam pa ci yang med// nyid ni bde chen ye shes te// nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du mthong// lha mo den rdzogs pa'i rim// don dam par deshes par bya// lha mos gsol pa/
bcom ldan ye shes rin chen nyid// 'dod pa thams cad rab 'grub pa// snang ba bzhi la de rim gnas// mnga' bdag chen pos bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa2[-]//
snang ba bzhin la go mi gnas// sems dang sems byung 'du shesaso// de dag las nam rig 'byung// mtshams kyi 'du shes mtshan nyid can// nyon mo'i rang bzhin sems las 'byung// sems
mtshan mo'i ri bo 'di// yang dag 'od na gsum dang bral// lhan skyes ye shes mtshan 'di do// gang tshe tshangs pa'i tshigs su nyis// lha more tsho nyin mor 'gyur/ rma nga tshe de las srog 'apo ba
de tshomtshan mo 'og na gnas// steng yang ma yin 'ogam min// de tshe mtshams shes dran par bya// de yang ma yi rang bzhin grags/ nyi ma la ni srog 'dzan ma// gang gis nyim yod pani// snang ba
las shar dus 'gyur// snang ba zla ba zhes par bstan// yongs su zhu ba'i bdud rtsi g.yo// lumo chen mo g.yo ba'i phyir// dga' bral dga' bar rab tugrags// gang du chad pa lasan thom/ 3
mchog gi dga' ba shar ba'i dus// de ni snang ba dang po'arigu'// de las mchog ni gsal bar 'gyur// gsang phur snang ba mched par grags// zhu med g.yo mar skaba'o// sa ba las ni phra mo'i
dngos// bde sbyin mang na kun spyod do// kun spyod lasan thob pa yin// zhal bzangamoni snang bas so/ de ni mtshams zhes grags pa ste// dbus kyi gnas su yod pa'i phyir// dbus kya gnas
na yod pa na// de phyir kun du spyod byed pa'o// dbusanadengos po thams cad la// 'dus par byed pa dran pa'o// yang na gang du mtshan mo ni// ma byung nyim nub pa 'o// de ni dbusakyi
mtshams zhes grags// rang bzhin dga' ba sbyin byed ma// de nyid snang ba thob pa yin// thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin no// gang du dbus mtshams skad cig gis// bdo ba'i tshor ba ma shesan// skal
ldan lha mo de ni// dga' bral gsal khama'agyur ba'o// de yi nyamasasumyongashes pa// skyon ni cung zad mi byed po// mashes pas naasal ldan mo// rtsa ba dang bcas med par byed// rtsa bsnang
ba zhes byar dran// khu ba'igazugasan zla ba 'o// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter// bsrubs lasaskyo ba yin pa'i phyir// lha mo me tog snang ba mchod// dmar ba'i phyir ni merab rjod// bde chen/
rnam par smin pa'i phyir// dmar ba'i gzugs sngar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu thob pa'i grags pa ste// mtshan dang dpe khyad dang ldan no// dngos dang dngos min bral ba'i phyir// zhal bzang mtshams
kyi ye shes so// nyin mo snang ba mched 'khor grags// mtshan mo snang ba mya ngan 'das// srid dang mya ngan 'das bral ba// mtshamasanasnang ba thob pa 'o// de lta bu yi gsang chen mchog/ gang du yang
ka gsal ma byas// skal ldan khyod kyi ngor byas pas// ye shes rin chen gsal byas so// lha mos gsol pa/ 'bras bu de nyid rin chen gang// mnga' bdag de ni jo ltar rnyed// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// 'bras bu de ni rin chen gang// den gnyis su bye bar gnas// mchog go dga' pa'i ngelog cig/ mchog gi dga' pa dang bral ba// mchog dga' de bor grags pa ni// nyan
su myong bas red pa yin// mchog gi dga' ba dang bral la// rang lasarab tu gsal bar 'gyur// skal ldan mo gang nyams su myong// de ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no// 2sa su myong mir rdzogs pa
ni gang du sus kyang mi shasaso// ji ltar bu mo lang tshobs// skyes bu med 'u rnam yang min// legs dgyes kyi ni bde myong pa// legs skyes dbang mo mngagasaso// gang zhing sa la/[(]2/ ka[5/]

kyis// de ni bskyod pa'imtshand do// bstod pa dang na rdzogs bral ba// de ni 'bras mchog rang bzhinano// de ru gang zhig sgom pa ni// phrare tshe phra mo yang dag mchog/ gang gis bla na medu sngan nga ga
ba'i ma re yod pa min// bla na med pa'i ye shesache// bzhi dang bral ba rtag tushar// rtag tu shar ba 'as gzhan mi/ gang du ya nga nabasgom yedangang dgad da gang gis bgro na ba de/ a pa ra 2

yongs mi skye// mi skye'i phyir na bsam gtan ngal// gal te khyad par 'ong gyur na// de ni de nyid rang bzhin min// de nying min par the tshom med// de nyid mi bsgom de nyid ni// su zhigang la rong par ka ring
de namakha' la ri mo ni// mchog gi dbang mo 'dri ba'o// lha mos gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'dini// shes pa dang ni bshad pasu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang phyogs
tsa @#// dpal rdo rje'i gnas su u rgyan du rgyal po i dzA ti zhes bya bas shes pa dang/ bshad pa rang/ sems can la gsal bar byed do// lhamos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU tizhes bya ba de sa du'i dbang phyug lags bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbalaye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gzhig ngas bstan pa'i phyag
nardo rje'i rgyal po de nyid on b+hatasprul pa'iskusas bcu'i dbang phyug ye shesakyi skus bcu bzhi'i dbang phyug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rirab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs
bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi rdzu 'phrulagyis snatshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod sbyin

byas nas bstod pa/ de khon nyid bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'i snying po rab mchog rgyal gyuracig/ ye shesanam mkha' skye med gzugasamang brjod mang sku rab rgyal gyur cig/ dngos dang dngos min rogacig ngolo'i
mod byung de nyid rab gtarargyal gyur cig/ stong nyid stong pa nyid mne mchog dang gzhan mchog 'od kyis grub pa rgyal gyur cig/ de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod nas/ 'khor thams cad bcom

ldan 'das dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal bo mchogachen po rmad du byung zhing/ rmad du byung ba re khon nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya brdzogs
rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradzAAkhultas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus tadag par byas so//
rgya gar skad du/ bi'ud+d+haka pA lanA ma yo gnItan rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thodapa zhes M bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
rgyalapo/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa laphyag 'tshal lo// 'disadabadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod
chags dang bral pa'i gtso bo rnams dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i tshig gis rdzong chen po ze/nasasu/ rgyud thams cad dang sngags yang dag par bshad nas/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dang/
par yang dag par spyarabs/ btsumo'i garayongs su mya ngan las 'dasaso// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor ma thams cang rmad du
@#// gyur tegacig la gcig lta zhing/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su ji ltar yongasasu mya ngan las
'das/ de nas rnal 'byoram sna tshogs sde ma la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// lha mosems can bsod nams dman rnams nus pa la zhon par

'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad mchis sam/ gsus pa/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bye ba phrag drug nyid do// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud lan bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid do// mdo sde so so lan bye ba phrag brgyad cu'o//

de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa lan bye ba bsgos pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o// 'dingag thams cad nathub pa'i dbang posaM gsungasaso// sngags dang bral nanargyud kyi nus pa mi snang ste/ rgyud la lar ni ci
nas sngags bye babazlas pa gsungs so// bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyisanusngags 'bum bzlas pas myur bar 'grub par gsungs so// bsod nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub
za bo de ltar rdo rje chen po rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i gtso bos gsungs so// bsod nams chung pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba bzlas pa gsungs so// sems can 'bad rtsol chung po rnams kyis
ka 'bum bzlas par bdag skya'o// sems can sgom pa la nyan pa rnams kyisan khri khonabazlas bya'o// sems can 'dod chags la zhugs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ blun po dang lhugA
pa'i 'gas can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags/ shin tusams la dmigs pa sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ 'di ltar phan tshun skyabasa'abasan dngos grub gzhan du'ang 'gyur ro//

gal te dman pa'i sems kyis nyomongs bzhin pas bye ba brgya bzlas pa de'i tshe bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do// de ltar thosonas rnal 'byor masnatshogs sde na bcom ldan 'das/
kyi zhal la ltapar byed cing zur mig dang brnyas pa'i chags pas bltas te/ shin tu khrobs 'jigs par byed tsang snying rje'i thugs 'khrugs pas/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo// de ltar bzhugs

pa'i lha mo chen mo rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug la de nas des gzigs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu las sngags phyung ngo// o puN+Dasid+d+he susid+d+hi/ a mr-i ta ar ji ru ka pA la so

negro Ta ya trAs ya ho hU~M phaT/ de ltar sngags kyi mchog son pas sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa'i klu rnams bcom par byas shing phu marabyas nas slar 'ongs te sna tshogs sdoma'i zhal du zhugs te/

ba'i nang nas byung nas slar thod par zhugs so// sngags 'di'i mthus klu rnams zhig ste/ sgragacidi dug skyag par gyur to// rdul byung bar gyur to// nor rgyas la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrulatshonapo'i klu tha
cad lhags te/ stobs kyi rgyu dang/ dung skyong dang/ 'jog po dang/ mtha' las dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po la sogs pa klachon bo rnams dang/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dug las byung ba thams cad
kyang lhags so// rnal 'byor mas tshogs sde la kha phyogs te klu thams cad kyis zhus pa/ lhamo bka' cistsol cazhig bgyi zhes snya'o// gsungs pa dang/ gang yang sangs
rgyas nyams sumyong ba de ltar gyis shig/ de ltar thos pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyis thod pa kha phye ste glogasabam byung// nam mkha' la sgra
byung ngo// lha mo sna tshogs sdom zung// sems can kun la phan 'dogs ma// rgyud 'dirgyal po chen po ste// rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba// sems can kun la phan/
byed pa'o// de ltar thos nas sna tshogs snga mas glegs bam mang dag par bzung ste/ phyagan rdo rje la nye bar gtad do// phyag na rdo rje rgyud 'di zung// sems can kun la khade'abab pa// rnal
'byor ma yi dngos grub kun// 'bras bu myur du ster byed pa'i// mnan dang spar ba ye shesache// gong na med pa red dka' ba// gsang ba mchog mas dga' ba// lus kun la ni rnam
par gnas// nam mkha' lding dang char dbab dang// dngul chu bcud kyis len pa dang// bslang dang dbang du bya nyid dang// rmongs dang mngon spyod nyid dang ni// dpung la sogs pa rengs nyid dang//
dusasu zin pa bzlog pa dang// phur bus gdapa dang gsad pa dang// rtag tu sgrub pa byed pa dang// snatshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang// ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma bskyed dang// dpalachonaharug yazho
bskyod ba dang gnas brgyad dang// das dang dngosamad gros med dang// srid dang spyod cing dgos med dang// dgos pas bshad r mchog chen dang// rnal 'byor ma yi mchog chen dang/ rnal 'byor
ma yi 'dus pa dang// nus pa rnam pa mang gsungs pa// thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan ngag pa nyid dang/ de bzhin bstan pa skyong ba dang/ dur khrod 'jigs pa chu bzang
dang// langs sgrub la sogs pa dang/ stobs po rnams dgag pa dang// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gug dang// rims kyi gdung ba 'jigs chen dang// dgra yi la sogs pa cings da nga///

de bzhin gsad dang bslu ba dang// ma snang byed pa mchog/dang na/ mig smanadwang ni ri'i khu nyid// bcud len ral grwa nyid dngan// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// thod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/
mi snang ba mchog chen dang// snatshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam 'phrul dang// rang gi gzugs bsgyurab dang// gzhan gyi lus la gzhugasogs dang// sangs rgyas bye bas rab bsrungs pa'i// sa ngas rgyas
bumo mchog chen rnams// khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs phyongan// gzhan dgasos ltacago dgos// mig 'phrul byed pa nyid dang ni// dge mtshan rnam pa mang shes pa// 'dod pa ldan bsten bzhin
pas// 'di ru'agrub par gdon mi za// 'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po// gcig gis 'bum las rgyal bar byed// skyes pa gcig gis 'dod chen gyis/ bud med 'bum phrag 'dzag
byed cing// rdo rje byed pa red dka' ba// gcig gis thams cad 'dod pa spyad// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// mkha' lding sbyor ba rim ji bzhin// rgyud kun tu yang red/
dka' ba// mu stegs rnams kyi yul man pa// rlung gzhan duyang ma gsungs so// sangs rgyas thod pa'i gzhung ji bzhin// rdo rjemagon pos gsungs pa yi// mkha' ltadi shin tu rmad byung
pa 'jig rten gsum n rnyed dka' ba'i// sbyor ba rnam pa bco brgyad gsungs// sha la ka yi sbyor ba dang// rig pa 'dzin dang rgyun po 'byed// rnga rdung bud med 'phrog pa dang// gshin
bsnyan zhagasar sa 'tshang ba dang// khu byug par s 'byed pa dang// rtag byed chu blugs dung 'bud dang// thod le kor 'phrog skyug pa dang// sa g.yog thal lcag brdab pa dang// yig
gsum bsam gtan gyi ni gtam// 'di rnams kyis ni dgugapar bya// mkha' lding sbyor ba bco brgyad do// 'jig rten gsum norab red dka'// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// rdo rje
mgon po nyid kyis gsungs// de nas gzhan ya nga rab bshad pa// mchog gi ye shes ji bzhin pa// b+haga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs// bde ba chen po ltar byed pa// de nyid ni kun gnas
kyang// byis pa rmongs pas ma shes so// der ni bcud dang bcud len te// de nyid du nisangs rgyas bzhugs// der nadakyil 'khor bzang po 'o// derAnaslob ma dbang bskur ba'o// der ni he ru ka
dpa' bo/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso bo// derani nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa// de nyid du na ro langs bsgrub// der ni dur khrod brgyad po rnams// skad cig tsam kyis bskyed pa'i rgyu// der ni
sangs rgyas bdag nyid che// stong phrag gsum ni rnam par bzhugs// der ni 'jig rten khams kun te// de nyid bcom ldan 'das lha mo// sangs rgyas lasogs bskyed pa'i yum// byang chub
sems dpa' dpa' chen po/ shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen// nyid bsod nams kun star ma// de nyid thar pa star byed ma// phyag rgya chen po grags chen po// dngos grub kun n 'dod
byed ma// ma dang tshamo srong mo dang// bu mo bud med rab brtan ma// shes rab mnyes shing 'jigs byed ma// 'gro drug bde sdug khagachags bcas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das nyid dang// bdag
nadi chen po de nyid de// rnam rtog kun tu rtog pa nyid// de bzhin 'char dang nub pa dang// nyin mtshan mal stan bza' ba dang// nges pa'i brtul zhugs rtsis dang grangs// rnam par mi rtog
yang dag rtog/ dman dang mchog dang bar m dang// gzhan dang gang dang de dang ni// de nyid bdag nyid chen po gcig/ de sems can kun la bdo ba 'bab// de ltar thos nas phyagan rdo rje la sogs
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ 'dod can m la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams dga' ba'i spyan gdangs nas sna tshogs sde tsho la yang dang yang du btung de/
'di ltar gsol to// e ma'o sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma// sems can kun la bde 'bab ma// glegs bam don dang ldan gang zhig/ de kun sangs rgyas byin brlabs
bshad// de nas phyagan rdo rje'i phyag gnyis glang po che'i lag pa ltar rab tu brkyang ste/ glegs bam yang dag par blangs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i

gnasasu don dang bcas pa'i gzhung zhu bar gyur to// phyag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas byung ste/ snatshogs sde ma'i thugs su ngal bsos so// de nas phyag na rdo rjeganod sbyin gyi bdag po chen posan la 'byor
mtshan mo la 'di ltar gsol to// sngags kyi bzlas pa gang zhig lags// las kyi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'grub// sngon du bsnyen pa gang zhig lags// mkha' lding 'grub pa'i nges pa gang//
dngul chu bcud len snyatshogs pa// dngos grub ster byed gang zhig lags// sngar dang mnan pa gang gsungs dang// dus dang bya ba'i dris bcas dang// dngos grub thob dus gang zhig lags//

sangs rgyas ji lta buru ba rjoraM/ de bzhin thod pa ji lta bu// sna tshogs sde ma'ang ji lta bu// theg pa chen po ji lta bu// rnal 'byor ma yi rnam nges ci// gsungs pa/ rgyud 'di sngon du bsnyen pa med/
de bzhin yul dang dus tshes dang// gza' dang rgyu skar sbyor med pa// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsten// dus dang bya ba'i ngos mi bya// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// thos pa tsam gyis/
'grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes su gsungs// thod pa gru gsum yang dag 'byung// sbyor ba dang ldan ja lta bu// sbyor bgasang bar gnas pa'i rtsa// de yi sna tshogs ngo mtshar byed//
nibade chen ye shes so// 'di nyid theg pachen po ste// rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung// de ni rmad byung che mchog ste// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba nyid// de nyid he ru ka dpa' bo//
'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bde ba 'bab// rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs bde// dpa' dbang bdag mo dbang
shugam// de ya bod pa'i dkyil 'khor la// sngags dang rgyudan rnam par gnas// de yi ye shes bzang po ni// lhan cig skyes pa dag las byung// de ni rig pa'i dbang lnga dang//
sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te// snatshogs sbyor dang tshe 'phel dang// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub par 'adir na gdon mi za// man
ngag lam las gang shes pa// bla ma'i drin las shes par bya// sangs rgyas thod nga 'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang pa'i yang shan tsugasang ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos
grub thams cad dang/ gshes gtan la dbab pa dang/ thod pa kha phye ba las glogasaM bam byung pa'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ sngags
le'u ji bzhin gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'grom mo 'byung po rnams// sngags gang gsan 'grub 'gyur ba// de na de dag gis rab bshad kyis// khyod kyis dad pa brtan
pas nyon// o khu ka pA la ni ta lnga spo Ta ya sarba shu b+hapra dAyon hUM phaT/ spos dbul ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA la nam rngam Ta a sAhA/ me tog dbul ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA lA la

badri pa ra ba ra taT taT sta Taya sta Ta ya ma Ta ma Ta hU~MhahisAhA/ drodabul ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni grostsagro ts+tshagro ts+tshapa ya hri ts+tsha pa ya ba ra ba ra ta Ta ta Ta/ sta Ta ya sta ba ya ma'u hU~M hU~M hU~M swAhA/

blo mar ma dbul ba'i sngags so// o buts+tshaka pA lan/ gro rgyugaM h+phagro tsA pa ya hU~M h+phapa ya kA khAhU~M/ lha bshos dbul ba'i sngagasaso// oM ma hA ka pA la na badzra d+harma d+harma ma h+phe ba ri pra ba re ba re ba rakar
ka ra/ taT taT ha swA hA/ gos dbul ba'i sngags so// oM hAhi ho hi hohaha/ go tsha'i sngags so// oM bud+d+haka pA la ni a khaM kro ng+hashI aa hUM hUM phaT/ spyan drang ba'i sngags/

oM ma hA ka pA li badriNigats+tshagats+tsha u tilau ti/ dza dza dza hadzaji/ tA lo tsa ba tre pA Ni hU~M phaT gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM ma hAkaM pA la brje tsitAsu tsa tre a lam+pane phrin yA/

[# ]sarba b+hU tan ma ra NakA la ya duTun utsuT ya sarba big+ho bi drwa pa ya b+ha ga ba ti yak+Sha rakA sa pishA tsanashe laya tekra ya sap+ta pA tA la ga tan/ sa ras ra/ prasar pra sar/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT
thaT phaT/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngagasaso// 'bras sA lu blangs pa'o mas bkrus la bu mo gzhon nu mas de shin tu zhib par btag par bya/ de'anga shes rab can gyis gzugs
brnyan byas te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ba gzhung bzhin cang te'u dang/ kha TaM ga dang/ ral gri dang/ thod pa 'dzin pa'o// de nas ro bsregs pa'i sol ba phyi mar byas la rdo rje gtsug gis mnye
bar bya'o// de nas des gzugs brnyan la byug par bya'o// me tog dzakar pos mchod par byas te/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas he ru ka'i rnam pa'i sbyor bas sngags brgya rtsa brgya dbazlas
par bya'o/ oM ma hAbadzra he ru ka badzra/ rnar g+hor/ d+hu ru d+hur/ ma sUdza na so Ta na sha hUMsA d+ha ya swo pA ya kAl ya hUM phaT/ sngags 'di tshul lan bdun du mngon par bzlas te gzugs brnyan de
bkru bar bya'o/ chu des rang gi gdong bkrus na ma snang bar byed de/ lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' 'o// nags kyi nang du stag gas kyang mi mthong ngo// gzhan dgags kyang de mthong bar mi 'gyur
ro/ srog chags 'bum gyi nang du song na ngomatshar sna tshogs byed do// gang gis kyang ma mthong ngo// lha'i bu mo 'phrog cing lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo// 'o mas gdeng bkrus pa tsam gyis ni
mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzugs bon po'i snying kar shang 'ba' bo las phul te/ dur khrod kyi me la 'ba' bo las dang tshangs pa rdo rjes rab tu sbyar la/ de'i thal ba yang dag par blas te/
kham phor du gzhag par bya'o// yang na pad+ma'i snod du'o// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bazlas par bya'o// oM bud+d+hAka pA lineTAhU~M/ oM badzrapi li so nA gIn+d+hihU~M//

o kam nikhaM hU~M/ o pA tA lA ba sI nAM a/hU~M/ o tsi tra/ sa nAs ma ya tiSh+Thaya shrAhU~M/ sngags 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shanetu red par daka' 'o// thal ba de dang rdo rje gtsug gis
lus byug par byas na/ srod du lus la mtshonachas phog pa de srid du mi tshugs so// sur zhing dgra thams cad kyi mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang snang ba la bltas na de long bar 'gyur ro//
gang zhig sdang ba'i sems 'dzin pa de skyo bar 'gyur ro// thal ba de nyide dang mar khu bzang pos mig phyugs na dpag tshad stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang ci'ang rung ba'i sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i
gter dpag tshad stong gi 'og tu son po'i dngul dang/ gsar dang/ rin po che gang na yod pa de thams cad la srani lag gis sdigs mdzub byas pa tsam gyis thams cad mdun du lhags
te gsol pa 'debs so// kye sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byorapa gter leng lasems can gyi don gyis shig/ der gter blangs na gang 'dod pa de byed do// thal ba de dang go ro
tsan lhan cig bsnos te/ mdzub mos mnyes pas dpung gi tshogs langs pa'i nang du mdzub mo bskor ba tsam gyis 'bum phrag stong gis dpung rnams khas phub tu ltung bar 'gyur ro//
gang 'dod pa de byed do// bkras pa tsam gyis langs par 'a di la the tsom mad de// thal ba de dang zha nye'apha ma dang bsdos te gtsug tu byas la/ rdo rje'i gtsugarjes su byin te khab 'dren gyi

lcags kyi phye ma bsu zhing gser gyi phyi ma'ang nyung zad bsre bar bya'o// rdo rje'i chu'i khu ba dang lhan cig tu bsnos tazangs ma'i snod du ma bdun gyi bar du gzhag go/ de nas mkhris pachen po mnyes te/
rta'i khrag dang lhan cig tubasnos la/ yang snod de nyid du ma gsum du gzhag ra ra bya'o// de nas bton te lcags kyi snod du gzhag par bya'o// zangs ma'i snod du bzhag pa de ma'i nang du bcugan gser
dang dngul pu'agyur bar som mngaro// srang gcig kyang srang stong gi rin thang du 'gyur te rin po cha dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gser de ma shagacig dang dngul srang gcig bsres te me la bzhun srang sum

brgya'i rin thang gi tshad du 'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med de// 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' 'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po

snying rje dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po stobs che ba de rnams kyis kyang sbyin par mi nusaso// 'di yi sbyor ba red dka' ba// sangs rgyas thod pa'irgyud du gsungs// rgyud gzhan rnams su sbas pa yin//
'dus sogasarnal 'byor rgyud du ni// sbyor ba rnam pa ma gsungs pa// gang tshe sngon du bsnyen po'i tshe// de yi sbyor bas ci zhig bya// bsod nams dman pa'i soms can gang// mtshams
mdu lnga ni byed pa yang// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di lta'i spyi ba 'grub par 'gyur// dngos po thamase blo chen rnams// sems can don la gcig tu brtson//
srang gcig gis bsras bya ba'i rin// sbyor ba kun tu dpar dka'// sbyor ba glegs bam la mi bri// bla ma'i drin las shes par bya// bla mas dngos grub bla mas thar//
bla ma ston pa rnams kun pa// des na slob ma blo can gyis/ 'bad pas bla ma ma nyas par bya// thal ba de 'de kyis ltas lta ba'i don du bu mo'i mgo la blugs kyi rdo rje'i gtsug gis bu mo/
bkru'o// yang thal bas thig le byas la/ tshangs pa rdo rjes maN+Dal gru bzhi byas te/ de'i dbus su bu mo gzhag par bya'o// bdug spos rdzas bdugs shing sangs rgyas thams cad
kyis byin gyis brlabs na bu mo la 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba ston to// bu don gyi 'bras la sngags 'di lan bdun du mngon par bsngags

sa/ o bud+d+hA ka pA la no di hi/ da ha da hid dwapa ya da dA pa ya ha ha b+ha ga ba ti shrI g+ho khad gaM d+ha ra habud+d+hA ka pA la badzras mdzA ma laM g+ha ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT a phaT/ yungs kar bsnonapa tsam gyis ni//
bu mo grags chen m ni rgod// de yi kho nas ral gri bdun// 'byung ba la ni tha tsem mad// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas skad cig ma de nyid la 'grub par 'di'i som nyi mad do// de lta'i la
gri gcig grub pas bye ba brgya stong gi rig 'dzin ba grub pas bskor bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni 'jige rtan gsum na'ang red par dka' 'o// bu mo bkrus pa tsam gyiso rnal mar 'gyur
ro/ du'i thol ba lcags gsum gyis dkris te ra'i bu byas nas khar bcug pa tsam gyisan mi snang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab can gyis sum cu pa 'ang bskor ro// sangs rgyas thams cad
kyis kyang mi gzigs so// ril bu lag par blangs pas dngos po gang dang gang la reg pa tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro// thal ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka'//
obuN+Da ka pA la dza hU~M khaMraMa/ 'jig rten gsum sgrub pa'i sngags so// oM bud+d+hA ka pA la ne blo/ dgra rlag pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka pA la badzrakha kha khA hi khA hi sarba duShAnag+ha g+ha

ga ta yag+hA ta ya sarbob rdzuahi hUM hUM phaT/ bsad pa'i sdugs so// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shanetu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ thal ba'i sbyor
bdeng/ las sna tshogs gtan la dbab pa dang/ sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ sna tshogs sde ma la btud da
'di skad ces gsol to// sems can don la gcig brtson pa// legs so bcom ldan 'das lha mo// 'di lta'i rab tu sbyor zhes pa// rgyud gzhan dag tu ma gsungs shing// sangs rgyas
kun gyis rab sprus pa// de ni 'bad de gsal bar mdzod/ lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ klu'i le 'u ni ji lta bu// sas rgyas thod pa rnal 'byor ma// rgyud
du lha rnams du zhig gsungs// der gzugs na jo lta bu// gus pa yis gnyen par 'tshal// gsungs pa/ ri las nyi ma bsam par bya// nyi ma'i steng du hU~M byung ba'i// rdo rje nag
po srog pa'i bdag/ rdo rjed nyid 'od zer gyis// rab dra ba'i mtshams bcing ngo// de bzhin rdo rdzunag gyur pa// rdo rjes gzhi bsam par bya// rdodra'i sa gzhi'i dbus chud par/ a yi
rnam pa bdag nyid ma// gru gsum kham gsum 'dag 'de can// yi ga laM gyuras yin// dkyil 'khor gru bozhi ba so ba'o// dab debus gnas sa bon ni// yi ge mos chos bdag
nyid// o las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsa rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs// rtsa ni drug cu la rgyan dang// sprul pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'od pa//
des na rtsa brgya nyi shu 'o// rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid ma// shes rab can gyis de ltar sams// de yi dbus gnas sa bon ni// bai dkarayaM gi las byung ba// rnyiyi dkyil 'khor zlum po 'o// rtsa
rnams thams cad nu Ti ni// dkyil 'khor la ni thim par bgyur/ slar yang bsam par bya ba ni/ r-idamar las byungama'i dkyil 'khor// gru gsum 'bar ba'i bdag nyid tsan// rab tu
'bar bzhin pa yi ni// rtsa ba'i bakhor lo yang dag blta// de nas bsam par bya ba ni// yaMgyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zla ba phyed pa'i rnam 'dra po// rtsa rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i gzugs/
thim 'gyur 'khor lo'i rig par gsungs// de dag thams cad thim gyur pa// da yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa// de ltar shes par byed gang zhig/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
denas zla ba bsam par bya// zla ba'i stong du nyi ma 'a// de yi dbus rgyud sa bon ni// hU~M dang a yi rang bzhin no// ya go ka yis habargyan te// kA ni ha la thim par 'gyur// ma phyed pa yi/
hadang haM// gas ka'i bdag nyid can blta 'o// han mishegs shes rab kyi// bdag nyid dbu dang yi gi dwag/ gnyis ka gcig tu gyur pa ni// yi ge rgyu ga mchog blta lo// hUM las
byung ba'i bod zar rnams// de yi bod ba bsul te/ ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can// nyi mar lhan cige zhu gyur cing// dkyil 'khor gnyis ka gcig gyur pa/ nyi ma'i mchog tu blta bar bya//
ya ni b+ho byung 'od zer des// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la// reg ma thag pa'i mod la ni// rtsa yi 'khor la las 'bab 'gyur// zhu ba de yis sa bon bkru// hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ste//
dbus su de nyid kyis byin brlabs// sa bon rdo rje las byung ba// dpa' bo khrag 'thung mdog sngon po// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// gtso borgyu zhes bdon pa ste// spyi la krung phyed pa 'i tshe
kyi// dgar gyis gnas// gnyis ka'ang khro ba'i bdag nyid can// stag gi pags pa ni bza' mnabs// mgo bo rlon pa'i 'phrang ba 'chang// bsags su mchod pa'i
thogs pa yi// shin tu bzhad pas 'jigs che bgi/ gtso be sAng lnga'i bdag nyid blta// dpung rgyan mgul do 'khor gdub dang// gcar gu rus pa'i ska rags 'ching// g.yar ka bcas
pa'i rkang gdub can// ma lus bdud rnams 'dzoms par byed// ral pa'i cod pan yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga yis brgyan// zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha// dbu la sna tshogs
rdo rjes mnan// 'khor lo rna cha gdu bu dang/ phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis mtshan// thal pa'i rdul can 'jags par byed// thod pa gti mug gis brgyan pa// dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa//
sgyu byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no// gtso chen de yi shes rab ma// sna tshogs sdu ma rnal 'byor ma/ gcer bu mgo bo'i'i phreng ba spangs// rgyun mad mchod phyir thogs med ma// bad ba kun gyi gzug
can ma// phyag gnyis skra grol ba go/ haru ka la 'khyuda gnas ma// da ltar pha rol phyin lha mo// kha dog dmar mo rnam gsal ma// zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba// cung zad mche ba gtsigs
aSha 'jigs ma// g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yo kha tsA bod pa'o// rang gi lus skyes 'od zer gyis// rtsa mi 'khor lo bskul bar bya// du yase bskul pa tsam gyis ni// rtsa yi 'khor
ba lo'i ring bzhin las// 'dzag 'gyur 'direnakhri tsam med// 'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma// brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog/ mchod pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa yis// mgon po haru ka mchod/
de rdordzamagon po 'di gar gnasal// derdzas cha ba ma yasen// thod pa khrag gis bkang bzung ste// gzi brjid chen po gso bar mdzad// rdo rje pho rtabadag nyid che// dbang ldan du ni
cang te'u rdung// rdo rje gadung madri snod dang// me yi phyogs su rnam par gnas// rdo rje can ma grags chen mo// mchod yon snod can bden bral na// rdo rje gcigs ma lho yi ni// phyugs
narnga bo cha 'dzin gsungs// rlung du rdo rje lta ba la// ri bong can gyi snod 'dzin no// nub tu rdo rje 'jigs ma ni// ce sbyang phyag na 'dzan par gsungs// byang du 'dod chags rdo rjem// lha mo'i ga
pas gtso bo mtshod// da ltar ho ru ka bsams nas// rnal 'byor mnabargyad kyis mchod// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom// sna tshogs rol mo mchog gsungs dang// dri zhim lnga dang ma
tog smyos// 'di dag gis nigatso bo mchod// mchod yon zhal bsil de bzhin khrus// glu yi mchog ni rnam mang pos// mgon po khrag 'thung bdag nyidam/ 'di dag gis ni mchod par bya//
dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag 'dzag pa de las rnala'abyor ma// rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa// bde gshegs kun gyis byin barlabs pa// sna tshogs
rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs// gzugs ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan// lenib cu dang ga nyis bon pa/ phyag g.yas byang chub sems/
bkang ba// bum pa a ma'i sbug bcas bsnams// zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis// ha ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig/ rgyal gyur cig ces 'di ltar smra// mgon pas mdun du bltas nas ni// dbang
bskur mchog ste gsol ba gdab// bcu dang ldan pa'i grogs chen mo// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ dbang bskur ba yis bdag bsgral phyir// rdo rjen la 'byor mas khrus shig/
dpon bu tshamad pa'i khyim// shi ba tsam gyis stongs pa de// da bzhin dbang dang bral na ni// ye shes kun gyis stongs pa nyid// dpan pa wang sbyor kun tshogs// rgyud dang phral na rdung
mi rung// de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni// sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur// rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par// bdag ni debang bskur zhes smra ba// ji srid sangs rgyus bzhugs
kyi bar// slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro// de ltar shes bya rnal 'byor ngas// slar yang bdag la dbang bskur cig/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba
gdab// gal te dbang bskur med na ni// he ru ka ru bdag gyur cig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams// rgyal gyur rgyal gyur ces smra zhing// bcom ldan dbang bskur khrus gsol lo//
tsam/ phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi// dbang bskur tsam gyis nam mkha' ya// dkyil nas rnga yi sgra grags cing// me tog tsan dan cha'i 'bab 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams// rtsa yi/
'khor lo la ni thim// sas rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na mad pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ lha bskyed pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
rdo rje sde la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ci yi phyir na bdag cag rnams// 'od zer gyis ni 'tshal te mchis// bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas
phyag na rdo rje ganod sbyin gyi bdag pos/ rnal 'byoram sna tshogs snga ma la 'di skad ces gsol to// nor rgyus la sogs bdag nyid ma// klu rnams ci'i phyir dgug pa lags// rnal 'byor
chen mo bdag la gsungs// de nas sna tshogs snga ma'i sangag 'od zer gyis klu thams cad kyi snying ka dang spyi bo'i mthar thug par zhugs te/ tshim par byas nas slar log go/ de nas klu do/
rnams thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// lha mo bka' ni ci zhag stsol// kye lags ji lta bu zhig bgyi// gsus pa/ mu stags la sogs mkha' lding sngags//
yo shes las byung ji lta bu// dus su zin pa ji lta yin// ji ltar dug ni skye bar 'gyur// sbrul gyis zin pa tsam gyis na// slar yang sems can ba ma 'gyur zhing// zhus pa/ khyab/
'jug dbang phyug sogs lha dang// tshangs pa tshangs pa mdunan 'don// de rnams la ni 'chi ba bo mchis// dug gi nyes pas gnod par 'gyur// de ltar dus su zin
ces smra// sprul gyi dug ni sol ba med// da bzhin sprul la dug ni yod// sprul zin 'tsho bam ma 'tsho ba// bad byed la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// lha de rnams ni de ltar smra// stong pa
stong nyid ngas gsungs pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bse gsungs// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// sbrul gyi dug na ji ltar yod// gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin//
dus dang dus min ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar spyod cing ji ltar bsdu// gang phyir 'dzin cing gang du 'dzin// sems can dug zin ma 'chib// stong nyid smra ba'i nges pa yin// 'dod chag
gti mug stong pa nyid// grags chen yul ni stong pa nyid// yul gyi ring bzhin dri ma med// dram dang bral ji ltar dug/ sbrul gyis kyang ni ci zhig byed// tha mal pa yi yul ni sprul//
mul gyis nyes pa dug nyid do// lha rnams yul rnams kyis ni bsgribs// thams cad dus su zin pa yin// yul gyi sa pa sbyangs pa nyid// stong pa longs spyod gos mi 'gyur// sangs
rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod kun nye bar longs spyod bya// ri sogs sbyor ba rnyed dka' dang// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pas// 'dileni klu rnams thams cad lhags// de
phyire rab nges lha mo kyi// dus zin tha tsom mad pa ru// blo med mu stags can de sna// 'di ltar smras te klu rnams kyis// sna tshogs sde mar phyag 'tshal te// rang rang gi ni gnas su dong// de nas
bcom ldan 'das mas yul gyi nyes pa spong ba'i sngags gsungs pa// o'u n+ya tAdzA na badzra sa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM/ stong dang stong min mtha' dag bcas// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur gcig/
'jig rten mtha' dag brdzun gyis bcings// kye lags bshes mo 'di ltar ltos// da nus phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po tshan pos/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs
ta 'di skad ces gsol to// ri skegs sbyor ba red dka' ba// lha mo yi ni bshad du gsol/ sems can don la gcig tu 'bad// de ru bdagu la ltad mo mchis// gsungs pa/
dkyil 'khor mad par sbyan mi bya// slobo mkhasdu bar mi bya'o// gtso bos ji ltar gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor las ni smra bar bya// mtho lnga pa yi sa bzung ste// khor yug tu ni

gru bzhi 'o// de yi phyed kyi zlum po la// brgyud las 'dam skyes 'dab ma brgyud/ oM hU~M hU~M khaM hU~M a hUM tiSh+Tha ti badzras ma ya a d+hiSh+Thayad/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so// badza?he ru ka badzra sa ma

ya hri sarba dus ma ya mu dra pa b+haM dzaha hUM ru lu ru lu byo hU~MhU~M phaT/ sa sbyang ba'i dus su gto'o me gtang bo'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hin+d+ho na mi daM su tra tiSh+Tha ma tsa la ha he bud+d+ha ka pA
la badzra he ru ka hUM hUM tha tha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du srad bu la mngon par basngags par bya'o// thige skud kyi sngags so// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po// rta babs
bzhi dang yang dag ldan// kha khyer snam bu sbyangs pa la// ba dan rnam pa brgyud kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdul tshon gzhan dang 'dres med pa'i// rdul tshon dmar
por rdzogs par bya// de ru bum pa bzhi po rnams// tshig dang grwa ru rnam par gzhag/ bum par mtshan ma bri bya ba// thod pa dang ni ba hUM ga/ gri gug dang ni cang te'u dang// cang te'u gnas su
do rdza bri// rdo rje'i steng du 'dam skyes te// de ltar bum par bris byas nas// chu yis yongs su dgang bar bya/ bum pa la ni res kyis brgyan// rin chen rnam pa lnga gzhug cing// bum par
kun nas 'bru lnga dang// a ma'i lcug mas dgab par bya/ de nas 'o ma'i snod bzhag ste// de rjes slob dpon blo mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas byed pa'i sbyor dang ldan// pad+ma'i stang du nyi ma ste//

Ni ma'i ga nga du hUM yi ga bsam// hU~Mgyur pa las rdo rje/ sngon po hU~M ga bdagating skyes// tshudang rdo dzabyung dpa' bo// he ru ka ni bdag nyid che// sku mdog sngon po phyag bzhi pa// gtso bo tshan/
ca po zhal gcig pa// g.yas na gri gug thod pa ste// g.yon na kha ni rdo rje lo// sku la mi mi rus pas brgyan// klu rnams skrag par byed pa po// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// gcer bu
[4]'jigs byed rang bzhin te// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// dbu skra sar zhing gyen du 'bar// thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas pa/ sa 'og bdun ni 'khrug par byed// dpa' bo de ltar bsam
par bya// phyis ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// oM dang hU~M dang khaM dang / yi ge yongs su gyur pa las// rnal 'byob ma rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs sde ma 'dod can ma// sa 'og gnas ma rab
bathang ma/ lha mo de dag mdog sngon mo// grags chen zhal gcig phyag bzhi me// rtima'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhugs// g.yon brkyang ba ya zhebs kyis bzhugs// g.yas na
gri gug thod pa 'dzin// g.yon na kha hUM cang te'u// rus rgyun lha mo kun 'jigs ma// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs// skra ni sar po gyen du 'bar//

thod pa'i 'phreng bas spyi bo brgyan// de rnams mgo brgyus 'phrang ba can// lha mo'i bod zer spros gyur ngas// klu rnams skrag par mdzad ma lo/grod pa'i 'phrang bas spyi bo brgyan// da rnams mag rgyas snang ba

phyogs kyi 'dab bzhugs cher bzhad ma'o/ ba'i bzang nam mkhar 'gro ma su/ mtshams kyi 'dabblo ldan mtshams kyi 'dab bzang la// nyam bzhi lo hU~M yig bano// hU~M yig so sor gyur pa las// chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung ba ma// bzhin bzang
byas lha mo na// g.yas na gri gug cang te'u 'dzin// g.yon na kha TaM thod pa'i// sku las 'od zer ser po 'phro// shin tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan// cung zad mche
ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// thams cad gar byed skya ser ma// klu rnams skam pa skyed byed ma!/ mtshams kyi mdu par gnas// de nas bsam par bya ba ni// slob dpon he ru kas rang gi
lus las skyes pa'i 'ad kyis phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg par byas nas slar log ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg pa'i
'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros pas/ he ru ka dang rnal 'byor ma brgyud lhan cig tu bkrus so/ bkrus pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du gyur te// dkyil
'khor rdzogs par mthong nas ni// slob dang na bdag nyid chen po yis// phyis ni gtor ma gtang bar bya// khyad par du zhu 'o ma 'o// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pa'i// shes rab can
gyis chang btung zhang/ mar me bzhi ni dbul bar bya// 'bras bu bzhi yang dbul bya zhing// de nas slopa ma blo chen gyis// ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya// der na gdan yang bstab par/
bya/ slob dpon padag nyid chen po yis// de ru rnal 'byor ma mchod do// blo gros chen po thugs dgyes pas// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom// dpa' bo rnal 'byorom tshom bya// mgu
0 bar sems pa'i yod kyis ni// 'khor lo khyad par mi bya ste// phyis ni slob dpon brtse chen bdag/ phyi rol sa ru byung nas// bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te// slob mas maN+Dal gsum byas la///
bla ma me tog sna tshogs mchod// zhabs la spyi gtugs 'di skad gsal// ston pa bcom ldan bla ma kye// sems can don la gcig brtson pa// nam mkha' lding bzang sbyor ba dang// sha la
ka yi sbyorab 'tshal// dus su zani ra bzlog pa yi// sems can don na bzang po ba tshal// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byorang// ston pa chen pos de dag gsungs// bdag gi the tshom
bzlog pa dang// sems can don ni mthar thug bgyi// brtan pa dang ni rgyu ba dang// yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi// dug rnams dug med par bgyi zhing// sems can thams cad 'tsho
bgyi ba// bla ma chen po de dag gsungs// de nas slob dpon brtsi ba yis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i thugs kyis ni// khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi// slob ma la ni so shing sbyin// so
shang sngags ni sbyin par bya// oM hU~Mha b+ha ga lu ti mu khaM pa ri shud+d+haM ku ru swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la// so drud nas na ba bshal te// slob ma lhag par gnas pa bya// rang
ga lag pa byug bya zhing// me tog gis kyang dkri bar bya// mgron pa lag par zla ba bsam// zla ba'i zer gyis phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon za za// sangs rgyas tshogs kun
@#// zla ba ra blta// grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing// zla ba zhu bar gan gyi khra// skyob dang 'a h+phes pa 'anus pa yis// slob ma 'a mdo ru 'a ga bzhag ste//

lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// oM sarba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka su kA ya ma d+hin ya ma shu la tsA ts+tshA[– ]ti ha ra ha 2/ pa d+ha ra ba d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tra pa tAr/ b+ho b+ha ga pIta ab

bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra sa ka ti ma la ya shA hUM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM haha/ sngags 'di lan bdun du bzlas ngas lcag paro gnas pa/sma bya'o// ngas rgyas pa dag thams cad kyis de'i klu ka ya 2 tsa ra byin gyis
rlob par 'gyur ro// lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum pa'i ng bdor ro/ nor ka la sogs pa'i spobs po che rnams dpyod m+man gyu kar kye ma'o
sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// lhag par gnas pa tsheg gyis ni// 'a da lta'i sdug bar snga' shob 'gyur na// mkha' lding rta ba nga 'i sems na gyis/ bdag ni ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ da
ma thag tuslob dpon gyis/ dkyil 'khor nang du me togani// rnam pa sna tshogs dngul bar bya// sna tshob das spros/[']la lta bshes dbul// dung nga zangs chos snod dag ni// man ji'i stang
ka dugazhag par bya// ko da yon gyi na don ched du// bum pa rnams lhag gnas rgya/ khrag 'thung go la rang kanas pa yis// rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba yi// khrag 'thung rnam pa spyan dra
te// dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan/ mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams sa bon gyi// 'od zer gyi ni rnam par bsam// bdag nyid chen po grags chen po//
bum pa ru na zhugs tsam gyis// dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhu bar gyur// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang ni// slob dpon gyis na 'di ltar blta// de nas zangs ma'i snod du chu blugs shing dung
yor chus bkang ste/ man ji'i steng du gzhag par bya'o// yang phyir byung nas slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o// ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis
dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhug la chus gtor te sngags bzla'o/ a g+ho Shiny+tsan tshwa sacha yo ga ni ma ku Ta a d+hi yaMtu a paM tu hUM swA hA/ cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de nas slob
dpon gyis skye khyod su zhes sna/ slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhiso sba'o// de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog lan gsum du gtor 'a// mag ras bsal te dkyil 'khor

mchod par bya'o// oM he ru ka badzrapup+payaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ dbus su'o// otsatra sa nA pu yaM pra tIts+tsahU~M/ shar du'o// o kAmin pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ lho yi'o// o pA tA la pA sa ni pul+layaM

pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ nub tu'o// oM su b+ha dra du yaM pra tItset+taM/ byang du'o// o sha Da no pul+layaM pra tIts+tshahU~M/ mer ro// oM bud+d+hin pup+payaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ bden bral du'o// o tsa tur b+ha tra puShA yi pra tIts+tshAhU~M/
rlung du'o// oM a A bA si ni puyaM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ dbang ldan du'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog ji lta bu dang mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du slob ma la bstan
par bya'o// yang dung phor zlangs te chu btung bar bya'o// de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cung skyo bas dug skyug por 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang// gzhan
yang sbyar ba dang nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang/ mda' dug dang/ byug pa'i dug dang/ dgu rnams kyis gang sbyar ba dang/ bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i dug de rnams nye bar 'apho bar
'gyur ro// gal te klu yis zin pa yang// de ru du nangs par 'gro// gzhan yang sprul gyi dug kyang rung// chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang// de dog thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi
ts+tso phyirin dung ga chu// 'di ru btung bar the tshom med// de nas slob ma dri bar bya// 'di ni sha li kar byed cing// mkha' ldaye shes pa'i slob dpon 'gyur// bsam pa rnam par dag shes/
nas// phyis ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya// stong ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab// de nas sngags kyi man ngag sbyin// ji srid sbrel gyis bran dus dang// ji srid mkha' lding rags
yod par// de srid de dang de las kyang// ja srad dus su zin med par// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min// dus zan 'chapa' nga shes bya ste//
nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya// dus su smin no zhes smra ba// da sud rnal 'byar na 'a de zhes// de ru las ni brtsam par bya/ bdag nyid nyaru kar gyur rung// rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang
dag ldan// blo ldan sngon gsungs gsang sngags kyis// phyis na gtor ma sbyin par bya// de rjes dkyil 'khor du sa nas ni// sngon du gsungs ba'i gsang sngags kyang// gnas
dbu ru ni mchod par bya// mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes// mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams partsam// gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yod// de ru sems bzang 'od zer spro// klu
rnams kyi ni snying bskams pas// su zhig bgyi 'o zhas ni sna// gsung pa/ lha mo sna tshogs snga ma pa// sangs rgyas byed par sngon du bya gsungs// kye kyi grags pa che ba'i/ song
sa bde dus zin gyur pa'i// dus ban 'dzin dang gzung ba med// dug mad sbrul dang med pa'o/ gang phyir dgas pa/ las gyur pa// de la ru skye bo rnams 'chir 'gyur/ de nas
'od dror slar log ste// snying ka ru ni thim par 'gyur// yang sems na na nyeg bzhag pa'i// slob dpon gyis na nga mtshar bstan// de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i lta ba blangs la par
chags risags gnyis bya zhang stod dka/ra po byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i sol ba khag par ba'o// lo bsregs pa'i so la ba la stag tsha byas te/ sems can gyi don rig pas de na kha pus[“]sa

bri bar bya'o// oM bud+d+hA ka pAl ni hri ted tha ba ya b+ho sha la keg na a na ya na buN+Da ka pA la badzra A dzAm liM g+ha ya hU~M hU~Ms raM tu sawad TIka pha ti katsa ta/maM d+ma gru ti sarba dzi in su naM ta pa

yag ra re kar ko Ta ka pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dzan spu taM ti mu jan 'a ris spu a ba sa skya ma tsa la ha ma bu la ha dza e tsal dbu la ha ro ra b+ha ru kri pra b+hi ta ya nA ga rA dza'i u ha pu'u Ta mu d+hi pra na dza i/ zhes pa nisha la ka'i
snying po'i sngags so// da nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas// sems ni shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// yongs rdzogs sha la ka byas la// pho dang mo ru brtag par bya// snag tsha yis ni bri bar bya// mig
gisngon du mi bzhag cing// sha la ka bzang pos phyogs blta// de nas lcag ma sngags kyis bsngags// oM haM ha la khyab 'jug gi sa bon no// oM ba tshangs pa'i sa bon ni// oM saM zhes bya ba ni
blo zhi byed kyis bon no// oM ha ha ha ha ha ha haM sAhA/mngag pa'i sngags so/ 'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog/ stong gsum na yang red par dka'// lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni// bgro
bar 'dir na the tsom med// klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi// mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas ni// klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe// mkha' lding bya ba'i stobs dang ldan// ri nas kyang
na ga shog rlung gis// stobs po che yi klu rnams sgrog/ mtho ris mi yul sa 'og dang// gang yang gzhan ni gnas pa dang// gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad// skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni slu//
wa klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shi na// bdag nyid chen po sha la ka mthong m thag leng bar 'gyur ro// klu dang sngal de dag gis ka li ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi sha 'di ka gzhan du
gsung bar ma mdzad cig/ de ltar thos nas sha ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbal long ba khyer te 'jog go/ de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/ sa'i gong bu blangs lasha
la ka mngag pa'i sngags kyis sbrul leng ba la bstan no// skad cig de nyid la de'i mig dbye bar 'dir som nyi med do// dug gas chen pa 'gyel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas/ de'i lus la 'gro
ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing/ dga' ba'i sems kyis ldang ngo// zin pa langs pa tsam nyid nag la dus sbrul bzung ste mu snang bar 'gyur ro// skad cag
ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi yabashes bsgom par bya'o// stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kye// gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin// tha'
dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kye// dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag dang dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod nga re rgyud las gsungs Sha/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma
zhig po de srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam par bya'o// de ltar slob pa la rjes su ya nang 'ba'i phyis lung bstan par bya'o// des lan brgya 'am stong du gsol ba btab nas/
dug 'dzoms pa'i sngags bstan par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha pA li ni AhU~M/ dug bza' ba'i sngags so// de nas gzhan yang don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la
dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dung phor gyi chu 'thungs pa des dug med par 'gyur// sbrul gyis mA 'dzin no// gal te 'tshan na de'i tsho klu 'chi bar 'dir the tsom med do// de ltar slobam sha la
ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson pa la bka' gnang ba byin te/ grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do// gal te yod na de'i tsho klu 'am bar 'gyur ro// de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo
rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gang ci'ang rung ba'i yon dor dbul bar bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung ste// gtor ma gtang bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sngags/
kyis gshegs su gsol to/ oMbud+d+hA ka pA li ni huu tang gats+tsha hUM hUM phaT/dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ chu yi sbyor ba bla med pa//
gang gis byin pa tsam gyis ni// dug ga zin de 'tsho bar 'gyur// nyo ma bdun du 'chi ba dang// gzhan yang dug gis nyams pa rnams// chun byin pa tsam gyis ni// 'di ru 'tsho bar the tshom med
sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// gnas dgu rnams su mchod par bya// dung porachu yis bkang byas pa// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// donas brtse ba chen po yis/
bcas bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la// zla ba yi ni khyad par bsam// bcu drug cha 'a sa yongs rdzogs pa'i// dri med dge ba lus can te// de'i dbus sa bon
mi shigs dag/ kha dog dkar po lus can no// lag des snod kyi kha bcad de// de nas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oM sarbab ha ra ha ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dris lan
bdun gyi bar du mngon par bsngags te/ mashag pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur nas chu'i nang du tham ste/ chu dang zla ba gcig tu 'dres pas shin tu dkar por gyur ro// gal te dug gis zin pa/
man na deb tsha chu glud do// yang nayi ba yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug par lan gsum du zhu rgyun mi 'chad par blugs na langs par 'dir the tsom med do// de nas chu blud na rnal mar
'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/sha la ka'i sbyor ba dang chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dang
de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// shin tu rnyed dka'i bcud len le'u// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sang po mchog/ rnal 'byor la yA gong na 'ad// gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka grub ma byis
pa can ma dang// de bzhin thod bzang can ma'o// bde dag sman na chen po lnga// sangs rgyas rdzas kyang red par dka'// 'a de dag thos pa tsam gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar do 'tsho ga
gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu// de bzhin sha ra ka zla gsum// grub pa zla ba gcig tu po/ byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis// thod can m yang zla bar te// tshe ba phul ba ya mchog
yin no// bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs// glang po ma ni ngangang ba gzugs// drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te/ sngo bsangs dkar chu sngon mo'i mig/ kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni/ mig/
las byung ba'i rdzas gang yani// sman deb mang ni gzhon nu ma// 'ad ru bstan par som nyi med/ de yi pad+ma las byung rdzas// rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas// gi sar sbas pa'i spyod yul/
te/ sbyan de sha ra ka ru gsungs// me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang// kha dog nag mos rab mdzes ma// gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus nga// de ya kha sbyar sbyor 'as byung// sman
lhod mi na grub mar bshadu// sangs rgyas byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// bud med rab mdzes ma nyams dang// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// mi phyed nye bar sdod pa yi// da las dang
por byung ba'i rdzas// sman da byis pa can no zhes// bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs// lhan cig skyes dga' byung ba'i rdzas// byang chub sems mchog chen mar khu// chags pa'i yi
ka chu dag dang ni// bsre 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// sman de'i mang thod can mo'i// zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis// bya bir 'dir ni the tshom med// zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyir// de lus skra dka
gnyer ma zhi// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar// de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur/ sman 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni// dag pa'i lus su 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang yang rung//
lcags dang zangs ma'i snod dag la// dngul ni phyugs pa tsam gyis ni// dngul dang gsar du 'gyur ba yin// de nas yang dag rab bshad ng// dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed dka' ba// rgyud gzhan

du na rab sdus pa// 'bad pa sa de 'dir rab gsal bya// dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste// dri chen rdo rje bzang po3de// khrag na mar med rdo rje yin// khu ba rdo rje'i thabs byung nyid// sha ni chos kyi d+do rje
yin// de la rnal 'byor ma yi mchog/ gang bas dam tshig red dka' ba'i// thabs 'dir pa dang da pa des bshad par bya// ba glang sha ni nga bar ba ste// khyi ya sha la spro bar gsungs// rta yi/
sha la bza' bar bshad// glang po'i sha la zhu bar gsungs// shachen la ni bzang por bshad// de la rnal 'byor mchog tu gsungs// rnal 'byor la 'byor ma ldan par// gal te gcig
du byed nus pa// de tsho rnam rtog de thams cad// 'jig 'gyur ba dir ni the tsam med// zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste// tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid// ro la shin tu rnyed dka' gsungs// byas/
pa la ni' gal ba nyid// g.yung mo la ni bzang mo'i gsungs// rus pa'i 'phreng la rdzas zhes bya// skyes bu la ni rdo rjer gsungs// bud med la ni snod bzang nyid// dbang po gnyis kyis
'bya// rab sbyor la// gzi brjid 'phreng chen de bshad de// rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid// 'khyud pa la na chos zhes brjod// 'dri ba la namar me// shin tu 'dril me/bsgyur la/ gzadzad 'phracha/
swa zhes bya// 'gro ba la na 'phrang can ma// 'od 'gan khub phreng can ma// myur ba la ni byug ces bya// dpa' ba la ni bzang de brjod// pad+ma rtse 'jo 'phreng can ma// sngags kyis mtshan la rab nges
na'o// bldag la lta log ces bya ste// sa la babra' ba sa la bad/ mig la lo'i rtsed mu tig rna/ gsang ba'i yul la rnyed dka' zhe'o// 'di dag bshad rdo lag chen ngo// 'jig rten gsum
na rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor nga// mid par phan tshun snami bya// 'on kyang bshad chen de nyid 'ad// gcig la gcig gis sba bar bya// rgyud rnams thams cad du sbas pa//
rgyuda'adi ru na gsal bar byas// nya mdun grong mtha' lhan cig ce'o// 'dus pa phyi rol zhes su gsungs// lta ba'i 'dus pa nang de bzhin// gonas 'a 'bras bu zhes su gsungs// te/
ba'i gnas la shung nyid do// grong mtha' la na sa bon gsungs// lta ba'i grong na tha' myu gu 'o// gas pa la ni sdong bur gsungs// gcig pu la ni 'dab ma ste// stong pa la ni rtsa ba'i 'o//
ga de ltar dgongs pas bshad pa ni// bde gshegs rnams kyis ma mkhyen no// spyan me la sogs rnal 'byor ma// rnams kyi khong du ma chud cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul ming zhing//
tsa bla ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spros pa thams cad sbas nas ni// rdzas la chags pa ma bya 'o// shin tu stong sgom rnal 'byor pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog med// gti mug dang
ni nga rgyal srungs// nyon mongs thamasA cad rnam par spangs/ khra 'thungs de bzhin glu len na// shin tu spros pa spang bar bya// bde bas dga' ba nyid dang ni// shes rab thabs kyis bdag
nyid gsungs// bla med de nyidi zla phyed kyis// 'grub par the tshom med pa'o// byed drags grogs mo 'gro kunu gang// mtha' dag dri ma med pa yi// blta dang bral la skye bo ltos// gsog
gso ba rang bzhin ba spu ba// nga da rtsi grib ma lta bur ltos// dbang po lnga na sgyu 'dra zhing// lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi// rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas bu grub// sangs rgyas thod pa'i
rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gon med pa gsang ba yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba lasaM/ sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///de nas yang dag rab
bshad pa// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa mchog gsang bar// thabs dang shes rab sgrub pa yin// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba// shes rab pad+ma'i nang dbus su// dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil
'khor la// gsum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus// 'khor ba'i 'jigs po la su skyob pa// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par// mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur//
[@]// gal te byang chub bla med 'dod// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa chen po skya bar 'gyur// des na rdul tshon tsam gyis ni//
de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'khor la rin chen dang/ de bzhin pad+ma ral gri nyid// dus na slar yang 'jigs byed pa// skyes bu tha shal dam la phar 'gro// gang gis
ti sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing// gang gus gshegs su gsol ba yis// rdo rje sems dpar byon pa dang// de bzhin gshogs pa byon pa rnams// gang na'ang byon pa ma yin no//
zla/ dri ma med cing dog pa'i 'us// gang gis spyan drangs gshags su gsol/ de nyid kyis na brtag med par// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya// lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo na//
tshul khrims ma nyams chags chung ba// thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo/ nad med sAng rje dang ldan ma// sems can don la gcig nan tan// rgod cing pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan// zla ba'i
cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma// mu cor ma smra brtan zhing dul// des na slob ma blo chen po// shin tu dad pa'i sems dang ldan/ 'dod med dbang po dul ba dang// chags dong chags bral rnam par
sangs// sems can don la shin tu sbyor// ga te mug zhe sdang phrag dog spangs// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// de rnams la ni de nyid bshad/ gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang
tsam nA bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang// gnyis ka gcig tu ba dus pa ba// gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya// slob ma legs dang ldan pa dang// brtse ldan sems gzhan med pa
yis// gas ra ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang/ sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa dang// glang po bud med dam pa dang// ral gri bakhor lo rtadang na// yongs 'dren skyes bu bzhi chen rnams//
sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// de ni bla mar dbul bar bya// shin tu dri med sems kyis ni// de nas 'dir ni gsol ba gdab// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ dpungaganyen
khyod kyis bsgral du gsol// bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing// sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs// kya kyi ston pa bla ma ni// mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod// de ltar
gsol 'debs tshig gsan nas// de ru blam mi gsung bzhugs/ man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni// glegs bam rnams las spyod yul mun// dkyil 'khor gang la gang gas brgyan//
mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kyi// su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kyi// 'gro ba brdzun 'dra'i som nyi'i lhung// mtha' dgo stong pa gos med kyi// chu nang zla ba rtswa 'dra ba// de
'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus gnas// kye la gas rnal 'byor ma tshogs ltos/ deron he ru ka gcig dang// thams cad skyed par byed ma yin// 'gro kun rmi lam su bas na/
sa gdug las ni bskyed pa ltos// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba bas/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri ba dang slob ma
dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// rangang phug dang tshang tshing ngam// yang na dur khrod dag dang ni// gdod nas grub pa'i gnas su 'am//
'on targya mtsho'i grum dag tu// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bla med gyi// rdul tshon sngon po na re bsregs pa song ba las bya'o// rdul tshon dmar po na dur khrod kyi so phag las byago/ rdul tshon
ljang khu na nim pa 'dab ma las bya'o// rdul tshon dkar pan mi'i rus pa'i phyi ma las bu'o// rdul tshon serapa ni yung ba'i phye ma 'dus bya'o// de ltar rdul tshon lnga rnams kyis// mkhas
pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// pho brang rigs gsum zlum po la// rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor// phyi rol kru ba'i lham pa yi// sgo bzhir rta babs rnams kyis brgyan// ba dan/
rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan// dra ba dru ba phyed pas spras// phyi rol kha khyer dag pa dang// na chen pha gur yang dag ldan// pad+ma nyi ma'i nyi shu lnga'i// gdan rnams kyis ni shin tumadzes//
tshal de yi dbus tshud sa bon ni// yi ge hUM gi rang bzhin sngo// skad cig tsam gyis ha ru ka/ sku mdog sngon po grags chen po// g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yon na kha TaM thod pa 'o//
skyil krung phyed bas 'jigs chen po// zhal gyis mche ba cung zad gtsigs// ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// dbu la sna tshogs rdo rje mnan/
zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha// sku 'pha tha' ba'i rdul gyis byugs// dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang// shin tu hUM sgrogs 'jigs byed pa// gar gyi stabs kyis rnam bar bzhugs/
mgo bo yin pa'i 'phreng ba can// mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba/ byed pa gti mug rnam dag nga/ 'breng ba brgyus pas brgyan pa'i lha// mgul do dang ni 'khor lo dang// rkung gdub
dang ni dpung rgyan dang/ gdu bu med pa'i ska rags dang// dpa' bo rna cha mtsheg gis brgyan// 'di 'dra'i gzugs can gtso bo na/hU~Mzhis zlos bar byed pa'o// de las byung ba'i rnal
'byor ga/ shurtsa bzhi 'i bdag nyid rnams/sku mdog sngon mo grags chen mo// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod pa 'chang// so so
yi ni ming ji bzhin// de rnams ming na rab tu bshad/[” ]'phreng bzang la kha dod can ma/'jigs ma/ thub dka' ma/ dge ba'i ska rags can ma/ gzugs can ma/ rnam rgyal ma/
'byung gnas ma thod can ma/ mtsho chen ma/ byed ma/ gsod ma/ sgrol ma/ 'jigs ma/ mthong ma/ mi bapham ma/ dag ma/ mjur byed ma/ dus mtshan ma/ grags chen ma/ mdzes
sdug ma/ nor 'dzin ga/ skal bzang ma/ grags mtheng ma'o// 'di lta bu yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan// de yi dbus gnas lha
mo ni// he ru ka la bde ster ma// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar byed ma// ma ya rus pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// lha mo 'od zer dpag dka' zhing// skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste// hU~M gi
bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs// zhal nas khrag na 'thor byed ma// dkar mo nag mo ljang ku ma// thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma// lha ya dkyil 'khor bskyod pa na// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i
bdag nyid gsungs// bdag nyid he ru ka gzugs la// tad+hishu rtsa bzhi'i lha mos mchod// thod pa bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba// he ru ka yas btung bar bya// de yis 'thungs pa
tsam gyis ni// 'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che// gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs// rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'du// de ltar he ru ka mgon pos// rnal 'byor ma kun spyod
par bya// thams cad sbyad pas zhu gyur te// nyima'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas// da na zhu bar mthong nas ni/ shin tu srid pa sgrub pa'i phyir// sgra ya rnal 'byor ma yis bskul// ni
ste 'jig rten snyan mnan no// ci phyir khyod ni ma dgyes gyur// gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na// ma dgyes gyur ba mtha' dag thong// srid 'jigs skye bo kun lhung bas// stong pa'i thugs ni ma
mdzad par// nyid kyi dgongs pa kun ba sgrubs kyi// rnal 'byor ma yi grogs pa bzhengs// gal te don gtso tshags gsum na// 'bras bu yal bar ma dor cig/ khyod ra snang na 'gro ba yi//
skye ba mtha' dag gdung bas zhan// leg pa 'i nga rgyal ma mdzad pa ra// stong pa'i rang bzhin sngangs nas ni// khyod kyis dngos med kun thang 'a// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs 'a spyod//
rnal 'byor na ni bzhi po yis// 'ad lta bu ya glu yis bskul// sngon bzhun ma dag dang mtshan sogs ldan// nu nas rna 'byar na rna' sa bskor// 'jigs pa 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i
dpa' bo chen po ba de bzhengs so// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i u0f7a yang shin tu gsang ba 'as// dkyil 'khor dang ha ru ka bskyed pa dang bsgom pa
le'u ste bdun pa'o/// de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor mchog 'bral re// ka dang rwa rgyas pa dang// da bzhin dbang dang man spyod de//
sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// gang gi sbyin sreg ma bya zhing// 'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang ran// ba ldag 'a bad 2 tog gis ni sbyin sreg bya// me tog lnga po/
mchog chen dang// 'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya// gal te zha ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod// zhi ba'i gzugs sogs ldan pas/ zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa// khabs dang rgyar ni mtho
gang ba// kha la rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dka po rtsi 'dus pa bri// rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po na// zhi ba hU~M bdag 'khor bar ni// de yi dbus su 'khor 'a la// gru gsum
pa yi ya gis brgyan// u waM ma yu mchog chen gyi// lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs// rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor// rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i dbus su nyi ma bsam/
nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hUM// kha dog dmar po'i 'od chen po// mtshalasu dang mtshams su de sngon// rtsa dgu sar po bri bar bya// bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste// phyis na sbyin sreg
yang dag brtsam// shes rab can gyis me ya lha// sngags 'ad yas ni spyan drangang// a sarba de ba hri da dra d+hi ne/ a ba kalpa su da ha na da ha da ha dz+wa la dzul/ dra sa ra pra sa ra/ A
gtsA A gats+tshA da ya khri kaM ni a tiSh+Thaya ti ya/ tiyati/ ki ki la/ hAhi ho ha hA/ hri hUM swAhA/ ma lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// shes rab can
sngags lan bdun bzlas// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs shing// mdog dkar du ba dang bral ba'i// me lha rgyal dbang byon nas kyang// thab khung gi ni dbus su bzhugs//
de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya// de ru sol ba bzhugs bya ba// a shwa ta dang n+ya gro d+ha// u dum wa ra ra ka ti// pa la sha ste shang lnga las// sol byas du med 'bar ba'i mi// blo ldan
0 thob khung dbus su bzhugs// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+ma brgyan ni rtsa brgyad dang// de bzhin utu la nyid dang// ku mu da dmar dri zhim 'dra// ka ra bA ra gzhan nyis 'gyur/
byas te bsregs pas na bar gsungs/ sbyin bdag mdun na ba dug pa 'a// de tshe du ba dbab par bya// mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di bton zhing/ pad+ma ma'i sbags bsreg par bya//

oM pad+ma rA dzaagi pra na ya a mu ka su shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ mkhas pa yisan sngags bzlas te/ sa tal 'o mas sbyin sreg bya/ a g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya te dzo rA dza bi nA ya shAt+taM ku ru swAhA/
mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis// gur kum ku mu da bsngags bsregs// oM su nga bre su ka ra tsa lo dz+wa la ni yishAn+taM ku ru swAhA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'a di yisan// dro
zhimatsan dan sbyin sreg bya// oM d+ha ni hA me rA dzod ha da hasarba bag+ho shAn+ti ku ru swAhU ka ra bIr dri zhim mar// mkhas pas sngags rgyal bzlas sreg/ oM ka la su ka la ka ra ka la dri
sarba pA pa da hod ha shAn+ti ku ru swAhA me tog rer ro'il// gsang sngags rgyal po lan re bzla// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bla med pa// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'// me'i 'o mas zhi
bar bya// de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya// rgyas la thab khung zlum po ste// chu yi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba// zabs dang rgyal ni mtho gsum ste/
ka'@#// kha dog ser por rnam par bsam// de dbus rdo rje rtsa dgu nga// sngo bu de stong pad 'dab brgyad// bdag nyid he ru ka rnam pa// khro ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid kyis//
shing bsregs dra yi sbyin sreg bya// gal te rgyas pa mchog 'dod na// a mu kan tha pa la dang/ an pal ba du du ra// shan tu rnyed dka' shang lnga las// sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du
slob dpon gyis ni gzung bar bya// ma gas la bsams ma bcud nyung// bu ga can gyi shing smyung ngo// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsam// rang
la ni brgya rtsa brgyad// bgrangs pa de nas sbyin sreg bya// bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul// skamadog nag po 'od chen pos// ma' dang yum shing thams cad ni/ sngags bsregs 'dir ni the tshom
mad/ a ga ga na ga ga na ba lo ka na hUM phaT/ 'dzorA dza puT+Ti ku ru swAhA/ shing rnams kun gyis sngags 'di yis// re re bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// phyis ni ser po'i chus zhi bya// 'di lta
rgyus pa'i sbyin sreg na// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'o// rgyud gzhan rnams su sdus pa ni// rgyud 'di ru na gsal bar byas// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dbang du bya ba'i
mi sbyin sreg mchog/ thab khung gru gsum dmar po la// thabs dang rgyur ni sor mo brgyad// de dbus pad+ma kha dog brgyad dmar// zla ba dmar la sogs pas brgyan// gro grwa run rdo rje dmar/
bdag nyidaha ru kar bsam pa// dmar po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag/ rdo rje dmar po thod pa bsnams// ye ngas su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis// khams gsum pa la rjes su chags// a/
go ka yi yam shang dang// go ro tsa nar ldan pa ni// blo ldan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs te// shin tu mnyam bzhag sngags ni 'i don// sa a sho ka ni su nga ku a nu ra ga ya tra lokya ba kaM ka
rwa lo tsa bsha mA na ya swA hA/ nyin bdun sbyin gra ga byas tsam gyis// khams gsum dbang du 'gyur ba yin// chu ni dmar pos ma zhi bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad nga// mngon spyod
da ni gsud pa mchog/ zla ba phyed pa'i cha 'dra'i thab// zabs dang rgyur na khru gang tshad// 'a jigs chon mdog ni ljang ku'o// klu grwa ru na rdo rje bri// dbus kyi sa gzhi stong pa ru// blo ldan
sha lngas sbyin sreg bya// gsod pa yi ni sbyin sreg mchog/ mngon spyod gsod pa 'u ni gsungs// dgra kun bstan cing zlog par byed// dgra bo thur du kha bltas shing// kha nas khrug ni
skyug pa nyid// sha ya dbus su bsam par bya// seng ldeng sol bas mi bya ste// med na 'ba' 'bo 'a nyid kyi// 'ba' 'bo tshor sag phug ste// brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags kyis sreg/
o mA ra ya ma ra ya kA la ya kA la ya sa/rma shad nAMnAka ya hUM phaT+Ta/ bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing// sku mdog sngon po thugs 'khrugs pas// dgra rnams thams cad rlag par ni// skad
cig de la the tshom med// phed mdzad 'jigs shing 'dris par bud// gu pa zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzod// gdug pa thams cad gsad par ni// sbyin sreg tsam
gyis tha tsam med// 'di lta'i gsad pa'i sbyin sreg dang mngon spyod kyang na rnyed dka' ba// rnal 'byor lha mos rtogs min na// sngags skyes phal lta smos ci dgos// de phyir sangs
rgyus thodapa yi// rnal 'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems// lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'// ljang ku'i chu yis mi zhi/ gang gas bsregs
'tsha shang gang zhig btsugs// gang gi zhi ba gang zhi ba// gang gis rnam rtog kun bcom pa// de yi sems ni mgu bar byed// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na
spyi med pa gsang ba'i ya nga shin tu gsang ba las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// da/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// spyod pa'i le'u shin tu rnyed doka' ba/
bud mod nyin tu mchog gyur dang// rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed// dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam// sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod//
de de'i dngos grub rtag tu star// lag pas thod pa bzung byas te// gcer bu sku grol gyur nga ya// brtul zhugs can gyi spyod pas 'am// gang du gang tshe de tsho der// rtag tu spyod pa
thams cad bya// rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing// nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa yi// shes rab can gyis kyis khyim du// slong mo bya bar the tshom med// yid dang mthun pa kun blangs
nas// bsam gtan gnas su the tshom med// dga' ba'i sems kyis bsams nas ni// rnal 'byor ma yis slong mo bslangs// chos la gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas// thod pa'i stong du
bzhag pa yi// rdzas ni da nas bza' bar bya// rdzas ni thos ma thag tu yang// khyim khyim thal phung shing drung dang// gang du gang tsho dar dang tsho// gang gis dga' ba'i sems de yis// blo
gros chen po gnyid 'a ga 'phreng// 'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya chen po nges par 'thob// de ltar yang ni rgyud las gsungs// gang du ji ltar de de ltal// gang gi de yis sangs
rgyas te// rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams// mtha' dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas byed pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/
spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas yang dag rab bshad nga// gcig tu sems can don rab nges// gsar du nges par byed pa'i le'u// slob dpon la ni rab dang
bas// mu tigadang no nya phyis dang// dngul chu dang na byu ru yis// gang gi sems can nor ldan 'gyur// 'di ni phyi yi sman man te// shun lpags la ma ma yin zhing// dngul chu bcud
[pi]@#// lan ma yin te// mu zi lhang tshur ma yin zhing// lcags dang zha nye zangs ma yin// lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te// grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no// 'di lta bu yi tshig/
thos nas// phyag na rdo rje stobs po ches// zhabs kyi rdul gyi ma btud nas/ sems dpa' gcig tu dad brtan pas// lha mo legs so zhes ni sgras// sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing//
dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu// gus pa yis ni rten par 'tshal// lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs// grub pa'i sman gyi mchog gang gis// gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur// tshor phel
zhib la brtson pa gang// sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis// sman chen grags pas 'grub pa gang// gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur// mo gsham bu dang ldan gyur gang// yang dang yang du mi 'chi
zhing sha nes yang dag 'tshor 'gyur ba/ lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs// bka' stsal pa/khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi// sman chen po yas kha grub ba ste// de yang stod bzang mchog la 'grub//
byas pa rmongs pas mi shes so// bdag don gcig pu la 'bab cing// kyi ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas// ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur// snod bzang la ni gnas pa'i bcud//
ze 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te// ro bcud rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i// sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod// gang gsalcags ni gser 'gyur bar// gcig gis kyang na grangs med 'gyur// 'di lta
ca bu ya sman chen mchog/ ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas// rab 'byor chog sngon 'gro bas// sman gyi mchog ni de grub par 'gyur// der ni yang dag sbyor pa bshad// dad pa brtan pa yis ni
nyon// me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang// gzhon nu kha dog nag mo ste// rgyud 'di thod pa dang ldan zhing// ngo tsha med cing ltos med la/ 'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse// de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams sten cing// rtag tu rab sbas ngartsog med ma/ 'di lta'i bud medaMrab blangs te// sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam// skyes bu shin tu chugs che zhing// myur du byang chub sems
'bab pa// gang yin de la dngos grub med// 'di lta bu yi snyan che po// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'// shin tu brtan nga 'i sems kyis ni// blo ldan bud med de rnams bsten//
da ltar yang gsungs pa/rab tu brtan pa gtso ba'i gnas// zhes ni sgrub pa po rnams sna// de phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// snod bzang 'bras bu bskul bar bya// der ni ma rtog ldan
bud med// gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka' brtsam// grub pa'i bcud kyis byug pa yis// zla ba rang gi snying kar bsam// sngon du ri yi rgyal pos brgyan// der ni yi ge hU~M sa bon// sems
can don la gcig tu ba bad// blo ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam// zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas// zlum po snod bzang la bcug ste// g.yon pa bskum pa'i g.yas zur
gzhag/ med na lcags kyang bya ba yin// brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni// de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam// ri rab zla ba sa bon rgyal// zhu 'gyur the
tshom med pa yin// snod bzang dag ni ngal bsos pas// 'pho ba'i sbyor bas 'o jog pa nyid// bzang por gyur du rab byas te/ ma khas pa yis ni byug par bya// rdzog po byugs pa
tsam gyis ni// mi yi nang du gzhug bya zhing// de nas shes rab can bltas na// gser du bgyur pa the tshom med// de ni ma sha gcig gis na/ srang brgyar ni 'gyur ba yin// de ltar
gser gyi sbyor ba mchog/ 'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'// gal te sman yin tshad min na// nga tsho sangs rgyus tshad ma yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir// dngos po gang dang gang
zla/ gsus pa// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di tshad ma'i sa ba'i// blo gros chen po thos ldan pa// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs
kyi bar// de dag thams cad dmyal bar 'gro// sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na// chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang// bla med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// de dag thams cad brdzun par/
'gyur// mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang// sems can sangs rgyas chos la 'tshe// sman gyi mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba// skad cig de la the tshom med// sems can don la gcig tu 'bad//
tsami sgo ldan 'grub pa lta ci smos// san mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur// ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod// me ni bskal pa bye bar 'tsho// de nas yang dag rab bshad nga// mo gsham/
rnams kyi bu med pa// yang dag sbyor bas bkrus tsam gyis// skad cig de la bu ldan 'gyur// sngon gyi gtso bos ji skad gsungs// khrus kyi cho ga rab tu bshad// kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon
nam// yang na rdul tshon dkar po yas// dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yis// dkyil 'khor 'jigs par bri bar bya// de ni bum pa lta tsha ba// zlum po bzhi na gzhag pa'i bya// shes
rab can gyis chu yas dgang// ngas kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya// rang gi khrag gis mtshan ma bri// bud med mo gsham da ya na// khams kyis gtso bo blangs nas ni// mkhas pas bum
pa'i kha lu byug de nas khrag 'thung go 'phang la// gnas pa sgrom pa'i mchog ldan pas// nag po dmar mo 'jigs chen po// rdo rjes hU~M las yang dag byung// 'jigs pa'i ma ltar
'jigs byed pa// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// bla ma 'jigs pa'i gar byed cing// mkhas pas shun sgrogs bzhin pa// blo ldan bum pa'i nang du bsam// de nas ral gri 'am
pa yi// skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po// khro gzhan gyi sems dang ldan// 'jigs chen skyes bu de rnams kyis// ral gris nam mkhar bsnun cing gsod// sangs rgyas thod pa'i
sbyor ba dang// 'di lta bu la sbyor ldan pas// da bzhin du ni bud med bkru// skad cig de la bkrus tsam gyis// bud med bu dang ldan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sman tshon po khyad par can dang/ mo gsham gyi khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o///
de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// mkha' lding sbyor las byung ba'i 'a// sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'abya// blo ldan he ru ka dang ni//
kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed// mtshan ma phyag sogs sngon gaMsung bzhin// kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid// phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar zhing// mtshams kyi dmar po nyid
