chung mni// 'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar// lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags nas// sbyong rtsi 'o ma'i rgyun gyis bkru// o suko b+ha bi b+hUha saMhA/ zhe bar byed pa'i sngags so/ 'ji
ba'i snod blang byas la// pad+ma'i dbyibs kyi rnam par bya// rno ba'i til mar yungs kar gyis// bug pa dgang zhing sbyor bar bya// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// sab
ldeng phur pas brdung bya zhing// sngags ni brgyad brgya rab bzlas na// b+ha ga gzar zhung gzi bor 'gyur// jipa la ta hUM phaT/ bdi yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid
de chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing// sngags dang mngon du sbyar bar bya// oM sarba sho d+ha ni swAhA/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo// gzhan yang las kyi
mtshan nyid ni// shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyad d// rgyal po lam gyi sa rdul rlung/ yang ni bzhi mdo'i sa rdul las// pad+ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni// b+ha pha'i snying po khrag dang ni// yi dgas
T+Tha phyag rgya phyag rgya yis// brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas// thi pra phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// pad+ma sdom pa'i las su bsgyur// oM a mr-i ta wa tisAhA/ dkon mchog gsum la
gnod pa dang// bla ma dang ni slob dpon spyod// dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba ni/ sdug gas gos par ma 'gyur ro// gal te rmongs shing bro ba ni// las kyis rtag tu byas nas ni// 'dis ni nges par ltung
ba ru// sangs rgyas kyis gsung the tsom med// las kyi rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so////gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don// snying po'i mchog ni mdor bsdus pa/
ca rob mo bstan bcos sogs glu la// de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas// gnyis med dngos po'i ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar 'gyur// gses kyi dngos po bdag min pas// gas dngos dngos po
mad pa yi// dngos po dngos min dngos chad la// mnyam nyid lta ba'i soms kyis su// rnam par rten dang brten bya med// rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul pa dang// gzugs dra gzugs can zad pa' byed/

rang bzhin yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid// sems kyi brtan pa'i gnas su ni// bsam gtan bsam bya bsam par bya// dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// thams cad dbyings su 'dzag par byed// stong nyid stong la sogs/

stong pa'i// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid// dag cing ba la phra ba'i don// sems dang sems pa dang bcas pas// kun tu dngos po dngos med pas// thams cad nam mkha' bsdam pa le/rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i
don/ nam mkha'i khams ltar bstan sams pas// ma stagardul phran yan lag 'phro// chu skyor bzhin du brtag pa yi// rnam shes ye shes lhag ma na/ nam mkhar 'phro zhing snang ba 'o// nyon mongs de bzhin
mun pa ni g.yags rdo rjes bcomanas su/ rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bar// ye shes snang ba sogs thob 'gyur// sems dang sems byung soms pa yis// rnam par lta zhing rab tu spyad// 'jigs pa med cing

'tshemadabar// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// thams cad rgyan du snang byed cing/ khums cad 'od zer kun bsdus dang// snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni/ dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ a la ke la rab sbyor bas//
byung ba ya ni ba bon mchog/ sbyor ba 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni// mnyam nyid rnal 'byor pa yase sgom/ sa bonanam mkha' smyos pa yis// 'jigarten gsum snang ba byas/ ma lus
sprin ltar spro ba nyid// skad cig gis ni spro zhing bsdu// phyis ni rang 'dod dmagos mod cing// yi ge mad pas yang bsam mo// gzugs ni stong par brtag pa yi// mnyam nyid sems dang sems kyisani//
rgyu ma lus rnamabar bltas pa yis// khams gsum snang bar byed pa 'o// de ltar sems kyis bsams pa yis// byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur// skad cig gzugs dang gzung nyid dang// skad cige zung
tsha po'i rnam pa dang// skad cig thams cad dbyibs rnams ni// da phyirami rtag pa ya gnas // legs byas tas byas mnge can ni// shes pas smad par mi bya 'o// gzugs dang stong pa la
sogs dbus// sems dang sems byung rnam par mtshon// dngos po'i lhag ma dngos mad pas// de yi lhag ma gzugs med pa'o/ ye shes ri mo 'bar ba yis// 'od zer
mnyam par gnas pa nyid/ da yi mtshan nyid mtshonapa nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyad// rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi 'os/ yang dag byang chub brtag pa bo// yid du 'ong
ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sngon du bstan pa rab brtsams nas// las dang don kun rab grub pa'o// re reb rtse mor kun bsams pa// rang 'dod rgyal
chen gazhal yas khang// sna tshogs ni chen rang bzhin mchog dub bu dra sa mngon par ma rgyan/ gdugs dkar po dang ba dan dang// sna tshogs mchod pas mngon par brgyan//
rdordzas mas dpa' bdag nyid ni// dkaradang kund klu bar byed// de ni rgyan Da/chu rgyus nga rgyal zhing// sangs rgyas lnga yas mngon ra la chas// rab tu mdzes pa'i gos bsnams shing/
phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dril// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam mang po/// ka'athu nus rdo pa'i 'od phyir ngu/ ngams gsum pa yi rnam pani// sems dang sams kyis sgom pa 'o// snying khar
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dmar po'i hU~Mni res 'bar ba/ glu re ba med legyi ri bo/ ba sbya'i bu ga nas 'a phra pa'o/ shar du rdo rje gzhag pa dang// lho ru mda' ni
rnam par dgod// nub tu ral gri mtshon pa dang// byang du gzhu ni ye da tsho pa'i 'ag/sa ba la sogs bzhi/ mtshams dang mtsho mas su gtag nga grwa ba/ 'di
ltar mtshan nyid sngon ldan pas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom/ pa sa bon gtso mo na/ de nyid ldan pas yang sngags bzlas/ phyag 'tshal srug pa mthar bzhag
pa 'bum phrag gsum du rab bstan pas// rdo rje'i lus dang lus nyid ni/ rdo rje sams dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// sbas nga 'i dang po snying po dang/ rdo rje chos dang
chos mchog go/ rdordzasams ni rjes mchod pa'i// hUM gi glu yi rnam pas bya// bkra shis sgra ni ston pa yis// mnyam par bzhag pas blang bar
bya khyi ba nA dzA la te mAn+tia nu ra ya na wa ti/ ras saM ha sra tIkA d+ha sa su pa ra sra wa ti/ ba hu bi da ru pa po sha a nu ra ya na ta ta ta wa ti/ na ta a badzra sa pa
bas ra la wa ti sAhA/ gdan bzhi rgyud ni rgya chen las// stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa// de yi dngos po mdor bsdus las// snying po mdor
ni bsdus pa 'o// sdobs sbyor sgra dang rtog sogs mad// don dang don na yang dag bsdus// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i don ni sbes pa nyid// brda yi skad kyis bshad/
pa bo/ gdan bzhi de las yang dag par btus pa sngags kyi cho'i rgyud bshad pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ho ra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bgos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
